Rubber backing.

name: EcoFlex 3L Storm Pants
description:
Our new TEK O2 technology makes our four-season waterproof pants even more breathable. It's guaranteed to keep you dry and comfortable – whatever the activity and whatever the weather. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted through hip and thigh. 

Why We Love It: Our state-of-the-art TEK O2 technology offers the most breathability we've ever tested. Great as ski pants, they're ideal for a variety of outdoor activities year-round. Plus, they're loaded with features outdoor enthusiasts appreciate, including weather-blocking gaiters and handy side zips. Air In. Water Out. See how our air-permeable TEK O2 technology keeps you dry and comfortable. 

Fabric & Care: 100% nylon, exclusive of trim. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Three-layer shell delivers waterproof protection. Brand new TEK O2 technology provides enhanced breathability. Interior gaiters keep out rain and snow. Full side zips for easy on/off over boots. Two zippered hand pockets. Thigh pocket. Imported.

name: Smooth Comfort Check Shirt, Slightly Fitted
description: Our men's slightly fitted check shirt is the perfect choice for your wardrobe! Customers love how it fits right out of the dryer. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted, Relaxed through the chest and sleeve with a slightly slimmer waist. Fabric & Care: 100% cotton poplin, with wrinkle-free performance that won't wash out. Our innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly. Additional Features: Traditional styling with a button-down collar and a single patch pocket. Imported.

name: Mens Outdoor Research Apex Gloves
description: These Outdoor Research Arete gloves are perfect for your backcountry adventures. They feature a tough Taslan nylon shell and removable Gore-Tex® nylon fleece liner that is quick-drying and provides complete protection and warmth. The stretchy nylon Lycra elastane soft-shell fabric on the back of the hands allows for freedom of movement, while the ergonomic design lets your hands move naturally for maximum comfort. The gauntlet closure seals out snow and cold wind, and a special pocket allows for a heat pack to be inserted to help keep your hands warm. Both the shell and 100-weight-fleece liner can be worn alone or together for maximum warmth. Imported. These gloves also offer serious waterproof protection from the elements, and are highly breathable to allow moisture vapor to escape. Get the durability you expect from Gore-Tex fabrics.

name: Women's Ultraplush Sweats, Relaxed Crewneck
description: This crewneck sweatshirt is crafted from soft french terry, making it feel great after a long day. It also looks so good it could be worn around town. Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body and falls at the hip. It's made of 95% cotton and 5% spandex and is a substantial midweight french terry fabric, smooth on the outside and softly looped on the inside. It's designed with shaping for a flattering, feminine fit and features raglan sleeves, a straight hem with side slits, and a curved hem that's slightly longer in the back. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Mountain Man Fleece Jacket
description:
Our best-value fleece jacket is designed with inspiration from our archives and made from 100% recycled polyester for unbeatable comfort and wear-anywhere style. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip. 

Why We Love It: Our designers took inspiration from the  archives to create this ultrasoft fleece jacket. We love how the heritage styling is updated with a modern, slimming fit. Plus, it’s made from 100% recycled fleece – so you can stay warm and feel good about it. 

Fabric & Care: 100% recycled fleece is soft, cozy and gentle on the planet. Ultraplush fibers resist wind for even more warmth. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Features our classic Mount Katahdin logo. Bart Boot lace-inspired zippers and drawcord. Two lower zippered hand pockets. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem seal out cold air. Imported.

name: Compact Camping Table, 25"
description: This aluminum portable camp table is perfect for car camping trips, picnics and tailgates. It features a one-piece design with telescoping legs that folds down into a small package. The table is made from lightweight yet durable aluminum and can hold up to 60 lb. The open dimensions are 25"H x 25"W x 27.5"D and the folded dimensions are 25"H x 24"W x 2"D, and the weight is 5 lb. 10 oz. This table can accommodate dinner for up to four people or can be used as a side table.

name: Cozy Comfort Pullover Set, Stripe
description:
Perfect for lounging, this striped knit set lives up to its name. We used ultrasoft fabric and an easy design that's as comfortable at bedtime as it is when we have to make a quick run out.

Size & Fit
- Pants are Favorite Fit: Sits lower on the waist.

Imported.

name: Ultra-Lofty 850 Stretch Down Hooded Jacket
description: This technical stretch down jacket from our DownTek collection is sure to keep you warm and comfortable with its full-stretch construction providing exceptional range of motion. With a slightly fitted style that falls at the hip and best with a midweight layer, this jacket is suitable for light activity up to 20° and moderate activity up to -30°. The soft and durable 100% polyester shell offers complete windproof protection and is insulated with warm, lofty goose down. Other features include welded baffles for a no-stitch construction and excellent stretch, an adjustable hood, an interior media port and mesh stash pocket and a hem drawcord. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

description:

Top-quality wool for exceptional durability. 
Warm when wet and quiet in the woods.

Pocket buttons are reinforced for security. 
Two buttons on cuffs for increased adjustability.

Even when something is loved as much as a classic chambray, there's always something you can do to make it even better. And that's just what we did – introducing our exclusive easy-care chambray. It's light, breathable and sheds wrinkles. Just throw it in the wash, and it's ready to wear right out of the dryer.

name: Wind Chaser 110 Kayak
description:
This lightweight recreational kayak is designed with a hard-chined hull for superior performance, a generously sized cockpit for easy entry and exit, and excellent stability so everyone in the family will enjoy paddling it. 

Specs: 
Capacity: 278 lb. 
Weight: 38 lb. with seat; 32 lb. without seat. 
Dimensions: 11' x 27". 

Construction: 
Made from superlight, durable thermoformed ABS plastic. 

Additional Features: 
Stern bulkhead provides flotation and dry storage. 
10-inch hinge hatch allows easy access to stern storage compartment. 
Bow and stern deck bungee for dry bag and gear storage. 
Paddle holder secures paddle to deck. 
Super-comfortable frame seat easily clips into a mounted bracket under the deck. 
Seat can be removed for use as a beach chair. 
Twist-loc foot brace system easily adjusts from a seated position. 
Molded grab handles at bow and stern offer a comfortable grip for carrying. 
55-inch XL cockpit allows easy entry/exit and accommodates a small child or pet. 
USA.

name: Camo Trekker Midweight Quarter-Zip Pullover Hoodie
description:
This camo quarter-zip hoodie is an extremely versatile mid layer that's great for all hunting seasons. It's made from warm, breathable fleece and features an innovative lightweight hood with a built-in face mask. 

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: An excellent layering piece for cold weather. Wind-resistant hard-shell fleece is quiet and resists water, debris and snags. Super-soft fleece interior is warm and can be worn over layers or next-to-skin. Unique lightweight hood has a built in face mask for extra warmth and total concealment. Built-in articulation allows excellent range of motion. Quarter-length zipper allows for easy on/off and ventilation. Single vertical upper chest storage pocket. Thumbholes in cuff allow extra coverage; they stay closed when not in use. Flat seams won't chafe or catch on under layers. Imported.

name: Summit Soft Loveseat
description:
Our upholstered loveseat sofa is designed for smaller spaces – and years of enjoyment. Specs: Dimensions: 38"H x 61"W x 36"D. Weight: 115 lb. 

Why We Love It: We worked closely with expert upholstery craftsmen in North Carolina to bring you this sturdy classic-styled loveseat at a comfortable price. Our well-designed Pine Point Upholstered Collection features soft yet durable fabric in an enduring traditional style to suit any space. 

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester fabric. Spot clean. 

Construction: Kiln dried hardwood and manufactured wood. Heavy-gauge steel springs provide extra support. High-density foam and soft polyester fiberfill. 

Additional Features: Comes fully upholstered in a choice of colors for timeless appeal. Designed with plush cushioning in a versatile classic style. USA, fabric imported. 

Questions? Please contact our customer service team for more information.

description:

Additional Features:
- Appropriate for touring, fitness paddling and light river running.
- Inflates up to a rock-hard 20 psi for performance that is close to a hard board.
- Streamlined construction for lightweight performance.
- Four D-rings for attaching gear and essentials.
- Includes three fins, travel carry bag, pump and a repair kit.
- Folds up compactly when deflated for easy transport and storage.
- EVA Deck Pad provides textured surface for grip and comfort.
- Imported.

name: Militia Pullover, Crewneck

Formerly known as Trim Fit, our Slightly Fitted Sweaters are relaxed through the chest and sleeves and have a slightly slimmer waist. Fabric & Care: 100% merino lambswool, 21 oz. Shoulder and elbow patches: 100% cotton. Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. Additional Features: Warm wool sweater like those worn by the British Commandos in World War II. Excellent resiliency and shape retention. Crew neck and turn-back cuffs. Elbow and shoulder patches ensure long wear. Well-loved customer favorite. Neat, trim appearance. Nonbinding fit for outdoor comfort. Imported.

name: Junior All-Terrain Adventurers
description: Our colorful kids' waterproof hiking shoes feature exclusive Tek2.5 technology and sneaker-like comfort, for fun on and off the trail. Why We Love It: Our hiking boots have a bright design that young hikers will love to wear – and the fun look goes easily from the trail to school. The great fit and rugged construction of these boots earn high marks with our customers, year after year. Construction: Breathable mesh nylon and water-resistant suede upper. Nylex lining. Additional Features: Cushioned EVA midsole and removable EVA footbed provide noticeable comfort, right out of the box. Heel and toe bumpers add durability. Lace-up style for a custom fit. TEK2.5 waterproofing ensures feet will stay dry in all conditions. Trail Trac rubber outsole features a versatile lug pattern for traction on a variety of surfaces. Imported.

name: Women's PrimaLoft Downpour Jacket
description: Our PrimaLoft hooded insulated jacket is redesigned to keep you warm and lightweight in any weather. It is wind and water resistant and offers two levels of comfort: light activity to 35° and moderate activity to -15°. The updated construction is made with PrimaLoft’s Cross Core technology, which is a fusion of PrimaLoft Gold insulation and Aerogel. This combination provides 15% more warmth without any additional weight. The polyester shell and lining is 100% recycled and machine washable. This jacket features an easy on/off elastic hood, an internal media pocket with audio port, two handpockets, one chest pocket, drawcord hem, and a take-along pocket for easy storage. Explore Cross Core and watch the video for more information.

name: MaxGrip Sport Socks, Twin Pack
description: Our women's moisture-wicking socks are designed with quick-drying, breathable fabric and thoughtful cushioning to keep your feet cool and dry during any activity. Additional Features: CoolMax yarn offers advanced moisture control, NanoGlide technology reduces friction and prevents blisters, mesh surrounds the foot for 360 degrees of breathability, cushioned heels and toes. Fabric imported from USA.

has been crafting authentic handsewn moccasins of the highest quality since 1936 – and the craftsmanship and comfort of these heritage mocs are no exception.

name:
ed

Rangeley Camp Performance Checked Flannel Shirt

description:
Warm, waterproof, odor fighting, durable, ultracomfortable and with great traction, these insulated rubber hunting boots stand out from any other rubber boots on the market. They're also lighter than most rubber boots. Light activity: to 20°  Moderate activity: to -30° about comfort ratings.

name: Garmin MiniTrack Satellite Communicator
description:
The Garmin inReachMini is a palm-sized satellite communicator that lets you send and receive text messages, track and share your journey and, if necessary, trigger an SOS alert to contact the GEOS 24/7 emergency response team. It has dimensions of 3.90”H x 2.04”W x 1.03”W and weighs 3.5 oz. It has a display size of 0.9" x 0.9" with a resolution of 128 x 128 pixels. It is powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery with a water rating of IPX7, able to withstand immersion in water up to 1 meter for up to 30 minutes. It has a battery life of up to 90 hours at 10-minute tracking; up to 35 hours at 10-minute tracking with 1-second logging; up to 24 days at 30-minute tracking power save mode; and up to 1 year when powered off. 

Why We Love It:
Always be connected with family and friends with the Garmin inReach Mini Satellite Communicator. It is 100% waterproof with 100% global Iridium satellite coverage allowing two-way text messaging from anywhere in the world (subscription required). Trigger an SOS alert and

name: Fjord Fleece Sweater
description: Inspired by the traditional sweaters of Norway – worn as a defense against the bone-chilling conditions at sea – this sweater is made of premium 100% wool that will keep you warm wherever you are. Why We Love It: While imitations are endless, it’s hard to find authentic sweaters like these anywhere else, especially at this price. Competitors use wool-blend yarns, more modern machinery and take other measures that just can’t compensate for the tried-and-true craftsmanship of our heirloom sweaters. Made exclusively for us the old-fashioned way, each sweater is expertly knit in Norway by family-run businesses who’ve been making them for generations. Fabric & Care: Premium 100% wool. Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. Construction: Heavyweight wool is warm enough for unusual cold, whether braving the sea or a New England winter. Additional Features: Time-honored craftsmanship, featuring designs and traditions that go back for generations. Norwegian villagers traditionally knit distinct patterns or cables into the sweaters for good luck. Made in Norway.

name: Women's Luxurious Shearling-Lined Slides
description:
Pamper your soles with these easy-on women's Wicked Good slide slippers, made from authentic shearling and available in jewel tones. Size & Fit - Half sizes order up. 

Why We Love Them - With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it’s clear customers think our Wicked Good Slippers deserve the title of Best Slippers Ever Made. They make such a great gift that we sell a pair every 7 seconds during our peak in December. Why are they so popular? There are a few reasons but at the top of the list is the most cozy shearling you can find. Throw in superior construction using premium sheepskin and you’ll know why in Maine, “Wicked Good” is as good as it gets. 

Fabric & Care - Spot clean. 

Construction - Sheepskin suede upper. Genuine lambswool shearling lining wicks moisture. Durable outsole for added traction. EVA foam footbed. Imported (fur Australia).

name: Sealed Leather Moc
description:
Whoever said “they don’t build things like they used to” doesn’t own the  Boot. In an easy-to-slip-on, weather-resistant rubber moc style, this pair is handcrafted in Maine with the attention to detail we've insisted on for over 100 years. 

Size & Fit
- With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down. 
- With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down. 

Why We Love Them
An avid outdoorsman, Bartholomew Barnstormer wanted to create a comfortable, dry pair of boots for tromping through the backwoods of Maine. Today, our Signature Collection rubber mocs are still sewn right here in Maine, one pair at a time, from rugged, weather-resistant waxed canvas that gets even better with age.

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
- Crafted from rugged, weather-resistant waxed canvas. 
- Still made here in Maine from the highest quality materials.

name: Kork-Ease Myrna Comfort Sandals
description: These platform wedge sandals from Kork-Ease have been beautifully crafted since 1953 for exceptional comfort and timeless style. Constructed from full-grain leather, they feature an adjustable buckle, cushioned footbed, and a cork wedge. Imported. If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Men's Trail Model 4 All-Terrain Waterproof Hiking Shoes
description: The comfort of sneakers combined with the protection and support of hiking boots make this shoe an ideal choice for casual wear as well as outdoor adventures. Weighing in at around 2 lb. 5 oz., these shoes feature our exclusive VertiGrip outsole with pronounced multidirectional lugs for excellent traction. The breathable TEK2.5 barrier keeps your feet dry, while the suede and fabric upper, cushioned EVA midsole and removable footbed offer noticeable comfort, right out of the box. Heel-and-toe bumpers add durability. Imported.

name: Big Agnes Big House 4 Deluxe Tent Ground Cover
description: Protect your tent floor from rocks, debris, and pitch with this footprint. Designed specifically for the Big Agnes Big House 4 Deluxe tent, this ultralight footprint attaches directly to the poles for easy setup. It is made from polyester with 1500mm waterproof polyurethane coating to protect your tent floor from abrasion or punctures. It weighs 15 oz and is imported.

name: New Balance Women's 990v4 Trail Runners
description:
The latest in New Balance's Made in the USA series, these lightweight road-running shoes combine cushioning and stability designed especially for the moderate-to-high-mileage runner. 

Size & Fit: We recommend ordering a half size up or your regular New Balance size. Approx. weight: 1 lb. 7 oz. per pair. Drop: ½".

Made right here in New England, the New Balance 990v4 delivers improved performance and a cool, retro look every runner will appreciate. This latest-generation 990-series running shoe is more breathable than ever, and features a lace keeper to keep the tongue comfortably in place while you rack up the miles.

Construction: Pigskin-and-mesh upper is rugged, breathable and lightweight. Special ENCAP midsole technology provides support, cushioning and stability. Long-lasting blown rubber outsole. Breathable fabric lining. Soft tongue and dual-density foam collar. Removable foam insole. Made in the USA.

name: Women's New Balance 608 Leather Cross Comfort Shoes
description:
Thanks to their signature fit, natural construction and advanced cushioning, these all-around women‘s leather New Balance sneakers will help you keep moving in comfort. 

Size & Fit
You should order New Balance active footwear one half size larger than your usual shoe size or your regular New Balance size. Fit best with midweight socks. 

Specs
Approx. Weight: 1 lb 3 oz. per pair.

Construction
Genuine leather upper looks polished yet sporty. EVA midsole ensures long wear. Abzorb technology in the heel and forefoot provides shock absorption. Dual-density collar foam protects your heels and ankles from rubbing. Nonmarking outsole allows for wear on a variety of surfaces. Flex grooves in sole increase flexibility for more natural range of movement. Soft, breathable textile lining. Imported.

name: Women's Oboz Sawtooth Trekking Shoes
description:
These Oboz Sawtooth hiking shoes are the perfect combination of an athletic profile and heavy-duty tread, making them suitable for a walk in the park or tackling the most challenging trails. The ventilated design offers breathability and comfort in warm weather.

Size & Fit: Order your regular shoe size.

Specs: Approx. weight: 1 lb. 8 oz.

Construction:
- New upper and panel mesh are softer and more breathable. 
- Nubuck leather upper with abrasion-resistant synthetic panels. 
- 3D molded heel counter helps shoes maintain a snug, comfortable heel hold over time. 
- Dual-density EVA midsole provides supportive balanced cushioning. 
- Nylon shank offers added support between heel and forefoot. 
- Classic Oboz Sawtooth sole sheds mud and provides exceptional traction. 
- Sidewall lugs grip off-camber trails while shaving weight. 
- Low-density EVA pods provide cushioning and comfort. 
- Imported.

name: Kids' OluKai Nohea Breeze Slip-Ons
description: With its handsewn seam stitching, comfy fit and easy-going style, these Hawaiian-inspired kids' OluKai slip-ons are sure to be instant favorites from the get-go. Constructed with lightweight, durable cotton canvas upper, with soft microfiber lining, the shoes feature elastic goring for easy on/off, an anatomical compression-molded EVA footbed with arch and heel contour for all-day support, and a rubber cupsole for year-round conditions. The all-weather rubber outsole has heavy gauge sidewall stitching and molded rubber pods for traction. Additional features include a versatile Drop-in Heel® that lets kids wear them as a shoe or a slide, a removable and washable footbed, and embroidered logo detailing. Imported. "Nohea Lole" translates to "handsome/lovely."

name: Angler's Athletic Shorts
description:
These high-performance fly-fishing shorts are also great for all-around wear. They're made with super-comfortable, durable materials with built-in technical fishing features.

Size & Fit
Standard Fit: Sits lower on the waist and straight through the hip and thigh for a streamlined look.

Fabric & Care
90% nylon, 10% spandex. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low.

Construction
Quick-drying lightweight synthetic fabric with four-way stretch for comfort and performance. Articulation provides active range of motion.

Additional Features
Two front slash pockets with nylon web reinforcements for knife/tool clip. Nylon web belt loops are low profile and rugged. Right-rear and left-front-thigh zippered security pockets for wallet, phone or other essentials. Center front button is secure and extremely durable. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off 
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Print Flannel Trousers
description: Welcome crisp fall nights with cozy flannel pajama pants, complete with pockets and an easy-on drawstring waist. Size & Fit Classic Fit: Sits at the waist. Inseam: 30". Petite 28". Fabric & Care 100% cotton flannel, brushed for extra softness. Machine wash and dry. Imported. Questions? Contact our customer service team for further assistance.

name: Premium Double L Short-Sleeve Polo Banded Without Pocket
description:
This extraordinary all-cotton polo simply will not wrinkle, fade, shrink or pill. Size & Fit - Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. Why We Love It - We’ve updated the fit of our most popular polo, with trimmer, shorter sleeves that sit higher on the shoulders. It will look and feel great for years to come. Fabric & Care - Super-soft cotton pique-knit allows air to circulate. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features - Printed label for added comfort. Imported. 

 for Business - Your Logo. Our Quality. SAVE UP TO 20% WITH VOLUME DISCOUNTS - Add your logo to this product for business outfitting, gear and gifts.

name: CamelBak Chute Mag Elite Water Bottle, 12 oz.
description:
This new-and-improved Chute water bottle features a magnetic top that easily stows the cap while you're drinking. 100% leakproof, it's a great choice for staying hydrated during all your outdoor adventures. 

Specs 
- Capacity: 12 oz. 
- Height: 7.9" 
- Weight: 4.5 oz. 

Construction 
- BPA-, BPS- and BPF-free. 
- Made from Tritan copolyester. 
- Cap is made from polypropylene. 

Additional Features 
- Magnetic handle keeps cap stowed while drinking. 
- 100% leakproof design. 
- Ergonomic high-flow spout. 
- Comfortable carry handle. 
- All parts are top rack dishwasher safe. 
- Fits most car cup holders. 
- Imported.

name: Mountain Peak Polarized Sunglasses
description: The Native Catamount features a semi-rimless, vented frame that's ideal for cycling, Nordic skiing, mountain biking and other high-energy pursuits. Interchangable lenses allow you to adapt these polarized sunglasses to changing light conditions. Construction includes lenses that selectively filter UV for higher contrast and crisp definition, blocking up to four times more infrared light than standard lenses. The frames are made of Rhyno-Tuff AIR, a light and durable material, with Cushinol nose and temple pads to prevent slipping, cam-action hinges for durability and crisp opening, and a tri-laminate frame construction that improves durability. The Mastoid Temple Grip helps keep frames in place and the Advanced polarized N3 polycarbonate lenses are extremely durable. Frames are also made from biodegradable caster resin instead of petroleum-based products. Imported.

name: Women's Salomon Sense Adventure Trail Runner
description:
These Salomon trail shoes offer a great fit and generous cushioning so you can push the mileage and stay comfortable all day. We recommend ordering a half larger than your regular shoe size or your regular Salomon size. Approx. weight: 1 lb. per pair. Drop: 8 mm. 

Construction:
- 3D printed open-mesh upper is lightweight and highly breathable.
- Sensifit upper cradles the foot for a secure, custom-fit feel.
- Quicklace one-pull tightening system with a lace pocket to stow laces out of the way.
- OrthoLite sock liner keeps feet cooler and drier and adds plush cushioning. 
- Vibe assembly limits vibration for a smooth ride.
- Feel confident on slick and slippery surfaces with the Contragrip outsole.
- Imported.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Tropicview Baseball Cap
description:
This sun-blocking baseball hat features a rear flap for extra coverage. It provides UPF 50+ rated sun protection, the highest possible. 

Fabric & Care 
Body: 71% nylon, 29% polyester. 
Mesh: 85% polyester, 15% S.Cafe polyester. 
Sweatband: 100% polyester. 
Handwash, line dry.

Additional Features 
Rear flap allows additional protection and can be tucked away when not needed. 
Elastic cord allows for infinite adjustment for a fit that's always comfortable. 
Coolmax sweatband wicks away moisture to keep you comfortable in even the hottest of weather. 
Dark underbrim does not reflect sun. 
Mesh side panels increase ventilation. 
Imported.

name: Cozy Cable Knit Slipper Sock
description:
Inspired by our traditional fisherman's sweater, our cable-knit slipper socks are made from soft New Zealand lambswool that will keep your feet warm on cold mornings. 

Fabric & Care: Handwash, dry flat.

Construction: Upper: 85% New Zealand lambswool, 15% acrylic. Outsole: Suede leather for indoor traction. Sock top is ribbed to stay up. Open-cell foam footbed provides cushioning and insulation.

Additional Features: Roll them up and take them with you when you travel to make any place feel more like home. Imported. 

Questions? Please contact us if you have any questions.

name:
oblast

NanoBoost
description:
This innovative new product provides a wide range of benefits for its users. If you have any questions about how it works, our experts are here to help.

This innovative new product provides a wide range of benefits for its users. If you have any questions about how it works, our customer support team is available to answer your queries.

description:
A textured stripe adds even more beauty to our 100% cashmere sweater. It's perfectly timeless and made of the finest fibers on earth. 

Size & Fit
- Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.
- Falls at hip. 

Why We Love It
For thousands of years, Inner Mongolia has produced the finest cashmere yarns. So soft and supple, it's the most beautiful cashmere we've ever felt – and it's the source for all of our Classic Cashmere Sweaters.

Fabric & Care 
- 100% Inner Mongolian two-ply cashmere.
- Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. 

Additional Features
- Narrow ribbed trim.
- Imported.

name: Arctic Flip 18 Cooler
description:
This premium soft-sided cooler features state-of-the-art insulation and construction that keep food and drinks impressively cold for days. The Hopper Flip 18 is also super-durable, leakproof, and versatile for many outdoor uses. 

Specs: 
Exterior dimensions: 12.6”H  x 15.6”W × 10.25”D.
Interior dimensions: 10.25"H x 14.25”W x 8.5”D.
Weight: 5.1 lb.
Capacity: 20 12 oz. cans (with 2-to-1 ice-to-can ratio).

Construction: 
DryHide high-density fabric shell is waterproof and resistant to mildew, punctures, and UV rays.
Liner is made from FDA-approved food grade material.
ColdCell closed-cell rubber foam offers far superior cold-holding to ordinary soft coolers.
HydroLok zipper is the toughest, most water- and leakproof cooler zipper in the world.
Wide-mouth opening allows easy access and visibility to contents.
Hitchpoint Grid allows easy attachment of a bottle opener, carabiners,

name:
-Functional

Traveler's Companion Backpack.
description:
This day pack is a lightweight, fun option that is perfect for travel. It packs up small, into its own internal pocket, making it easy to take with you wherever you go. Here are the specs:

Capacity: 1,343 cu. in., 22 L.
Weight: 14 oz.
Dimensions: 19"H x 10"W x 7"D. 
Packed size: 8" x 7".

It is made of super-light and extra-tough ripstop nylon fabric, and features a panel-load design for greater convenience. The padded foam shoulder straps and back panel ensure all-day comfort, and the back panel also features wicking Air Mesh. There are multiple pockets for organizing your gear, including a front "shove it" pocket that is easily accessible.

The day pack also features an internal stow pocket for easy packing, two mesh water-bottle pockets with loop locks to keep bottles secure, an adjustable waistbelt and sternum strap to keep the pack secure against your body, and a “Blinky” loop for attaching a light. It is imported.

name: AquaSport Swimwear, Bottom
description: Our BartSport Swim Bottom is crafted with premium Italian swim fabric that is breathable and quick-drying. Chlorine-resistant and long-lasting, it will withstand the sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. The moderate leg openings provide great coverage and maintain its shape season after season of fun. Rated to UPF 50+, it offers protection from the sun's UV rays. Handwash and line dry for best results. Mix and match BartSport Swim Separates to create the perfect suit. Imported.

name: Katablock Wind Hooded Jacket
description:
This lightweight wind jacket is softer, lighter and more breathable than the average windbreaker. With its fun colorblock design, it resists the elements, keeping you dry and comfortable.

Size & Fit
- Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.
- Best with midweight layer.
- Falls below hip.

Fabric & Care
- Weather-resistant and ultralight 100% nylon.
- Moisture-wicking 100% polyester lining keeps you dry and comfortable.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Adjustable hood easily stows away when you don't need it.
- One chest pocket, two zipper pockets.
- Elastic cuffs.
- Hem drawcord.
- Imported.

name: Women's Cozy Comfort Cross Band Slide
description:
These ultra-cozy cross-band slides feature plush shearling underfoot and on the slide straps, making them luxuriously comfortable.

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up.

Fabric & Care: Spot clean only with mild soap & water, using damp cloth. Allow to dry away from direct heat.

Construction: 
- Footbed and straps lined with the finest premium shearling.
- Super cushioned foam midsole. 
- Whip stitch detail provides extra durability. 
- Lamb fur is dyed and treated. 
- Rubber outsole for extra traction and long-lasting durability. 
- Imported.

Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for assistance.

name:
Top

Soft Cotton Colorblock Crew-Neck Top
description:
A lighter double-knit layer – ideal for transitioning from spring into summer. Crafted in a heathered blend of 98% cotton and 2% nylon for supreme comfort. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. 

Why We Love It: For decades, our Two-Layer River Driver's Shirt has been a warm favorite for cool days and harsh, wet weather. When warmer days call for something lighter with just as much comfort, this colorblocked shirt is the answer. 

Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Raglan sleeves offer ease of motion. Ribbed collar and cuffs. Straight hem looks great untucked. Imported.

name: Swix XC Comfort Gloves
description: These insulated cross-country ski gloves are designed for those colder days when you need maximum protection on the trails. They're also a great choice if you're into running no matter how cold it gets. Construction features include a Gore Windstopper Outer shell that blocks all wind, a neoprene flex panel for excellent range of motion, PrimaLoft insulation for reliable warmth, reflective piping for visibility in low light, a synthetic leather palm for excellent grip and a Swix-Dry lining that wicks moisture away from skin, keeping your hands dry. Imported.  Have questions? Contact us for assistance.

name: Kiddos' Superb Slippers
description:
Our shearling slippers wrap completely around little feet for soft, cozy comfort. 

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up.

Fabric & Care: Made with superior sheepskin. Naturally warm premium shearling lining draws moisture away from feet. Genuine lamb fur is dyed and treated. Spot clean.

Additional Features: Durable outsole for added traction and occasional outdoor use. Imported.

name: Mountain Peak Fleece Jacket
description:
Our Mountain Pile Fleece Jacket is the perfect addition to your winter wardrobe. Whether you wear it on its own or as an extra layer, you can rest assured that you'll stay warm and comfortable. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care: Shell: 100% polyester. Piecing: 55% polyester/45% nylon. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: This versatile design is perfect for any outdoor activity, from the trail to around town. The heavyweight sherpa fleece provides unbeatable warmth and plush comfort. Elastic cuffs and hem keep out the chill. Imported.

name: Ragg Wool Sweater, Crewneck
description: Our versatile ragg sweater is crafted with a soft and comfortable cotton/linen blend and features thick waffle stitching for added texture. Cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist, this sweater is lightweight and perfect for layering. With 71% cotton and 29% linen, it offers comfortable warmth without ever feeling too heavy. The ribbed trim keeps its shape and allows for easy layering over a tee or woven shirt. Imported.

name: Men's Tropical Adventure Zip-Leg Pants
description:
Keep your options open with these Men’s convertible cargo pants. The two quick zips allow you to adapt to any weather, quickly transforming the pants into shorts. 

Size & Fit
Inseams: Pants 31¼"; Shorts 7".
Classic Fit: Sits at the natural waist and trim, with a traditional straight leg.

Fabric & Care
94% nylon, 6% spandex wicks moisture and resists wrinkles. Built-in SunSmart™ UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Button front with zip fly. Adjustable nylon belt. Two front slash pockets, two cargo pockets, two rear pockets. Zippered security pocket. Elastic inserts in waist. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: ® Men's Arctic Trekkers
description:
Warm, dry feet have been a timeless staple, so L.L. has kept their innovative 1912 design the same. 

Size & Fit
With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.
With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Why We Love Them
Whoever says “they don’t build things like they used to” must not have a pair of these boots. Today, our signature boots are still handcrafted right here in Maine – one pair at a time – by expert craftspeople whose technical skills and passion for their work shines through in every pair of boots they make. Our “duck” boots combine the waterproof protection of rubber-bottom boots with the supple comfort of full-grain leather.

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
Full-grain leather sheds rain and snow.
Waterproof protection of rubber combined with the comfort of leather.
A uniquely shaped foot form offers comfort and stability, and a steel shank adds support.
Made in Maine.

name: Women's Camo Mountain Fleece Vest
description:
Designed for unbeatable warmth and plush comfort, our camouflage heavyweight Sherpa-Fleece Vest looks great from mountain peak to base lodge. Why We Love It: We turned to our archives for inspiration when designing this extraplush sherpa fleece. It's the perfect layer for cold days on the mountain, gathering around the campfire, or running into town. 

Fabric & Care: Thick and cozy 300-weight sherpa fleece provides serious warmth during outdoor excursions. 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Elastic at arm holes and hem for flexible comfort and to block out wind. Features our classic Mount Katahdin logo. Zippered hand pockets.

name:
s

Rain Striders, Patterns
description:
These kids' patterned rain boots are made to stand up to the muddy and wet conditions that little ones get themselves into. They are durable and leakproof in kid-friendly prints, perfect for splashing around on those rainy days. 

Size & Fit - Half sizes order up.

Construction - Durable waterproof rubber won't stiffen or crack over time. Features 3M™ Scotchlite™ Reflective Material back triangle, removable insole lined in jersey-knit cotton, sure-grip outsole for improved traction and firefighter-boot-inspired grab handles. Imported.

name: Mountain Ready Boys' 3-in-1 Jacket
description: This 3-in-1 jacket is waterproof and breathable, with a PrimaLoft liner and lots of features kids will love. It is slightly fitted and made from 100% nylon shell and 100% nylon mini-ripstop liner with 100% polyester PrimaLoft Silver insulation. It offers ultimate weather protection with media ports allowing kids to keep their tunes on while wearing the liner, shell or both. The comfort ratings are light activity to 20° and moderate activity to -5°. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Fluoroflex Max Tippet
description: This strong and durable fluorocarbon tippet material is the perfect choice for nymphs and streamers. Specs: Length: 30 yd. Construction: Made of supple, strong 100% fluorocarbon. Nearly invisible in the water and abrasion resistant, this material is a little stiffer and denser than traditional leader material. Additional features: Ties excellent knots, even to nylon tippet and leaders. USA. If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Cozy Cuddles Knit Pullover Set
description:
Perfect for lounging, this knit set lives up to its name. We used ultrasoft fabric and an easy design that's as comfortable at bedtime as it is when we have to make a quick run out. 

Size & Fit 
Pants are Favorite Fit: Sits lower on the waist. 
Relaxed Fit: Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body. 

Fabric & Care 
In the softest blend of 63% polyester, 35% rayon and 2% spandex.

Additional Features 
Relaxed fit top with raglan sleeves and rounded hem. 
Pull-on pants have a wide elastic waistband and drawstring, side pockets and a modern slim leg. 
Imported.

name: Executive Leather Briefcase
description:
This leather briefcase offers undeniable craftsmanship and world-class quality for your workday. With the finest oiled cowhide leather, antiqued brass-finish hardware and cotton twill lining, it comes with a top zip closure and several additional features. Inside is an interior zipper pocket, a neoprene laptop sleeve with integrated tablet pocket and stud-and-socket tab closure, as well as two front pockets with genuine buckle closures. On the rear is a newspaper pocket with a magnetic snap closure, and there's an embossed logo at the side. Imported. 

Specs: Capacity - Approx. 579 cu. in., 9 L; Weight - 2 lb. 14 oz; Dimensions - 12¾"H x 16½"W x 2¾"D.

name: Mens  Footwear, Gumshoes
description:
's original "antidote to wet feet," our Maine-made gumshoes provide the same waterproof comfort customers have come to expect over the past 100 years. 

Size & Fit
With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down. 
With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Why We Love Them
Whoever says “they don’t build things like they used to,” doesn’t own these boots. Our  Boots are still sewn right here in Maine – one pair at a time – by expert craftspeople whose technical skills and passion for their work is evident in every pair of boots they make. Warm, dry feet haven’t gone out of style in a hundred years, so we haven’t needed to change L.L.’s innovative 1912 design.

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
Made from premium full-grain leather that sheds rain and snow. Supportive steel shank and rubber chain-tread bottom

name: Comfort Cotton Slacks
description: Our women's Perfect Fit Pants offer an exceptional look and feel. With a blend of 90% jersey-knit cotton and 10% stretchy and resilient Lycra 3D, these pants will stretch and move with you, but never lose their shape. Size & Fit: Inseams: Misses 30", Petite 28", Medium Tall 32", Women's 30". Classic Fit: Sits at the waist. Slightly fitted through hip and thigh. Straight-leg. Fabric & Care: Made of smooth 90% jersey-knit cotton with 10% stretchy and resilient Lycra 3D. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Stretch jersey-knit fabric feels substantial next to skin and offers great coverage. Yarn-dyed for stay-true color, wash after wash. Flat-front elastic waistband. Drapes nicely and doesn't cling. Front pockets. Printed label. Imported.

name: Cozy Cardigan Vest
description:
This cotton sweater vest is the perfect complement to flannel or plaid. Pair it with your favorite shirt or even a soft knit tee.

Size & Fit
Relaxed Fit: Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care
100% Cotton. Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features
Chevron stitchwork at front panel. Exaggerated side slits. Imported.

name: Women's Stretch Down Quilted Jacket
description: Our stretch down puffer coat is the perfect combination of warmth and mobility. It is designed to keep you warm and comfortable in temperatures as low as -35°F and is perfect for light to moderate activities. The slightly fitted coat falls at midthigh and is best layered with midweight clothing. The windproof 100% polyester shell is exceptionally warm and features down insulation that is RDS certified for best practices in animal welfare. Plus, it's equipped with a removable and adjustable hood, one interior pocket, and two zipper hand pockets. The low-profile storm cuffs will keep you protected from the elements. The coat is easy to care for - simply machine wash and dry. This coat is imported.

name: Freshly Starched Chino Shorts, 6"
description: The Washed Chinos have a casual washed-down softness and a hint of stretch for exceptional comfort. Perfect for weekends and warm days, these flattering khaki women's shorts are designed to be closer fitting. We recommend ordering one size up for a looser fit. The inseam is 6" and it sits lower on the waist for a slightly fitted look through the hip and thigh. The fabric is a blend of 99% cotton and 1% spandex for shape retention. The inside waistband is tailored with contrast fabric, and there are front slash pockets and back welt pockets. The fly front is secured with a zipper, and the chinos are machine washable and dryable. Imported. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to reach out.

name: Heritage Cotton/Linen Raglan Poncho
description:
This ultracozy take on the classic ragg sweater is a hooded poncho crafted from beautifully marled cotton and linen for amazing texture. 

Size & Fit
Relaxed Fit: Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care
This poncho is made from a midweight blend of 71% cotton and 29% linen. Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features
This poncho has a kangaroo front pocket and adjustable side ties. Imported. 

Questions?
Reach out to our customer service team for assistance.

name: Luxe Fleece Neck Cuddler
description:
Our coziest neckwarmer ever, made from incredibly plush hiloft fleece that resists wind and traps heat for even more warmth. Why We Love It: The outside is inside everything we make. That's why we're committed to making quality products that also minimize environmental impact. We used recycled fabric made entirely from plastic bottles to make this ultrasoft, ultrawarm fleece neckwarmer—because we believe in staying warm and feeling good about it, too. 

Fabric & Care: Extra cozy hiloft fleece with a brushed interior. Plush fibers resist wind and trap heat for even more warmth. Made from 100% recycled polyester for minimal impact on the environment. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Adjustable for a customized fit. Longer in front for extra coverage. Imported.

name: Mountain Explorer Outdoor Jacket
description: This Men's Upland jacket is designed with improved pockets and tough fabric to withstand the most rugged environments. It features exclusive durable Uplander Cloth nylon, treated with highly water-resistant laminate to resist stains, heavy drizzle, and sharp thorns. Articulated sleeves, bi-swing back and underarm gussets offer a relaxed fit and the freedom of movement needed for fast-flying crossers. Hidden vents on back provide ample airflow, while two lower button-front cargo pockets with shell loops, front-loading game bag with zipper, dual zippered pockets, two upper handwarmer pockets, and interior zippered security pocket provide plenty of storage options. Adjustable button cuffs, corduroy trim and license loop on back complete the look. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Lady's Cloche Hat
description: This bucket hat is perfect for a day in the sun. Made from soft 100% cotton, the 100% polyester CoolMax® sweatband is designed to wick away moisture. It's easy to pack and store in your beach bag, and the 3" brim provides extra sun protection. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name: Dual Line Spare Arbor Reel Spool
description: This durable spare spool is perfect for our Double L Standard Arbor Fly Reel. It is made from anodized, machined 6000-series aluminum, and features a standard arbor design that fits 3 and 4 weight lines. The spool is generously drilled for better balance on light rods, and provides plenty of capacity for line and backing. It is imported, and if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name:
olock

microlock

With a wide range of features, such as temperature control, a rotating barrel, and a heat-resistant glove, this tool is designed to provide users with the highest quality results. If you have any questions or need help deciding which tool is right for you, our customer service team is here to help. 

This hair styling tool is the perfect choice for achieving beautiful results for any hairstyle. name: Men's Arctic Sport Muck Trekkers, Mid-Cut
description:
These Men's ankle muck boots with toe bumpers provide feet protection from extreme elements. Waterproof and insulated, they are ideal for cold weather.

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up. Fit best with a midweight sock.

Specs: Approx. weight: 4 lb. 2 oz. per pair.

Construction: Waterproof neoprene and rubber construction. Neoprene bootie wraps comfortably around your foot and calf, shutting out the cold. Breathable Airmesh and fleece lining keep feet warm and comfortable. Thermal foam in the instep area insulates feet from the cold ground. Reinforced outsole has protective toe bumper with molded lugs for traction. 12"H. Imported.

name: Women's Tropical Plaid Shirt
description:
Our lightest hot-weather shirt lets you beat the heat with a flattering fit.

name: ProStretch Fleece Hoodie Jacket
description:
Stay warm, dry and comfortable with our breathable soft-lined women’s hooded fleece jacket. This jacket is made of lightweight ProStretch fabric, which provides extra mobility and is four times more wind resistant than standard fleece. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip. 

Fabric & Care: 98% polyester, 2% elastane in main body and sleeves. 92% polyester, 8% elastane in side panels. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Treated with DWR for water resistance. Repels more moisture than standard fleece. Comfortable moisture-wicking, brushed-fleece interior. ProStretch fabric allows for extra mobility. Flatlock stitching for easy layering. Ponytail port at back of hood. Two hand pockets. Imported. 

 – Official Supplier to the U.S. Ski Team
THEIR WILL TO WIN, WOVEN RIGHT IN. LEARN MORE

name: Garmin Marathoner GPS Running Watch
description:
The Garmin Forerunner 25 GPS Running Watch is an advanced training timepiece perfect for any runner. Beginners and marathoners alike will benefit from the high-sensitivity GPS that tracks time, distance, pace and calories burned.

Why We Love It: 
Besides tracking distance, pace and calories burned, The Forerunner 25 features Garmin Connect. You can upload your activities to a free online community to see your run on a map, get more detail, see

name: Benchmade Mountain Ridge Skinner Knife
description:
Benchmade's premium skinning knife is crafted with cutting-edge materials tested to withstand the toughest conditions. The specs of this blade include a modified clip point style with a 4.2" blade length and 8.7" overall length, weighing 4.7 ounces and reaching an impressive hardness of 58-60 HRC. The CPM-S30V stainless-steel blade offers superior edge retention, long-lasting durability and corrosion resistance. The DymaLux handle is contoured to provide a sure grip while dressing game and a leather sheath with belt loop is included. This knife is proudly made in the USA. 

NOTICE: You must be at least 18 years old to purchase this product. Check your state and local laws for any additional restrictions that may apply before ordering.

name: Manly Muck Boots by ®, 8"
description:
Our legendary Maine-made  Boot – designed by "L.L." himself in 1912 and keeping feet dry and comfortable ever since. Chances are, you’ll only ever need one pair. Size & Fit: With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down. With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Why We Love Them: Whoever says “they don’t build things like they used to,” doesn't own these boots. Today, our signature boots are still sewn right here in Maine – one pair at a time – by expert craftspeople whose technical skills and passion for their work is evident in every pair of boots they make. Warm, dry feet haven’t gone out of style in a hundred years, so we haven’t needed to change L.L.’s innovative design. Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction: Waterproof protection of rubber-bottom boots with the supple comfort of full-grain leather. A uniquely shaped foot form offers comfort and stability, and a

name: Men's All-Terrain Katahdin Hiking Boots, Leather Mesh
description: This lightweight and versatile leather-and-mesh style alpine hiker is perfect for short hikes and everyday wear. Featuring our TEK2.5® waterproof system and wicking lining to keep feet dry and comfortable, this shoe also has a VertiGrip rubber outsole with lugged traction tread for great traction. Additionally, a padded collar, EVA sock liner, and bi-color stacked EVA midsole all add to the comfort of the shoe. Lastly, a D-Ring lace system with speed hooks and our retro Mt. Katahdin logo on the tongue make it easy to put on and take off. Approx. weight: 3 lb. 4 oz. per pair. Height: 4". Imported.

name: Rain Dancer Waterproof Boots, Lace-Up
description:
Our classic  Boot design now features all the Storm Chaser features you love. Breakthrough SolarCore insulation technology gives you maximum insulating power with low weight. Comfort ratings: Light activity to 30° and Moderate activity to -10°. For best fit, wear midweight socks. Half sizes not offered? Order up to the next whole size.

Combining all-weather protection of our Storm Chaser with the timeless design of our iconic  Boots, you get a classic look that is perfect for ice, snow and slush. SolarCore aerogel delivers serious thermal power in one of the thinnest packages on the market. Plus, it’s proven not to lose warmth when wet or compressed.

Construction details include waterproof full-grain nubuck leather, 200-gram water-resistant PrimaLoft for extraordinary warmth, molded EVA midsole, EVA-molded footbed and nylon shank, molded toe bumper and waterproof heel counter, siped rubber outsole with multi-lugged tread, TEK2.5 waterproof/breathable membrane inner lining, and leather/nylon pull-on loop on back collar. Imported.

name: Resilient Comfort Boxer Brief
description:
We took our exclusive wool performance fabric and designed a comfortable boxer brief for everyday wear. Made from nature's best insulator – itch-free merino wool. 

Size & Fit
4.5" inseam.

Fabric & Care
Breathable, itch-free 100% merino wool provides warmth and comfort. Fine-gauge knit, with flat-lock seams to eliminate chafing. Merino wool naturally resists odors so you stay fresher, longer. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry in the shade.

Additional Features
Lined waistband for a better fit. Fully functioning fly. Imported.

name: Flexible Knit Cords, Slim-Leg
description:
This streamlined and flattering pair of knit corduroy pants offer the tailored look of slim-leg cords without compromising comfort. Just the right amount of stretch and an elastic waist ensure that you'll feel great all day.

Size & Fit
- Inseams: Misses' 30", Petite 28", Medium Tall 32".
- Classic Fit: Sits at the waist.
- Fitted through hip and thigh.
- Slim-leg.

Fabric & Care
- In 73% cotton and 23% polyester with 4% Lycra® elastane for shape retention and ease of movement.
- Yarn-dyed for color that lasts, wash after wash.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Smooth, flat-front elastic waistband.
- Imported.

name: KidKomfort Pack Plus
description:
This comfortable, lightweight and well-ventilated child-carrier backpack will transport your little one safely. It's exceptionally easy to get a perfect fit and meets all international safety standards.

Specs
- Capacity: 48.5 lb.
- Weight: 7.67 lb.
- Dimensions: 29"H x 15"W x 17"D.

Construction
- Made from 210D nylon shadow box, 400HD nylon packcloth and 420HD nylon packcloth.
- Aluminum frame and hinges.

Additional Features
- Osprey's unique Anti-Gravity suspension ensures a fast and supercomfortable fit.
- Airspeed back panel allows air flow to help keep you cool.
- Two large grab handles.
- Removable and washable drool pad.
- Wide base with locking footbar makes it stable when placed on the ground.
- Built-in sunshade.
- Adjustable child-seat height with safety leg loops and adjustable/removable stirrups.
- Hydration reservoir sleeve in back panel, reservoir sold separately.
- Imported.

name: Men's K2 Precision Boa Ice Skates
description: These K2 recreational ice skates feature a Boa closure for superfast on/off and a custom fit. SoftBoot technology provides the stability of a stiff boot in a lightweight, comfortable skate. The Boa-closure system offers stability and the Stability Plus Cuff provides excellent support with an integrated buckle for an adjustable fit. Insulated and water resistant with Thinsulate™ Insulation for warmth, these skates are durable, comfortable and will keep you skating comfortably for hours. The injection-locked stainless steel blade resists corrosion and is easy to maintain. Half sizes should order up, and these skates are imported.

name: Glideaway Kayak Paddle
description:
This adjustable kayak paddle is designed for both beginner and recreational kayakers alike. It is lightweight and features technical elements. 

Specs: 
Blade size: 18" L x 6¾" W.
Weight: 2 lb. 5 oz.

Construction: 
Lightweight aluminum shaft.
Polypropylene blades. 
Blades are shaped to eliminate flutter.
Built-in, molded drip rings. 

Additional Features: 
Adjustable ferrules can be unfeathered or feathered to 60° for both right- and left-hand control. 
Made in the USA. 

If you have any questions, please contact the manufacturer.

name: Kids' Adventurer Snowshoe with Boa Bindings Package
description:
Revolutionary snowshoes built for kids. 

Size & Fit: Fit kids' winter boots size 4 to 7. 

Specs: 
Length: 19"L. 
Capacity: 50 to 110 lb. 
Weight: 4 lb. 4 oz. per pair. 

Construction: 
Frame is made from exceptionally lightweight and durable 6,000-series aluminum. 
The Boa-closure is made from 49 individual strands of aircraft grade stainless steel wire. 
Deck is built from rugged polyethylene. 
New deck mounts stiffen the deck to make a more responsive snowshoe. 

Additional Features: 
Easy-to-use Boa-closure allows superfast binding adjustment even for kids wearing mittens 
Adapts to fit most types and sizes of winter boot. 
Incredibly easy to switch between users of different size feet. 
Package includes three-piece 7,000-series aluminum snowshoe poles and heavy-duty snowshoe bag. 
Imported. 

FIND WINTER ADVENTURE
Walk your favorite trails all winter long. We have the perfect snowshoes for every type of hiker

name: Men's OluKai Nohea Breeze Slip-Ons
description: These men's mesh slip-on shoes are designed with a versatile drop-in heel and ultrabreathable mesh upper, giving them a sleek, distinguished look with handsewn seam stitching and embroidered details. Elastic gore side panels provide a comfortable fit, while moisture-wicking Dri-Lex microfiber lining keeps feet cool and dry. An all-weather nonmarking rubber outsole with heavy-gauge sidewall stitch provides support and traction. Imported. Questions? Please contact customer service.

name: Nova Prime Pump
description: The NRS Super 2 pump is designed with a patented double-chamber to make inflating SUPs up to 25 psi a breeze. This pump is built from durable molded plastic with an aluminum shaft for maximum durability. It features a large 1.4L single-action stroke and 3.8L double-action stroke for quick inflation, and comes with a 49" hose. The integrated pressure gauge ensures precise inflation and the AIR MAX and POWER BOOSTER buttons allow for single or double-barrel action. Ideal for high-pressure inflatables, this pump is also great for deflating them as well. Imported.

name: Moultrie A-700 Pro Game Camera
description: Take your scouting game to a new level with this compact, lightweight and affordable game camera. It shoots clear, crisp images and HD videos with sound so you can see exactly what's out there. Specs: Dimensions: 4.8"H x 3.5"W x 3"D. Battery life: 17,000 images. Additional Features: Moultrie’s ILLUMNI-NIGHT sensor allows bright and clear nighttime images. Moultrie Pine camo color for concealment. Compact size is easy to carry and conceal. 32 LED invisible flash technology won't spook game. 14 megapixel resolution images. 720P video capability. 50' flash and detection range. Powered by 8 AA batteries; batteries sold separately. 0.7 second trigger speed. Compatible with Moultrie Mobile’s MV2 and MA2 Cellular Field Modems; sold separately. Imported.

name: Double-Layer Base Layer, Crewneck
description: When it's cold outside, the first layer is the most important - and the double-layered design of these men's thermal shirts provides the ideal solution. Fabric & Care: Durable knit outer layer combines 50% cotton/ 40% merino wool/ 10% nylon, with an inside layer of soft, breathable, itch-free 100% cotton. Machine wash and dry. Construction: Super-soft, warm two-layer construction won’t bind. Rib-knit cuffs with Lycra elastane hold their shape. Nonchafing flatlock seams for superior comfort. Made in Canada.

name: NatureFlex Packaway Jacket
description: This women's lightweight winter jacket is perfect for year-round use. It is designed to keep you toasty warm and can be worn alone or with layers. It also stuffs into its own hand pocket for easy packing. Comfort ratings range from light activity (35°) to moderate activity (-15°). The size and fit are improved for a trimmer body and upper arms, with a center back length of 25¾ in size M. It falls at the hip and is made of ultralight 100% ripstop nylon, with lightweight and compressible 60-gram PrimaLoft® One polyester insulation. The wind- and water-resistant shell and drawcord hem help keep body heat in. Elasticized cuffs provide a snug fit. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Women's Katahdin Leather Mesh Waterproof Hiking Boots
description:
The classic alpine hiker is back, with retro style and all-day comfort you'll want to wear beyond the trail. 

Specs:  Approx. weight: 1.8 lb. 

Construction:
Classic hiker-inspired suede leather and mesh upper. 
TEK2.5® waterproof system and wicking fabric lining keep feet dry and comfortable.
Lugged rubber outsole for traction. 
Bi-color stacked EVA midsole inspired by European hiking boots.
Classic padded collar and EVA sock liner for comfort. 
D-Ring lace system with speed hooks for easy on/off and a secure fit. 

Additional Features: 
Features our retro Mt. Katahdin logo on tongue.
A great choice for short hikes and everyday wear. 
Imported.

name: Cashmere Lace Pants
description:
These women's silk pants are light and provide a subtle warmth without being bulky - the soft pointelle-knit fabric adds a feminine touch. 

Fabric & Care
100% pointelle-knit silk.
Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features
Elasticized waist.
Imported.

name: Wilderness Warrior Pants
description:
Whether you’re hunting for varmints, predators or winter waterfowl, these snow camo pants are the perfect outer layer to seal in warmth—and provide exceptional cover. 

Size & Fit: Oversized to fit over your warm clothing. 

Fabric & Care: Made from silent, soft Hush Hide polyester fabric. Machine wash, line dry.

Additional Features: Camo pattern is ideal for predator, varmint hunting and winter water-fowling. Pants slide on easily over boots. Elastic waist with drawcord and gathered cuffs. Access slots allow you to get into interior pockets. Imported.

name: MaxGrip XtraSport Socks, Twin Pack
description: Our women’s moisture-wicking socks are designed with quick-drying, breathable fabric and thoughtful cushioning to keep your feet cool and dry during any activity. Fabric & Care includes 43% nylon, 40% CoolMax polyester, 15% NanoGlide nylon, and 2% spandex. Machine wash and dry for convenience. Additional Features include CoolMax yarn for advanced moisture control, NanoGlide technology to reduce friction and minimize blisters, mesh fabric around the foot for 360 degrees of breathability, and cushioned heels and toes. Fabric imported from USA.

name:
Tee

Comfy Cotton-Modal Scoopneck Tee
description:
Crave-worthy softness and perfect drape in a collarbone-skimming scoopneck silhouette. It's our favorite premium T-shirt with eye-opening style updates. 

Size & Fit

Falls at high hip.

name: Women's ExOfficio All-Day Comfort Bikini Brief
description: Easy-care women's ExOfficio underwear is built for adventure travel, but it's so comfortable it might just become your everyday underwear. Fabric & Care: 94% nylon and 6% spandex. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry in the shade. Additional Features: Breathable and moisture-wicking. Antimicrobial technology offers advanced protection against odors. Pack down small so they won't take up a lot of space in your luggage. Nylon/spandex blend offers stretch and comfort. Just give them a quick wash in the sink and hang to dry; they'll be ready to wear in a few hours. Imported.

name: Customized Canine Collar
description:
Make sure your pet can be easily identified with our personalized dog leash. 

Specs: 
Dimensions: 6' x 5/8". 
Dimensions: 6' x 1". 

Construction:
Durable nylon webbing.
Metal swivel clip.
