Personalize up to 23 characters, including spaces.
Note: for words like “McCosh” with a capital letter in other than first position, please contact us. 
Made in USA.

Questions? Please contact us.

name: Boys'  Tech Quarter-Zip Pullover
description:
This pullover is perfect for any active lifestyle. It is moisture-wicking and quick-drying, while also being incredibly comfortable and stretchy. The fabric stretches with him, but won't stretch out of shape. It also features a flat-faced fleece fabric that is brushed on the inside so it feels great against his skin. Additionally, it has reflective hits for enhanced visibility in low-light conditions. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit. 

Fabric & Care: 88% polyester, 12% elastane. Machine wash and dry. 

Imported.

name: Rugged Ridge All-Terrain Hiking Shoes
description: This is a true hiking shoe that can perform on multiday hikes over rough terrain while carrying a pack. Specs include an approximate weight of 2 lb. 8 oz. per pair. We love them because they are a great value for the true hiker and comfortable enough for wherever the day takes you. It is loaded with features you need for a smooth ride on rough trails such as support, traction, comfort and durability. The upper is waterproof nubuck leather with a polyester mesh collar and is lined with synthetic mesh fabric that is treated with NXT antimicrobial odor control. Dual-density EVA midsole and footbed with forefoot for maximum comfort with a TEK2.5 waterproof inner lining. It also includes a Vibram XS-Trek rubber outsole for multisurface traction and molded rubber toe bumper and extended external heel counter for added protection. Additionally, there is a lace-up style for a customizable fit, webbing pull-on loop at back collar and reflective accents on upper for added visibility. Importantly, all these features are included in the shoe.

name: Men's Wicked Warm Slippers
description:
We searched all around the globe for the finest genuine shearling to make our popular Wicked Good Slippers even better. Just slip into these incredibly soft sheepskin slippers and it's easy to see how they got their name. 

Size & Fit: Fits best with lightweight sock or barefoot. Half sizes order up. 

Why We Love Them: With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it’s clear customers think our Wicked Good Slippers deserve the title of Best Slippers Ever Made. They make such a great gift that we sell a pair every 7 seconds during our peak in December. Why are they so popular? There are a few reasons but at the top of the list is the most cozy shearling you can find. Throw in superior construction using premium sheepskin and you’ll know why in Maine, “Wicked Good” is as good as it gets. 

Construction: Sheepskin suede upper gets softer with age. Genuine shearling lining. Indoor leather sole. Imported.

name: Men's TEKWool Thermal Shield Plaid Jacket
description: This wool jacket is designed to provide rugged protection and classic style while resisting the elements. The fabric is a rugged, weather-resistant blend of 55% acrylic, 25% polyester and 20% recycled wool with a 100% polyester lining and insulation of 65% olefin, 35% polyester. Best worn with a lightweight layer, this jacket falls below the hip. It includes two-way zipper, interior zippered security pocket and one zippered chest pocket, as well as four snap closure exterior pockets, snap adjustable cuffs and snap adjustable vents on back bottom hem. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: SmartWool Jewel Socks
description: These men's SmartWool argyle socks are designed with durability, great looks, and comfort in mind. Crafted with a combination of 69% merino wool, 29% nylon, and 2% elastane, these socks will keep your feet warm and dry while providing extra cushioning in high impact areas. The classic argyle style is perfect for everyday wear, and they are proudly made in the USA. For best care, machine wash and dry.

name: Kids' Arctic Hunter Hunting Bibs
description: Warm, waterproof midweight bibs are just what your hunting buddy needs for all-day comfort in the field. Why We Love Them: A cold, wet hunting buddy makes for a short outing. We want to keep the hunting tradition alive, that's why we've selected the best hunting bibs on the market for kids. Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Midweight insulated bibs with waterproof, breathable laminate. Shell's soft exterior fabric is exceptionally quiet. Leg zips for easy on/off. Adjustable shoulder straps. Front slash pockets. Zippered chest and rear pockets. Imported.

name: Mountain View HV 2 Tent
description:
Our popular two-person Mountain Light Tent has been redesigned with much more usable interior space and vestibules that are 50% larger. The unique full-coverage fly can be configured to allow multiple venting options.

Specs
Capacity: Two people plus gear.
Tent area (excludes vestibules): 33.75 sq. ft.
Footprint (excludes vestibules): 90" x 54".
Center height: 43".
Vestibule area (each): 11.39 sq. ft.
Weight: 5 lb.
Packed size: 24" x 7".

Why We Love It
This versatile tent features a unique fly that can be configured in multiple ways to maximize ventilation. Both ends can be rolled back, together or separately, to increase airflow or for stargazing at night. The integrated vestibule doors can also be rolled back. The tent body is mostly No-See-Um mesh so only air can get in, not bugs.

Construction
Tent floor is made from durable, lightweight 70-denier ripstop nylon taffeta.
Durable No-See-um mesh on doors and body keeps bugs out and allows excellent airflow.

name: Frosty Peaks Women's Fleece Jacket
description: Our best-value fleece jacket is designed with inspiration from our archives and made from 100% recycled polyester for unbeatable comfort and wear-anywhere style. Size & Fit - Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip. Why We Love It - Our designers took inspiration from the  archives to create this ultrasoft fleece jacket. We love how the heritage styling is updated with a modern, slimming fit. Plus, it’s made from 100% recycled fleece – so you can stay warm and feel good about it. Fabric & Care - 100% recycled fleece is gentle on the planet. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features - Bart Boot laces at zippers and drawcord hem. Features our classic Katahdin logo. Elastic cuffs help seal out cold drafts. Two zippered hand pockets for securing valuables. Imported.

name: Wilderness LED Cap, Camouflage
description:
Now our redesigned lighted cap makes getting out to your stand or tracking game in the dark even easier.

Size & Fit: One size fits all.

Specs:
- Output: 48 lumens
- Beam Distance: 42 ft.
- Batteries: 4 CR2032 coin-cell batteries (included).
- Runtime: 50 hr.

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton.

Additional Features:
- Made of soft washed chino twill.
- Camouflage hunting cap with under-the-brim, hands-free lighting.
- Easy-to-use, low-profile on/off button on the visor for convenient one-handed operation.
- We've tucked all four ultrabright LEDs under the precurved bill.
- Two LEDs aimed forward for distance lighting.
- Two LEDs angled at 55 degrees provide area lighting for close-up tasks.
- Imported.

name: Lumenscope MT18 3000 Lumen Rechargeable Torch
description: The MT 18 is a powerful flashlight that produces a maximum output of 3,000 lumens and casts a beam over a quarter mile. It is perfect for situations where you need maximum visibility in the dark. The flashlight features IPX4 construction that can withstand splashing water from any direction. It is equipped with advanced battery technology that provides excellent burn times. The X-Lens Technology bundles three Xtreme LEDs into one very bright beam and the Single-hand Rapid Focus mechanism allows you to quickly change the light beam. It can be quickly charged via the included USB cable. The battery status and charge indicator lets you keep tabs on the power situation. Additionally, it also features a transportation lock and energy saving mode. The flashlight is 6.7" in length, 3.4" in head diameter, and 21.8 oz in weight with a run time of 5 hours on high, 9 hours on medium, and 96 hours on low. Imported.

name: SportPRO™ Field Trainer 350
description: The SportDOG field trainer 350 has been field-tested in a variety of conditions, including heat, cold, rain, snow, dust and mud by seasoned sportsman and their dogs. The dependable receiver and transmitter are waterproof and submersible, with an ultracompact design that prevents it from becoming snagged in dense brush and tangled cover. Additional features include a range of up to 300 yd., eight levels of stimulation, tone modes, low battery indicator on both units, rechargeable batteries, and a charger included. Imported.

name: Stretch-Resistant Pull-On Capri Pants
description:
We've taken our rugged ripstop pants to the next level of comfort with an ultrasoft feel, a touch of stretch and a soft-knit elastic waistband. In a pull-on capri style that's great for warm weather.

Size & Fit
- Inseam: Misses' 23", Petite 21"
- Favorite Fit: Sits lower on the waist
- Slightly fitted through hip and thigh
- Slim-leg

Fabric & Care
- In a durable ripstop blend of 98% cotton with 2% spandex for just the right amount of stretch
- Machine wash and dry

Additional Features
- Comfortable knit waistband with adjustable drawstring
- Faux-fly front
- Two back patch pockets with snaps
- Snaps at hem for adjustability
- Imported

name: Women's Chunky Neck Blanket
description:
This stylish Buff neckwarmer is knit from soft yarns and lined with Primaloft fleece for extra warmth all winter long. 

Specs:
Dimensions: 11"L x 10"W.

Fabric & Care:
Cozy Primaloft® fleece lining provides extra warmth and next-to-skin comfort. Crafted from a soft blend of 80% wool and 20% polyamide. Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features:
Just-right drape falls effortlessly at neck for warmth and comfort. Imported.

Questions? Please contact customer service for any inquiries.

name: Ladies' Luminous Cloud Sandals
description: Supercomfortable, travel-ready sandals with an exceptionally soft, podiatrist-certified LUVSEAT polyurethane footbed. Adjustable strap system allows a custom fit every time you hit the beach. Construction: Polyester jacquard webbing upper wraps around the foot and through the midsole for a custom fit. Injection-molded ladder lock buckle. Women's-specific LUVSEAT PU midsole. Antimicrobial treatment for odor control. Nonmarking ChacoGrip™ rubber outsole with 3 mm lugs for traction. Imported. Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for assistance.

name: StreamMaster Ultra II Four-Piece Fly Rod, 4-6 wt.
description:
Our popular 4-piece fly rod series has been improved to be lighter and more durable. With a crisp medium-fast action, a light feel and quality components, it's simply the best casting fly rod you'll find anywhere at this price.

Why We Love It

You won't outgrow this easy-to-cast four-piece fly rod even as you become an accomplished caster. It features a forgiving medium-fast action that will be appreciated by beginners and experts alike. It's a great way to get started in the fun sport of fly fishing. This year we've lowered the weight while creating a graphite blank with up to 50% greater hoop strength. It has the power you need to cast streamers and fight big trout.

Construction

Chrome-plated, double-foot snake guides and alconite stripping guides reduce line friction. Graphite reel seats resist corrosion.

Additional Features

Includes lightweight, rugged nylon-covered fiberglass rod tube with built-in section dividers. Alignment line and dot at each ferrule for easy assembly. Imported.

name: Weatherproof Patio Recliner
description: This classic all-weather outdoor rocker is built in the USA with HDPE (High Density Polyethylene), and is partially made with recycled materials. The marine-grade, rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware ensures that this rocker will stay in place in any weather and will not rot, warp, crack, splinter, absorb moisture or ever need painting. It is easy to clean with soap and water and is available in three fade-resistant colors. Overall, this rocker measures 42½"H x 26¼"W x 33¾"D, with a seat area of 20" x 19" and a seat height of 17½"H. It weighs approximately 37 lbs. and pairs perfectly with any of our All-Weather products to create a timeless and functional outdoor entertainment area. For additional comfort, pair with our Casco Bay Cushions, sold separately. Assembly instructions are included.

name: Women's  Midweight Printed Base Layer Pants
description: Our  Base Layers are the perfect pick for all-day comfort and performance properties. These printed midweight pants are our most versatile yet—layer them under your favorite hiking pants for fall treks or snow pants for your first snowshoe of the season. With a blend of 54% polyester, 40% recycled polyester and 6% Elastane to reduce impact on the environment, they wick away moisture and dry quickly while being treated with an anti-microbial finish to resist odor. The close to body fit provides just-right stretch so layers move with you and retain their shape. Enjoy the Favorite Fit—it sits lower on the waist for ultimate comfort. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name: Customized Dog Tag
description: This made-in-Maine dog ID tag is crafted from thick, durable, scratchproof stainless steel, making it ideal for long-term pet safety. It is constructed using stainless steel and cast using the lost wax casting process at a foundry in Maine. The tag has a medium size and is suitable for pets between 15-80 lbs. It is designed, handcrafted, finished and engraved in Maine and can be personalized on the back side with up to three lines, 12 characters per line. The tag comes with two hardware attachments: S-hook and split ring. It is chewproof and will not rust, wear through or discolor – even in salt water. The price includes personalization and the tag measures 1 1/8" in diameter. Made in Maine.

name: Elevation Outdoor Light
description: The Traverse Cube Outdoor Light is extremely versatile and great for all ages. It can be used as a night light or as a camp lantern to illuminate a tent or nighttime card game at the picnic table. With dimensions of 4.5"H x 3.25"W x 3.25"D, it weighs 7.7 oz. with batteries. Light output is up to 200 lumens on high power and 56 lumens on low. Run time is up to 14 days on low power. Kids will love the rotating multicolor mode, and adults will appreciate the high-power output for a game of cribbage at the picnic table. The globe is made from silicone and the base from impact-resistant ABS plastic. It is IPX7 construction and can withstand immersion in water up to 1 meter for up to 30 minutes, and it also floats if accidentally dropped in water. It includes a convenient handle for carrying or hanging, and a special mode that cycles through the colors of the rainbow. Traverse Cube Outdoor Light is imported. Three AA batteries are required and not included.

name: Girls' Summit Waterproof Insulated 3-in-1 Jacket
description: This 3-in-1 girls’ jacket offers three great options for one great price, so she'll stay warm, dry and comfortable – whatever the weather. Light activity: to 20°  Moderate activity: to -5°. It is slightly fitted and made from 100%-nylon ripstop, 2.5-layer shell and 100%-nylon mini-ripstop liner. It is insulated with 100% polyester PrimaLoft Silver insulation. The waterproof, breathable shell can be worn alone in damp weather, and the water-resistant liner is insulated for warmth in cool weather. Wear both layers together for complete weather protection. Additional features include a media port on both the liner and shell, and fully taped seams on the liner for added comfort in wet weather. It is machine wash and dry, and imported.

name: Timberland Plaid Shirt
description:
Born from the tradition of our iconic  chamois shirt, now in a style that's specially detailed and softer than ever. This plaid chamois shirt is destined to be an essential part of your wardrobe.

Size & Fit
- Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.
- Falls at low hip.

Why We Love It
We combined the premium quality and sought-after warmth of our original cotton chamois with features that make this women's chamois shirt all its own. It's the softest of all our chamois shirts, with eye-catching details like cuffs you can fold to reveal chambray trim.

Fabric & Care
- Brushed 7.5 oz. Portuguese cotton chamois – the same as our original. 
- Specially washed three times for a softness all its own.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Double-stitched seams ensure extra strength and durability.
- Chambray lining under collar and cuffs.
- Interior locker loop.
- Imported.

name: Garmin Chrono Pro Fitness Watch, Sapphire
description:
This premium multisport GPS smartwatch features wrist heart rate technology that eliminates the need for a chest strap. Built-in full-color mapping and navigation features help keep you headed in the right direction. 

Specs 
Dimensions: 1.9” diam. x 0.6”D. 
Display size: 1.2” diam. 
Weight: 3.1 oz. 
Display resolution: 240 x 240 pixels. 
Water rating: 10 ATM; suitable for rain, splashes, showering, swimming, diving into water and snorkeling. 
Memory: 16 GB. 
Battery life: Smartwatch up to 12 days, GPS up to 18 hours, GPS and music up to 8 hours. 

Why We Love It 
This GPS smartwatch offers a wide range of features and capabilities to keep you on track and informed. It has an incredibly accurate and fast location acquisition, tracks heart rate from your wrist, monitors sleep quality, transmits activity data to your phone, maps your activities, lets you choose from over 3 dozen sport modes, stores up to 500 songs, and supports wireless Bluetooth headphones. 

Construction 
This GPS smartwatch is

name: Women's Cozy Cabin Chukkas
description: Our Wicked Good Slippers are made from the coziest material on earth and are designed to last. Not only are they incredibly soft and warm, but they also provide superior comfort and insulation. With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it's clear customers think they are the best slippers ever made. The secret to their popularity is the cozy shearling and superior construction using premium sheepskin. Features include a cushioned EVA midsole, a durable rubber outsole with a grooved tread for added traction, and authentic rawhide laces. The shearling lamb fur is also dyed and treated for water resistance. Spot clean for best results. These slippers are sure to keep you cozy for seasons to come.

name: Mountain Ridge Hunting Cap
description:
The low-profile  hunting logo hat is the perfect way to show your passion for the sport. It features an embroidered ® hunting logo on the crown and soft washed-chino twill.

Size & Fit: One size fits all.

Fabric & Care: Chino twill cotton. Spot clean.

Additional Features: Embroidered  hunting logo, low-profile style, precurved bill, durable stitching on panel, adjustable cam-lock back strap, imported.

name: Nikon NatureView Binoculars, 12 x 42 mm
description: These Nikon 12x42 binoculars provide superior viewing in the field with advanced prism-coated lenses and extra-low dispersion glass. Specs include magnification of 12x, objective lens diameter of 42mm, field of view of 262 ft. at 1,000 yd., eye relief of 15.1 mm, dimensions of 5.7"L x 5"W x 2.1"D and weight of 21.1 oz. The rubber-armored body offers shockproof protection and the lenses are waterproof, fogproof and scratch-resistant. Other features include Extra-Low Dispersion (ED) glass for enhanced contrast and resolution, a streamlined focus wheel for easy image adjustment, advanced dielectric prism coating for superior performance in low lighting, eyecups with multiple settings for correct eye-positioning, generous and comfortable eye relief and flip-down lens covers. A carrying case is included and the binoculars are imported.

name: Women's Double-Layer Thermal Underwear
description: This unique two-layer women’s union suit features a Wool Plus outer layer and a soft, itch-free cotton liner for all-day warmth and comfort without any added bulk. The outer layer is a blend of 50% cotton, 40% merino wool, and 10% nylon and the inside layer is 100% cotton. The cuffs are composed of 48% cotton, 38% wool, 9% nylon and 5% spandex. For care, wash the red version separately and machine wash and dry the rest. Additional features include a cotton/merino wool/nylon blend for the best combination of flexibility and warmth, one-piece convenience, easy laundering, rib-knit cuffs reinforced with Lycra® elastane, nonchafing flatlock seams, and a one-button vertical closure in back. This item is imported.

name: Glimmerbeam Clip Light
description: Being seen is essential to staying safe at night. This small light will clip onto just about anything for nighttime visibility—great for walking the dog, unlocking the car or camping. Constructed with a stainless-steel clip, this light is water resistant and clips securely onto zippers, dog collars, key chains and much more. It features both glow and flash modes and arrives in “Try Me” mode and will shut off automatically a few seconds after being turned on. To deactivate “Try Me” mode, press and hold power button until the light starts flashing quickly. Imported.

name: Ultra-Warm 850 Down Mittens
description: This glove version of your favorite jacket takes inspiration from our 850 Down Jacket to create a technical glove perfect for lightweight warmth in colder conditions. Our revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry longer and dries out faster, making it an even better insulator. The fabric and care includes a coated 850-fill DownTek™ premium goose down insulation that absorbs less moisture and dries faster, a durable water-resistant Pertex shell that blocks wind, stretch nylon fabric on fingers for a comfortable fit and a polyurethane palm and forefinger for added grip. It is machine washable and dryable. This glove also features 850 down quilted panels for extra warmth on those chilly days and a knit cuff that seals out cold air and a microfleece lining for additional warmth and comfort. This product is imported. If you have any additional questions, please contact us.

name: Family Bow and Arrow Set
description:
Enjoy backyard archery with our best-value family bow set that has everything you need to start hitting targets. Specs include: 

54" Draw Weight: 20 lb. Draw Length: 24". Draw: Right hand.

Draw Weight: 20 lb. Draw Length: 24". Draw: Left hand.

62" Draw Weight: 29 lb. Draw Length: 28". Draw: Right hand.

Draw Weight: 29 lb. Draw Length: 28". Draw: Left hand.

Draw Weight: 36 lb. Draw Length: 28". Draw: Left hand.

Draw Weight: 36 lb. Draw Length: 28". Draw: Right hand.

Why We Love It: This well-made set has everything you need to introduce your family to archery and enjoy it for years. It’s easy to choose the right bow: Determine which hand you will use to pull the bowstring. If with your right hand, you will need a right-handed bow. In general, children will be more comfortable with a 20 lb. draw weight, and most adults should go with a 29 to 36 lb. draw weight. Stronger adults should select the 36 lb. draw weight.

name: Outdoor Research Windproof Peruvian Hat
description: This soft fleece windstopper hat is designed to keep your head warm without any additional weight or bulk. It is made with 100% WINDSTOPPER® polyester fleece and can be machine washed and dried. It offers protection from the cold, with little bulk or weight and features chin cord and cord-lock for extra security in windy conditions. This product is imported.

name: Women's Featherlight 850 Down Jacket, Print
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down jacket defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum polyester shell – for unbeatable performance. Light activity: to 30°  Moderate activity: to -20°. About comfort ratings, Size & Fit - Closer fit with a slightly slimmer waist. Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip. 

The Technology - We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements. Revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry, long and dries out faster, making a great insulator even better. Watch the Video 

Fabric & Care - 850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for

name: Men's Excursion Travel Brief
description: These ExOfficio men's briefs are designed for performance and comfort in all situations—from travel to fishing to everyday wear. Crafted from a breathable, moisture-wicking blend of 94% nylon and 6% spandex, these briefs pack down small and won't take up a lot of space in your luggage. The nylon/spandex blend offers stretch and comfort, and they are treated with Aegis Microbe Shield to resist odor-causing bacteria. For best care, machine wash and line dry. Imported.

name: Signature Plaid Oxford Shirt
description: Our soft, slim-fitting oxford cloth shirt, now in plaid, can be worn to work or on the weekend. Size & Fit - Slim Fit: Cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist. Fabric & Care - 100% cotton, 6.5 oz. weight. Garment-washed for exceptional softness from day one. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features - Heavier cotton provides a traditional oxford outlook. Neatly tailored with a precise slim fit, wear it from work to weekend, tucked or untucked. Button-down collar. Single patch pocket. Box pleat at center back. Shirttail hem. Imported.

name: Luminous Kids' Graphic Tee
description: This kids' tee is the perfect addition to their adventurous wardrobe. It's ultrasoft and ultracool, featuring a glow-in-the-dark graphic inspired by the great outdoors. With its relaxed fit, classic crewneck styling, and vivid colors, this tee will be a favorite for years to come. It's made with 100% cotton and can take all the washings and playings kids throw at it. Unisex styling makes it great for both boys and girls. Imported.

name: Twin L® Denim, Comfort-Flexed Relaxed Fit
description: When the weather gets cold, our toasty fleece-lined men’s jeans are just what you need to stay warm. Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit - Our loosest cut, with the most room through the seat and knee. Why We Love Them: Made from heavyweight cotton that exceeds industry standards for toughness, the Double L Jeans are the most durable pair of denim we have on our shelf. First, we craft them with a special weave that resists abrasion, shrinking and fading, then double-needle stitch them for even more strength. We finish each pair with a garment wash for worn-in softness and comfort right from the start. Fabric & Care: 100% cotton denim and 100% polyester fleece lining. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Prewashed for softness, classic five-pocket design, double-needle stitched with bar-tacking and rivets at stress points, polyester fleece lining is quick drying, shrink and fade resistance exceeds our standards, fits belts up to 1¼" wide, imported.

name: Aurora Shield Polarized Sunglasses
description:
The Suncloud Sentry sunglasses are built with superlight polarized lenses, rugged TR90 grilamid nylon frames with megol nose pads that keep the frames in place when the action ramps up. 

Size & Fit 
Fit medium faces best. 

Construction 
Lenses made of lightweight, durable injection-molded polycarbonate. Grilamid frames are flexible and tough. Megol nose pads keep glasses firmly in place. 

Additional Features 
6 and 8 base lens curvature. Microfiber cleaning/storage bag included. Lenses filter out all harmful UV rays. Imported. 

Questions? Contact customer service for additional help.

name: Cozy Quilted Sweatshirt
description: Our sweatshirt is an instant classic with its great quilted texture and versatile weight that easily transitions between seasons. With a traditional fit that is relaxed through the chest, sleeve, and waist, this pullover is lightweight enough to be worn most months of the year. The cotton blend fabric is super soft and comfortable, making it the perfect casual layer. To make dressing easy, this sweatshirt also features a snap placket and a heritage-inspired Mt. Katahdin logo patch. For care, machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Cozy Comfort Slippers
description:
Ballet slippers that feel like they were made just for you. With a soft, foam-padded insole that molds to the contours of your feet, it's the next best thing to walking on air.

Size & Fit
Half sizes order up.

Construction
Plush suede upper. A decorative bow and zig-zag stitching detail add style. Stretch inserts at the heel for a secure fit and easy on/off. Lined with supremely soft 80% polyester, 20% acrylic fleece. Padded insole molds to your foot's contours. EVA-foam midsole adds even more cushioning for your comfort. Textured rubber outsole provides traction. Imported.

name: SplashSport Watercolor Tankini Top
description:
Made of breathable, quick-drying premium Italian fabric, our women's watercolor print scoopneck tankini top will look great and feel comfortable all day in the sun and surf.

Size & Fit
Soft-cup bra. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care
80% nylon, 20% Lycra Xtra Life fiber. Lycra Xtra Life provides long-lasting fit. It resists degradation from sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. Full front lining: 95% polyester, 5% spandex. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Handwash, line dry.

Additional Features
Stretchy fabric is quick drying, breathable and chlorine resistant. Mix and match BartSport Swim Separates to create the perfect suit. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Women's Tempest Trekkers, Mesh Lace-Up
description:
Our bestselling Storm Chaser Footwear offers the protection of rubber boots and the comfort of sneakers. This winter-ready combination will keep you comfortable, from rain to snow to 10° below.

name: Careless Indestructible Tee, Timeless Fit, Long-Sleeve Henley
description:
Made of soft cotton that resists wrinkles, stains, shrinking, fading and pilling, our resilient henley keeps its shape wash after wash. Size & Fit Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Why We Love It We’ve put our Unshrinkable Carefree Tees to the test, in the lab and in the field. And we’re glad to say our unshrinkable t-shirts passed with flying colors. What’s more, the 100% cotton fabric resists wrinkles, stains, fading, pilling and shrinking, so our shirt keeps its true-to-size fit while maintaining its comfort and softness. No wonder it’s been a customer favorite for as long as we've been making it.

Fabric & Care 100% jersey-knit cotton. Double ring-spun fabric fights shrinkage, stains, wrinkles, fading and pilling. Built for comfort, the fabric gets even softer the more you wash and dry it. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features Comfortable enough for everyday wear. Durable double-needle stitching. Soft jersey-knit taping on neck seam. Straight hem can be worn tucked or untucked. Tagless

Crafted with premium bison leather and genuine shearling lining, these slippers also feature a soft foam insert for cushioning and added insulation. The soles are smooth to the touch, but can be roughed up for added traction. They are also imported from Australia. Enjoy the best of both worlds with these cozy and comfortable slippers.

Finely tailored, with a narrow placket and pearlized buttons. Taped seams stay smooth for little or no ironing. Women’s sizes feature bust darts. Imported.

name: Mountain Ridge Fleece Vest
description: Our Sherpa Fleece Vest is designed for adventure and packed with features to keep up and look great from mountain peak to base lodge. With its slightly fitted style, it pairs best with midweight layers and falls at the hip for a comfortable fit. Constructed from extra plush sherpa fleece for heavyweight warmth, it is perfect for cold days outdoors or running into town. It features thick and cozy 300-weight sherpa fleece for maximum warmth, 100% polyester fabric and is machine washable. For added comfort, elastic at arm holes and hem are designed to block out wind while two lower zippered hand pockets provide convenience. Imported.

name: Men's Ultra Tough Katahdin Micro Crew Sock
description: Featuring our classic Katahdin logo, these Darn Tough socks are made right here in New England and are packed with all the natural benefits of merino wool. Size & Fit: Performance fit for no slipping, bunching or blisters. Why We Love Them: We partnered with Darn Tough to design this exclusive hiking sock, featuring our classic "Sunset Over Katahdin" logo. Living up to their name, Darn Tough socks are made to endure even the toughest conditions; we even tested them on the Appalachian Trail to ensure durability and comfort during long days on your feet. Fabric & Care: In a blend of 59% Merino wool, 38% nylon and 3% Lycra spandex for breathability and comfort. Natural antimicrobial fibers repel bacteria and odor. Wicks away moisture and dries quickly. Do not bleach. Do not dry clean. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Seamless construction provides an ultrasmooth, invisible feel. Fine gauge knitting for extra durability. Micro crew height falls just below the calf. Mid-level cushion density under foot for a comfortable fit. Made in Vermont.

description:
These Pearl Izumi cycling shorts are designed to provide women a form-hugging fit, padding and breathability for lasting comfort on the bike.

8" inseam.

Fabric & Care
88% nylon, 12% Lycra® elastane.
Chamois liner: open cell foam covered with polyester.

Stretchy performance fabric gently hugs muscles and moves moisture away from skin to keep you dry.
Advanced Select Pursuit chamois is engineered for women to eliminate pressure points and friction.
Grippy silicone material inside leg openings holds shorts in place.
Reflective details increase visibility.
UPF 50+ sun protection.

name: Thermos-Tight Vacuum Sealed Food Container, 14 oz.
description:
Our 14 oz. stainless-steel vacuum food container is an essential item for busy lifestyles. It has a double-walled construction and is 100% BPA-free. The lid is easy to open and has a sleek, compact design that is leakproof and ergonomic. The container fits easily in bags and packs, and keeps food warm for up to 6 hours. For best results, preheat with hot water. This product is imported.

Weight: 10.2 oz.

Easy-open lid.

Leakproof and ergonomic.

name: Adventuring All-Weather Lace-Ups
description:
Our classic  Boot design features the Storm Chaser features you love. This boot is equipped with breakthrough SolarCore insulation technology for a lightweight build with maximum insulating power. With these boots, you can enjoy light activity up to 30° and moderate activity up to -10°. 

For the best fit, these boots should be worn with midweight socks. If your size is not available in half sizes, we recommend you go up to the next whole size. 

Inspired by the boot that started it all, these all-weather boots offer waterproof protection and thermal power. Their SolarCore aerogel is incredibly thin and will not lose warmth when wet or compressed. The full-grain nubuck leather is lined with 200-gram, water-resistant PrimaLoft® for extraordinary warmth. The molded EVA midsole, EVA-molded footbed and nylon shank provide added support and protection. The siped rubber outsole features a multi-lugged tread for traction on slick surfaces. The TEK2.5® waterproof/breathable membrane inner lining and leather/nylon pull-on loop on back collar make them easy to take on and off. 

If

name: Boater's Edge Gloves
description: Don't let blisters or cold hands spoil a great day of paddling. Our H2Core® rashguard fabric is cool and comfortable, offering UPF 50+ sun protection to block 98% of the sun's harmful rays. The gloves are designed specifically for the rigors of paddling, featuring Amara® reinforced palms with silicone for superior grip and comfort. They feature a hook-and-loop wristband closure for a snug fit and snap together for easy storage. Imported.

name: Women's STORM-BLOCK Pro Hoodie
description:
This hooded jacket blocks the elements and keeps you dry. Combining the comfort of a fleece with the protection of a softshell, it is the perfect jacket for any season. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls below hip. 

The Technology: Our first-to-market STORMFLEECE Pro technology features an innovative fusion of softshell and fleece. The rugged and weather-resistant softshell exterior actively repels wet weather and blocks out the wind, while the soft fleece interior breathes well and keeps you dry. 

Fabric & Care: Smooth, weather-resistant softshell exterior with STORMFLEECE Pro fabric technology. Soft, warm fleece interior. In a blend of 92% recycled polyester and 8% spandex. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Three-point adjustable hood. Two zippered hand pockets. Hem drawcord seals out cold air. Imported.

name: Tough Trail Waterproof Hiking Shoes
description: This is a true hiking shoe that can perform on multiday hikes over rough terrain while carrying a pack. Specs: Approx. Weight: 2 lb. 8 oz. per pair. Why We Love Them: A great value for the true hiker and comfortable enough for wherever the day takes you. Loaded with the features you need for a smooth ride on rough trails; support, traction, comfort and durability. Construction: Upper is waterproof nubuck leather with a polyester mesh collar. Lined with synthetic mesh fabric that is treated with NXT antimicrobial odor control. Dual-density EVA midsole and footbed with forefoot for maximum comfort. TEK2.5 waterproof inner lining. Vibram XS-Trek rubber outsole offers multisurface traction. Molded rubber toe bumper and extended external heel counter for added protection. Additional Features: Lace-up style for a customizable fit. Webbing pull-on loop at back collar. Reflective accents on upper for added visibility. Imported.

name: Cozy Leaf Flannel Comforter Cover Collection
description:
Our bestselling Ultrasoft Comfort Flannel comforter cover is woven exclusively in Portugal and features a beautiful, multicolored leaf motif inspired by the great outdoors. 

Specs
Twin - Dimensions: 68" x 88"
Full - Dimensions: 81" x 88"
Queen - Dimensions: 88" x 96"
King - Dimensions: 107" x 96"
Standard Sham (1) - Dimensions: 20" x 26" (excluding 2½" border)

Fabric & Care
100% brushed cotton flannel, 5 oz. weight. Tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (137 CITEVE). Some lint buildup in the dryer screen is a natural result of brushed flannel and will decrease. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Brushed eight times for superior softness that gets even softer with every wash. Comforter cover has hidden button closures and internal ties to keep cover secure. Sham has an envelope closure. Comforter cover and sham sold separately. Price reflected for a single sham. Made in Portugal.

name: Timeless Textured Stripe Cashmere Cardigan with Pocket
description:
We traveled the globe to Inner Mongolia to find the most superior cashmere for this luxurious striped cashmere cardigan. Incredibly soft, its comfort – and value – is beyond compare.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at thigh.

Fabric & Care: 100% cashmere from Inner Mongolia, the finest we’ve found. Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean.

Additional Features: Open pockets. Ribbed trim. Side slits. Imported.

name: Signature Cotton Seaman Tunic Sweater, Colorblock
description:
A new twist on a nautical tradition, our fisherman tunic sweater features a distinctive colorblock pattern in soft cotton yarns. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at low hip. 

Why We Love It: The original fisherman’s sweaters of the Aran Islands were knit with designs that told stories of a rich coastal heritage. From good luck to a plentiful catch, special sentiments were represented in each and every stitch. We’ve recreated those same authentic cable patterns in an updated silhouette, beautifully stitched in a longer tunic length, perfect for pairing with leggings and skinny jeans. 

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton in a versatile three-season weight. Machine wash, dry flat. 

Additional Features: Rounded hem with antiqued brass zippers at each side. Imported. 

Questions? Please reach out to our customer service team for any questions or concerns.

name: Nemo Skyview Comfort Camp Chair
description:
Introducing the first camp chair that both swings and reclines. With a relaxing motion designed for comfort, this chair is the perfect way to end a day of outdoor exploration. It features a sturdy aircraft-grade aluminum suspension frame with water-resistant nylon mesh fabric for cooling, bacteria-resistance, and sun protection. With a supportive headrest and deep reclining action, you can find the perfect angle to view the night sky. It packs down quickly and compactly and includes a no-spill cupholder, stash pocket, and padded carrying case with interior storage pocket. Setup is quick and easy, with non-marring feet suitable for just about any surface. 

Specs
Capacity: 300 lb.
Weight: 6 lb. 5 oz.
Packed Size: 23.6"L x 6.7"W x 6.7"H.
Dimensions: 25"L x 36"W x 45"H.
Imported.

name: Women's Teva Avina Sandals
description: Designed for outdoor adventures of all kinds, the super-sleek, all-terrain Teva Sirra Sandal provides comfort and performance – in and out of the water. Size & Fit: Half sizes order up. Construction: Water-ready, quick-drying polyester webbing stands up to hard use. Rugged Durabrasion Rubber outsole offers dependable traction. Lightweight compression-molded EVA foam midsole. Antimicrobial treatment resists odors. Women's specific shape and fit. Imported.

name: Thermal Quilt
description:
Our amazingly plush blanket features the latest heating technology for maximum comfort when the temperature dips. 

Specs: 
Twin: Dimensions: 62" x 84"
Full/Queen: Dimensions: 84" x 90"
King: Dimensions: 100" x 90"

Fabric & Care: 
Face fabric is Primalush 100% polyester.
Back fabric is loftmink polyester.
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry in the shade.

Additional Features: 
Primalush™ top layer is supremely lush and soft to the touch.
Fused to the PrimaLush fabric, the special insulating layer reflects warmth back to your body.
Luxurious Velvetloft® bottom layer is designed with channels to direct the flow of heat.
Features patented Intellisense™ technology to ensure an even temperature – no hot or cold spots.
Ultra-thin, flexible wires means less bulk.
Includes convenient pre-heat option to warm up the bed, five heat settings and an auto shut off.
Includes dual light-up controllers for individual heat zones; Twin size comes with one controller.
Imported.

name: Traverse Trek Sneakers
description:
These lightweight sneakers feature trail-friendly features to keep you comfortable and supported. 

Size & Fit
Fit best with midweight socks.

Specs
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 8 oz. per pair.
Drop: ½".

Construction
Durable leather-and-mesh uppers resist water.
Thick, cushioned EVA midsole and sock liner deliver all-day comfort.
Sock liner is treated to control odor.
Lugged rubber outsole for serious traction on slick surfaces.

Additional Features
Foam padded collar and tongue add comfort and seal out debris.
Nylon pull-on loop at heel.
Five sets of Gillie lace loops for a micro-adjustable fit.
Imported.

name: Kids' Wickedly Soft Slippers
description: Our Wicked Good Moccasins are perfect for kids who trust their feet to carry them up and down the mountain, through the woods, or just around the yard for a snowball fight. With premium materials and the same customer-favorite design, these slippers wrap their toes in a cloud of unparalleled warmth, so they’ll soon be itching to do it all over again. Made from premium sheepskin for durability that other slippers for kids just can't match, these genuine shearling slippers feature a suede outsole, rawhide laces, and ultrasoft shearling that draws away moisture for unbeatable comfort. Plus, the genuine shearling lamb fur is dyed and treated for added durability. Half sizes order up. Genuine shearling slippers are now available for boys and girls.

name: Kids' Adventure Rain Jacket, Print
description: This waterproof, wind-resistant kids' print rain jacket is loaded with features and cleverly designed to pack in its own pocket. It's made from 100% nylon with taped seams to seal out moisture and a breathable 100% polyester mesh lining that won't cling to skin. It includes 3M™ Scotchlite™ back triangle and zipper for low-light visibility and underarm vents for breathability. With an internal storm flaps and elastic cuffs to keep the weather out, and a fleece-lined chin guard to prevent chafing, there's no better value. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Timeless Cotton Kennebunk Button-Down, Classic Fit
description:
Customers love the high-quality craftsmanship of our wrinkle free button down shirt, which gives you all the comfort of cotton, with none of the wrinkles. 

Size & Fit
Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Why We Love It
When we say wrinkle free, we mean it. Unlike some of our competitors’ shirts, ours has wrinkle-free performance that lasts for the life of the shirt and won’t ever wash out. But we didn’t stop there. We wanted our 100% cotton shirt to feel soft and breathable, so we added another step to the process. Our TrueCool technology helps the fabric retain the natural comfort of cotton and also gives it moisture-wicking performance for warm (or hectic) days.

Fabric & Care
100% cotton poplin.
Fine 80s two-ply fabric for longer wearability.
Features wrinkle-free performance that won't wash out.
Our innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Button-down collar and single chest pocket.
Imported.

name: Organic Cotton Camp Shirt, Short-Sleeve, Floral Print
description: This classic camp shirt is made from 100% certified organic cotton for a naturally breathable and soft feel. It's our lightest weight fabric for cool comfort on hot days. This slightly fitted style is relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slimmer waist for a flattering fit. It's washed down for extra softness and features short sleeves, chambray trim and a single button-through pocket. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name:
Slip-on Shoes

Rockport FlexAir Mesh Slippers
description:
These lightweight, flexible athletic shoes offer breathable comfort and go-anywhere style. 

Specs: Approx. weight: 1 lb. 2 oz. per pair.

Construction: Durable mesh uppers with perforation details for added breathability and leather trim. Lightweight EVA midsole absorbs shock and helps reduce foot and leg fatigue. Flexible EVA outsole has traction control. Strobel construction provides forefoot flexibility. EVA truFLEX spine provides flexible, lightweight impact absorption. Breathable leather and textile lining for a soft, comfortable feel.

Additional Features: Lightly cushioned tongue and collar. Removable insole. Imported.

Questions? Please contact us for help.

name: Sandy Shore Pinstripe Comforter Cover
description:
Our softest percale comforter cover is remarkably smooth and gets even softer and more comfortable with each wash.

Queen - Dimensions: 96" x 88"
King  - Dimensions: 96" x 107"

220-thread-count, 100% cotton. Tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (BEHO 103206, TESTEX). Machine wash and dry.

Enzyme-washed to enhance natural softness and create an ultracozy texture and substantial feel. Hidden button closure and internal ties keep cover secure. Imported.

name: Thermal Tote, Print Medium
description:
Our insulated bag has similar styling to our classic totes, but it will keep your lunch and beverages cool. This new print version is a great-looking addition to our tote lineup.

Specs:
- Capacity: Approx. 1,008 cu., in. 16.5L.
- Weight: 2 lb. 5 oz.
- Dimensions: 11¾"H x 16¾W" tapers to 13W" x 6"D.

Why We Love It:
Finally, a substantial insulated bag that keeps food and drink cool and looks good while doing it. Take it for picnics, tailgating, camping or anywhere you want to keep food and drinks cold.

Construction:
- Main fabric is 600-denier polyester, trim fabric is 8 oz. cotton canvas.
- Food-grade, seam-sealed lining is BPA and PVC free.
- Lining is tested to be free of lead and phthalates.

Additional Features:
- Lining is leakproof and easy to clean.
- Imported.

name: Elemental Ski Poles
description: Built from strong 7000-series aluminum, these cross-country ski poles have an excellent strength-to-weight ratio, a shaped synthetic cork grip, and a carbide tip that won't lose its sharpness. Construction includes a 7000 series aluminum alloy pole shaft, a shaped synthetic cork grip, a carbide pole tip, and an adjustable polyester wrist strap. This set of two poles is available in lengths of 90 cm, then 105 - 165 in 5 cm increments and is imported.

name: Cozy Check Flannel Shirt, Slightly Fitted
description: This flannel shirt is made from the same high-quality cotton flannel as our Men's Scotch Plaid shirts. It is slightly fitted for a soft shape and flattering fit. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at low hip. Why We Love It: It takes the approval of a master weaver to confirm that our exclusive Portuguese flannel is simply the best. Meticulously brushed eight times on each side, the incredibly plush, wonderfully long-lasting fabric passes a "touch test" by a skilled craftsman. Fabric & Care: High-quality Portuguese cotton flannel. Authentic Scottish tartan patterns are specially yarn-dyed so they’ll stay bright. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Button-front styling, chest pocket, shirttail hem. Imported.

name: Men's Summit Strider Day Pack
description:
This technical, lightweight day pack features a custom fit for exceptional comfort and stability. 

Specs: 
Capacity: 1,672 cu.in.; 27.4 L. 
Weight: 1 lb. 12 oz. 
Dimensions: 20" x 10" x 6.5". 

Why We Love It: Thoughtfully designed, the Ridge Runner will quickly become your go-to pack for everything from strenuous mountain day hikes to walks to the local farmer's market. Sternum and shoulder straps adjust easily to allow a comfortable and stable fit. Lightweight, durable fabrics ensure lasting quality and generous organizational features keep your gear easily accessible. 

Construction: 
Main body fabric is tough 100D triple ripstop nylon; lined with 210D nylon. 
Mesh-covered, dual-density foam on back panel and shoulder straps is perforated for breathability. 
Large main compartment with reversed canting zipper for wider opening and easier access. 
Large stretch mesh water bottle pockets with integrated, tuckaway compression straps. 
Ice axe loop with elastic trekking pole attachment. 

Additional Features: 
Front shove-it pocket keeps an extra layer handy. 
F

name: Graphic Foot Fun, Duo-Pack
description: Our graphic boot socks are the perfect accompaniment to  Boots. Crafted from a stretchy fabric in fun, outdoor-inspired prints, these socks are sure to be a favorite. Fabric & Care: 51% merino wool, 47% nylon, 2% Lycra elastane. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Soft, stretchy merino-wool blend. Fun outdoor-inspired prints – they look great poking out from the tops of  Boots. Two-pack. USA. If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Sea Sprit Hybrid Lock-Grip Kayak Paddle, Small Shaft
description: This superlight, strong carbon fiber shaft paddle allows for less fatigue and better stroke efficiency. The 100% carbon composite shaft is lightweight, durable, and reduces fatigue and joint strain. The fiberglass-reinforced nylon abXII blades are 22% stronger and lighter than the previous generation. Smaller diameter shaft works well for smaller hands, and is designed to minimize fatigue on short trips and long expeditions. The Posi-Lok™ adjustable ferrule system provides infinite feather adjustment and a rock-solid lockup, and the ovalized shaft gives improved grip comfort and feather control. Weight: 30.5 oz. Blade dimensions: 18"L x 6.25"W. Two-piece construction. Imported.

name: Signature Stripe Rugby Shirt, Long-Sleeve Classic
description: Our Rugby is the perfect combination of heavy weight and slim fit. Crafted with extra-strong rubber buttons and durable sewn-on stripes, it is both soft and substantial. The slim fit is tailored to the chest, sleeve, and waist. We took our cues from the original to perfect it for today with a slimmer, more modern fit. Rugged, substantial 9 oz. cotton is washed for extra softness from the start. Additional features include a woven collar, rubber buttons, chest stripes sewn on for a traditional look, vintage-inspired chest patch, ribbed cuffs, side vents, and imported. Machine wash and dry for easy care.

name:
-Day

Trekker Travel Pack
description:
This daypack is perfect for travel, as it stuffs away into its own small internal pocket. It is super-light and extra-tough, made of ripstop nylon fabric and panel-load design. It features padded foam shoulder straps and back panel for increased comfort, as well as wicking Air Mesh for all-day comfort. With lots of pockets for organizing gear and an easily accessible front "shove it" pocket, this pack is sure to keep your items secure and organized. It has two side mesh water-bottle pockets with new loop locks to keep bottles secure, an adjustable waistbelt and sternum strap, and a “Blinky” loop for attaching a light to help keep you visible. 

Specs:
Capacity: 1,343 cu. in., 22 L.
Weight: 14 oz.
Dimensions: 19"H x 10"W x 7"D.
Packed size: 8" x 7".
Imported.

name: Cresta Wool Ultra-Lite 150 Long-Sleeve Base Layer
description: Our women’s long-sleeve wool T-shirt is lightweight, warm and remarkably soft, making it the ideal base layer for any activity in any season. Fabric & Care: Made of itch-free 100% merino wool, nature’s best insulator. Machine wash, line dry. Additional Features: Fine merino wool fibers trap heat and provide more warmth for the weight. Fine-gauge knit with flatlock seams for a remarkably soft, smooth fit. Lightweight fabric for warmth when you’re on the go. Naturally resists odors. Thumbhole cuffs keep sleeves snug at wrist. Imported.

name: Women's Brooks Essential Performance Vest
description: This lightweight fitness vest is perfect for running, hiking, cycling, or walks around town. It is made with lightweight polyester microfiber fabric that blocks wind and resists light precipitation. It also has reflective highlights on the front and back for safety, plus a back vent to let heat and moisture escape as you exercise. It also has two zippered side pockets and an internal media player pocket. This item is imported. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.

name: PrimaLoft Plaid Shirt-Jac
description:
This jacket provides the warmth of a lightweight jacket and the classic good looks of a flannel shirt jacket. Designed to keep you warm in colder weather, this jacket is filled with 40-gram PrimaLoft® Silver insulation. Made from 100% cotton, with a quilted nylon taffeta lining for easy on/off. It features princess seams for a flattering fit, side pockets, adjustable buttoned cuffs and an interior locker loop. Machine wash and dry. Imported. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed fit - our most generous fit sits farthest from the body, falling at the low hip. 

Additional Features: Princess seams for a flattering fit, side pockets, adjustable buttoned cuffs and an interior locker loop.

name:
Hiker

Men's Merrell Chameleon 7 Mid Waterproof Trekker
description:
You'll be light on your feet with these ultralight, breathable day hikers. But don't let the comfort fool you - they deliver all the waterproof protection and stability you expect from a Merrell trail hiker.

Specs
Approx. weight: 2 lb. 5 oz.

Construction
Waterproof membrane repels moisture and enhances breathability.
Nubuck-suede-and-mesh upper with breathable mesh lining.
Vibram TC5+ rubber outsole provides great traction on any surface.
Protective rubber toecap and molded TPU heel counter for added stability.
EVA midsole and Merrell air cushion in the heel absorb shock and add stability.
Lightweight FlexPlate technology and removable insole provide flexible support when hiking.

Additional Features
Nylon insoles add support for hiking with a pack.
Metal hooks and lacing eyelet for secure lacing.
Bellows tongue keeps debris out.
Imported.

name: Dry-A-Matic Multi Boot/Glove Dryer
description: The ultimate solution for wet, soggy ski boots and gloves. Can dry two pairs of boots at a time or one pair of boots and one pair of gloves. Construction features Legendary Peet drying technology for quick drying, plus four patented Peet DryPorts to circulate air for thorough drying. Glove DryPorts are also included for drying gloves. Thermal convection rises through AirChambers for natural drying, and the product operates silently. A large, sturdy base can handle up to two pairs of heavy ski boots. Made in the USA.

name: Wrinkle-Free Resortland Sport Shirt, Traditional Fit Gingham
description: Our men’s gingham sport shirt is colorful, crisp and cool and is designed with a traditional fit that is relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. It is made from 100% cotton and features wrinkle-free performance that won't wash out. Our innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly. Machine wash and dry. Additional features include a single patch pocket and shirttail hem. Imported.

name: Vintage Crafted Leather Chukkas
description:
This premium leather slipper is lined with warm, moisture-wicking shearling for the ultimate in comfort. 

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up.

Why We Love Them: With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it’s clear customers think our Wicked Good Slippers deserve the title of Best Slippers Ever Made. They make such a great gift that we sell a pair every 7 seconds during our peak in December. Why are they so popular? There are a few reasons but at the top of the list is the most cozy shearling you can find. Throw in superior construction using premium sheepskin and you’ll know why in Maine, “Wicked Good” is as good as it gets.

Construction:
- Made with genuine Australian lamb shearling. 
- Lined with warm, moisture-wicking shearling. 
- Durable, water-resistant upper.
- Rawhide lacing. 
- Molded rubber outsole with cross-hatch grooved tread.
- Shearling-covered EVA insole.

- Imported (fur Australia).

Questions?

The ultimate sweater fleece – made from superior fabric and offered at an unbeatable price.

Why We Love It

Our customers (and employees) love the rugged construction of our popular Sweater Fleece Vest and wear it for absolutely everything. From high-intensity activities to everyday tasks, you'll find yourself reaching for it every time.

oblocks

description:
This lightweight hip pack is the perfect companion for town, trail or travel. It is made with super-light and extra-tough ripstop nylon fabric, and features an air mesh back panel for breathability. The dual pockets feature a key fob and other organizational features, and like the Stowaway Day Pack, it can be stowed inside an internal hanging pocket. This fun multicolor version adds a little color to your gear.

Our most technical women’s hiking pants are expertly constructed for rigorous hikes. Durable, high-performance ripstop fabric, articulated knees and two-way stretch for maximum mobility on the trail — these pants are built for adventure.

With its versatile style, great price and classic details, you'll reach for this cardigan in every season.

description:
These lightweight poles feature the PowerLock 3.0 adjustment mechanism that reliably locks them in place at the desired length. Anti-shock system reduces fatigue by absorbing impacts and bumps. 

Size & Fit 
Adjustable from 105cm to 140cm.

Specs 
Packed length: 27.5" (70cm). 
Maximum length: 55" (140cm). 
Weight: 22 oz. per pair. 

Construction 
Hydrophobic cork handles won't get slippery by absorbing moisture or sweat. 
PowerLock 3.0 adjustment system is durable, field-serviceable and ultra-reliable. 
Shaft constructed of heavy-duty 7075 aliminum alloy. 
Anti-shock system reduces fatigue caused by repetitive impact and vibrations. 
Tungsten Carbite tips for outstanding grip on any surface. 
Padded wrist strap can be easily adjusted. 
Includes a pair of minimalist trail baskets.

Hiking with poles takes significant pressure off your knees and ankles.

description:
Our latest exclusive waterproof/breathable TEK O2 technology offers four-season versatility, perfect for both on or off the trail. Size & Fit Slightly Fitted. Falls at hip. Why We Love It Innovative first-to-market waterproof/breathable technology is designed to keep you active, with three layers of high-performance fabric that instantly move moisture away for maximum protection against the elements. Air In. Water Out. See how our air-permeable TEK O2 technology keeps you dry and comfortable. Fabric & Care Waterproof, three-layer TEK O2 nylon shell, featuring our exclusive technology. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Three-point adjustable hood allows a custom fit. Articulated sleeves provide free arm motion. Pit-zip venting.  – Official Supplier to the U.S. Ski Team THEIR WILL TO WIN, WOVEN RIGHT IN. LEARN MORE

Fully waterproof, with a waterproof gasket that seals out moisture. Secure latch prevents accidental opening. Designed for nymphs and dries. Imported. Questions? work

Imported.

name: Men's Merrell All-Terrain 2 Waterproof Hiking Boots
description:
Protect your feet on those long treks—or comfortably take the scenic route home—with these waterproof Merrell backpacking boots. They'll provide superior comfort right out of the box.

name: Renewed Splendor V-Neck Bikini Top Print
description: This bikini top is perfect for all your favorite watersports. It's crafted with an eco-friendly fabric in a colorful, eye-catching print. The premium Italian-blend is breathable, quick drying and abrasion resistant, with lightweight racerback straps that won't get in your way. The fabric is made with 82% recycled nylon and 18% Lycra® spandex, and lined in 90% recycled nylon and 10% Lycra® spandex. Plus, it has an impressive UPF 50+ rating—the highest sun protection rating possible. Handwash and line dry for best results. With its sustainable fabric and flattering V-neck silhouette, this swim top is good for the earth and good for your summer adventures!

name: Men's Ultralight DownTouch Gloves
description: Keep your hands toasty warm whether you're skiing, snowshoeing or simply on your morning commute with the revolutionary DownTek treated down. Our premium 850-fill down outerwear stays dry and dries out faster, making a great insulator even better. Its durable water-resistant Pertex shell blocks wind, while the stretch nylon fabric on fingers provide a comfortable fit, and polyurethane palm and forefinger for added grip. Microfleece lining provides additional warmth and comfort and rib-knit cuffs seal out cold air. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported. Watch the Video for more details.

name: MountainTrek Lightweight Hiking Socks 2-Pack
description: Our merino wool hiking socks outperform the competition, both in the lab and with testers in the field. Fabric & Care: 78% merino wool, 20% stretch nylon, 2% elastic lightweight blend. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Itch-free merino wool wicks away moisture so feet stay comfortable while you're active. USA, fabric imported. Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for further assistance.

name: DiamondView 10x32 Binoculars
description: These premium binoculars boast the best optics technology available. The specs include a 10x magnification, 32mm objective lens diameter, and a field of view of 360 ft. at 1,000 yd. At 21.2 oz., the streamlined shape and lightweight magnesium housing make these binoculars comfortable to hold. Furthermore, they are fog- and waterproof. HD lenses provide exceptional resolution, advanced focusing allows for fast, precise adjustments, and superior contrast in low-light conditions. Adjustable eyecups, longer eye relief and lightweight alloy construction ensure crisp images at close range. The lenses contain fluoride to ensure bright images with maximum color fidelity, minimizing color fringing. Swaroclean anti-stick lens coating resists dirt and makes cleaning easy. This package includes a field bag, carrying strap, and protective caps for eyepieces and objectives. Imported.

name: Chill Out Trousers
description:
Made from tough yet soft nylon, these pants are exceptionally comfortable and a customer favorite. With features like pockets, an ultracomfortable waistband and adjustable drawcords, they offer reliable protection and comfort on every adventure. The fabric is a durable, abrasion-resistant blend of 95% nylon and 5% spandex, providing two-way vertical stretch for all-day comfort. It's also quick-drying, breathable and wicks away moisture from the skin. Available in three inseam lengths, Misses 31", Petite 29", and Medium Tall 33", with a Favorite Fit that sits lower on the waist, slightly fitted through the hip and thigh, and straight-leg. You can machine wash and dry for easy maintenance. 

For added protection against the sun, our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

description: Our best-value waterproof rain jacket is redesigned to be tougher with a durable laminate interior for more rugged protection and breathable comfort. It's slightly fitted and best with a lightweight layer, falling below hip. Our TEK waterproof technology blocks the elements while maintaining breathable comfort, and is made from 100% recycled nylon for minimal environmental impact. The jacket features a three-point adjustable hood, one chest pocket, two zippered hand pockets, and an adjustable hem and cuffs to seal out the elements. It also packs away into its own pocket. Imported. Machine wash and dry.

description: Our bestselling soft-shell jacket has been upgraded for cool-weather wear with a cozy fleece lining for warmth and protection from the elements. It has all the weather resistance of the original, plus a warm fleece lining to keep you covered through the cooler months. Rugged, moisture wicking and designed to move with you, it's the hiking jacket you'll want on all your adventures. The technical shell fabric resists wind and water, providing versatility in all sorts of weather. The body is lined with a soft, grid fleece that adds warmth and pulls away excess moisture, while the sleeves are lined with taffeta for easy on/off. It also features an adjustable, zip-off hood, cinch waist and two-way zipper for easy customization of the look and fit. The fabric is 95% nylon and 5% spandex with a 100% polyester lining. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported. Light activity: to 50°  Moderate activity: to 0°. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at thigh.

Blended EVA contoured footbed, molded nylon arch shank and molded footframe cushion every step. Air inserts under the heel help absorb shock and enhance stability. Durable Vibram® Multi-Sport™ TC5+ rubber outsole with 5mm lugs provides tenacious grip. Imported.

There's also a removable, mesh-covered EVA insole, Euro-hiker-inspired stacked EVA midsole, VertaGrip rubber lugged outsole for traction, padded collar and tongue for comfort and polyester-mesh lining with odor and moisture control. As a final touch, we've added a retro Katahdin logo on the tongue. Approx. weight: 3 lb. 2 oz. per pair. Height: 4". Imported.

name: Women's Ultra-Loft Down Sweater Hooded Jacket
description: Our revolutionary 850 jacket is designed with the best outerwear technology to ensure unbeatable performance. With premium 850 down for more warmth for its weight and DownTek treatment for water resistance, this jacket is light, lofty and warm. The tightly woven Pertex Quantum nylon shell is wind and weather-resistant for added protection. Comfort ratings for light activity is up to 30° and moderate activity up to -20°. With a slightly fitted shape that falls at the hip and best with a midweight layer, this jacket will keep you warm in any condition. It is virtually weightless and packs away into its own pocket. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, it is a jacket of its own class.

name: Mountain Climber Four-Season Trekking Poles, XL
description: This set of durable, lightweight hiking poles is built to withstand the rigors of hiking at a great price. The XL size extends up to 150 cm (59") to accommodate taller users and collapses to a length of 72 cm (28.5"). Each pole weighs 1 lb. 3 oz. The poles are constructed with 7075-series aluminum shafts for durability and lightness. Adjustable, padded wrist straps and EVA foam grips provide all-day hiking comfort. The telescoping design allows the poles to be easily stowed in a pack or gear bag and the PowerLock 3.0 system securely locks the poles in place at the desired length with no slipping. Tungsten carbide tips provide outstanding grip on any surface. This set also comes with two sets of baskets; one for snow and one for hiking. The poles are made in Austria.

Light activity is suitable up to 25° and moderate activity up to -25°. With a center back length of 29½" (Tall 31") and a slightly fitted design that falls at the hip, this jacket is made to move. It's crafted with premium 850 down for more warmth without the weight and treated with revolutionary DownTek that allows it to resist moisture and dry faster. The game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements. The jacket also features elastic cuffs, an internal stowaway pocket, external zip handwarmer pockets, media storage with headphone ports, and machine-washable fabric. Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Men's Maine Hunting Boots, 10"
description:
Featuring the moccasin-like feel that L.L.'s original hunting shoes had in the woods, our legendary Maine-made boots have the comfort and protection you need – whether you're bird hunting on a muddy tote road or walking the dog on a slushy sidewalk.

Size & Fit
- With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.
- With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Specs
- Approx. weight: 3 lb. 8 oz. per pair.

Why We Love Them
The original Maine Hunting Shoe was Bartholomew Barnstormer's first product, introduced in 1912. Over the years, we've made lots of improvements to these boots, but hunters have told us that they miss the moccasin-like feel that our original boots had in the woods. So we set out to bring it back.

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
- Premium waterproof leather upper.
- Steel shank for superior lateral and arch support.

Additional Features
- Moccasin-

name: SeaSport Swimwear, Skirted Bottom
description:
Our bathing suit skirt bottom is made with premium Italian swim fabric that is breathable, quick-drying, chlorine-resistant and provides great value. It sits lower on the waist, falls at the upper thigh, and features moderate leg openings. The swimwear is designed with thoughtful features for the best performance and value. Constructed with 80% nylon and 20% Lycra Xtra Life fiber, it provides long-lasting fit and resists degradation from sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. It also features a full front lining of 95% polyester and 5% spandex and an elastic-waist pull-on skirt with built-in “panties.” UPF 50+ rated - the highest rated sun protection possible - and a stretchy chlorine-resistant fabric keeps its shape. Handwashing and line drying is recommended. Mix and match BartSport Swim Separates to create your best suit. Imported. 

This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant, providing SPF 50+ sun protection and blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

Additional Features: Lightweight polyester fabric is fade resistant. Sized to fit over your outerwear. Dual side cargo pockets for easy access to gear. Imported.

name: Kids' Super Snuggly Slippers

The suede outsole and ultrasoft shearling draw away moisture and wraps around kids' feet for unbeatable comfort. The rawhide laces add to the style. Genuine shearling lamb fur is dyed and treated, and imported from Australia. These genuine shearling slippers are now available for boys and girls and come with a durable outsole for added traction. Half sizes should order up. They are perfect for a day out, whether it be up and down the mountain, through the woods, or just around the yard for a snowball fight. After a long winter day, your feet will appreciate the warmth and comfort of Wicked Good Moccasins. 

Questions? Contact us for more information.

With a slightly fitted shape to softly shape the body and an ultrasoft blend of 55% polyester, 39% recycled polyester and 6% spandex, this T-shirt offers moisture wicking and quick drying capabilities to keep you comfortable on hot days. Its abrasion-resistant fabric stands up to daily wear and tear, and a special antimicrobial finish actively resists odor to keep you feeling fresh. Plus, this fabric is Bluesign approved, ensuring total sustainability. For added visibility, this T-shirt has small reflective hits on the shoulders and back. Mesh side panels and back yoke provide additional breathability and a flattering look, while a slight droptail hem provides extra coverage. Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

This revolutionary day pack features a Boa-closure® system that compresses and stabilizes your load. Designed to specifically fit a woman's body, it's not simply a man's pack sized smaller.
