- Capacity: 1,224 cu. in., 20 L.
- Weight: 1 lb. 14 oz.
- Dimensions: 17.5"H x 11"W x 5.25"D.

Construction
- Pack body made of 210D Ballistic Cordura nylon. 
- Pack and shoulder straps are designed to fit a women's torso.
- Pack base made of rugged 600-denier Kodra nylon. 
- Recurve collar-cut shoulder straps provide a snug, comfortable fit.
- Perforated foam waist belt is comfy – and easy to adjust.
- Built-in hydration bladder sleeve with port inside main compartment (bladder sold separately).

Additional Features
- Tapered design lowers contact with your back for better ventilation and free movement. 
- Equipped with two Boa-closures to compress and stabilize your load.
- Stretch-paneled “shove it” pocket provides quick access to trail essentials.

name: Snuggly Down Sleeping Bag with DownTek, Rectangular 20°
description:
This roomy 20-degree rectangular bag is a great choice for three-season backpacking and car camping. It features a better fit and a lighter overall weight, and is insulated with RDS-certified 650 fill DownTek. The lightweight DownTek absorbs 30% water and dries 60% faster than untreated down, while the exterior shell and interior lining are made from silky, downproof ripstop nylon with a water-repellent coating. Baffling holds insulation in place, preventing shifting, clumping and cold spots, and a draft tube on the zipper helps prevent cold air from seeping in. It also features a yoke-style draft collar for retaining warm air and a small inside pocket on the shoulder for essentials. The bag comes with a heavy-duty stuff sack and extra-large storage sack, and two bags can be zipped together to form a double sleeping bag.

Size & Fit: Regular fits users up to 6'. Long fits users up to 6'6".

Regular: Weight: 2 lb. 10 oz.; Packed size: 18" x 9".

Long: Weight: 2 lb. 13 oz.; Packed size: 18" x 9".

Fabric & Care

name: Island Breeze Shorts, 7" Inseam
description:
These Women's hiking shorts with pockets provide superior protection from the heat and sun. Their lightweight, durable construction helps keep you cool, comfortable, and safe from the sun's harmful rays. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed through hip and thigh; sits higher on waist; inseam: 7". 

Fabric & Care: 94% nylon/6% spandex blend wicks moisture and resists wrinkles; machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Built-in SunSmart™ UPF 50+ protection against UV rays; improved pocket system; imported.

name: Camo Trail Strider Midweight Quarter-Zip Pullover Hoodie
description:
This camo quarter-zip hoodie is an extremely versatile mid layer that's great for all hunting seasons. It's made from warm, breathable fleece and features an innovative lightweight hood with a built-in face mask. 

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: An excellent layering piece for cold weather. Wind-resistant hard-shell fleece is quiet and resists water, debris and snags. Super-soft fleece interior is warm and can be worn over layers or next-to-skin. Unique lightweight hood has a built in face mask for extra warmth and total concealment. Built-in articulation allows excellent range of motion. Quarter-length zipper allows for easy on/off and ventilation. Single vertical upper chest storage pocket. Thumbholes in cuff allow extra coverage; they stay closed when not in use. Flat seams won't chafe or catch on under layers. Imported.

name: Heritage Washed Denim Long-Sleeve Shirt by L.L. Bart
description: This jean shirt from our archives features rugged denim for a lived-in look and softness. It has a relaxed fit that sits farthest from the body and falls at low hip. Our designers created a hardworking and good-looking shirt with soft, resilient fabrics and extra tough construction. It has a longer length for a flattering, easygoing fit. The 100% cotton fabric is soft-washed in a 7 oz. weight that works year round. It is individually hand finished for a vintage appeal. This shirt has a curved shirttail hem that looks great tucked in or untucked, special stitch detailing on the inside collar, button-front flap pockets, and an  label at the bottom placket. It is imported.

name: Women's Trail Model 4 All-Weather Hiking Shoes
description: Supercomfortable lightweight hikers with a built-in waterproof membrane are versatile enough for casual wear and a wide variety of outdoor adventures. These shoes feature 's exclusive VertiGrip outsole which provides excellent traction on a variety of surfaces, as well as a suede-and-fabric upper with a waterproof TEK2.5® barrier to keep feet dry. Cushioned EVA midsole and removable footbed provide noticeable comfort right out of the box, and heel-and-toe bumpers add durability. Approximate weight: 1 lb. 13 oz. Imported.

name: Women's PrimaLoft Comfort Socks, 1/4 Crew
description:
This sock is designed with the perfect combination of PrimaLoft yarns and merino wool, making it durable and comfortable for all-day wear. 

Size & Fit: Quarter-crew height.

Fabric & Care: Crafted with a lightweight blend of 35% nylon, 31% PrimaLoft® polyester, 31% merino wool and 3% spandex. PrimaLoft yarns wick away moisture and dry quickly, and the breathable merino wool yarns naturally resist odor. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Seamless toe construction won't chafe, cushioning under foot for additional comfort, and reinforced heel and forefoot add durability. Made in the USA.

name: Soft Touch Fleece-Backed Straight-Leg Pants
description:
Specially brushed on the inside for fleece-like comfort, these Perfect Fit Pants offer the same great style as our original straight-leg pants, only cozier and warmer for colder weather. 

Size & Fit 
Inseams: Misses 30", Petite 28", Medium Tall 32", Women’s 30".

Slightly fitted through hip and thigh.

Yarn-dyed for stay-true color, wash after wash. 
Machine wash and dry.

Flat-front elastic waistband. 
Front pockets. 
Printed label.

name: Comfy Cot
description:
This camping cot is perfect for any camping trip or extra bed at home. It is easy to transport, set up and take down and is made of durable materials.

name: Aura Prime Elite Shooting Glasses
description: This premium shooting eyewear provides maximum protection and top-of-the-line optics. Super-lightweight, frameless design allows maximum vision so you can easily track your target. They're also ideal for cycling, running and other outdoor activities. Construction meets ANSI Z87.1 and MIL-PRF-31013 protection standards. FreeFloat™ lens technology absorbs serious impact to protect your eyes. Lenses made from lightweight, tough polycarbonate. Additional Features: Includes grey ignitor and clear lenses. Interchangeable lenses are easy to swap with Smith's exclusive Pivlock system. Grey lens is best for bright conditions; clear for low light. Tapered Lens Technology corrects distortion. Super-thin, moldable alloy temples fit cleanly under ear protection without breaking the seal. Three-position, adjustable nosepiece. 100% protection from the sun's harmful UVA/UVB rays. Imported. If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out.

name: Smallmouth Bass Slam Fly Selection
description:
Increase your chances for success with this versatile fly selection. They've been proven to catch hard-charging smallmouth bass as well as other species. 

Additional Features: Includes 2 #8 Near Nuff Crayfish, 1 #6 Bass Popper, 1 #10 Bass Popper, 2 #6 Rubber Leg Crystal Buggers, 1 #6 Clouser Minnow in olive, 1 #6 Foxee Red Clouser Minnow, 2 #4 Autumn Splendor and 2 #4 Murdich Mini Minnow. Imported. 

Questions? Please contact us for further assistance.

name: Wild Hunter Soft-Shell Hunting Jacket
description:
This technical full-season hunting soft-shell jacket is versatile enough for cool to cold conditions, plus it's great as a layering piece for even colder weather. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. 

Why We Love It: This premium soft-shell hunting jacket is thoughtfully designed by passionate hunters so you can be sure it will perform in the toughest conditions. Windproof, breathable soft-shell material is quiet and includes an anti-odor treatment. Slightly fitted with built-in articulation so you can move freely and have an unimpeded gun swing.

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Quiet shell and liner material won't spook game. Windproof soft-shell material keeps you comfortable in a wide range of temperatures. Soft interior grid fleece is quiet and comfortable. Hard-face outer shell fabric resists snags and repels water. Wind- and water-resistant full-length front zipper seals out weather and has a clean finish. Articulation and flat seams for comfort and range of motion. Welted slot in back allows treestand harness strap to pass through. Silicon chain tread print on shoulders prevents pack straps and gun sl

name: Downy Feather 850 Jacket
description:
Our revolutionary 850 jacket defies cold, wet weather - and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology - innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum nylon shell - for unbeatable performance. Light activity: to 25°  Moderate activity: to -25°. 

We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements.

Size & Fit: Closer fit with a slightly slimmer waist. Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care: 850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. Premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, ensuring the humane treatment of animals.

name: Micro Egg Balance 2 Pack
description: 'Imported. Have any questions? Reach out for assistance.'

name: Kids' Bogs Rain Boots, Tiptoe Trekkers
description: Bright, light and fully waterproof, these Bogs rain boots are just what kids need to make the most of rainy days. Construction features an ultrasoft and flexible natural rubber upper, lined with Bogs Max-Wick™ to keep socks nice and dry. Additional features include 100% waterproof and DuraFresh organic bio-technology to fight odors. Easy pull-on style and imported. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

name: Mountain View Polarized Sunglasses
description: Native Wells Polarized Sunglasses offer a stylish, durable design that meets the highest standards of optical clarity. Featuring B3 technology, Native's most advanced polycarbonate lenses selectively filter UV light for better contrast and crisp definition, and block up to four times more infrared light than standard lenses. Rhyno-Tuff Air Frames decrease weight and improve durability, while Cushinol nose and temple pads keep the frames from slipping. Durable cam-action hinges open crisply, and Tri-laminate frame construction increases frame durability. Mastoid Temple Grip prevents movement, and the frames are made from biodegradable and sustainable plant-based resin. Imported.

name: Coastal Breeze Jacket
description: Lightweight and nautically inspired, this windbreaker blocks the wind and protects you from inclement weather. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip. Fabric & Care: Made from exceptionally lightweight, wind-blocking fabric in a blend of 60% cotton and 40% nylon. Breathable construction keeps you comfortable. Additional Features: Nautical trims and detailing. Chest pocket and two lower handpockets. Two lower drawcord adjustments to block out the wind. Covered elastic cuffs. Imported.

name: Mountain Ridge Cap
description:
Our best-ever trucker hat, made for a comfortable fit and designed featuring  original artwork you won't find anywhere else. 

Why We Love It
Each and every one of our hats features exclusive patches and graphics inspired by the great outdoors and designed right here in Maine. Made for performance without sacrificing style, this trucker hat is the perfect pick for mountaintop treks or days downtown. All you have to do is throw it on and get out there. 

Fabric & Care 
100% cotton brim. 
100% polyester breathable mesh for ventilation. 
Spot clean. 

Additional Features 
Classic trucker style. 
Adjustable snap back for a customized fit. 
Interior sweatband keeps moisture out of eyes.

name: Durawear Glasses
description: These tough reading glasses are designed for the outdoor enthusiast who needs a little help reading the fine print. Constructed with a lightweight TR-90 thermoplastic frame, they're a great choice for reading maps, smartphones and tying flies onto your leader. Available in magnifications of 1.5X, 2X, 2.5X and 3X, the glasses feature an antireflective coating to eliminate glare on screens, preventing eye fatigue during long days out. Also included is a heavy-duty carrying case with plastic clip for attaching to a pack or fly vest. Imported.

name: Men's Stay Grounded Tee, Short-Sleeve
description:
This cool, lightweight tee will make biting insects head in the other direction. With the help of Burlington Labs, this shirt is evenly treated with permethrin, a synthetic form of a naturally occurring bug repellent, so you can be free of insects. 

Size & Fit: Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Fabric & Care: 76% polyester, 20% cotton and 4% spandex. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. 

Additional Features: Treated with permethrin, a synthetic version of a chemical produced naturally by daisies. Built with some cotton and spandex for softness and stretch. Built with the same permethrin treatment as our bestselling No Fly Zone™ Fishing Apparel. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric. Available in US only. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. 

Tell Biting Insects to Take a Hike: No Fly Zone repels biting insects like ticks, black flies and mosquitoes. It's odorless and lasts

name: Auto-Organizer Pro
description:
This handy organizer stores and organizes all your fishing gear behind the front seat of your vehicle. It's generously equipped with pockets to accommodate your fishing gear and accessories. 

Specs 
Dimensions: 23.75"W x 29"H. 
Weight: 2 lb. 4 oz. 

Why We Love It 
A favorite fishing pastime in Maine is spending a day hitting all your favorite fishing spots by car or truck. Usually all your gear is piled in the back and by the end of the day things are a disorganized mess. This fishing gear organizer will help you keep everything organized, protected and easily accessible. It's fully adjustable to fit a variety of vehicles and has thoughtful design features like canted pockets that accommodate the lean angle of your car's seats and dual side access. 

Construction 
Main body is durable 210D ripstop nylon. 
Back panel and pocket linings made from 600D polyurethane coated polyester. 

Additional Features 
Organizes and carries rods, flies/lures, accessories and essentials on the backside of your seat. 
Holds two 4-piece rod tubes vertically on each end of the organizer. 
Multiple reel

name: Ladies' Merrell Moab 2 Waterproof Trekking Boots
description: Whether you're trekking down a dusty path or scaling a rugged mountain, you can count on these women's Merrell hiking boots for waterproof protection, support and comfort. Featuring a performance suede leather-and-mesh upper, a waterproof layer that keeps water out and allows vapor to escape, and a ventilated bellows tongue for breathability, these boots have you covered. Plus, with a rubber toe cap and heel counter for protection, a blended EVA contoured footbed and molded footframe for cushioning, and an Air insert under the heel for shock absorption, they'll keep you supported and steady. Finished with a durable Vibram® Multi-Sport™ TC5+ rubber outsole with 5 mm lugs for reliable grip, these Merrell boots are ready for any adventure. Approx. weight: 1 lb. 3 oz. per pair. Imported.

name: Easy-Care Check Shirt, Traditional Fit Short-Sleeve
description: Our short-sleeve button-down shirt is designed to look as crisp and sharp at the end of the day as it does at the beginning. The traditional fit is relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. Made of two-ply 100% cotton, this shirt features wrinkle-free performance that won't wash out. The innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly. To care for your shirt, simply machine wash and dry. Additional features include a button-down collar and single patch pocket. Imported.

name: Men's Tropical Breeze Pants
description:
These Men’s cargo hiking pants are adventure-ready in a cool, moisture-wicking fabric that has 50+ UPF sunblock woven right in. Size & Fit - Classic Fit: Sits at the natural waist and trim, with a traditional straight leg. Fabric & Care - 100% nylon wicks moisture and resists wrinkles. Built-in SunSmart™ UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Additional Features - Button front with zip fly. Adjustable nylon belt. Two front slash pockets, two cargo pockets, two rear pockets. Zippered security pocket. Elastic inserts in waist. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off - Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Women's Fusion Hybrid Jacket
description: This lightweight down jacket is designed with two premium insulations - PrimaLoft® and DownTek™ - to provide superior warmth even in cold and damp conditions. It offers light activity protection up to 30° and moderate activity protection up to -20°, giving you the perfect level of insulation in any environment. Slightly Fitted and best with a midweight layer, this jacket falls at the hip and packs on the warmth without feeling bulky. The water-resistant ripstop nylon shell is filled with 650-fill DownTek down insulation and 60-gram PrimaLoft Silver Insulation at hood, shoulders and sleeves. Additional features include an insulated hood, soft fleece inner-collar, zippered chest pocket, two zippered hand pockets, cozy elasticized cuffs, adjustable hem drawcord, and a pouch for compact packing. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Ladies' Cotton Cabled Boot Socks, Knee-High Duo
description: Our popular itch-free slub cotton socks come in a knee-high length that's easy to layer with boots and provides additional warmth and coverage. Fabric & Care: 86% cotton, 13% nylon and 1% spandex. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Knit in the USA from a blend of soft, itch-free cotton slub yarns. Longer length is perfect under boots. Made in the USA.

name: Adventurer 40 Backpack
description:
A light and fast day pack that’s big enough for overnight trips, the pack body is made from 100D Robic nylon reinforced with 100D high-tenacity ripstop nylon. Unique trampoline suspension system allows cooling ventilation between the pack and your back. Lose-a-Lid removable top lid lets you pare down the load for traveling lighter, with security and storage pockets in top lid and a storm bonnet closure seals the top opening when lid is removed. It also features a front stretch mesh "shove-it" pocket keeps an extra layer handy on the trail. Additionally, sleeve with drinking tube port is compatible with a hydration bladder (bladder sold separately). 

Regular: Capacity: 2,441 cu. in., 40 L. Fits torso: 17" to 19". Weight: 2 lb. 12 oz. Dimensions: 26½"H x 13"W x 6"D. 

Large: Capacity: 2,685 cu. in., 44 L. Fits torso: 18" to 21". Weight: 2 lb. 15 oz. Dimensions: 28½"H x 14½"W x 6¾"D. 

Imported.

description:
These snow boots provide kids with the protection of snow boots with a sporty look of hikers, and have been a favorite among adults for years. Now, in a kid-friendly design, they offer all-day comfort and protection for any winter adventure.

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up.

Construction: Leather and fabric upper features our breathable TEK2.5® waterproof system and 200-gram PrimaLoft® insulation delivers reliable winter warmth. Lightweight EVA insole has a sneaker-like feel, while the grippy outsole provides traction on ice and snow. Imported.

Our women's moisture-wicking socks are designed with quick-drying, breathable fabric and thoughtful cushioning to keep your feet cool and dry during any activity.

CoolMax yarn delivers advanced moisture control. NanoGlide technology coats yarn to reduce friction and minimize blisters. Mesh surrounds the foot for 360 degrees of breathability. Cushioned heels and toes. USA, fabric imported.

description:

Moisture-wicking nylon lining.
Foam innersole with odor-resistant antimicrobial technology.

Integrated nylon shank adds midfoot support.

Why We Love It
This stylish cotton V-neck sweater is an essential for any wardrobe. Wear it on a cool summer evening, a rainy spring day, or even in the depths of winter as a light layer.

Fabric & Care
100% combed cotton.
Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features
Rib fashioned V-neckline.
Slight droptail hem.
Imported.

name: Mountain Summit Pro Gore-Tex Jacket
description:
This Gore-Tex Pro waterproof jacket offers extreme protection and total versatility for year-round use. It is guaranteed to keep you dry, and is more durable than ever, having a substantial feel yet being extremely lightweight. It has zoned areas for additional stretch, so you won't feel any restriction during high-intensity activities.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls below hip.

Fabric & Care: Waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex Pro fabric. 100% nylon front and back of main body, hood and sleeves. 92% nylon/8% elastane under arms, shoulders and across back for slight stretch and ease of motion. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Higher collar and longer center back length for full protection. 4-way adjustable hood. Two chest pockets and two handpockets. Pit zip venting for added breathability. Internal mesh pocket and media pocket with port. Adjustable cuffs. Imported.

name: Trail Trekker Trousers
description: Take to the trail with confidence knowing that our top-of-the-line hiking pants are ready for any adventure. Constructed from lightweight, trail-ready nylon fabric that wicks moisture, these pants are designed to keep you comfortable, dry, and protected. The fabric offers two-way vertical stretch for full range of movement, plus an abrasion resistant, industry lab-tested finish that stands up to wear and tear. For added convenience, two low-profile zippered cargo pockets and back zippered pockets keep your essentials secure. With UPF 50+ protection, you can enjoy your outdoor activities in the sun without worrying about skin damage. Available in standard fit and machine washable. Imported.

name: Men's Signature Handcrafted Jackman Moccasin, Leather
description: Craftsmanship, comfort and quality—these rugged heritage mocs are part of ’s decades-old tradition of authentic handsewn moccasins. Why We Love It: Our finest blucher mocs are crafted in time-honored fashion from the very best leather. So strong, durable and timeless, you'll wear them for years (even decades) to come. Construction: Full-grain leather. Comes with rawhide and taslan laces. Smooth leather lining for comfort with or without socks. Molded rubber outsole. Imported, components USA and imported.

name: Weather-Ready Adirondack Chair
description:
Our classic All-Weather Adirondack Chair is built right here in the USA and guaranteed to last in even the toughest climates. It features overall dimensions of 35¾"H x 29"W x 35¾"D, a seat area of 20" x 17", and a seat height of 14"H. This chair is constructed with ecofriendly, partially recycled HDPE (high-density polyethylene) and marine-grade quality stainless-steel hardware, and weighs approximately 37 lbs. 

Tougher and more resilient than treated wood, the HDPE used to build this chair is heavy enough to withstand winds and unaffected by wet weather and extreme temperatures. It won't rot, warp, crack, splinter, absorb moisture or ever need painting, making it ideal for outdoor use - even if left outside all year-round. This chair folds for storage and is available in six attractive, fade-resistant colors. Pair it with our All-Weather Adirondack footstool and Casco Bay Cushions, sold separately, to create the ultimate outdoor lounging setup. 

Assembly is required and instructions are provided. If you have any questions, please reach out to us.

name: GSI Outdoors Adventure Chef Cookset
description: This ultralight camping cooking system was designed for two—easy cooking and easy clean-up. With its specs of 5.9" x 6.4" x 5.9" and a weight of 21.6 oz., this set is perfect for backpacking trips. The cups, bowls and spoons are made of lightweight, BPA-free polypropylene, while the pot is made of hard anodized aluminum. The set includes one 1.8 liter pot, two 20 oz. insulated mugs and two 20 oz. bowls, plus two sporks and a welded stuff sack that doubles as a wash basin. Everything nests together in a small package for storage. The nonstick coating helps heat the pot evenly and makes cleanup a snap. Additional features include a folding pot handle that locks into place for cooking and secures the entire set for transport, a crush-proof, heat-resistant nylon lid with an integrated strainer, integrated nesting for stowing of ultralight stoves and fuel canisters, and an integrated insulating sleeve for keeping drinks hot. The sporks fold down to just 3.7" long, and the Teflon® with Radiance Technology provides a non-stick surface and even heating. This set

name: Sleek Stretch Denim

name: Rustic Plaid Flannel Shirt, Slightly Fitted
description:
For over 80 years, we’ve been crafting our classic Scotch Plaid flannel shirts to the highest standards. Our exclusive Portuguese fabric is carefully brushed for softness and yarn-dyed for enduring color.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.

Why We Love It: An  original, our flannel is woven in a small mill in the hills of Vilarinho by Portuguese artisans. The material is made using longer-staple cotton fibers, making it stronger and of superior quality. Then, it is brushed eight times on each side and tested for softness by a master weaver.

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton flannel, woven in Portugal. Authentic tartans are yarn-dyed for lasting color. Each color is carefully matched to the historical tartans in the Scottish registry. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Button-down collar, single patch pocket, shirttail hem. Imported.

These herringbone pants have the rich look of wool in ultrasoft cotton for itch-free comfort all season long.

Front pockets.

name: Cashmere-Blend Ball Cap
description:
We've winterized your favorite wool baseball hat with a wool-blend crown for warmth and waxed-cotton visor to repel moisture, then lined it with cotton poplin for comfort.

These jeans will follow your every move and look just as good at the end of the day as they did when you first put them on.

description:
Our legendary Maine-made  Boot – designed by "L.L." himself in 1912 and keeping feet dry and comfortable ever since. Chances are, you’ll only ever need one pair. 

Size & Fit
With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.
With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Why We Love Them
Whoever says “they don’t build things like they used to,” doesn't own these boots. Today, our signature boots are still sewn right here in Maine – one pair at a time – by expert craftspeople whose technical skills and passion for their work is evident in every pair of boots they make. Warm, dry feet haven’t gone out of style in a hundred years, so we haven’t needed to change L.L.’s innovative design.

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
Waterproof protection of rubber-bottom boots with the supple comfort of full-grain leather. A uniquely shaped foot form offers

name: Ultra-Loft 850 Big Baffle Hooded Jacket
description: Our Ultralight 850 Down Jacket is designed with bigger baffles to provide you with unparalleled comfort and style. It's suitable for light activity up to 15° and moderate activity to -35°. Its slightly fitted cut falls below the hips and best with midweight layer, making sure you stay warm and cozy. The shell is made from Pertex Y-shaped yarn technology, a tightly interlocked weave that resists moisture and keeps down feathers inside. It's filled with premium 850-fill-power goose down, one of the highest on the market, and treated with DownTek for water repellency. It's also responsibly sourced down. Plus, it features adjustable hood, two zippered hand pockets, one zippered chest pocket, low-profile inner cuff construction and a hem drawcord for additional coverage and wind protection. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

description: Tracking animals requires skill, patience and the right gear, which is why our men’s cotton field pants are flexible, tough and well designed to keep you dry and free to move in the field. Why We Love It Rugged, water-resistant and deflects most thorns—these pants have been designed to handle whatever you throw at them and more. Lightweight and comfortable for long days in the elements, the adjustable waist ensures a customizable fit and gives you room to layer up when necessary. Moreover, the articulated knees allow for a wide range of motion. Fabric & Care Shell: 100% cotton. Chap facing: 330-denier Uplander Cloth Nylon. Durable, water-resistant coating. With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it's clear customers think our Wicked Good Slippers deserve the title of Best Slippers Ever Made. They make such a great gift and are so popular due to the most cozy shearling and superior construction using premium sheepskin. Genuine lamb fur is dyed and treated, and the durable outsole provides added traction. Spot clean when necessary and half sizes should order up. Imported (fur Australia).

description: From hiking to trail running to backyard chores, this men’s reflective tech tee wicks away moisture for on-the-go comfort. Additional Features: Improved fit with longer length for better coverage, especially when active. Raglan sleeves place flatlock, nonchafing seams off the shoulders for greater comfort. Imported.

name: Epic Scholar Backpack
description: This Deluxe Book Pack is a bestseller for nearly three decades and continues to evolve with new improvements. It is known for its impressive extra capacity and iron-clad construction, making it perfect for any use from playgrounds to classrooms, varsity fields to lecture halls. It features a weatherproof, 600-denier polyester construction and has a reinforced bottom for extra durability. The back panel and lumbar support provide all-day comfort, while the adjustable and ergonomically curved straps ensure a secure fit. We've added two deep water bottle pockets and redesigned storm flaps that keep out weather but won't snag on the zippers. The heavy-duty zippers come with easy-to-grip pulls and a waist belt for a more secure fit. There is also a dual main compartment with an organizer panel and laptop sleeve, plus a new fleece-lined interior tech pocket with a built-in cord port and an internal file divider for easy organization. There's also 3M Scotchlite reflective trim for added visibility and a haul loop on top of the bag. This Deluxe Book Pack is designed for ages 10 and up and is imported.

Made of wind- and water-resistant supplex nylon fabric, it is also machine washable for easy care. Additional features include a roomy, adjustable hood for easy on/off, kangaroo pockets, and an adjustable drawcord at the hem. This anorak stows in its own pocket and is perfect for just about anything. Imported. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip.

name: Kids' Adventurous Katahdin Hiker Crew Socks
description:
Featuring our heritage-inspired Mount Katahdin logo, these kid-friendly Darn Tough socks are breathable, comfy and fast drying - plus made right here in New England.

Size & Fit
Performance fit for no slipping, bunching or blisters.

Why We Love Them
We partnered with Darn Tough to design this exclusive hiking sock, featuring our classic "Sunset Over Katahdin" logo. Living up to their name, Darn Tough socks are made to endure even the toughest conditions; we even tested the adult version on the Appalachian Trail to ensure durability and comfort during long days on your feet.

Fabric & Care
In a breathable blend of 59% Merino wool, 38% nylon and 3% Lycra spandex for added comfort.
Natural antimicrobial fibers repel bacteria and odor.
Wicks away moisture and dries quickly.
Do not bleach or dry clean.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Seamless construction provides an ultra smooth, invisible feel.
Fine gauge knitting for extra durability.
Cushioning under foot for a comfortable fit.
Micro crew height falls just below the calf.
Made in the USA.

name: Portable Utility Carrier
description:
Expertly made in Maine just like our Original Boat and Tote, the Utility Tote represents a striking version of our legendary bags. Built for organization and comfortably carrying your gear, it's a great-looking bag you'll reach for every day. 

Specs
Dimensions: 14"H x 16"W x 7.5"D.
Capacity: Approx. 1,680 cu. in.
Fabric & Care
Spot clean.
Construction
Main body and base fabric is rugged 1000-denier Cordura nylon.
Antiqued brass metal hardware and rivets.
Seams are stitched with a heavy-duty nylon thread for durability.
Attractive leather handles and trim details.
Adjustable shoulder strap.
Additional Features
Handy exterior pocket for smaller necessities.
Interior zippered apron pocket with key fob.
Storage pocket behind apron pocket will hold most tablets up to 10 inches.
Taslon zipper pull is the same material used for our  Boot laces. 
Made in Maine.

name: AquaGuard Adventure Backpack
description:
This full-featured, waterproof day pack will keep your gear dry in all weather. Waterproof fabric, a roll-top closure and taped seams in the main compartment seal out moisture so you can concentrate on the trail ahead.

Specs
Weight: 2 lb. 5 oz.
Capacity: 1,465 cu. in.; 24 L.
Dimensions: 23"H x 10.5"W x 9"D.

Construction
Built from super-tough 210D TPU-coated ripstop nylon.
Shoulder straps, back panel and hip belt feature perforated EVA foam for comfort.
Waterproof YKK zipper.

Additional Features
IPX6 waterproof rating – repels rain, snow and mud (not intended for full immersion in water).
Waterproof roll-top closure on main compartment keeps your gear dry.
Main compartment interior seams are taped and sealed.
External "shove-it" pocket with drainage holes allows quick access to a jacket or other essentials.
Two large stretch-mesh hip pockets hold keys, phone or other necessities.
Two elastic mesh water bottle pockets.
Top compartment includes pocket with double-seal zipper for quick access.
Side

name: Cocoon Comfort Camp Futon
description: Spoil yourself with luxurious comfort on your next camping trip with this plush sleeping pad. At three inches thick with a soft fleece sleeping surface, you'll sleep just as well as you would at home. Specs: Open dimensions: 84"L x 32"W x 3"H. Rolled dimensions: 32" x 18". Weight: 7 lb. 3 oz. Construction: Polyester fleece top improves comfort and adds warmth. Water-resistant 900D polyester on sides and bottom. Three-inch-thick 150D TPU laminated polyester inner pad. Additional Features: Machine wash shell, hand wash pad. Line dry. Imported.

name: Men's Oboz Sawtooth II Waterproof Trekking Shoes
description:
These Oboz hiking boots are designed to take on wet and slick conditions with waterproof construction and heavy-duty outsoles. The newly redesigned upper is now more breathable and flexible.

Size & Fit
Order your regular shoe size.

Specs
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 3 oz. per pair.

Construction
Nubuck leather upper with abrasion-resistant synthetic panels.
Oboz B-DRY waterproof, breathable membrane seals moisture out.
3D molded heel counter helps shoes maintain a snug, comfortable heel hold over time.
Dual-density EVA midsole provides supportive and balanced cushioning.
Nylon shank offers added support between heel and forefoot.
Classic Oboz Sawtooth sole sheds mud and provides excellent traction.
Sidewall lugs grip off-camber trails while shaving weight.
Textile lining wicks moisture away.
Low-density EVA pods provide cushioning and comfort.
Imported.

name: Kids' Teva Hurricane XLT 2 Sandals
description: With its secure comfy fit, super easy on/off and water-ready design, these quick-drying Teva Toddlers' sandals are ready for a season of splashing fun. Construction: Water-friendly polyester webbing stands up to the elements and dries quickly. Rubber outsole offers great traction for little adventurers. Additional Features: Easy hook-and-loop closures for quick adjustability and secure fit. Soft heel strap padding. Foam footbed offers cushioned support and comfort all day. Imported.

name:
-Height

Park Ridge Mid-Height Boots
description: This boot has good looks and all the features you need to get through the colder seasons comfortably. Here are the specs: Heel height: 1"; Shaft circumference: 10"; Shaft height: 6"; Approx. weight: 1 lb. 9 oz. per pair. It features a stylish, waterproof full-grain-leather upper with wool-blend back shaft panel, soft fleece lining and cushioned footbed for an amazing feel, a removable synthetic-covered EVA insole with a moderate arch contour for support, and a molded EVA midsole to cushion in all the right places. It also has a nylon shank, molded rubber outsole for traction, and a 5" zipper at arch side of shaft. Imported. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us.

name: Men's Allagash Handcrafted Chukkas
description: Our chukka boots are crafted with meticulous attention to detail and premium leathers, making them the standout of the season. Constructed with durable full-grain and nubuck cowhide leather, the seams are lockstitched in place for years of wear, even at the stress points. An ergonomically shaped footbed provides superior cushioning, while a nylon shank delivers all-day support. For reliable traction, a lugged rubber outsole completes the design. Imported.

name: Men's Go-and-Give Tee
description: This travel or adventure shirt is perfect for backpacking, camping, and traveling! It is made of 94% nylon and 6% Lycra® spandex for a stretchy diamond weave mesh. The highly breathable fabric is lightweight and treated with Aegis Microbe Shield to eliminate odor-causing bacteria. The seams are moved off the shoulders to prevent rubbing and the tagless label adds extra comfort. Plus, the T-shirt is easy to wash and dry quickly. Just machine wash cold with like colors, then tumble dry low. Or, if you're out in nature, simply toss it into the laundry, hotel sink, or river for a clean, dry shirt in hours. Imported.

name: Vista Wool Midweight Performance Crew, Print
description: The perfect base layer for cool-weather sports, our exclusive wool performance fabric provides big warmth with little weight in a soft, smooth fabric. Featuring a fun print, this midweight layer is perfect for layering up for the ski mountain or taking the dog for a walk. It's made of itch-free 100% merino wool, with fine merino-wool fibers that trap heat to keep you warm. Flat-lock seams provide a remarkably soft, smooth fit, and thumbhole cuffs keep sleeves snug at the wrist. Plus, it naturally resists odors. Machine wash cold with like colors, then tumble dry low. Imported.

name: Women's L.L. Bart Camp Sleeveless Shirt
description:
Our new favorite essential tank is made from a soft fabric that wicks away moisture and keeps you going on any adventure. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at hip. 

Why We Love It: This stylish tank is easy to wear and provides all the performance-ready benefits needed in the gym or on the trail. The soft fabric actively moves moisture away from skin for dry comfort during high-intensity activities. 

Fabric & Care: In a moisture-wicking, quick-drying blend of 60% polyester and 40% cotton. Specially washed for added softness and comfort right from the start. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Muscle-tank style looks great layered or worn alone. Shaped hem. Imported.

name: Men's Stetson Adventure Crushable Wool Hat
description: Made in the USA from lightweight, weather-resistant felt, this Stetson Crushable Wool Hat perfectly blends utility, comfort and timeless design. Why We Love It: When it’s not keeping the sun off your face, you can store this topper in a pack or a suitcase without worry. Our Stetson Crushable Wool Hat pops back into shape easily, thanks to fine wool felt and quality construction. Fabric & Care: Made from fine wool felt. Dri-Lex® (polyesterylon blend) sweatband. Feather-impressed hat band. Spot clean. Additional Features: The Mello Felt fabric is lightweight and weather resistant for a range of conditions. Pops back into shape after being stowed in a pack or suitcase. 3" brim. USA.

name: Signature Classic Boyfriend Jeans
description: This pair of boyfriend jeans is the perfect addition to any wardrobe. Stylishly slouchy and comfy, they feature a modern fit that sits low on the waist and is slightly fitted through the hip and thigh. The straight-leg design is finished with a washed, handsanded, and slightly distressed look for a lived-in appeal. It also includes classic five-pocket style with signature back pockets, logo, and hardware. Available in white (79% cotton 19% rayon 2% elastane) and indigo (98% cotton 2% Lycra® elastane), and can be machine washed and dried. Imported. Size & Fit: Inseam: 30". Modern Fit: Sits lowest on the waist. Slightly fitted through hip and thigh. Straight-leg.

name: Timeless Arbor Bench
description: Settle in to this lightweight and comfortable hunting ground seat when hunting deer and turkey. It’s portable, easy to set up and silent in the woods. Specs: Capacity: 300 lb., Weight: 4 lb. Construction: Gently contoured ComfortTech sling seat is made of ventilating mesh. Folding GoLight aluminum frame and shoulder straps make it easy to transport. Additional Features: Portable, easy to set up and silent in the woods. Imported.

name: Luxurious Linen Drawstring Tunic
description:
This drawstring tunic shirt is made from fine European flax – our source for the very best linen. Noticeably softer and wonderfully light, with a beautiful drape and easy-care convenience.

Size & Fit
- Relaxed Fit: Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body.
- Falls at thigh.

Why We Love It
Wonderfully airy and soft draping, this button-front tunic offers cool comfort and easygoing style, even on the warmest of days.

Fabric & Care
- 100% linen is crafted from premium-grade European flax.
- The machine-washable fabric has exceptional ease and longevity.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Single chest pocket.
- Button-front placket.
- Drawstring at waist for flattering style.
- Long sleeves.
- Imported.

name: Men's Under Armour ColdGear Compression Legging
description: Cold mornings in the treestand require more than just regular hunting pants. These warm tights are form-fitting for a snug, non-bulky fit and won't catch or pull on an outer layer. Dual-layer fabric with an ultra-warm, brushed interior and a smooth, fast-drying exterior make them perfect for outdoor activities. 4-way stretch allows complete freedom of movement, while ColdGear® fabric technology wicks moisture and circulates heat to help keep you warm. Anti-odor technology minimizes odor to give you the advantage over game. Smooth flatlock seams prevent chafing, and an advanced, super-comfortable elastic waistband provides added comfort. Stretch-mesh gusset and inseam panels deliver strategic ventilation. These tights are imported.

name: Perform-A-Tex Woven Shirt
description:
Perfect for trail or travel, this breathable summer shirt has the look and feel of cotton - but is packed with performance. Size & Fit Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at hip. 
Why We Love It Designed for total versatility in the backcountry or city streets. We made this woven top with a special quick-dry fabric – one of the fastest drying you'll find anywhere, so you can hit the trail or town in a top that looks great and performs even better. 
Fabric & Care 100% nylon. UPF 40+ rated to block the sun's UV rays. Machine wash and dry.
Additional Features Dries in less than fourteen minutes. Wicks away moisture. Abrasion-resistant for exceptional durability. Imported.
Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Men's Hydro-Shield Hoka One One Sky Toa
description:
These waterproof "speed hikers" are designed to be your lightest and most durable choice for adventures across any terrain. 
Size & Fit: We recommend ordering up a half size from your measured shoe size or your regular Hoka One One size. 
Specs: Dimensions: 14.99 oz. 
Construction: Waterproof eVent bootie keeps your feet comfortable and dry. Technical synthetic upper offers durability and breathability. Rubberized EVA midsole foam offers durable cushioning and a responsive feel. Vibram® Megagrip hi-traction outsole. Multidirectional lugs for supreme grip on varied terrain. Imported.

name: Girls' Tech Skorts
description:
The sport shorts every girl needs in her wardrobe, in a super-soft fabric with next-level performance.

Size & Fit
Relaxed Fit.

Fabric & Care
88% polyester,12% elastane French terry. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Ultrasoft performance fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. Stretches comfortably with her, yet won't stretch out of shape. Flat-faced fleece is brushed on the inside so it feels great against her skin. Comfortable elastic waistband is easy on/off. Imported.

Questions? Contact us for more information.

name:
band

SmoothSail Cropped Pants with Hidden Comfort Waistband
description:
Our women's wrinkle-free original fit pants have versatile cropped styling and a no-iron fabric, making them a great wardrobe staple.

Size & Fit
Inseams: Misses 23". Petite 21", Women’s 23".
Original Fit: Sits higher on the waist.
Relaxed through hip and thigh.
Straight-leg.

Fabric & Care
100% cotton.
Wrinkle-free fabric looks great right out of the dryer every time.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Hidden elastic panels inside the waistband add extra comfort.
Front pockets, back welt pocket.
Imported.

name: Mountain Crest Insulated Pullover
description:
We took the classic anorak look and combined it with the exceptional warmth of PrimaLoft® insulation - the perfect throw-on-and-go for transitional weather. Light activity is comfortable up to 45° and Moderate activity is comfortable up to -5°.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip.

Why We Love It: Inspired by our archives, we designed this insulated pullover hoodie to have all the features you love about our classic anorak, plus the innovative, lightweight warmth of PrimaLoft insulation. We love throwing it on for morning walks with the dog, exploring a new trail or simply stepping out for the weekend.

Fabric & Care: Weather-resistant, lightweight 100% polyester. Packed with 40 grams of ultralight, ultrawarm PrimaLoft insulation. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Elastic hood and cuffs to seal out the conditions. Deep-front quarter zipper for easy on and off. Kangaroo pocket with hidden security pocket on the right. Adjustable drawcords at hem. Imported.

name: Victorinox® Master Tinker
description:
The Victorinox Super Tinker multitool is the perfect companion for everyday fixes. With 13 tools, this multitool attaches to your key ring so you'll always have it on hand. The stainless-steel tools and hard plastic handle are designed for durability. You'll find two knives, small/large flat blade screwdrivers, cross point screwdriver, scissors, wire stripper, reamer/punch, cap lifter, can opener, tweezers, toothpick and hook. Weighing just 3.5 oz. and measuring 3½"L when closed, this multitool is the ideal size for portability. Imported.

NOTICE: You must be at least 18 years old to purchase this product. Check your state and local laws for any additional restrictions that may apply before ordering.

name: Sunset Strand Chair
description:
This full-size beach chair with head pillow features four positions and a durable aluminum/steel hybrid frame. Bi-Fold Technology™ lets you fold it in half twice, becoming a quarter of its open size for easy packing and storage.

Specs:
- Capacity: 250 lb. 
- Open dimensions: 25.8"L x 25.8"W x 31.5"H.
- Folded dimensions: 14.4"L x 4.1"W x 26'H.
- Seat height: 10.6"
- Weight: 7.3 lb.

Construction: 
- Powder-coated steel and aluminum frame.

Additional Features: 
- Free-Stand Technology lets it stand on its own while folded, keeping it sand-free. 
- Built-in pillow and mesh backrest help keep you cool and comfortable. 
- 4-position backrest. 
- Comfortable carry strap. 
- Convenient beverage holder. 
- Imported.

name: Women's Nor'Easter Slide, Print
description:
"These women's slides are designed with comfort in mind. The stretch upper provides comfortable range of motion, while the EVA footbed with excellent arch support offers cushioning and support. Additionally, the contoured anatomical footbed provides superior support and comfort. A cushioned EVA midsole and lightweight rubber sole with chain-tread detailing for traction further enhance the comfort of these slides. 

Size & Fit: Order regular shoe size. Half sizes order down.

Construction: 
- Stretch upper provides comfortable range of motion.
- EVA footbed with excellent arch support for cushioning and support.
- Contoured anatomical footbed provides superior support and comfort.
- Cushioned EVA midsole.
- Lightweight rubber sole with chain-tread detailing for traction.
- Imported.

name: Chill-Print Cooler
description:
We listened to your feedback and added 5 exterior pockets to our popular coolers so it's easier to organize all your picnic accessories. The new flip-top lid stays open when you're looking for a snack inside and can hold a 6-pack of 12 oz. cans with ice. 

Specs
Capacity: Approx. 346 cu. in., 6 L. 
Weight: 13 oz. 
Dimensions: 10.5"L x 7.5"H x 6"W. 

Construction
The body is made from durable 600D Kodra and triple ripstop 100D Cordura. It also features a food-grade, non-PVC liner that is easy to clean and won't leak. The easy-opening, zippered main lid allows quick access and the dual-adjustable shoulder strap is removable. There are two small zippered side pockets for utensils or small essentials, a large front pocket with an elastic cuff, and two zippered pockets on the lid and back. The carry straps with velcro handle wrap are elongated, allowing the cooler to be easily shouldered. 

Additional Features
This lightweight and durable cooler is perfect for work, picnics

name: Gore-Tex/Thinsulate Women's Winter Boots by ®
description:
Our iconic Maine-made  Boots are ready for whatever Mother Nature throws your way. With a waterproof Gore-Tex lining and warm Thinsulate Insulation, your feet will stay warm and dry in rain, cold, mud, slush and whatever else comes your way.

Size & Fit
- Light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down. 9, 9½, order 8.
- Heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order normally. Half sizes, order next size down. 9 or 9½, size 9.

Why We Love Them
Warm, dry feet haven’t gone out of style in a hundred years. That's why our Women's insulated duck boots are built with attention to detail and premium materials you won't find anywhere else. Still handcrafted right here in Maine – one pair at a time – just like the originals. Chances are, you'll only ever need one pair.

Construction
- Supple comfort of full-grain leather.
- A uniquely shaped foot form offers comfort and stability, and a steel shank adds support.
- Our original rubber chain-tread bottom provides traction and durability

name: Smith Spectra Shield 2 Polarized Sunglasses with ChromaPop
description:
Show your classic style in these Smith Serpico Slim 2 sunglasses, which boast exceptional durability, lightweight frames and Smith's incredibly advanced ChromaPop lenses. 

Size & Fit
Small-Medium.

Construction
Durable metal frames. Tailor-fit adjustable nose pads keep frames from slipping. Advanced ChromaPop polarized lenses provide incredibly clear and crisp images. Special lens coatings repel water, oil and grime. Antireflective coatings provide clear vision.

Additional Features
Sleek, attractive aviator style. Fit small faces best. Imported. 

Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Katahdin Iron Works Bonded Flannel Shirt Jac
description:
The ultimate shirt jac, designed to withstand cold weather and hard work. The unique bonded fabric is soft and warm, inside and out, with a hefty, substantial feel. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. 

Why We Love It: Part of our popular Katahdin Iron Works collection inspired by hardworking Mainers, our work shirt offers utility and comfort to rely on. We use ultrasoft, pill-resistant waffle-knit cotton that's lined with the same plush berber fleece as our sweatshirts for toasty warmth without weight. It's a great layer for working outdoors. 

Fabric & Care: 77% polyester, 23% cotton. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Bonded construction insulates for extra warmth and won't stretch out of shape. Classic shirt jac styling, with collar and modified hem for extra coverage. Full snap placket for easy on/off. Chest pockets with snap closures. Pencil pocket on chest. Underarm gussets enhance mobility. Berber fleece-lined pockets keep hands warm. One pocket has a hidden security pocket tucked inside. Imported

name: Wilderness Hoodie
description: This  hoodie is designed to keep you warm and comfortable no matter the activity. Its weather-resistant nylon shell, soft fleece lining and naturally stretchy fit make it a great choice for outdoor wear. Its adjustable hood and polyester-bonded cuffs and hem are perfect for keeping drafts out. It has a traditional fit that is relaxed through the chest, sleeve, and waist. Made of 100% polyester, this classic hoodie can be machine washed and dried. It is imported, and you won't regret having one in your wardrobe.

name: Rugged Explorer Mug, 14 oz.
description:
This classic steel camping mug features vacuum insulation to keep drinks hot or cold for hours. Tough stainless steel construction will handle all of your outdoor adventures.

Specs
- Capacity: 14 oz.
- Weight: 6.5 oz.
- Dimensions: 4"H x 3.5" diam.

Construction
- Made from rugged stainless steel.
- Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks hot or cold.

Additional Features
- Simple press fit polyethylene lid is easy to drink from and easy to clean.
- Handwash only.
- Imported.

name: Dream Futon
description: A practical choice for any household, our hardwood futon frame set offers the comfort of a couch and the convenience of a guest bed. Specs: Overall: 32"H x 85¾"L x 36"D. Overall as bed: 23"H x 84¾"W x 53"D. Weight: 126 lb. Construction: Crafted from solid American ash hardwood. Finished with stain and durable lacquer topcoat. Assembly required, see instructions below. Additional Features: Designed with timeless style, a focus on function, and expert craftsmanship. Reclines into a bed. Adjusts to two seating positions: upright and relaxed. Part of our American Hardwood Collection. Futon mattress, slipcover, and bolsters sold separately. Handcrafted in Maine. USA. Assembly Instructions

name: Tiny Toes Animal Slippers
description:
These fur-ocious kids’ animal slippers will stir toddlers’ imaginations while the brushed polyester lining and cushioned insole keep their feet warm and comfortable, and the adorable paw print tread prevents slips. 

Size & Fit
Half sizes order up. 
Sized for toddlers.

Fabric & Care
Polyester upper.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Brushed polyester lining.
Cushioned foam insole.
Ankle-hugging cuff.
Nonmarking rubber sole with paw-print tread.
Selection of fun critters kids will love.
Imported.

name: Men's Kanga-Temp Upland Hunter's Boots
description:
Our bestselling insulated upland hunting boots have been improved with feedback from our own expert hunters and customer reviews. They are now more comfortable, fit better than ever before and provide much better traction. 

Size & Fit: For half sizes not offered, order up to next whole size. Approx. weight: 3 lb. 2 oz. per pair. 

Why We Love Them: Kangaroo leather is stronger, lighter and more durable than cowhide leather of the same weight, making it the perfect choice for upland hunting boots. Our waterproof TEK 2.5 membrane with 200-grams Primaloft insulation keeps your feet comfortable, dry and protected all season. The updated Vibram Mega-Grip outsole provides optimum grip in all conditions. 

Construction: 
-Made from lightweight, durable Kangaroo leather that provides all-day comfort
-TEK 2.5 waterproof, breathable lining
-200-gram Primaloft insulation for reliable warmth
-Traditional welted construction for exceptional support
-8" height for optimum comfort, support and protection
-Updated Vibram Mega-Grip outsole with improved traction and soil release
-Premium ortholite sock liner for extra comfort and support

name: Mountain Peaks National Park Emblem
description:
We are proud to offer the Rocky Mountain National Park collectible patch - featuring Colorado's inspiring scenery and opportunities for amazing outdoor adventures. 

Specs: Dimensions: 2 1/2"H x 3 1/2"W. 

Why We Love It: We're dedicated to supporting organizations that help people get outside and we think we've found our perfect match. The National Park Foundation, the official charitable partner of the National Park Service, works to protect an amazing network of more than 400 national park sites, many of which you'll find just a short trip away. 

Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Iron on to a pack or jacket - or sew on to fabric surface for extra durability. Get your 2019 National Park pass with us. Learn more at bbarnstormer.com/nationalparks. Made in the USA.

name: Cozy Comfort Everyday Underwear, Pants Pattern
description: Stay cozy with our heat-generating underwear, designed to keep you up to 7 degrees warmer. Crafted with 48% acrylic, 28% Tencel, 19% polyester, and 5% spandex, these underwear are trim-fitting and ultra-soft, perfect for wear under clothing or on their own. The advanced fabric traps body moisture, transforming it into heat, even while sitting still. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Perfect for casual warmth and everyday wear while running errands, walking the dog or snow blowing. Imported.

name: Cozy Rib-Knit Henley
description:
Our women's long-sleeve waffle knit henley shirt blends soft, comfortable stretch cotton with timeless styling to make it an indispensable layering piece.

Size & Fit:
Fitted: Sits close to the body. Falls at hip.

Fabric & Care:
98% cotton, 2% Lycra. 100% cotton jersey binding at collar and placket. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry in the shade.

Additional Features:
Printed label. Ribbed neckline and cuffs. A touch of spandex helps the cotton fabric hold its shape, wash after wash. Imported.

name: Kids' Trail Adventure Rain Jacket, Colorblock Lined
description:
Our bestselling kids' rain jacket is better than ever, featuring a durable laminate interior to help maintain waterproofness. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit

Fabric & Care: Waterproof/breathable Tek 2.0 ripstop nylon. Shell is made from recycled nylon to help reduce our environmental impact. 100% polyester fleece lining. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Cozy fleece lining adds extra warmth and comfort on the wettest days. 360° reflectivity for better visibility during low-light conditions. Storm flap with hook and loop closure plus fully-taped seams help seal out rain. Three zippered pockets for necessities:  two handwarmer and one chest. Waterproof, breathable and extra warm, it also makes it a great transitional jacket for active kids. Imported.

name: Women's  Ultimate Cycling Jersey, Long-Sleeve
description:
This jersey has a more relaxed look and fit than most cycling apparel, making it ideal for cycling. It won't look out of place at the store during a midride snack break. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. 

Fabric & Care: Soft, breathable Airtek polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: SunSmart UPF 40+ sun protection. Lightweight, comfortable, and quick-drying. Silver Max antimicrobial treatment fights odor. Quarter-zip front provides quick, easy ventilation. Back pouch pocket holds food, money, keys, or a cell phone. Rear zip pocket on lower back with vertical invisible zipper. Imported.

name: SnowShield Pants
description:
These men’s waterproof snow pants provide reliable warmth and waterproof breathability with TEK2 fabric.

Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit - our loosest cut, with the most room through the seat and knee.

Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry.

Construction: Breathable, waterproof TEK2® 100% nylon fabric taped at the seams, insulated with ThermaTEK polyester insulation, snap closure and waistband adjustments for a customizable fit, snow gaiter hems for deep snow protection and easy on/off over boots, lining content: 100% Nylon taffetta, imported.

name: Cozy Comfort Sweats
description:
Our Ultrasoft Sweatpants in a straight-leg style—made from remarkably comfortable french terry. 

Size & Fit
Inseams: Misses’ 30½", Petite 28½", Medium Tall 32½", Women's 30½". 
Classic Fit: Sits at the waist. 
Slightly fitted through hip and thigh. 
Straight-leg. 

Fabric & Care
In 95% cotton and 5% spandex. 
Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
French terry feels wonderfully soft and comfortable next to your skin. 
Designed with shaping for a more flattering, feminine fit. 
Elastic waist with drawstring, front pockets. 
Imported. 

Questions? Feel free to contact us for any inquiries.

name: Wool-Lined Midweight Base Layer Trousers
description: 'Our pants are made of our exclusive wool performance fabric, made with 100% merino wool, nature's best insulator. The fine-gauge knit with flat-lock seams won't bind, and the gusseted design provides comfortable mobility. The fabric speeds moisture away from your body and traps heat for extra warmth, and it naturally resists odors for the lifetime of the fabric. Machine wash and line dry. Imported.'

name: Journey Trek Shoes
description:
Lightweight sneakers with trail-friendly features to keep you comfortable and supported. 

Size & Fit: Fit best with midweight socks.

name: CatchMaster Fishing Life Vest
description: Designed for serious anglers, the  Guide Fishing PFD is comfortable and fully adjustable, with ample pockets and attachment points for fishing gear. Medium - fits chest sizes 30" - 40", Large - fits chest sizes 40" - 46", and XL - fits chest sizes 46" - 52". Outer shell made from 240D ripstop nylon; inner liner is 200D nylon. Flotation consists of PVC-free Gaia foam: Medium -16.5 lbs., Large - 17 lbs., and XL -17.5 lbs. It features innovative graded sizing to minimize bulk and maximize comfort. There are two 7" x 5.5" zippered pockets for fly boxes and other gear, with additional storage behind pockets and stretch mesh on front for smaller items. The thin foam on back makes it comfortable to wear while seated in a kayak seat. It also has adjustable shoulder straps, reflective tape on back for visibility, interior mesh lining for breathability, dual side adjustment straps for better fit, and a cross-chest harness to prevent ride-up. USCG approved Type lll PFD. Attachment points for tippets, retractors, nippers and other fishing accessories. Imported.

name: Allagash Natural Fit Cargo Pants
description:
Our rugged men's cargo pants have been praised by customers for their functional design and meticulous construction. Now, thanks to your feedback, they're even more comfortable and easy to wear.

Size & Fit

Natural Fit: Sits at the natural waist and relaxed through the hip and thigh.

Why We Love Them

These hardworking cargos are a great-looking choice for any day of the week. Made from 100% cotton, they have a subtle texture for less heft and a more airy, comfortable feel. With new features like snap pockets that make them sturdier and more convenient than ever.

Fabric & Care

100% cotton canvas.

Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features

Triple-needle stitching at stress seams adds long-lasting durability.

Roomy side cargo and back pockets – both with snaps.

On-seam pockets, with a zippered security pocket on the right side.

All pockets have sturdy pocket bags and offer plenty of room for a wallet, cell phone and more.

Gusseted crotch for ease of movement.

Imported.

name: O'Malley's Catch of the Day Crewneck
description:
Inspired by the traditional sweaters worn as a defense against the bone-chilling conditions at sea, our heavyweight cardigan is made in Ireland with premium wool for outstanding warmth. Why We Love It: While imitations are endless, it’s hard to find authentic sweaters like these anywhere else, especially at this price. Competitors use wool-blend yarns, more modern machinery and take other measures that just can’t compensate for the tried-and-true craftsmanship of our heirloom sweaters. Made exclusively for us the old-fashioned way, each sweater is expertly knit in Ireland by family-run businesses who’ve been making them for generations.

Fabric & Care: Premium 100% wool. Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. 

Construction: Heavyweight wool is warm enough for unusual cold, whether braving the sea or a New England winter. 

Additional Features: Time-honored craftsmanship, featuring designs and traditions that go back for generations. Irish villagers traditionally knit distinct patterns or cables into the sweaters for good luck. Made in Ireland.

name: Little Fire Joggers
description:
These knit high tops are an absolute must-have! They are super cool and stylish, perfect for kids who appreciate the look of lightweight knit sneakers and the comfortable and snappy feel they bring to each step. 

Size & Fit: Half sizes order up. 

Construction: 
- Breathable, lightweight knit mesh upper. 
- Flexible nonmarking rubber outsole absorbs impact and moves with the foot’s natural motion. 
- Removable foam insole. 
- Polyurethane midsole. 
- Lace-up style. 
- Imported.

name:
Jacket

 Kids' Cozy Fleece Hooded Jacket

Relaxed Fit.

Katahdin logo patch on the left chest. Zippered handwarmer pockets. Full-zip with chin guard. Imported.

name: Roaming Adventure Kit
description: Our newest pack easily converts from a carry-on suitcase to a backpack, giving you twice the options. Generous capacity is ideal for a business trip or weekend away. Specs: Capacity: 2,520 cu. in., Weight: 3.4 lb., Dimensions: 22"H x 13.5"W x 6.5"D. Why We Love It: We designed this bag so it's easy to carry two ways and also easy to stow. We especially love the added versatility of the backpack straps - when we hit the airport, we put the whole pack on our back to navigate more quickly through the crowds. Fabric & Care: Spot clean. Construction: Rugged, abrasion-resistant polyester twill, Stowable backpack straps, Large main compartment with two zippered sides and mesh divider, Multiple zip pockets on front, Detachable shoulder strap is padded for extra comfort. Additional Features: Large organizer pocket on front with separate mesh compartments, Padded pocket on back panel accommodates a laptop up to a 17", Back slot slides over our Spinner handles for easy transport, Meets most airline carry-on requirements, Imported.

From hobbyist to enthusiast, this adults’ snorkeling set provides the high-quality gear you need for underwater exploration.

- Splash guard keeps snorkel water free.

Additional Features
- Convenient travel-size fins.
- Carrying bag included.

name: Women's Double-Buckle Leather Slides
description:
With pretty styling and all-over comfort, these two-buckle cork sandals are ideal warm-weather companions. Their all-terrain outsole, waterproof-leather upper and precise, adjustable fit make them easy to wear just about anywhere.

Size & Fit
Half sizes order down.

Construction
Soft, waterproof full-grain-leather upper
Two soft leather straps with adjustable buckles for a custom fit.
Cork-covered foam footbed with synthetic jersey lining.
EVA midsole and cork provide great cushioning.
Nylon shank for support.
 all-terrain VertiGrip molded rubber outsole with floral detailing.
Imported.

name: Renew Refresh Swimwear, V-Neck Tankini Print
description: This watersport tankini top is designed with an eco-friendly fabric and ready-for-anything design to make a splash. The colorful, eye-catching print adds a stylish look. With a fitted design that sits close to the body, this swim top is made from recycled nylon with Lycra® spandex for a comfortable fit that moves with you. Breathable, quick drying and abrasion resistant, the premium Italian-blend is UPF 50+ rated, the highest rated sun protection possible. The lightweight racerback straps make it easy to get on and off and the flattering V-neck silhouette adds a flattering touch. Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation, this fabric is an effective UV protectant. Handwash and line dry. Imported.

name: Activewear Joggers
description:
Brushed for old-favorite warmth and softness, these men’s sweatpants are durable in action, soft and comfortable when lounging.

Classic Fit: Sits at the natural waist and trim, with a traditional straight leg.

Prewashed to minimize shrinkage.

On-seam pockets. 
Back pocket. 
Elastic waistband with drawcord. 
10" leg zippers for easy on/off over sneakers.

name: Women's Coastal Print Skirt
description:
Our do-it-all skirt is made from ultratough, ultraversatile supplex nylon that repels water, stands up to daily wear and tear and looks great, too. 

Size & Fit
- 16" inseam.
- Modern Fit: Sits lowest on the waist.

Why We Love It
We designed this skirt to be exceptionally light and packable, so you can bring it along as your throw-on-and-go for the campsite, a trip into town — literally anywhere. We love wearing it on the trail or over a swimsuit for a day at the beach.

Fabric & Care
- Made from abrasion-resistant, water-repellent nylon.
- Anti-chlorine finish resists fading over time.
- UPF 50+ rated - the highest level of sun protection possible.

- Packs down small and stows away into its own pocket.

name: Men's Shearling-Lined Tumbled-Leather Bart Boots by ® 10"
description:
Our  Boots are perhaps our most comfortable yet, crafted with soft tumbled leather and a cozy shearling lining. Crafted in Maine, these duck boots provide the water-resistant protection of rubber bottom boots, the warmth of a shearling lining and a rich, full-grain US leather that has been gently tumbled for a remarkably soft and broken-in feel. Triple-stitched in Maine, one pair at a time, these boots feature a supportive steel shank, our original rubber chain-tread bottom and American shearling lamb fur that has been dyed and treated. For the best fit, whole sizes should order normally and half sizes should order one size down for midweight socks and one size up for heavyweight socks. 

Experience the comfort of these boots for yourself - you'll feel as if you've been wearing them for years!

name: Cozy Wool Blend Coat
description:
The ultimate sweater fleece – made from superior fabric and offered at an unbeatable price. 

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at midthigh. 

Why We Love It
Our customers (and employees) love the rugged construction and heritage-inspired styling of our popular Sweater Fleece Coat and wear it for absolutely everything. From high-intensity activities to everyday tasks, you'll find yourself reaching for it every time. 

Fabric & Care
Rugged sweater-knit exterior and soft brushed interior for exceptional warmth and comfort. Made from soft, 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
Front princess seams create a feminine shape. Two-way front zipper provides freedom of movement. Wind flap with zipper garage for warmth and comfort. Two zippered hand pockets and one on the left arm secure valuables. Cuffs and hem reinforced with jersey binding. Imported.

name: Men's Stride Wading Boots
description:
Our Emerger men's wading boots are the best value in wading boots on the market. Built for any type of situation, they're equally well suited to tromping through the river or woods. 

Size & Fit
Sized to be worn over neoprene booties; please order your street shoe size. Half sizes order down.

Why We Love Them
These affordable wading boots are a great way to get started. They feature premium design features without the premium price tag. Quick-drying materials tolerate being wet all the time if you're the type of angler who's always hitting the river. Streamlined shape won't let aquatic hitchhikers latch on. The advanced Idrogrip outsole provides excellent traction in all conditions.

Construction
Streamlined shape prevents invasive vegetation from hitching a ride. Closed-cell padding and EVA foam midsole protect against sharp rocks. Vibram Idrogrip outsole grips wet rocks and slippery bottoms. EVA sheet midsole provides excellent torsional support, protection and comfort. Nonabsorbent materials allow for quick drying. 8" height for good protection and ease of entry. Imported.

name: Easy Breezy Floral Oxford Shirt, Long-Sleeve Relaxed Fit
description:
Treated with wrinkle-resistant fabric and finished with delicate details, our very-fine pinpoint oxford cloth floral shirt gives a polished look whether straight out of the dryer or after all-day wear. 

Size & Fit
Relaxed Fit: Our most generous fit sits farthest from the body. Falls at low hip. 

Fabric & Care
100% cotton. Crisp, smooth pinpoint fabric is made of very fine oxford cloth and treated to resist wrinkles. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
Finely tailored, with a narrow placket and pearlized buttons. Taped seams stay smooth for little or no ironing. Women’s sizes feature bust darts. Imported.

name: Signature 650 Down Colorblock Parka
description:
A true classic made modern, this colorblock down anorak features heritage-inspired details and an updated fit for a streamlined look. Plus, it's packed with 650-fill down for exceptional warmth. 

Size & Fit: Slim Fit: Cut slim through the chest, sleeve, and waist.

Additional Features: Adjustable drawcord at hood and hem. Velcro tabs for adjusting cuffs. Zippered side hand pockets. Classic kangaroo pocket with velcro closure. Imported.

name: Everyday Comfort Socks, Midweight Duo
description: These soft, form-fitting men's midweight khaki socks are perfect for the office or at home, offering all-day comfort thanks to moisture-wicking merino wool, durable nylon and spandex for shape-retaining stretch. Fabric & Care: 32% nylon, 33% merino wool, 33% acrylic, 2% spandex blend. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: 10"H. USA, fabric imported.

name: Women's Camo Soft-Shell Trail Jacket
description:
This full-season women's hunting jacket provides exceptional temperature versatility and comfort. It's warm enough to be worn alone in cold weather and can be used as a toasty layer when the mercury really dips.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Windproof soft-shell material is breathable. Quiet fabric won't spook game. Anti-odor Polygene treatment conceals your odor from game. Low nap/hard face outer fabric resists snags, debris and repels water. Soft interior grid fleece. Articulation allows full range of motion and comfort. Wind- and water-resistant full-length front zipper. Flat seams prevent chafing and hot spots. Zipper is offset to keep it away from your chin for added comfort. Chaintread silicon print on shoulders prevents pack straps or gun sling from slipping. Two handwarmer pockets. Vertical upper sleeve pocket provides storage for gear and can be used while wearing a pack. Imported.

description:

Slightly Fitted.

Additional Features

description:
Designed for the solo backpacker, the Soloist cookset has everything you need to prepare meals in a compact, lightweight package. Includes 1.1 L cookpot, 14 oz. insulated mug/bowl, telescoping spork and welded stuff sack.

Dimensions: 5" x 5.4" x 5.5".
Weight 10.9 oz.

Construction:
Pot made from nonstick coated hard anodized aluminum.
Mug and spork made from polypropylene.
Stuff sack made from nylon.

Additional Features:
Folding pot handle locks into place for cooking and secures entire set for transport.
Welded stuff sack holds set while traveling and doubles as a sink or wash basin.
Crush-proof, heat-resistant nylon lid won't deform and includes an integrated strainer.
Integrated nesting allows for stowing of ultralight stoves and fuel canisters.
Unique mug/bowl with low center of gravity and Sip-IT lid virtually eliminates spills.
Integrated insulating sleeve keeps drinks hot.
Clever spork design folds to just 3.7" long.
Teflon® with Radiance

description:
Our Women's cycling shorts feature a trimmer fit, more zip pockets and new reflective highlights, making them perfect for both on and off the bike. You'll feel comfortable walking into a store for a mid-ride snack. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Inseam 8". 

Fabric & Care: Outer shell is 96% nylon/4% spandex. Interior liner is 88% polyester/12% lycra-elastane spandex. UPF 50+ rated, with the highest rated sun protection possible. Machine wash, line dry. 

Additional Features: Velcro-closure waist tabs provide a snug custom fit. Snap fly with zipper. Updated pockets include two front, two rear and one side zippered pocket for secure storage. Reflective accents provide increased visibility. Soft, yet durable outer shell is nylon and spandex. Comfort stretch interior liner is polyester with lycra-elastane spandex. Removable liner features chamois pad with a gender-specific fit. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful

name: Umpqua Ultralight Standard Fly Box
description: This high capacity, lightweight fly box has a slim design that easily slips in and out of your vest pocket. It can hold an impressive amount of dries and nymphs. The specs are as follows: Dimensions: 7.25"L x 4"W x 0.75"D. It features a 3-D molded high-grip FlyTrap™ storage system and high-capacity slotted foam to securely hold flies. It also has a single-sided opening and see-through lids with magnetic closures for good visibility and organization. This fly box is imported. If you have any questions, please contact us.

D-Ring lace system with speed hooks for easy on/off and a secure fit. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off

IF&W shield is same one Maine Game Wardens have on their uniform.
