name: Men's Fishing Graphic Tee, Short-Sleeve.
description:
These performance tees are adorned with fun fishing graphics and provide exceptional comfort. The polyester/cotton blend ensures moisture-wicking performance and quick drying capabilities. With a slightly fitted style that is relaxed through the chest and sleeve and a slightly slimmer waist, you'll stay cool and dry whether you're out fishing or hanging at a backyard barbecue. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.

Why We Love It: These performance tops wick moisture and dry incredibly quickly, making them a great choice for long days on the water.

Fabric & Care: 60% polyester, 40% cotton. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Polyester/cotton blend for outstanding comfort and performance. Short sleeves for warmer weather. Imported.

name: Women's Streamlight Ultra II Fly Rod, 8'9" 5 Wt.
description: Our 8'9" length fly rod is designed for her with amazingly crisp action and a remarkably lightweight feel. Our bestselling rod series has been updated with an improved design, making it even more durable and lightweight. With a moderate/fast rod taper, this rod offers sensitivity for timing and plenty of power to punch streamers across the river. Additionally, it features alignment lines/dots at each ferrule for ease of assembly, chrome-plated, double-foot snake guides and alconite stripping guides for reduced friction, a modified full wells cork grip ideal for smaller hands, and a shorter length good for line control and clearance. An  script logo and light teal color add a touch of color and the rod comes with a nylon canvas-covered rod case. Imported.

name: Easy-Care Cotton Chambray Shirt, Classic Fit Short-Sleeve
description: Our lightweight and breathable cotton chambray shirt from  is the perfect combination of classic style and modern convenience. Enjoy the look and feel of chambray fabric, but without the hassle of ironing thanks to its built-in easy-care technology that sheds wrinkles. It also features a single patch pocket and a button-down collar. This shirt is available exclusively at  and comes in our Traditional Fit, which is relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name: All-Weather Field Jacket, Cotton-Lined
description:
Often Imitated—Never Duplicated®. Our authentic men’s field jacket is made of heavy-duty Nor'Easter cotton canvas that feels broken in from the start, yet provides excellent protection against wind, rain and snow. Light activity: to 50°  Moderate activity: to 0°.

Size & Fit - Traditional Fit. Best with midweight layer. Large back length: 33".

Why We Love It - Our Original Field Coat has set the standard for quality and craftsmanship since 1924. Originally designed for hunting, it's built to withstand the briars and branches of the thick Maine woods.

Fabric & Care - Jacket: two-ply 10 oz. cotton canvas with water- and stain-resistant treatment. Collar and cuffs: 100% cotton 16-wale corduroy. Sewn-in lining: cotton in body, nylon in sleeves.

Additional Features - Underarm gussets and bi-swing shoulders let you move and reach with ease. Five pockets with enough room to carry a day's essentials. Imported.

name: Smooth-Look Tattersall Oxford Shirt, Long-Sleeve Slim Fit
description:
Our wrinkle-free pinpoint premium dress shirt is designed with a high thread count, an extra-smooth finish, a modern fit and durable two-ply fabric for all day comfort. 

Size & Fit: 
Slim Fit: Cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist. Select your neck and sleeve measurements for a comfortable, nearly custom fit. Looking for a Tall size? If you choose a 36" or 37" sleeve length, your shirt will measure 2" longer in the body. 

Fabric & Care: 
100% cotton: 3.9 oz., 80s two-ply wrinkle-free, non-iron fabric. High thread count, tightly woven for an ultrasmooth finish. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: 
Split back yoke for a natural fit across the shoulders. Durable buttons, cross-stitched to stay in place. Expert single-needle tailoring, with double-needle stitching at stress seams. Imported.

name: Soft Cotton Elbow-Sleeve Scoopneck Tee
description: Our elbow-length-sleeve tee for women is made from the world's finest Supima® cotton, grown right here in the USA. It's extraordinarily soft, smooth and long lasting, making it superior to other tees in every way. Supima cotton has a luxurious softness and rich color due to its long-staple fibers, which are 35% longer and 45% stronger than everyday cotton. It's also comfortable and easy to care for. With the added assurance that the fabric and fit remain the same, wash after wash, you can be sure you'll enjoy this tee for years to come. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at hip. Fabric & Care: Extraordinarily soft in long-staple Supima® cotton – grown in the USA. Interlock knit for a smooth feel inside and out. Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low. Additional Features: Tested to ensure the fabric and fit remain the same, wash after wash. Imported, fabric USA.

name: Women's  Tall Cozy Knit Socks
description:
Our chunky-knit Slipper socks are inspired by traditional sweaters, designed to keep your feet warm on cold mornings. Roll them up like socks and take them with you when you travel, so any place feels more like home.

Fabric & Care: Handwash upper in cold water; avoid getting the leather wet. Air dry.

Construction: Choose from a popcorn-stitch or Fair-Isle-patterned knit upper. Fair Isle upper is soft acrylic; popcorn stitch is 60% cotton and 40% acrylic. Polyester-fleece footbed surrounds your feet in softness. EVA-foam midsole and suede-leather outsole. Elasticized, ribbed top cuff prevents sagging. Suede leather rand. Imported.

name: Women's NRS Endurance Waterproof Paddling Pants
description:
These comfortable, affordable splash paddling pants are designed to keep out the wind and splashing water. Perfect for canoeing or paddleboarding in cooler weather.

Fabric & Care:
40-denier HyproTex™ 2.5 waterproof, breathable fabric. Handwash, line dry.

Construction:
Made from waterproof, breathable HyproTex™ 2.5 fabric that lets excess heat and moisture escape. Generous cut allows for easy layering underneath without restricting movement. High-rise design and wide neoprene waistband deliver optimal coverage even when sitting. Dual hook-and-loop adjustments allow you to cinch the neoprene waistband for a custom fit. Reinforced seat and knees add extra durability in high-wear areas. A splashproof thigh pocket keeps small essentials handy. Imported.

name: Signature Heritage Chamois Cloth Shirt, Slim Fit Plaid
description: Our men’s slim fit chamois shirt is crafted with a rugged attitude and attention to detail, featuring a modern fit that is trimmer cut and shorter length. Made of 100% 7.8 oz. cotton flannel woven in Portugal, it is brushed and garment-washed for a vintage broken-in feel that only gets better with wear. Additional features include angled flap pockets with custom buttons, spread collar and shirttail hem. Imported. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Girls' Ultra-Warm Down Jacket
description: Our girls' down coat combines 650-fill DownTek™ down insulation with a longer length for lightweight warmth and extra coverage. Comfort ratings are light activity: to 20°, moderate activity: to -5°. The fit is relaxed. This revolutionary down is treated to stay dry and dry out faster, making it a great insulator. The fabric and care is a 100% nylon shell and 650 Duck Down with DownTek insulation with a machine wash cold with like colors and tumble dry low. It also includes a water-resistant, 100% ripstop-nylon shell and lining. The insulated hood provides extra warmth and wind protection, along with two tricot-lined zippered handwarmer pockets. Additional features include DownTek down that stays lofty, even in wet conditions, for toasty warmth and top performance, two-way zipper with tricot-knit chin guard, and 3M™ Scotchlite™ Reflective Material back triangle. Import. If you have any questions please contact us.

name: Outdoor Research® Rocky Mountain Trail Gaiters
description:
These rugged high-calf black gaiters are built to keep your legs and feet dry and protected on the trail. 

Specs: Weight: 6.9 oz. per pair. 

Construction: Made of nylon packcloth, urethane-coated foot section is waterproof and resists snags. 

Additional Features: Lightweight, weather resistant and breathable. Hook-and-loop front closure allows easy on/off. Bottom secures with a snap, top with a strap and cam buckle. New shear tabs prevent separation. Hypalon instep strap firmly attaches gaiters to footwear. Elastic bottom edge seals out mud and snow. Imported. 

Questions? Contact our customer service team for more information.

name:
-Calf Boots

Cozy Shearling Mid-Calf Boots
description:
Add extra comfort and flair to your mid-sized Wellie Rain Boots with our warm faux fur fleece liners.

Fabric & Care: Handwash, line dry.

Construction: Soft polyester midweight fleece. Polyester faux fur fleece collar.

Additional Features: Add more warmth and lavish faux fur style to your Wellie Rain Boots. Cuff folds over the top of the boot to keep the warmers from sliding down. Imported.

name: Aqua-Shield Ski Gloves, Men's
description:
These rugged and waterproof ski gloves provide advanced protection for winter activities with a sleek look.

Fabric & Care: 
- Rugged 100% nylon shell
- Shell piecing is 97% polyester and 3% spandex
- 100% polyurethane palm and insert
- Cell-phone compatible thumb piecing is 50% nylon and 50% polyurethane
- Spot clean

Additional Features: 
- Waterproof shell provides protection from the elements
- Waterproof TEK insert is brushed for softness and moves moisture away from skin
- Insulation keeps hands warm
- Touch sensitivity at the index finger and thumb
- Chase leash prevents loss
- Imported

name: Rio InTouch HyperStick Fly Line
description: This versatile line is designed for both overhead and spey casting with your switch fly rod. It's easy to cast with a powerful, short front taper that excels at casting indicators, sink tips and large flies. Construction includes a floating fly line with XS technology for slick shooting. AgentX Technology allows a line that's less dense, higher floating, casts further and more accurate. It also features a tough welded loop on the front end for fast rigging and a DualTone system that marks the sweet spot of the line with an obvious color change. ConnectCore minimizes line stretch, allowing detection of even the subtlest of takes. Additional features include a long head for great mending and fly control and a unique taper that is great for casting overhead or spey. Proudly made in the USA.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

towels provide the softness and absorbency you know and love, but now in certified organic cotton for natural and ecofriendly comfort.

description: Just like Mom's, our fleece-lined girls' flannel shirt is an essential layer for cool days. Why We Love It: Just when you thought our Portuguese cotton flannel shirts couldn’t get any warmer, we added fleece. What came next was an iconic pairing that’s perfect for playtime in the cold. And with a soft hood for added warmth, she’ll be a happy camper all day long. Fabric & Care: Cozy Portuguese cotton flannel. Plush polyester fleece lining for added warmth. Additional Features: Fleece hood with contrast-fabric trim adds warmth and comfort in chilly weather. Side pockets for all her treasures. Relaxed fit is ideal for layering over a shirt or on its own. Imported.

name: Camo-Guard Day Pack
description: Our day pack is the lightest ever, with a capacity of 1,343 cu. in. and 22 L. It is made of ultra-light and extra-tough ripstop nylon fabric, so it is durable and reliable. It has a panel-load design and is 19"H x 10"W x 7"D, with a packed size of 8" x 7". It features padded foam shoulder straps and back panel, as well as a back panel with wicking Air Mesh for comfort. It also has a “shove it” pocket on the front, two side mesh water-bottle pockets with loop locks, an adjustable waistbelt and sternum strap for secure body fit, and a “Blinky” loop for attaching a light. Additionally, its internal stow pocket allows you to stuff it into a tiny package for travel. This product is imported.

name: UltraSun Shield Headwear
description: This UV angler hat is a multi-functional piece of headwear that is perfect for tropical fishing trips - with a sweatband, beanie, scarf, bandana and face mask all in one. Why We Love It: The CoolMax® Extreme fiber wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool, while the stretchy fabric fits snugly and protects you from windburn. Fabric & Care: Polyester. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Rated UPF 20. Imported. Questions? Contact our Customer Service Team for further assistance.

name: AquaRider Adventure Kayak
description:
This exceptionally packable two-person inflatable kayak is lightweight and easy to use. Designed for use on ponds, small lakes, and slow-moving rivers, it features Nitrylon construction, a laminate of synthetic and natural rubber over 1200-denier polyester. It packs down supersmall, so you can carry it with you on your travels. High-quality bayonet valves allow quick and reliable inflation in three separate main chambers, while the soft and comfortable inflatable seatbacks and gear bungee in stern provide additional convenience. A removable tracking fin and repair kit are included, as well as a pump hose valve adapter. We recommend the NRS Bravo Wonder Pump 6 or  Stowaway River Pump for rapid inflation. The inflatable seats are removable, making this the lightest tandem recreational kayak you’ll find on the market. With its easy transportability and excellent performance in slow or calm-moving water, this inflatable kayak is a great choice.

Dimensions: 11'9" x 36".
Packed Dimensions: 17"L x 14"W x 9"D.
Capacity: 396 lb.
Weight: 24.3 lb.

Crafted with 100% nylon for durability, the trunks also feature a super soft quick drying, anti-odor polyester mesh liner and UPF 50+ rated sun protection--the highest rated sun protection possible. Additional features include a durable water-repellent finish that ensures they will dry quickly, three-ply Supplex fabric that is lightweight and breathable, side seam pocket and back welt pocket with Velcro-closure, an updated elastic waistband with an internal adjustable drawstring for just the right fit, side cargo pockets, and mesh drainage panels at all pockets. The iconic Mt. Katahdin logo is featured on the lower left leg, and the fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant. Imported.

Additional Features: Versatile enough for casual wear and a wide variety of outdoor adventures. Imported.

This new construction method produces a lighter and more flexible wader – allowing you to move naturally in the water. Combine these waders with our waterproof Waterfowler Pro Jacket and you've got the ultimate outerwear system for staying warm, dry and comfortable in cold, wet weather.

Construction: Upper body and legs of four-layer polyester microfiber exterior with nylon lining. Neoprene feet and shoulder straps. 3M™ Thinsulate™ Ultra Insulation in boots. 

Additional Features: 2014 Field & Stream Best of the Best Award Winner. Super Seam adhesive technology replaces stitching – 50% stronger and more watertight. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets for cold days. Light-stretching QuickFit Velcro®-closure wading belt for superfast belt adjustment.

name: Maine Adventure Wool PrimaLoft Parka
description:
Wool is a time-tested favorite of cold-weather hunters for its ability to keep you warm even when wet, its quiet nature in the woods, and its lightweight yet durable construction. Our Maine Guide Wool Parka combines Bart's exclusive premium-quality, tightly woven wool with the lightweight comfort and warmth of advanced PrimaLoft® Infinity insulation. You get all the advantages of heavyweight wool without added bulk, allowing you to quickly and comfortably move through the woods and mount your rifle. 

Size & Fit: Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. Cut full for layering, with a comfortable, nonbinding fit. Traditional hip length.

Fabric & Care: 85% wool/15% nylon. Dry clean.

Additional Features: Forearms are protected with fabric patches, collar stays snug with strap closure. Back zip cargo pocket with reinforcements for drag rope or survival kit. Interior zip security pocket. Two front cargo pockets and two handwarmer pockets. Draft-stopping elasticized drawcord waist. License loop.

Imported.

Starting with the distinctive detailing they loved (the warm stand-up collar, classic chest pocket and contrast trim) our designers then redesigned it with super-plush, hi-pile polyester fleece. The result is our softest vest ever, with just-right breathability, warmth, and adventurous spirit stitched right in. Fabric & Care Plush 100% polyester fleece effectively traps body heat for even more warmth without weight. 100% nylon woven trim. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Chest pocket with snap closure. Zippered handwarmer pockets. Lycra binding at hem and armholes. Imported. Questions?  Need help? Contact our customer service team for assistance.
