It has a slightly fitted shape that softly shapes the body and falls at the hip. Crafted from the purest cotton, organically sourced and 100% certified, this organic tee is better for the planet and incredibly comfortable. The lightweight fabric is soft, breathable and retains its color and feel, wash after wash. It also features an inverted pleat at the back yoke and a droptail hem. Imported. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

name: Girls' Nautical Striped Shorts
description:
From trail to treehouse to surf, these water-friendly girls' hybrid shorts make summer transitions and adventure easy and comfortable. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed fit.

Fabric & Care: In a quick-drying, water-repellent 89% polyester, 11% spandex blend.

Additional Features: UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible, no-pinch adjustable waistband, envelope-style back pocket. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Grand Valley Moccasins, Two-Eye Bison
description: These handsewn bison and full-grain leather slip-ons will quickly conform to your feet for superior comfort and a broken-in feel every time you put them on. Construction includes a handsewn bison and full-grain leather upper, handsewn stitching, details and construction, a removable OrthoLite foam insole with a leather cover, an EVA midsole for support, comfort and cushioning, and a semi-lugged rubber and EVA outsole. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for assistance.

name: Timeless Shearling-Lined Oxford Shoes
description: 'Inspired by a "sturdy service oxford" from our 1959 catalog, our Country Walkers walk the line between warm winter boot and wear-anywhere oxford shoe. Constructed of handsewn premium waterproof full-grain leather, this shoe features a full Australian shearling lining for superior warmth, a Vibram CHRISTY wedge sole for stability and support, shiny nickel hardware, and gold taslan laces. Additionally, the Country Walkers are imported. Need more information? Contact us for further assistance.'

name: Cosy Cushion Flannel Sheet Set, Stripe
description:
This striped flannel sheet set is crafted in Portugal using an exclusive process, making it the softest and most pill-resistant flannel we've ever tested. Available in Twin, Full, Queen and King sizes, this set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases (Twin includes one case). These sheets are made with 100% brushed cotton flannel and are tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (137 CITEVE). The fabric is designed to resist shrinking, fading and pilling, and it has a comfortable 5 oz. weight for year-round use. We recommend machine washing and drying for best results. It took more than two years to perfect our popular Ultrasoft Comfort Flannel Bedding, and it was made in Portugal exclusively for . 

Twin: 
Flat: 102" x 72" 
Fitted: 76" x 39" x 15" pocket depth 
Pillowcase (1): 32" x 20"

Full: 
Flat: 102" x 86" 
Fitted: 76" x 54" x 15" pocket depth 
Pillowcases

name: Men's Trailmate Waterproof Hiking Shoes
description:
The comfort of sneakers, the protection and support of hiking boots. 
Specs: Approx. weight: 2 lb. 5 oz. 
Construction: 's exclusive VertiGrip outsole with pronounced multidirectional lugs. Breathable TEK2.5 barrier keeps feet dry. Suede-and-fabric upper. Cushioned EVA midsole and removable footbed provide noticeable comfort right out of the box. Heel-and-toe bumpers add durability. 
Additional Features: Versatile enough for casual wear and a wide variety of outdoor adventures. Imported. 
Questions? Contact our customer service team for answers.

name: Mountain Trek Shorts
description: We crafted these shorts from abrasion-resistant nylon and spandex for just-right stretch. They are lightweight and exceptionally rugged, making them perfect for any and all activities! So comfortable, we wear them everywhere - from rigorous hikes to beachside walks, weekend errands, and fireside lounging. The blend of 93% nylon and 7% spandex is lightweight yet rugged, quick drying, moisture wicking, and UPF 50+ rated for the highest rated sun protection possible. The fully elastic stretch waistband is contoured for comfort, and two zip security pockets and back patch pockets add extra convenience. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Explorer Pro Wheeled Duffel, Medium
description:
This super-tough, smooth-rolling duffle will hold everything you need for an extended trip. It's built from highly weather-resistant materials and will protect your gear from rough handling. 

Specs
Capacity: 2,160 cu. in.
Weight: 7 lb. 5 oz.
Dimensions: 22 1/8"H x 14"W x 9"D.

Construction
Made from tough 420-denier ripstop with highly water-resistant polyurethane coating. 
Robust telescoping handle is built to easily withstand years of travel. 
Large, durable wheels glide effortlessly over rough surfaces. 

Additional Features
Lining is treated with an antimicrobial to prevent odor. 
Sturdy rigid bottom; will stand upright on its end. 
Exterior compression straps to help keep your gear secure and in place when traveling. 
Imported.

name: Man's Oceanic Grip Gloves
description:
These sunscreen gloves are the perfect choice if you spend a lot of time fishing in the sun, whether it's in the tropics or mountains.

Size & Fit
Measure across upper palm: Small 7-8". Medium 8-9". Large 9-10". X-Large 10-11".

Fabric & Care
92% polyester, 8% spandex.

Additional Features
Provide UPF 50+ sun protection.
Full-coverage silicone grip, so you always have a secure hold on your rod and reel.
Bonded cuff.
Stretch fabric for ease of movement.
Quick-drying fabric.
¾ finger length.
Imported.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

name: Outdoor Adventure Bag
description:
Every shooter needs a rugged bag to keep gear protected, organized, and all in one place so they can just grab it and go. This Range and Field bag has lots of pockets and plenty of interior space to hold everything for a day on the range or hunting. 

Specs: 
Small: 
Capacity: Approx. 702 cu. in., 12 L. 
Dimensions: 9"H x 6½"D x 12"W. 

Large: 
Capacity: Approx. 1,430 cu. in., 23 L. 
Dimensions: 12½"H x 7½"D x 15¼"W. 

Construction: 
Made from tough nylon canvas. 

Additional Features: 
-Holds all you need for a day of shooting. 
-Includes shell and hull bag. 
-Unique gear-specific pocket system. 
-The shoulder strap converts to a waistbelt to hold the included shell and hull bag. 
-See-through pocket lined with mesh keeps gun-cleaning oil and solvents from leaking. 
-Also works as a rifle shooter's bag – use it to carry spotting scope

name: Signature Navy Plaid Canvas Shirt
description: A distinct plaid, subtle twill texture and true indigo dyes make this canvas shirt a standout favorite. Size & Fit: Slim Fit: Cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist. Why We Love It: Specially dyed for one-of-a-kind character, the time-worn appeal of this indigo canvas shirt only gets better, wash after wash. Fabric & Care: 100% cotton. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Front pockets. Buttoned cuffs. Contrast stitching. Imported.

name: Outback Trekking Sneakers, Leather Mesh
description: These lightweight, breathable retro hikers are perfect for day hiking on gentle terrain. Specs include approx. weight of 2 lb. 4 oz. per pair, a height of 2½", water-resistant suede-and-Cordura-nylon upper, removable, mesh-covered EVA insole, Euro-hiker-inspired stacked EVA midsole, and our exclusive VertaGrip rubber lugged outsole for traction. For comfort, the hikers feature a padded collar and tongue, as well as a polyester-mesh lining with odor and moisture control. Additional features include a retro Katahdin logo on the tongue, nylon webbing pull-on loop at heel, thermoplastic toe box and heel counter for protection and durability, and imported materials.

name: Signature Poplin Print Skirt
description:
"Inspired by the landscape of Maine's Mount Katahdin, this pleated skirt features a beautiful outdoor print. In the classic style of our much-loved poplin dress, with a feminine knee length.

Size & Fit
- Favorite Fit: Sits lower on the waist.
- Fit-and-flare silhouette.
- Falls above knee.

Fabric & Care 
- 100% cotton.
- Fully lined.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Removable tie belt at natural waist.
- Side pockets.
- Imported.

name: MountainWashed Flannel Shirt, Slightly Fitted Long-Sleeve
description:
Our Lakewashed Flannel is the ideal four-season shirt. We use 100% cotton that's more breathable and noticeably softer than the competition's, and we offer it at an excellent value. It is 20% lighter than traditional flannel, providing warmth without added bulk. The fabric is brushed on both sides and garment-washed, creating a broken-in feel and reducing shrinkage. We rigorously test the fabric at our in-house labs to ensure that it meets the very highest standards for long-lasting quality. The shirt also features a single button-through pocket and a collar button on the back neck. Machine wash and dry. Imported. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted - Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.

name: ThermaCell Cambridge Mosquito Shield Lantern
description:
This Thermacell lantern effectively repels biting bugs by dispersing allethrin, a synthetic form of a natural repellent. A heat-activated mat releases the repellent into the air to create a 15' x 15' zone of bug protection.

Specs
Weight: 2 lb.
Dimensions: 6.3" x 5.5" x 10.5".

Additional Features
Creates a pleasant ambient light, perfect for use on a deck or while camping.
Includes three mosquito repellent mats and one butane cartridge.
Each mat provides 4 hours of protection.
Each butane cartridge burns for 12 hours.
Additional mats and cartridges are sold separately.
Powered by 4 AA batteries, not included.
Imported.

name: Outdoor Research® Rocky Mountain Adventure Gaiters
description:
These rugged high-calf black gaiters are built to keep your legs and feet dry and protected on the trail. 

Specs 
Weight: 6.9 oz. per pair. 

Construction 
Made of nylon packcloth. Urethane-coated foot section is waterproof and resists snags. 

Additional Features 
Lightweight, weather resistant and breathable. Hook-and-loop front closure allows easy on/off. Bottom secures with a snap, top with a strap and cam buckle. New shear tabs prevent separation. Hypalon instep strap firmly attaches gaiters to footwear. Elastic bottom edge seals out mud and snow. Imported. 

Questions? Feel free to reach out for assistance.

name: Toddler's Tug Sled
description:
Sledding is the best and with our kids’ pull sled and cushion set, it’s the stuff that memories are made of. This heirloom-quality set includes a sled, cushion, and wooden handle and is made from kiln-dried northern hardwoods finished with clear water-based lacquer. The padded foam cushion is made from water-repellent polyester and steel runner blades ensure tracking and stability. Steambent runners keep the sled straight and true while a long front pull handle makes it easy to guide. Hardware is included and minor assembly is required. 

Small 
Dimensions: 13"H x 14½"W x 31¼"L.
Weight: 12 lb. 12 oz. 

Large 
Dimensions: 13"H x 17½"W x 39¼"L.
Weight: 16 lb. 12 oz. 

Made in Canada.

name: Sea Sage HD Saltwater Fly Rod
description: Sage's newest premium saltwater fly rod series is the most advanced rod they've ever made. If you're serious about going after big, hard-charging fish in the salt, this is the rod for you. Additional Features: Built with KonneticHD Technology, the next generation of performance graphite rods. KonneticHD Technology delivers accuracy and power in an easy loading blank. Sage has optimized the graphite-to-resin ratio, creating a higher-density fiber composite. Lighter, stronger blanks deliver unmatched recovery, energy transfer and line control. Oversized Fuji ceramic stripper guides and hard-chromed snake guides. Integrated, hidden hook keeper in reel seat. Super Plus full-wells cork handle. USA.

name: Outback Explorer Hat
description:
Lightweight and cool in the hottest conditions, this outback shade hat is the ideal choice for all your warm-weather outdoor activities. Size & Fit: Adjustable chin and back straps for maximum comfort and security. Fabric & Care: Shell is a lightweight and quick-drying nylon/polyester blend. Sweatband is CoolMax moisture-wicking polyester. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Handwash, line dry. Additional Features: Darker color on inside brim enhances shade. Foam insert in the brim helps the hat keep its shape and will float. Back flap tucks into hidden pocket under rear half of brim. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Ladies' Luxury Snow Coat
description: This insulated soft-shell jacket is extra rugged, with just the right amount of stretch so you can move smoothly down the mountain. It provides light activity protection up to 30° and moderate activity protection up to -20°. The slightly fitted design is best when worn with a midweight layer and falls at the hip. It is constructed of a durable and highly weather-resistant stretch soft shell blend of 88% nylon and 12% elastane, with ultralight, ultrawarm PrimaLoft insulation to keep you comfortable and dry on the slopes. Additional features include a longer length and higher collar for extra protection, a helmet-compatible, fully adjustable hood, pit zip venting, an interior media pocket and goggle pocket, and a drawcord at the hem. This jacket is machine washable and dryable and is imported. If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Cozy Cottage Love Seat and Slipcover
description: This comfortable, casual and practical love seat is ideal for smaller spaces and perfect for families with kids or pets. The slipcover is removable and can be easily washed in a large commercial machine. It is constructed from kiln-dried hardwood and manufactured wood frame, with heavy-gauge steel springs providing support, and high-density, high resiliency foam cushions double-wrapped in polyester fiber. The slipcover is sold separately and is available in Linen Beige (50% cotton, 50% linen), Chambray (73% cotton, 27% polyester) or other colors like 100% cotton twill. The dimensions of the love seat are 36"H x 61"W x 36"D. Spot clean cushions and fully assemble the love seat before putting on the slipcover. Throw pillows are not included and this product is proudly made in the USA.

name: Mountain Trekkers, Suede Mesh
description: These retro hikers are perfect for day hiking on gentle terrain. With a lightweight and breathable design, you can enjoy the outdoors without feeling weighed down. Specs include: Approx. weight of 2 lb. 4 oz. per pair, height of 2½", water-resistant suede-and-Cordura-nylon upper, removable mesh-covered EVA insole, Euro-hiker-inspired stacked EVA midsole, VertaGrip rubber lugged outsole for traction, padded collar and tongue for comfort, and polyester-mesh lining with odor and moisture control. Additional features include a retro Katahdin logo on the tongue, nylon webbing pull-on loop at heel, and thermoplastic toe box and heel counter for protection and durability. Imported. Questions? Feel free to reach out for more information.

name: Truck Seat Storage Caddy by
description:
This handy organizer stores and organizes all your fishing gear behind the front seat of your vehicle. It's generously equipped with pockets to accommodate your fishing gear and accessories. 

Specs
Dimensions: 23.75"W x 29"H.
Weight: 2 lb. 4 oz.

Why We Love It
A favorite fishing pastime in Maine is spending a day hitting all your favorite fishing spots by car or truck. Usually all your gear is piled in the back and by the end of the day things are a disorganized mess. This fishing gear organizer will help you keep everything organized, protected and easily accessible. It's fully adjustable to fit a variety of vehicles and has thoughtful design features like canted pockets that accommodate the lean angle of your car's seats and dual side access.

Construction
Main body is durable 210D ripstop nylon.
Back panel and pocket linings made from 600D polyurethane coated polyester.

Additional Features
Organizes and carries rods, flies/lures, accessories and essentials on the backside of your seat.
Holds two 4-piece rod tubes vertically on each end of the organizer.
Multiple reel, flybox and gear pockets allow you to store and

name: Luminous Journey Tee, Reflective Graphic
description: This men’s reflective tech tee is perfect for any activity, from hiking to trail running to backyard chores. Featuring quick-drying fabric that moves moisture away from the body, it also has an antimicrobial finish that controls odor, so you stay fresh. The lightweight and breathable 100% polyester fabric fits slightly relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. It also has improved fit with longer length for better coverage, and raglan sleeves place flatlock, nonchafing seams off the shoulders for greater comfort. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Women's OluKai Paniolo Slides
description: These OluKai Paniolo flip-flops feature full-grain leather adorned with a pattern inspired by Hawaiian western riding sandals. Their stylish exterior is complemented by a comfortable design, with features such as an anatomical midsole that naturally molds to the shape of your foot, a soft synthetic-leather lining, an EVA midsole, and a gum rubber outsole with a fish-scale pattern for traction. The outsole is also infused with natural burlap fibers and includes a handsewn leather toe post and a cast metal hook logo for detail. Imported.

name: Camp Comfort Footwear
description:
These men's handsewn moccasins are a customer favorite for their classic style and custom-made feel that only gets better with time. 

Size & Fit
For best fit, wear with lightweight socks. Please note: Handsewns need little breaking in, but should be worn two or three times before evaluating fit.

Why We Love Them
In 1936 when Bartholomew Barnstormer first introduced these shoes, he compared them to the unique comfort of a handmade Indian moccasin. That soft, custom-made feel is still apparent in each shoe sewn today.

Construction
Full-grain leather upper conforms to your foot. Traditional rubber sole with channel grooves for traction on wet surfaces. Removable padded, moisture-wicking insole. Imported.

name: Kids' Super Snuggly Slippers
description: Our Wicked Good Moccasins provide the same premium materials and customer-favorite design that adults trust, but now for kids too! These genuine shearling slippers are made from premium sheepskin for durability that other slippers for kids can't match. The ultrasoft shearling draws away moisture while wrapping around kids' feet for unbeatable comfort. The rawhide laces and durable outsole add extra traction and warmth. Half sizes order up. Genuine shearling lamb fur is dyed and treated. Imported (fur Australia).

name: Adults' Cozy Comfort Fleece Bartie
description:
Designed to be ultrawarm and functional, this fleece hat can be worn on the first fall day well into snow-shoveling season. With a rugged exterior and soft, smooth interior, it's a keep-by-the-door necessity when the weather gets chilly. 

Fabric & Care: Made of 100% polyester. Reinforced trim is 84% nylon and 15% spandex. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Smooth sweater-knit exterior. Cozy brushed-fleece interior. Features our heritage Katahdin logo. Stretch hem provides a great fit and seals out cold air. Imported.

name: Darn Tough Junior Trailblazer Socks
description: These kid-friendly hiking socks have a super-comfortable fit that won't slip down, bunch up or cause blisters. Crafted with a performance blend of 55% nylon, 41% merino wool, and 4% Lycra® spandex, they offer unbeatable durability and a "put it on, forget it’s on" feel. Furthermore, they dry quickly and wick away moisture from the skin, while their performance fit helps prevent slipping, bunching, and blisters. Plus, the naturally antimicrobial fabric resists bacteria and odor. Made right here in the USA.

name: Island Explorer 2 Inflatable Kayak
description:
The Island Voyage 2 is a two-person inflatable family kayak filled with features that make it easy and fun to use. It inflates and deflates easily while packing down small so it can be stowed in the back of your vehicle. 

Specs: 
Dimensions: 11’2" x 37". 
Capacity: 400 lb. 
Weight: 31.5 lb. 
Folded size: 31" X 18" X 10".

Construction:
Outer cover is made from super-rugged 600D polyester rip-stop with waterproof PVC backing.
Heavy-duty PVC Tarpaulin hull material is built for extreme puncture resistance. 

Additional Features: 
Easy to use: just unfold, inflate and attach the seats. 
High support, adjustable padded seats provide comfort for hours of paddling. 
Packs easily into the trunk of a car or you can fly it to travel destinations. 
3 seat locations allow for paddling solo or tandem. 
High-volume side tubes provide good stability and buoyancy. 
High-back supportive backrest with pocket and bottle holders. 
Removable deep tracking fin.

name: Women's Mountain Peak Reversible Jacket
description:
This ultimate reversible jacket provides two great options. We combined the cozy comfort of plush fleece and the ultralight warmth of Primaloft® insulation to provide light activity up to 45° and moderate activity up to -5°.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted, best with lightweight layer, falls at hip.

Fabric & Care: Weather-resistant nylon shell on one side, lightweight and exceptionally warm quilted PrimaLoft insulation, plush polyester hi-pile fleece on the other side. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Full center front zipper, fleece side has zip pockets, insulated side has open kangaroo pocket, Mt. Katahdin logo, elastic cuffs, adjustable drawcords at hem, and bart boot lace zipper pulls. Imported.

name: Men's Vasque Breeze Light Comfort Hiking Shoes
description:
These Vasque speed hiking shoes are designed to be lightweight and stable for fast-paced trails. This version is about half a pound lighter than the regular Breeze style.

Size & Fit
Order your regular shoe size.

Specs
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 6 oz. per pair.

Construction
Waterproof Gore-Tex liner with Extended Comfort Membranes keep water and moisture out.
High-abrasion synthetic microfiber upper with mesh panels are supportive, breathable and strong.
Heel and toe area ventilation ports increase airflow along the footbed.
Dual-density compression midsoles provide all-day comfort and support.
Vibram® Mega Grip system outsoles enhances traction in all weather and trail conditions.
Features cutting edge Vibram Lightbase technology that saves 25% in outsole weight.
TPU plate adds stability and support on rugged terrain.
Imported.

name: Outdoor Adventure Hunting Pants
description: Hunt with ease in these men's bug-repellent hunting pants. Burlington Labs has treated these pants evenly with permethrin, a synthetic form of a naturally occurring bug repellent, allowing you to stay free of insects. The pants are made with 100% polyester, and feature a semielastic waistband with nylon web belt, UPF 50+ protection, and seven pockets, including zippered cargo, rear, and security pockets. Additionally, the permethrin is still effective even after 70 washes, and the fabric is quick-drying and moisture-wicking. Plus, the legs can be zipped off to convert the pants into shorts. Available in US only and imported. Machine wash and dry.

name: Luxury Azur Denim Shorts
description:
True indigo-dyed canvas brings rich color and lightweight comfort to these cool summer shorts. 

Size & Fit
Slim Straight: Our slimmest shorts sit below the natural waist and are fitted through the hip and thigh. 8" inseam.

Why We Love Them
These shorts have been specially dyed for weathered character that will change and fade over time.

Fabric & Care
100% cotton. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
Flat front slash pockets. Back buttoned pockets. Imported.

name: Nautical Navy Patio Settee
description:
Enjoy outdoor relaxation with our comfortable All-Weather settee. Crafted with care in the USA, it is designed to provide years of comfort with low maintenance and coordinates perfectly with our All-Weather Collection.

Specs
Dimensions: 32¾"H x 51½"W x 33¼"D.

Why We Love It
Our All-Weather Furniture has been tested under punishing New England weather conditions at our company headquarters in Freeport, Maine for a year. Despite being fully exposed, it won’t rot, splinter, warp or crack, making it perfect for your lawn, patio or roof.

Construction
Love seat made from low-maintenance High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE).
Cushion covered with mildew- and mold-resistant Sunbrella cushion with built-in drain.

Additional Features
Will not splinter, crack, rot or warp for years of hassle-free use.
Love seat is super easy to clean with soap and water; spot clean the cushion.
Assembly required.
Made in the USA.

Assembly Instructions

name: Women's Ultralight 850 Featherweight Hooded Jacket
description:
Our revolutionary 850 jacket is unparalleled in its performance. We combined the best of outerwear technology with innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum nylon shell for unbeatable warmth and protection. Light activity: to 30°  Moderate activity: to -20°. Its slightly fitted design looks great and falls at the hip for comfortable wear. 

We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements. 

This virtually weightless style easily packs away into its own pocket and features narrowly quilted channels of down for a streamlined appearance. An adjustable drawcord at the hem helps you get the perfect fit. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, you can trust that the goose down used was sourced humanely. 

 is the official supplier to the

name: Men's Ultra-Lightweight Down Print Jacket
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down jacket defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum polyester shell – for unbeatable performance.

Size & Fit

Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

The Technology

We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements.

Fabric & Care

850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. Premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, ensuring the humane treatment of animals. 100% nylon lining. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features

External

name: Juju Baetis Craven's Dual Duo
description: Imported. Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for further assistance.

name: Crowned Classics Straight-Leg Denim
description:
Our ladies' straight-leg jeans are designed with every detail in mind and handfinished to ensure they fit perfectly.

Size & Fit
Inseam 33”.
Modern Fit: Sits lowest on the waist.
Fitted through hip and thigh.
Slim-leg.

Fabric & Care
Indigo: 98% cotton/2% spandex.
White: 76% cotton/22% rayon/2% Lycra elastane.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Custom logo hardware.
Five-pocket style.
Zip fly.
Note: Due to the dying process, color transfer may occur; machine wash separately before wearing.
Imported.

name: Maine Woods Zip-Front Insulated Shirt
description:
Our warmest zip-front Jac Shirt features all the benefits of wool with the added warmth of a Primaloft Silver lining. It's a great insulated hunting shirt to add to your wardrobe. 

Fabric & Care

85% wool, 15% nylon.
Solid colors 11 oz. per sq. yd.
Camouflage 15 oz. per sq. yd.
Dry clean.

Additional Features

Lined with 40g Primaloft Silver, ultrasonically quilted for stability and durability.
Attached exterior wool cape for additional warmth and protection in drizzle and snow.
Rear zippered pocket for gear storage.
Primaloft Lining also provides a windproofness for added protection and warmth.
Two welted handwarmer pockets and two button-through chest pockets.
Warm when wet and quiet in the woods.
Cut full for layering in colder weather.
Ultra suede trim on cuffs and collar for comfort against skin.
Rugged brass zipper.
Pocket buttons are reinforced for security.
Two buttons on cuffs for increased adjustability.
Imported.

name: Vector XL 6-Person Dome Tent, Ground Cover
description:
Our Vector XL Dome 6-Person Tent footprint is easy-to-use and cut to the shape of the matching tent. It acts as a vapor barrier and floor protector to extend the life of your tent. 

Fabric & Care: Nylon with PU coating. Spot clean. 

Construction: Nylon webbing, brass grommets, shock cord loop. 

Additional Features: Fits under the tent only - does not extend under the vestibule. For use with the Vector XL Dome 6-Person Tent. Imported. 

Questions? Please contact us for more information.

name: Men's Alpine Down Jacket, Colorblock
description: Our best-value down jacket is packed with ultralight 650-fill DownTek for warmth and protection, even when wet. It is suitable for light activity up to 15° and moderate activity up to -35°. This down jacket features game-changing Bart Tested® DownTek™ insulation that does what other down can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. 650-fill DownTek down insulation repels moisture and provides exceptional warmth, while the shell and lining are made from 100% recycled polyester, ensuring minimal impact on the environment. It is machine washable and dryable. Additional features include a stand collar, full zip with snaps on storm flap, our classic Mt. Katahdin logo, internal zip pocket, two lower hand snap pockets with security zipper pockets behind them, elastic cuffs with adjustable tabs, and an open hem with two adjustable drawcords to seal out cold weather. Imported.

name: Women's Mountain Peak Full-Zip Jacket
description:
We've taken our classic anorak design and given it a modern twist with a full-zip style and heritage-inspired details.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted.

Fabric & Care: Made from 100% nylon for water-resistant protection. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Adjustable hood for easy on/off, kangaroo pocket and one internal zippered pocket, elastic cuffs and hem drawcord to keep out the elements. Imported.

Questions? Contact our customer service team for assistance.

name: Crowned Mountain Henley Sweater
description: Rich with the cabled history of Fisherman's sweaters before it, this henley sweater provides exceptional warmth and iconic style. Meticulously stitched in a hardy yet handsome blend of premium yarns, it is made of a heavyweight blend of 79% wool for warmth and 21% linen for smooth texture. For best results, handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. Imported.

name: Park Ridge Everyday Booties
description:
These attractive, weatherproof boot mocs will keep your feet comfortable and dry when the weather turns wet and cool. A feminine update to the classic waterproof work boot.

Specs
Heel height: 1".
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 15 oz. per pair.

Construction
Waterproof suede upper with wool-blend back panel looks stylish and sheds moisture.
Soft polyester-knit lining for an amazing feel.
Breathable TEK2.5® waterproof system.
Removable synthetic-covered EVA insole.
Molded EVA midsole cushions in all the right places.
Nylon shank.
Molded rubber outsole with flower-shaped lugged tread.
Lace-up style.
Imported.

name: Women's Keen Targhee II All-Terrain Hiking Boots
description:
On tough trails or around town, these women’s Keen Targhee II hiking boots offer waterproof comfort in a rugged package. 

Size & Fit: Fits short in the length; we recommend ordering one half size larger than regular shoe size or your regular Keen size.

Specs: Approx. weight: 1 lb. 14 oz. per pair. 

Construction: Waterproofed nubuck leather with synthetic mesh and webbing upper. KEEN.DRY™ waterproof, breathable, and anti-microbial treated membrane inner lining. Dual density compression molded EVA midsole. Keen's "S3" internal heel support structure for torsion control. Keen's ESS® torsion stability shank. Non-marking rubber outsole with multidirectional lugs. Keen's exclusive generous rubber toe guard. Gusseted tongue. Web pull-on loops at back collar and tongue. Web tab lacing system draws heel inward to hold foot securely. Imported. 

Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for help.

name: Cedar Cove Comfort Sleeper Sofa and Slipcover
description:
This sleeper sofa with cover is the perfect choice for overnight guests. With a mattress that pulls out easily and a pop-up headrest for optimal reading or movie-watching comfort, your guests can experience the royal treatment.

Specs:
- Dimensions: 38"H x 83"W x 36"D.
- Seat height: 19".
- Queen-size mattress: 60"W x 72"D x 5½"H.

Fabric & Care:
- Linen Beige: 50% cotton, 50% linen.
- Chambray: 73% cotton, 27% polyester.
- Other colors: 100% cotton twill.
- Wash and dry in large commercial machine.

Construction:
- Kiln-dried hardwood and manufactured wood frame.
- Heavy-gauge steel springs provide support.
- High-density, high-resiliency foam cushion, wrapped in two layers of polyester fiber.

Additional Features: 
- Zip-off slipcover for easy cleaning.
- Slipcover does not need to be removed to open up sleeper.
- Pop-up headrest.
- Throw pillows not included.
- So

name: Mountain Maven Reversible Jacket
description:
Double down on cool, damp weather with our boys' reversible jacket. With plush fleece on one side and water-resistant nylon on the other, it's two great options – at one great value. 

Fabric & Care
Water-resistant ripstop nylon shell.
Reverses to 100% polyester fleece.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Plush fleece reverses to rugged nylon for two options in one.
Reflective chest logo on nylon side;  Katahdin logo on fleece.
Nylon side features zippered hand and chest pockets.
Spandex binding at hem and cuffs.
Imported.

name: The Gentleman's Brimmed Cap
description:
Made from breathable nylon that resists water and stains, this bucket hat offers top sun protection and a timeless design for everyday wear.

Why We Love It

Sunday Afternoons is a family-owned company dedicated to getting people outdoors comfortably. We love how all of their accessories are designed with outdoor inspiration and practical details that make hitting the trail, beach, or mountains even more comfortable (and stylish).

Fabric & Care

Nylon fabric is water-resistant, stain-resistant and exceptionally lightweight. 100% polyester mesh interior sweatband wicks away moisture. UPF 50+ rated - the highest level of sun protection possible. Bluesign® approved fabric ensures minimal impact on the environment. Handwash; dry flat or line dry.

Additional Features

2.5" brim with a sloped angle keeps sun out of eyes. Sunglass Lock™ for stashing glasses in place when you don't need them. Easily packs away so it's always there when you need it. Adjustable sizing with stretch for comfort. Imported.

name: Lightning Lantern 45
description:
This innovative camping lantern uses circular COB LEDs that put out more light than standard LEDs. It also has an amazing 45-day burn time on low power. You'll be sure to shine with its specs: Dimensions: 8.5"H x 4.1" diam., Weight: 13 oz. without batteries, Light output: 350 lumens on high; 20 lumens on low, and Run time: 19.5 hours on high; 45 days on low. 

Additional Features include a 350 lumen maximum output to easily light up your nighttime card game at the picnic table, making it an excellent choice as an emergency lantern during power outages. It also has three modes: high, low and candle flicker, as well as a water-resistant construction and easy grip rubberized handle. Powered by three D batteries, not included. Imported.

WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including DEHP, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.

name: Men's Pearl Izumi Elite Pursuit Shorts
description:
These men's cycling shorts have all the essential features for a long, comfortable ride, such as chamois padding, eight-panel design, moisture-wicking fabric and UPF 50+ sun protection. 

Size & Fit
10" inseam (medium)

Fabric & Care
88% nylon, 12% Lycra® elastane
Machine wash, line dry.

Additional Features
SELECT Transfer fabric provides moisture management for cool, dry riding comfort. 
Eight-panel anatomic design, with new SELECT Pursuit Chamois for enhanced comfort and support. 
Reflective elements for better visibility in low light conditions. 
Silicone grippers on leg openings hold bike shorts in place. 
Flatlock seams eliminate chafing. 
UPF 50+. 
Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Young Adventurers' All-Weather Hiking Shoes
description: Our colorful kids' waterproof hiking shoes feature exclusive Tek2.5 technology and sneaker-like comfort, for fun on and off the trail. Why We Love It: Our hiking boots have a bright design that young hikers will love to wear – and the fun look goes easily from the trail to school. The great fit and rugged construction of these boots earn high marks with our customers, year after year. Construction: Breathable mesh nylon and water-resistant suede upper. Nylex lining. Additional Features: Cushioned EVA midsole and removable EVA footbed provide noticeable comfort, right out of the box. Heel and toe bumpers add durability. Lace-up style for a custom fit. TEK2.5 waterproofing ensures feet will stay dry in all conditions. Trail Trac rubber outsole features a versatile lug pattern for traction on a variety of surfaces. Imported.

name: Women's Waterproof Primaloft Packable Jacket
description: Our PrimaLoft Packaway Jacket is designed for complete waterproof protection and superior warmth. PrimaLoft insulation utilizes revolutionary Aerogel technology, developed by NASA, which is 15% warmer without any extra weight. The TEK 2L waterproof and breathable fabric ensures protection against the elements and the adjustable hood, pit zips, two handpockets, adjustable cuffs, and drawcord hem provide exceptional versatility. This easy-to-pack jacket falls below the hip and is best with a midweight layer. The size & fit is slightly fitted and the comfort ratings are light activity: to 25° and moderate activity: to -25°. It is machine washable and imported.

name: Men's Brooks Core Running Vest
description:
This fitness vest is the perfect layering piece for your vigorous pursuits. It allows excellent freedom of movement and features high-visibility accents for safety. 

Fabric & Care: 
Made with lightweight polyester microfiber fabric that blocks wind and resists light precipitation. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: 
Reflective highlights on front and back. Back vent lets heat and moisture escape as you exercise. Two zippered side pockets plus internal media player pocket. Imported.

name: Quilted  10" Thinsulate Insulated Boots
description: Our Thinsulate-insulated  Boots boast a modern, yet heritage-inspired feel with a quilted upper and vintage patch. These boots are still proudly made in Maine, one pair at a time and feature a lightweight, quilted nylon upper, fresh colors and a decorative patch. Waterproof rubber bottoms, chain-link tread and taslan laces make these classic lace-up boots a customer favorite. They have a uniquely shaped foot form for comfort and stability and a steel shank for added support. Insulated with warm 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation, these boots are perfect for cold conditions and their chain-tread outsole provides reliable traction. Additional features include taslan laces, leather trim and pull-on loop at back collar. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Flowfold Fortress Billfold Wallet
description: The Flowfold Vanguard Wallet is constructed from reclaimed racing sail material, making it slim, superlight and extra tough. Weighing only 0.7 oz., it is about as light as three sheets of paper and is equipped with a cash pocket, two hidden card pockets and two ID windows. Each ID window can store 2 to 4 cards, while the hidden card pockets can comfortably store 8 to 10 credit cards. This wallet is made from high-performance racing sailcloth with X-ply technology and ballistic nylon webbing, making it incredibly tough and durable. It is also weather resistant and will float if dropped in water, making it ideal for outdoorsmen. All Flowfold products are made in the USA and come with a lifetime warranty. For best results, spot clean the wallet. The wallet measures 4¼"L x 3¼"W x 0.1"D and is made in Maine.

name: Mountain Man Jacket
description:
This innovative hard-faced fleece hunting jacket resists wind and water while providing warmth and comfort. This is great hunting apparel at a great price.

Size & Fit: Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester, exclusive of trim. Machine wash and dry.

Construction: Two zippered hand warmer pockets can also be used to carry gear and ammo. Zippered napoleon-style chest pocket. Full length front zipper for easy on/off and ventilation. Draw string waist for fit and weather protection. Imported.

Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Endurance Dri-Fit Long-Sleeve Tee
description:
Ready to keep up with your toughest workouts, this long-sleeve running tee is packed with performance features and will become your go-to for every activity.

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at low hip. 

Why We Love It
We believe in getting out there – hiking, running, jumping, biking, playing, climbing – and we believe your clothing should keep up with every second of it. That's why we designed a long-sleeve version of our popular Circuit Running Tee; with plenty of performance properties and a lightweight, soft-to-the-touch construction, you'll love wearing it on its own or layering under a jacket when the weather gets chilly.

Fabric & Care
In a moisture-wicking, quick-drying blend of 94% polyester and 6% spandex. 100% polyester mesh panels regulate airflow and vent off excess heat. Anti-microbial treatment actively resists odors. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
Feminine scoop neckline. Zoned with mesh for breathability & moisture management. Slightly longer back hem for additional

name: Kids' Arctic Snow Sneakers
description: Keep kids safe on wet, icy surfaces with our customer-favorite Snow Sneakers, now with Arctic Grip outsoles. The leather-and-fabric upper features our breathable TEK2.5® waterproof system and 200-gram PrimaLoft® insulation delivers reliable winter warmth. With a lightweight EVA insole that has a sneaker-like feel and Vibram IceTrek outsole with Arctic Grip polymer blend for superior grip on wet ice, these warm, waterproof kicks offer kids the protection of snow boots with the sporty look of hikers in an adventure-ready kids' style. A removable insole with contour for moderate arch support and additional insulation underfoot assures warm toes at the bus stop or on the playground. The tongue and suede collar are padded for extra comfort. Note: Not intended for indoor use and may harm indoor surfaces. Arctic Grip footwear will not prevent all slipping on every surface. Always tread with care. Arctic Grip outsoles do not replace the use of crampons, spikes or traction devices. A thermochromatic lug on each sole changes from white to blue as temperatures fall below 32°. Half sizes order up. Imported.

name: Maine Inland Fisheries and Wildlife Bartie, Brook Trout Edition
description:
Featuring the beautiful embroidery of a brook trout, the soft and warm Maine fisheries and wildlife trout beanie is made in partnership with the MIF&W. A portion of the sale of each beanie will be donated to the MIF&W.

Size & Fit: One size fits all.

Why We Love It:  is proud to partner with the MIF&W, supporting programs that maintain abundant game populations, educate kids and restore endangered and threatened species such as the Canada lynx.

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester fleece. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Low-profile fit. Supersoft, providing itch-free comfort. Embroidered with MIF&W logo and the image of a Maine brook trout. Imported.

name: Women's Merrell Moab 2 Waterproof Trekking Shoes
description: These Merrell trail shoes are designed to provide a comfortable fit and dependable performance on even the toughest terrain. Constructed with advanced cushioning and stability, and featuring a heavy-duty tread, these shoes are sure to meet your needs. The specs include an approximate weight of 13 oz. per pair. The performance suede leather-and-mesh upper is waterproof and treated to control bacteria, while a ventilated bellows tongue allows breathability and keeps debris out. A rubber toe cap and heel counter add protection and make it easy to clean off mud, and blended EVA contoured footbed, molded nylon arch shank and molded footframe cushion every step. Additionally, air inserts under the heel help absorb shock and enhance stability. The Vibram® Multi-Sport™ TC5+ rubber outsole with 5mm lugs provides tenacious grip, making this shoe a great choice for your outdoor activities. Imported.

name: Mens Thermal Tread Chinos
description: After extensive testing by our product developers, these Men’s PrimaLoft khakis proved to be warm and comfortable even during the harshest Maine cold snaps. Size & Fit Roomy in the seat and upper legs. Fabric & Care 100% cotton exterior. Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low. Additional Features Comfort Waist includes discreet side-elastic waistband for all-day comfort. Uses the same highly water-resistant finish as our Pathfinder Jacket. 40 grams of PrimaLoft Sport insulation. Soft, lightweight polyester liner. Waistband has silicone gripper tape, preventing pants riding up or down. Two front slash pockets for securing valuables. Two back pockets with weather flap and zipper closures. Suspender loops. Imported. Questions? Reach out to customer service for more information.

name: Thule Grand Motion XT XXL Cargo Box
description:
This award-winning Thule Motion cargo box is perfect for larger vehicles and longer skis. Its contoured design and tough ABS plastic construction allows it to cut through the air with ease, making your car more efficient. This cargo box can fit five to seven pairs of skis and poles, or three to five snowboards. Its PowerClick mounting system means it is easy to lock in place with an audible click. It also features lifting supports and grippy handles so you can open and close the lid even in bad weather. The SlideLock system lets you know when the lid is securely closed. The box also sits forward, allowing full access to the vehicle trunk.

Dimensions: 91.5"L x 37.5"W x 18"H.
Weight: 55 lb.
Capacity: 22 cu. ft.
Maximum ski length: 215 cm.
Made in the USA.

name: Women's Merrell Chameleon 7 Low Waterproof Trekking Shoes
description:
These ultralight trail hikers feature waterproof protection, excellent stability and exceptional comfort. They're a great choice if you want to hike fast and light while retaining cushioning, protection and stability.

Size & Fit
Order regular Merrell shoe size. For half sizes not offered order one size up.

Specs
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 11 oz. per pair.

Construction
Waterproof nubuck, suede and mesh upper.
Bellows tongue keeps debris out.
Molded TPU heel counter for added stability.
Removable Kinetic Fit insole provides flexible support.
Lightweight Flexplate technology for torsional rigidity and stability.
Vibram TC5+ outsole with 3 mm lugs offers outstanding traction on the trail.
Metal hook and eyelet at top for secure lacing.
Breathable mesh lining.
EVA midsole for cushioning and support.
Imported.

name: SightSavers
description: These innovative magnetic reading frames are designed for convenience and style. Featuring a lightweight construction with nylon frames and strong polycarbonate lenses, these frames are designed with a unique magnet feature that allows you to split them at the nose bridge. Available in tortoise for regular size heads and black for large size heads, with 1.5X, 2X, and 2.5X power options. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for more information.

name: Men's Summit Trek Waterproof Hiking Shoes, Leather/Suede
description: Durable and waterproof hiking shoes for gentle hikes or treks around town. Our proprietary waterproof barrier provides exceptional dryness and comfort. The upper is composed of waterproof leather and suede. Our exclusive VertiGrip outsole has pronounced multidirectional lugs for superior traction. The breathable TEK2.5 barrier keeps feet dry. Cushioned EVA midsole and removable footbed provide comfort. Heel and toe bumpers add extra durability. Cleansport NXT antimicrobial odor control. Imported.

name: Burnt Oak Quack Call
description: Designed to produce a smooth, low-end sound to lure ducks within 250 yards, this burnt hedge duck call mimics the same range and volume as a real duck. Construction is made of Burnt Hedge wood with a polycarbonate wedge and a double, plastic reed. Additional features include a smooth, low-end sound that has the same range and volume as a real duck, as well as a design that allows you to blow quietly when ducks are within 250 yards. This hardwood call is part DC's Premium 1972 Series, and is proudly made in the USA.

name: Umpqua Fluorocarbon Big Game Leaders
description: Extensively field tested in a variety of situations, from spring creeks to tidal rips, this 9 ft. extruded premium fluorocarbon fly fishing leader is knotless with a looped butt section for low visibility and superior wet knot strength. It is also highly abrasion resistant and imported. Match the leader to your fly line type, leader length, and fishing situation: floating line for trout/bass, 7½' to 10'; sinking line for trout/bass, 4' to 6'; floating and intermediate saltwater, 6' to 10'; sink tip line for trout/bass, 4' to 6'; saltwater shooting head/wet tip/full sinking, 4' to 6'. In windy conditions, shorten your leader for easier casting, and with large, bulky or weighted flies, use a shorter leader. On shallow, very clear water, use a longer leader with a light tippet.

name: Coastal Breeze Weather Jacket and Mitts
description: Don't let swarms of black flies and no-see-ums ruin your day of fishing. Protect yourself in our lightweight and packable bug jacket and gloves. Size & Fit: Fits generously over clothing. Fabric & Care: Polyester no-see-um mesh for total bug protection. Fully adjustable cuffs and waist. Zippered hood for easy access. Additional Features: Black face panel for better vision. Storage pouch included. Imported. Questions? Contact customer service for assistance.

name: Mix-N-Match Beachwear, Squareneck Tankini
description:
Pair this ultraflattering squareneck tankini top with your favorite swim bottom to create your best swimsuit ever. Size & Fit: Fitted: Sits close to the body. 

Why We Love It: Designed to suit your style, our Mix-and-Match swim collection makes finding the perfect swimsuit easy. And with so many incredible options, we're sure you'll find more than one. 

Fabric & Care: Body: 80% nylon, 20% Lycra® Xtra Life. Lycra Xtra Life provides long-lasting fit and resists degradation from sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. Lining: 84% nylon, 16% Lycra elastane. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Handwash, line dry. 

Additional Features: The soft, breathable, quick-drying Italian swim fabric holds its shape. Chlorine resistant for stay-true color. Adjustable straps. Feminine square neckline provides extra coverage. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful

name: Men's SportHill FrostGuard Winter Fit Pants
description: These men’s cross-country ski pants are great for cold, windy days. They are semi-fitted, yet still loose and not baggy, providing a snug fit without hugging your body like tights. The four-way stretch 3SP fabric resists wear on the outside with a soft, fleecy interior for warmth. It also blocks the wind, resists rain and snow, wicks moisture, and dries quickly. The flat-fitting waistband stays flat and includes a drawcord to adjust fit. It also features two zippered front pockets and 9" zippers at the ankles for easy on/off, even while wearing boots. The flatlock seams provide comfort, and subtle reflective piping only activates in low-light conditions. The fabric is made of 90% polypropylene and 10% spandex, and should be machine washed and line dried. This product is imported.

name: CozyQuarters Cotton Sweater
description:
Our premium men's quarter-zip cotton sweater will be the hardest-working sweater in your wardrobe. Wear it on its own or layer over a tee or button-down for classic style. 

Fabric & Care: 100% premium combed cotton. Machine wash, dry flat. 

Additional Features: Combed to create smoother and stronger-than-ordinary cotton and prevent pilling. Tight knit retains the sweater’s shape after several washes. Yarn-dyed for exceptional color retention. Midweight warmth for seasons of wear. Imported.

name: Gore-Tex Cresta Legends, 30th Anniversary Leather/Fabric
description:
This 30th anniversary edition of our bestselling backpacking boot is expertly constructed of fine Italian leather for outstanding durability and performance. Approx. weight: 3 lb. 8 oz. per pair. Height: 5".

Why We Love Them
From mountaintops to deep canyons, these premium European hikers have seen every continent and thousands of trails. But it all started in Montebelluna, a small Italian town near Venice. Galliano Bordin has been designing high-quality hiking boots here for over 30 years using only the finest Italian leather. And it is here that the Cresta Hikers were born. Thanks to Bordin's passion for his craft, it's no surprise the Crestas have been our most beloved hiking boots for so many years.

Construction
Weather-resistant suede-and-leather upper with nylon-fabric upper. Nylon-tricot lining. Gore-Tex waterproof, breathable membrane inner lining. Removable nylon-covered foam insole. Contoured insole for arch support. Rubber midsole. Tapered thermoplastic nylon shank. Vibram Rawthorne rubber outsole is lugged for high traction. Braided polyester laces. Thermoplastic reinforced

name: Leatherman Heritage Multitool With Sheath
description:
This ultralight keychain-sized multitool packs 10 stainless-steel tools into a compact 1.8 ounce design.

Specs
Weight: 1.8 oz.
Blade length: 1.6".
Closed length: 2.5".

Construction
Made from 100% super-durable stainless steel.
Includes classic leather sheath with "Leatherman" embossed in gold on the front.

Additional Features
Includes 420HC knife, spring-action scissors, flat/phillips screwdriver, ruler, nail cleaner.
Also: tweezers, bottle opener, nail file, medium and extra-small screwdriver.
USA.

Questions?
Feel free to reach out with any questions you may have.

name: Girls' Beachside Breeze Shirt, Half-Sleeve
description:
A great choice for sun protection on long days at the beach or as extra coverage for watersports, this girls' swim shirt coordinates easily with all of our swimwear. 

Fabric & Care: 80% nylon, 20% Lycra Xtra Life. Machine wash, line dry.

Additional Features: Rash guard features built-in UPF 50+ – the highest rated sun protection possible. Snag- and fade-resistant fabric holds its shape season after season. Durable seawater-resistant fabric retains its color. Cover-stitched seams are super durable. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Men's Tropical Plaid Short-Sleeve Shirt
description:
Our lightest hot-weather shirt is rated UPF 50+ for superior protection from the sun's UV rays. With a traditional fit that is relaxed through the chest, sleeve, and waist, this fabric is made of 100% polyester and is wrinkle-resistant. With front and back cape venting that lets in cool breezes and two front bellows pockets, this shirt is imported and provides the highest rated sun protection possible. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off. Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Tropical Breeze Shirt
description:
Beat the heat in this lightweight, breathable long-sleeve men’s UPF shirt, offering superior SunSmart™ protection from the sun’s harmful rays. The wrinkle-resistant and moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and comfortable.

Size & Fit

Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Why We Love It

When you spend a lot of time outdoors, limiting sun exposure is important. Originally designed for fishing, our lightest hot-weather shirt offers UPF 50+ coverage and is also a great choice for extended travel. Innovative SunSmart technology blocks 98% of the sun's harmful UV rays. The high-performance fabric is wrinkle free, dries quickly and keeps you cool by wicking perspiration away from your skin.

Fabric & Care

Shell: 71% nylon, 29% polyester.
Cape lining: 100% polyester.
Polyester-mesh inserts.
UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features

Wrinkle-resistant fabric. 
Front and back cape venting lets in cool breezes.
Two front bell

name: Kids' OluKai Sea Breeze Mesh Slip-Ons
description: Cool, comfortable and breathable, these kids' OluKai slip-ons deliver twice the fun with a versatile Drop-In Heel™ that can be worn up as shoes or down as slides. Construction features a lightweight air mesh upper for maximum comfort and breathability, as well as elastic gore panels for a secure fit and easy slip-on style. The design features hand-sewn whipstitch details throughout, and the Drop-In Heel™ lets kids wear them either as a shoe or a slide. The footbed is removable and washable, and made with anatomical EVA for all-day support. Imported.

name: Silken Soft Tunic
description:
Introducing a new twist on a classic favorite. Our flannel tunic is crafted from our signature chamois-shirt fabric, designed with a longer length for versatility. Wear it with leggings, skinny jeans and more for an amazing look. 

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. 
Falls at thigh. 

Why We Love It
For over 90 years, the  Chamois Shirt has been a go-to favorite among customers. It's crafted for both warmth and durability, and now transformed into a layer that you can love for years to come. 

Fabric & Care
100% cotton chamois. 
Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features
Heritage chest pockets and on-seam pockets. 
Imported.

name: Easy Care Check Shirt, Classic Fit
description:
Our check-patterned button-down shirt looks as crisp at the end of the day as it does at the beginning. 

Size & Fit
Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist.

Fabric & Care
100% 80s two-ply cotton. Features wrinkle-free performance that never washes out. Our innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Button-down collar. Single patch pocket. Imported.

Questions? Contact us for assistance.

name: Flux Fly Rod Outfit, 7-10 wt.
description:
Our new 2019 rod has been redesigned with new blank technology that creates a lower profile and more durable design. Get the full outfit and save money with this purchase: rod, Apex fly reel, Scientific Anglers floating fly line, leader and backing installed. 

Why We Love It: This fly rod is premium and high-performance delivering fast line speeds and long distances. It uses top of the line technology to match expensive fly rods and is extremely sensitive for delicate presentations. The cork grip provides a perfect feel in hand and the attractive, lightweight graphite rod tube is a great addition. The reel is for the serious angler who needs something to handle the most powerful gamefish. 

Construction: The high-modulus graphite blank has multi-directional scrim for sensitivity, tracking, and control. The graphite and anodized aluminum reel seat/spacer create a unique look. The four-piece design makes it easy to travel. The Apex fly reel has a super-smooth, powerful drag that will stop the strongest gamefish. The reel is deeply anodized with a rugged and rich appearance. The T6061 aluminum construction is ultra-smooth and corrosion resistant. It also has an inline carbon disc drag for excellent range

name: Floral Charm Quilt Collection
description:
Beautiful flowers bloom across the inside of this heirloom-quality cotton quilt, ready to grace your bedroom for years to come. Matching sham sold separately. 

Specs: 

Twin Quilt: Dimensions: 68" x 86"

Full/Queen Quilt: Dimensions: 90" x 95"

King Quilt: Dimensions: 108" x 95"

Sham (1): Dimensions: 21" x 27"

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton. Machine wash, line dry.

Additional Features: 
-Beautiful detailing and fresh colors. 
--exclusive design. 
-Reverse side matches quilt binding. 
-Sham has an envelope closure. 
-Quilt and sham sold separately. Price reflected for a single sham. 
-Imported.

name: Women's Sun Hat
description: This bucket hat has all the features you need for a day in the sun, from strolling on the beach to swaying in a hammock. It's crafted from soft 100% cotton and includes a 100% polyester CoolMax® sweatband to wick away moisture. Plus, it's easy to pack into a beach bag and has a 3" brim for extra sun protection. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Athletic Boot-Legs
description: These women's boot-cut athletic pants are ideal for any occasion. Crafted of soft, breathable stretch fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly, they offer exceptional comfort. With UPF 50+ rated sun protection, these pants sit low on the waist with a smooth, flattering waistband for a comfortable fit. They also feature a zip pocket to hold your keys or ID, and a printed label for extra comfort. Available in Misses' 31", Petite 29", and Medium Tall 33" inseams, these pants will resist piling, wash after wash. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Timeless Timber Coat Stand
description: This American-made standing wooden coat rack is crafted from rustic rough-cut pine and finished by hand, making each piece truly unique. The dimensions of the rack are 66"H x 19"W x 19"D, and it weighs 18 lb. The coat rack is handcrafted from rough-sawed pine, handsanded and stained, and finished with a durable low-sheen topcoat. It features iron hooks and is part of our Rustic Wooden Furniture Collection. The coat rack arrives fully assembled, and is made in the USA.

name: Men's Allagash Bison Leather Oxfords
description:
These bison leather men's oxford shoes are our top-of-the-line handsewn shoes. The supple, fine-grain leather molds to your foot and lockstitched seams ensure the comfort will last for years. 

Size & Fit
Fit best with midweight socks. 

Construction
Bison leather upper with full-grain cow leather trim. Trim of tongue synthetic. Lugged rubber outsole for secure traction. Lockstitched seams add durability at stress points. Ergonomically shaped footbed provides superior cushioning. Traditional lace-up style. Imported.

name: Seals All-Season Boat Shield
description: This easy-to-install, secure cockpit cover keeps dirt, debris and critters out of your kayak during storage. It is made from 600-denier tear-resistant material with superior UV protection, featuring rim grip technology to keep it securely attached to the cockpit, adjustable bungee cord rim attachment, and a hull strap to reliably secure it to your boat. The double-stitched seams add to its durability, and it is made in the USA. It fits  Manatee 12 and pre-2019 Manatee 10, Wilderness Systems Aspire 105 and Pungo 105, Old Town Loon 120 and 126, Wilderness Systems Pungo 120, 125 and 140,  Casco 14.5 and 15,  Calypso 12, Wilderness Systems Tsunami 125, 145 and 165, and  Casco 12 and 2019  Manatee 10. If you have any questions, please contact us.

Dimensions: 11"L x 10"W.

name: Women's Merrell Siren Sport Q2 Waterproof Trekking Boots
description:
This waterproof Merrell trail shoe is designed specifically for women, to provide support, stability and comfort for short outings and full days on the trail.

Construction: Nubuck-leather-and-mesh upper includes M-Select Dry to seal out water. Bellows tongue keeps pebbles and twigs from getting into your boots. Metal hooks and eyelets ensure secure lacing. M Select FIT tri-blended EVA contoured footbed provides complete arch support. Interior is treated to help control foot odor. QForm 2 dual-density midsole centers the heel as it provides support and cushioning. Air inserts in the heel absorb shock. Vibram outsole has 3.5mm-deep lugs for traction on wet and dry ground. Imported.

name: Mountain Majesty Fleece Pullover, Print
description:
Our best-value fleece pullover is designed with inspiration from our archives and made from 100% recycled polyester for unbeatable comfort and wear-anywhere style. Size & Fit: This pullover is Slightly Fitted and looks best with a lightweight layer. It Falls at the hip. 

Why We Love It: Our designers took inspiration from the archives to create this ultrasoft fleece pullover, using -exclusive prints from the 1990’s. We love how the heritage styling is updated with a modern, slimming fit. Plus, it’s made from 100% recycled fleece – so you can stay warm and feel good about it.

Fabric & Care: Our 100% recycled fleece is soft, cozy and gentle on the planet, with ultraplush fibers that resist wind for even more warmth. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Features our classic Mount Katahdin logo, Bart Boot lace-inspired zippers and drawcord, two lower zippered hand pockets, elastic cuffs and drawcord hem to seal out cold air. Imported.

name: Camouflage Hunter's Haven
description: This ultimate 2-in-1 big-game camo hunting backpack offers the big-game hunter more features for the price than any other bag on the market. Specs: Capacity: 1,908 cu. in., Weight: 3 lb. 2 oz., Dimensions: 20"H x 13"W x 8"D. Construction: Poly-warp knit bonded to a 150-denier polyester backer for a light weight, easily detachable gear bag for scents, calls and more can be carried into tree stand, substantial Duraflex Rocklockster buckles, side compression straps, waterproof zippers, and reinforced bottom. Additional Features: Rugged and highly water-resistant fabric that's incredibly quiet, main compartment has storage pocket for hydration bladder (not included), raised pads on the back panel allow fresh air to circulate between the pack and your back, top lid features security and storage pockets, top-loading design and semi-rigid back panel make packing the main compartment quick and easy, easy-to-adjust suspension harness and waistbelt properly supports heavy loads, two zippered side pockets can hold a water bottle, GPS or other small items, and six lashing points on exterior for strapping on shooting sticks or other

Construction
Upper is made from durable polyester webbing. Open toe construction prevents water from pooling. Universal strapping system provides a secure fit and multiple points of adjustment. Cushioned EVA footbed for all-day supportive comfort. Durabrasion® rubber outsole provides durable traction. Imported.

name: Mountain Summit Down Jacket
description:
Our best-value down jacket is packed with ultralight 650-fill DownTek insulation for warmth and protection, even when wet. It offers light activity protection to 15° and moderate activity protection down to -35°. It has a slightly fitted shape that is best with midweight layers and falls at the hip. 

The down jacket features Bart Tested® DownTek™ insulation that repels moisture and offers exceptional warmth. The shell and lining are made from 100% recycled polyester, ensuring minimal environmental impact. It can be machine washed and dried for easy care. The stand collar features a full zip with snaps on the storm flap. It also features our classic Mt. Katahdin logo, an internal zip pocket, two lower hand snap pockets with security zipper pockets behind them, elastic cuffs with adjustable tabs, and an open hem with two adjustable drawcords to seal out cold weather. Imported. 

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Women's Featherlight 850 Down Jacket, Print
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down jacket defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum polyester shell – for unbeatable performance. When it comes to comfort ratings, this jacket can handle light activity up to 30° and moderate activity up to -20°. Its slightly fitted cut with a slightly slimmer waist is best with midweight layers and falls at hip. 

We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements.

The 850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. Additionally, the premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, this jacket ensures the

name: Cozy Comfort 3-in-1 Jacket
description: This women's down 3-in-1 jacket offers a durable, waterproof shell and a lightweight yet warm 650 DownTek liner. It provides plenty of warmth and protection, and can be worn together or separately in varying weather conditions. With a fully adjustable helmet-compatible hood, pit zip venting, two chest pockets, two handpockets, and an interior media pocket, you can stay dry and comfortable in all conditions. Light activity: to 20°  Moderate activity: to -30°. Its revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry longer and dries out faster, making it an even better insulator. The shell is composed of 100% polyester exterior and 100% nylon interior, while the liner is 100% nylon and insulated with warm, lofty goose down. Machine wash and dry. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Falls below hip. Best with midweight layer. We're sure this jacket will fit every need and you'll reach for it all year long.

name: Men's Katahdin Iron Works Impervious Boots II
description:
These improved, hard-working Katahdin Iron Works oxford boots are handcrafted from durable, waterproof leather that gains more character with every wear – and the classic construction ensures exceptional support, comfort, and stability. 

Size & Fit
Order regular shoe size. For half size not offered order up to next whole size.

These rugged waterproof boots are inspired by our original Engineer Boots, which were developed by our founder Bartholomew Barnstormer, "...for Civil Engineers, Contractors and general outdoor workers where the best, as well as the most comfortable, shoes are required." these boots feature a classic last and Goodyear® welted construction for exceptional support and stability.

Katahdin Iron Works
Located in the north woods of Maine, adjacent to the Appalachian Trail, Katahdin Iron Works was built in 1843 and operated until 1890, when advances in steel manufacturing made it obsolete. At its peak, the Iron Works produced 18 to 20 tons of pig iron a day and employed 400 men just to cut the 20,000 cords of wood needed to fire the blast furnace.

Inspired by these hardworking Mainers, we designed our Katahdin Iron Works line of rugged work clothes to stand up to all kinds of rough use

Construction: Durable upper made from woven shirt-fabric material. Natural rubber outsole with pebble traction tread. Breathable cotton lining and cushioned insole. Lace-up front with metal eyelets. 

Additional Features: Superga logo at back heel. Imported.

description:

Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer.

The Technology
Our customer-favorite waterproof pants have been redesigned with a laminate construction - meaning the waterproof interior is bonded to the exterior shell, making them more durable, lightweight, and breathable.

Fabric & Care

Additional Features
Adjustable waist for a customized fit. Zippered back pocket. Zippered leg opening for easy on/off. Packs away for easy take-along. Imported.

name: SafetyNet Weather Alert Radio
description:
This durable weather radio ensures you will always be prepared when bad weather approaches. It can be powered via the integrated solar panel, hand crank or standard home outlet so you'll always be able to hear what's going on. 

Specs
Dimensions: 6.9"H x 5.8"W x 2.6"D.
Weight: .93 lb.

Why We Love It 
More than a weather radio, it's also a portable smartphone charger and LED flashlight. Simply plug your phone into the USB port and power will automatically flow to it. Provides 1.5 charges to most smartphones.

Additional Features 
Listen to AM/FM and NOAA weather band broadcasts and receive NOAA weather alerts automatically.
Receives all 7 NOAA/Environment Canada Weather band radio broadcasts.
“Alert” function broadcasts emergency weather alerts.
Hand crank and solar panels for recharging on the fly.
USB smartphone charge with 2600 mAh output.
Long-lasting LED flashlight and red flashing beacon for emergencies.
DC power option (mini-USB cord included).
AUX-input jack to play music from external player.
Glow-in-the-dark locator so you can find it

name: Boys' Featherweight Down Jacket
description: This essential cold-weather layer has extra warmth with 15% more down fill, while still providing featherweight comfort. With light activity, this layer is ideal for temperatures up to 25°, and with moderate activity, it is suitable for temperatures down to 0°. It is slightly fitted for a comfortable fit, and features revolutionary DownTek treated down which remains dry, long-lasting and a great insulator. The fabric and care consists of 100% ripstop nylon water-resistant shell and lining, insulated with innovative and highly water-repellent DownTek™ 650-fill down, and machine washable and dryable. Additionally, this layer has internal mesh pocket and side-zip pockets, as well as 3M™ Scotchlite™ Reflective Material back triangle. If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Kids' Colorblock  Fleece Pullover

Fabric & Care: Double-faced polyester for a smooth, sweater-knit exterior and cozy brushed-fleece interior. Breathable fabric keeps active kids comfortable. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Collar lined with brushed tricot for extra comfort. Two side handwarmer pockets lined with soft tricot. Finished with coverstitched details. Imported.

name: Women's Limited Edition  Boots, Rubber Moc
description:
We've put a colorful spin on a perennial favorite: the low-cut, slip-on, rain-shedding Rubber Moc – now in fun limited-edition colors for women. 

Size & Fit
With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.  9, 9½, order 8.
With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your regular size. Half sizes, order down.  9, 9½, order 9.

Specs
Approx. weight: 2 lb. 10 oz. per pair.

Why We Love Them
An avid outdoorsman, Bartholomew Barnstormer wanted to create a comfortable, dry pair of boots for tromping through the backwoods of Maine. Today, our signature duck boots are still sewn right here in Maine from premium full-grain leather. Now in limited-edition colors so bright and cheery, they'll shine through the rainiest weather and keep you dry and comfortable to boot.

Construction
Premium full-grain leather sheds snow and rain.

name: Kids' Adventure Rider Bike, 20"
description: This mountain bike is easy-to-ride and offers great durability and stability for the young rider who is gaining skills and confidence. It fits users 38" to 54" and features a tire size of 20" diam. x 2.0"W. The mountain-bike frame has a low stand-over height for control and stability, and wide, knobby tires provide extra grip on the road or trail. It comes with a 7-Speed Shimano drivetrain with an easy-to-use SRAM shifter, and the rugged steel frame and fork is designed to last for years. It also includes adjustable front and rear V-Brakes, a kickstand, and an adjustable seat height. Assembly instructions are available in PDF form.

name: Discover Your Park Badge
description:
As part of our partnership with National Park Foundation, we're excited to offer this Find Your Park collectible patch – inspiring adventurers of all ages to get out there and find their own special connection to our national parks. 

Specs: Dimensions: 2"H x 3½"W. 

Why We Love It: We're dedicated to supporting organizations that help people get outside and we think we've found our perfect match. The National Park Foundation, the official charitable partner of the National Park Service, works to protect an amazing network of more than 400 national park sites, many of which you'll find just a short trip away.

Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Simply iron on to a backpack or jacket; or sew on fabric surface for extra durability. Get your 2019 National Park annual pass with us. Learn more at bbarnstormer.com/nationalparks. Made in the USA. 

Questions? Please visit bbarnstormer.com/nationalparks for more information.

name: Nordic Pullover, Argyle Print
description: Inspired by the traditional sweaters of Norway, worn as a defense against the bone-chilling conditions at sea, our sweaters are made from premium heavyweight wool and expertly knit in Norway with the highest standards of craftsmanship. Fishing in the North Atlantic is not for the faint of heart. The weather is notoriously stormy and the ocean waters can be bone chilling. Into the sweaters of the brave men who went to sea, Norwegian villagers knit distinct colors and patterns as symbols of safety, good luck and a plentiful catch. Today, our sweaters are still expertly knit in Norway in premium 100% heavyweight wool warm enough to defend against unusual cold, whether you’re braving the sea or a New England winter. Fabric & Care: Premium 100% wool. Bird's-eye knit adds texture. Handwash and dry flat, or dry clean. Made in Norway. If you have any questions, please contact us.
