The paddle has a blade width of 7" and a length of 16". The shaft diameter is 3 mm and the weight is 2 lb. 8 oz.

How to Choose a Kayak: Find the best kayak for you - from short paddles to multiday adventures. WATCH THE VIDEO for more details.

Additional Features: 
- Fun, stable tandem kayak for everyone in the family

name: Umpqua Riverhold Scissor/Forceps
description: 'Dual-purpose forceps with a sharp cutting edge and half-serrated jaws are designed to help you safely remove hooks from fish. These forceps feature a stainless-steel construction for durability and increased strength. Additionally, the oversized finger loop provides a secure and easy grip, while the rubberized grip ensures a secure hold in all conditions. The sharp cutting edge helps you perform tough cutting jobs and allows the safe release of hooked fish. These forceps measure 6"L and are imported.' Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Breakwater ACE-TEC SUP 10'6"
description:
The Breakwater paddleboard is an incredibly versatile option for a variety of water activities. It is constructed with ACE-TEC which makes it incredibly durable and stable. With dimensions of 10'6"L x 31.5"W x 4.5"D and a weight of 26 lb, it can hold a volume of 185 liters and a capacity of 200 lb. 

This SUP is a great choice for both experienced and novice riders. It is lightweight, stable and offers great durability, making it ideal for paddling flat water, paddling for fitness, or even trying out some surfing. It provides an excellent platform for new riders and is great for a core body workout. With the integrated tie-down points, you can easily attach any gear to the board. Additionally, the soft EVA deck pad provides increased traction and the Ergo-Grip carry handle is embedded in the deck. The 10-inch Dolphin fin is also included. 

If you're looking for a paddleboard for calm waters or tackling big waves, the Breakwater is a great choice. Check out our SUP buying guide and watch the video for more information.

Made for weekend backpack trips or even ultralight thru-hikes, the Osprey Levity is for the hiker who wants as light a load as possible. In fact, you won't see pictures of this pack on Instagram because its typical user won't carry the extra weight of a phone. Special lightweight yet tough fabric allows it to weigh under two pounds while keeping great Osprey technology like the Airspeed backpanel and Exoform harness for comfort.

Heavy enough to withstand winds and unaffected by wet weather and extreme temperatures, this chair will stay in place without rotting, warping, cracking, splintering or ever needing to be painted – even if you leave it outside all year-round. description:
Our painted floral-print one-piece bathing suit is made from premium Italian swim fabric that is breathable, quick-drying and chlorine-resistant. With great coverage, stay-put shape and quick-drying comfort, it’s why customers return to it again and again. Plus, it offers UPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

Size & Fit
Moderate leg openings.

Fabric & Care
80% nylon, 20% Lycra Xtra Life fiber. Lycra Xtra Life provides long-lasting fit and resists degradation from sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. Full front lining: 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Handwash, line dry.

Additional Features
Stretchy, breathable, quick-drying chlorine-resistant fabric keeps its shape. Soft-cup bra. Imported. 

This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant. Get the best value under the sun with our painted floral-print one-piece bathing suit!

name: Men's Rockport World Striders
description: The Rockport World Tour shoes are perfect for any occasion, from a night out to a day of exploring. With an advanced walking-platform construction for sure-footed stability and a supportive shank and shock-absorbing outsole, you'll feel comfortable and secure no matter where your day takes you. The full-grain-leather upper is tumbled for a fine texture, while the nubuck upper has a soft matte finish. Soft padding at the tongue and collar add further comfort. For best fit, pair with midweight socks. Imported.

Built-in pillow and mesh backrest help keep you cool and comfortable.
4-position backrest.

description:

The lounger weighs about 48 lbs.

We love this product for its ecofriendly HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) construction, made partially from recycled materials. This lounger is heavy enough to withstand winds and won't be affected by wet weather or extreme temperatures. It won't rot, warp, crack, splinter, absorb moisture or ever need painting, even if you keep it outside all year-round.

Additional features include being easier to clean with soap and water and its fade-resistant colors. Create a timeless, functional outdoor entertainment area with our All-Weather products. Plus, you can pair this lounger with our Casco Bay Cushions, sold separately. It's made in the USA.

description:
Experience the great fit and comfort you expect from Moab when wearing these casual hiking boots. With added waterproofing and traction, you can trust these boots to keep your feet safe and dry. 

Approx weight: 2 lb. per pair.
Height: 3".
Construction: Waterproofed nubuck-leather upper with mesh panels and a bellows tongue with traditional lace closure. Breathable mesh lining. FIT ECO-blended, EVA-contoured footbed with organic odor control. Molded nylon arch support. EVA midsole for stability and comfort. Breathable M-Select DRY waterproof inner lining. Vibram rubber outsole for great traction on multiple surfaces. Imported.

name: New Town Swan 120 Kayak
description:
The Old Town Loon kayak has been redesigned for optimal recreational performance. This kayak is stable, straight-tracking and highly maneuverable. Here are its specs: Dimensions: 12' x 30", Cockpit Dimensions: 56" x 22", Weight: 56 lb., Capacity: 375 lb.

The new Loon series has a redesigned hull for effortless gliding and straight tracking. It also has a removable workdeck with customizable storage space for cameras, gear and water. The workdeck is equipped with a USB port for charging devices; battery not included.

Additional features include bow and stern carry handles, bow and stern deck bungees, and a Click Seal Hatch with bulkhead for dry storage. It is made from durable three-layer polyethylene and has a Supercomfortable ACS2 seat with easy adjustments, great support, premium padding and ventilation. It also features a Support Track foot brace system that can be adjusted on-the-go. This kayak is made in the USA.

If you're looking for the best kayak for you, watch the video for the Kayak Buying Guide. This guide will help you find the perfect kayak for short paddles to multiday adventures.

name: Men's  High-Loft Fleece Pullover
description: Our ultraplush, hi-pile polyester fleece is the softest yet, trapping heat to keep you warm without the added weight. This pullover features a distinctive warm stand-up collar, classic chest pocket with snap closure, a kangaroo pocket with zippered handwarmer openings, and Lycra binding at hem and cuffs. It's been designed with breathability, warmth, and adventurous spirit in mind. Made of 100% polyester fleece with 100% nylon woven trim, this pullover is machine washable and dryable. Inspired by an  fleece spotted on the historic Mount Everest International Peace Climb in 1990, this pullover is perfect for those looking for cozy and casual. Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. Imported.

name: Explorer Hiking Skort
description:
Our hiking skirt with pockets is designed with the features you need for even the most rigorous hikes. It is exceptionally soft and durable, with interior shorts fitted close to the body to ensure no chafing or slippage.

Size & Fit
- Favorite Fit: Sits lower on the waist
- Straight silhouette
- Falls above knee
- Skirt length 18"
- Short inseam 5"

Fabric & Care
- High-performance nylon/spandex ripstop fabric has two-way stretch for maximum mobility
- Exceptionally lightweight and quick drying
- Machine wash and dry

Additional Features

- Five zip security pockets to keep essentials safe
- Contoured waistband is lined with mesh for extra moisture-wicking comfort
- Belt loops
- Imported

Questions? Please contact us for assistance.

name: Cozy Knit Fleece Coat
description:
The ultimate sweater fleece – made from superior fabric and offered at an unbeatable price. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at midthigh. 

Why We Love It: Our customers (and employees) love the rugged construction and heritage-inspired styling of our popular Sweater Fleece Coat and wear it for absolutely everything. From high-intensity activities to everyday tasks, you'll find yourself reaching for it every time. 

Fabric & Care: Rugged sweater-knit exterior and soft brushed interior for exceptional warmth and comfort. Made from soft, 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Front princess seams create a feminine shape. Two-way front zipper provides freedom of movement. Wind flap with zipper garage for warmth and comfort. Two zippered hand pockets and one on the left arm secure valuables. Cuffs and hem reinforced with jersey binding. Imported.

name: Maine Ranger PrimaLoft Plaid Zip-Front Jac-Shirt
description:
This great-looking wool jac-shirt is lined with warm PrimaLoft insulation to go along with all the great benefits of wool. It’s a great choice as an outer layer in cool weather or for wearing under a shell or jacket in cold weather.

Fabric & Care: 85% wool, 15% nylon. 11 oz. per sq. yd. Dry clean.

Additional Features: Lined with 40-gram PrimaLoft Silver, ultrasonically quilted for stability and durability. Attached exterior wool cape for additional warmth and protection in drizzle and snow. PrimaLoft lining is also windproof for added protection and warmth. Two welted handwarmer pockets and two button-through chest pockets. Cut full for layering in colder weather. Warm when wet and quiet in the woods. Ultrasuede trim on cuffs and collar for comfort against skin. Rugged brass zipper. Pocket buttons are reinforced for security. Two buttons on cuffs for increased adjustability. Imported.

name: Elegant Flared Capri Pants
description: 'These wide-leg chino pants offer all-day comfort and an irresistible, lived-in look that will make you long for warmer weather. With a modern fit sitting low on the waist, they're snug through the hip and thigh and fall at the ankle. Crafted from 98% cotton with 2% spandex for a touch of stretch, they're washed for a soft, inviting feel. There are front and back patch pockets, and the pants are machine wash and dry. Imported.'

name: ReVamp Swimwear, V-Neck Bikini Top Print
description:
This bikini top is perfect for all your favorite watersports, whether you're going for a casual swim or hitting the waves on an SUP. It's made with an eco-friendly and eye-catching fabric that's sure to turn heads. 

Size & Fit
Fitted: Sits close to the body.

Why We Love It
Not only does this swim top feel great, its sustainable fabric is also good for the environment. It features a lightweight racerback design that won't get in your way and a flattering V-neck silhouette. The fabric is a premium Italian-blend that's breathable, quick drying and abrasion resistant. It also provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

Fabric & Care
Body in 82% recycled nylon with 18% Lycra® spandex.
Lined in 90% recycled nylon with 10% Lycra® spandex.
Handwash, line dry.

Imported.

name: Cozy Comfort Slippers
description:
We searched far and wide for the best genuine shearling to make our popular Wicked Good Slippers even better. Put them on and you'll quickly understand why they got their name - incredibly soft sheepskin slippers!

Size & Fit

These slippers fit best with lightweight socks or barefoot. Half sizes should order up.

Why We Love Them

It's no surprise that our Wicked Good Slippers have become the “Best Slippers Ever Made” - we sell a pair every 7 seconds during our peak in December! The top reason for this popularity is their luxurious shearling and premium sheepskin construction. In Maine, “Wicked Good” is synonymous with the highest quality.

Construction

These slippers feature sheepskin suede uppers that get softer with age, genuine shearling lining, and an indoor leather sole. Imported.

name: Women's Ultralight Featherweight Down Parka, Colorblock
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down sweater is designed to keep you warm, even in wet weather conditions. It is filled with innovative DownTek fill and 850-fill-power for unbeatable performance. Light activity: to 30°  Moderate activity: to -20°. This style is slightly fitted and falls at the hip. It is best to layer it with lightweight clothing.

We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to absorb 33% less moisture and dry 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements.

850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. The premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance and is certified by the Responsible Down Standard, ensuring the humane treatment of animals. Narrow down-quilting channels create a streamlined appearance, and the adjustable drawcord at the hem allows you to cinch it for extra warmth. It is virtually weightless and can be easily packed away into its own pocket. Machine wash and dry

name: Luxe Plaited Tunic Sweater
description:
Our essential cotton sweaters are now in a flattering tunic-length pullover. Beautifully knit with plaited yarns for a distinctive two-tone effect.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at low hip.

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton. Substantial midweight construction is comfortable year-round. Machine wash, dry flat or dry clean.

Additional Features: Crafted for enduring quality, with a soft hand, silky sheen and exceptional color retention. Made from long-staple yarns that are expertly spun to prevent pilling. A tighter knit helps to keep its shape. Features a beautiful mix of variegated cables, reverse jersey stitchwork and ribbed trim. Looks great paired with slim leg jeans. Imported.

name: Women's Brooks Limitless Running Pants
description: These feminine women's running pants are built with wind- and water-resistant fabric to help keep you comfortable on cool days. Size & Fit Form-fitted, mid-rise. Fabric & Care Body: DriLayer Threshold 88% polyester/12% spandex. Waistband: DriLayer HorsePower 81% polyester/19% spandex. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry in the shade. Additional Features Wide, flat power waist slims and stays put. Two storage pockets – one water resistant – at sides. Lined gusset. 31" inseam. Also a great choice for any fall or winter aerobic activity, including hiking and Nordic skiing. Imported.

name: Adventurer 11.5 Sit-On-Top Kayak
description:
This full-sized sit-on-top kayak is designed for adults but is also a lot of fun for kids. With its supertough rotomolded polyethylene construction, it is best for paddling on ponds, lakes and slow-moving rivers in calm to light winds. It features the Comfort Seating System with a comfortable, fully adjustable seatback. The larger version of our popular Cascadia is great for kids to use as a swim platform on a pond and its extra length allows faster paddling and better tracking. The kayak has a capacity of 350 lb. and a weight of 52 lb. Its dimensions are 11'6" x 30.25". Generous storage space also makes it a great choice for fishing and longer trips. Seating area accommodates paddlers of various sizes.

To find the best kayak for you, from short paddles to multiday adventures, watch the video below and check out our KAYAK BUYING GUIDE. If you have any questions, contact us for more information.

name: Performance Cycling Jersey, Long-Sleeve
description:
Our popular men's long-sleeve quarter-zip cycling shirt is ideal for cycling and won't look out of place at the store during a mid-ride snack break. Fabric & Care: Soft, breathable 100% Airtek polyester. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Built-in SunSmart UPF 40+ rated to block the sun's UV rays, lightweight, comfortable and quick-drying, Silver Max antimicrobial treatments fights odor, quarter-zip front provides quick, easy ventilation, back pouch pocket holds food, money, keys or a cell phone, and rear zip pocket on lower back with vertical invisible zipper. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Linen Luxe Shirt, Slightly Tailored Short-Sleeve
description:
One of the best warm-weather fabrics you can buy is a lightweight and breathable shirt that's a mainstay year after year.

Fabric & Care

name: CycleTech Cycling Shorts
description: These relaxed women's cycling shorts are designed to provide the technical features needed for all-day comfort and style during your long rides. The 11.5" inseam provides a relaxed fit. The shell is made from comfortable woven stretch nylon and the liner is made from nylon/spandex mesh. The Italian-made chamois pad offers additional comfort. For convenience, the shorts feature a snap-front closure, belt loops at the contoured waistband, stretch gussets at waistband sides, one cargo pocket with magnetic closure, two front hand pockets, and one zip front leg pocket. Reflectivity on the lower leg adds visibility. These cycling shorts are machine washable and should be line dried. Imported.

name: Two-Tone Trekker Down Jacket
description:
This Trail Model features quality construction and DownTek performance. The classic soft, durable ripstop comes in two beautiful color tones. Light activity: up to 15° and moderate activity: up to -35°. It has a traditional fit that falls below the hip and is best with a midweight layer. 

Revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry for longer and dries out faster, making it a great insulator. Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: 650-fill, water-repellent DownTek down. Imported. 

If you have any questions, please contact us for assistance.

name: Comfort Oxford Shirt, Relaxed Fit
description: This classic oxford style button-down shirt is designed to stand up to the rigors of your day, while providing high-performance benefits. The stretch fabric wicks moisture and sheds wrinkles, so you stay cool and comfortable and look good all day long. The slightly fitted silhouette offers a relaxed fit through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. A blend of 67% cotton, 30% polyester and 3% spandex, this shirt is exceptionally durable and impressively breathable. The garment-washing process ensures a soft feel from the start, and the double-button cuffs are easy to adjust. Additional features include a button-down collar, single patch pocket, and shirttail hem. Imported. Machine wash and dry.

Tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (5350CIT CITEVE).

name: Terry Freedom Cycling Knickers
description:
Designed for road riding, these performance cycling knickers are built to help you cover the miles in exceptional comfort. 

Size & Fit: Fall at high-calf, 18.75" inseam. 

Fabric & Care: Nylon/spandex construction. Machine wash, line dry. 

Additional Features: Italian-made Fleet seamless chamois features four-way stretch and multi-density foam padding. 2"-wide leg bands won't roll or bind. Sculpted from six panels for exceptional comfort and fit. Flat-seam construction. Imported.

name: Men's Quick Stream Swim Trunks
description:
We make our customer-favorite swim shorts from the most durable, abrasion-resistant fabric we could find. Now with an even better fit and improved mesh lining for even more comfort.

Size & Fit
Standard Fit: Sits lower on the waist and straight through the hip and thigh for a streamlined look.

Why We Love Them
Our design experts have worked hard to make these paddling shorts the best in every way. From the quick-drying performance fabric that stands up to long days of paddling, hiking and everything in between to the numerous pockets for storing away small items, these shorts were made to surpass the competition. Plus, we streamlined the fit for even more comfort.

Fabric & Care
Ripstop nylon fabric is tough and tested to stand up to daily wear and tear.
Polyester mesh lining is designed to drain quickly for all-day comfort.
UPF 40+ rated sun protection.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Zip-fly front.
Internal key fob.
One zippered security pocket.
Two back pockets with Velcro-closures.

name: Suggestion: Scientific Anglers Resonance Magnum Fly Line
description: This line is designed for punching streamers, poppers and larger flies long distances. It is constructed with a braided multifilament core, coated with AST for a slick finish that shoots farther and tangles less. The half-size heavier design loads fast-action rods, and there is a front welded loop. Proudly made in the USA. Do you have any questions? Reach out to our customer service team for help.

name: Mixed-Cable Crewneck Sweater
description: Our timeless Double L cotton sweater has enduring quality that stands out from the rest in a classic crewneck style you'll wear again and again. Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body and Falls at hip. There's incredible comfort in every stitch of this crewneck sweater. Made from extra-soft combed cotton in a tighter knit that helps keep its shape, expertly spun to prevent pilling. The 100% cotton yarns have a remarkably soft hand, silky sheen and exceptional color retention. Machine wash, dry flat. This substantial midweight style is perfect for year-round comfort and features variegated cables, reverse jersey stitchwork and ribbed trim. Imported.

name: Rugged Summit Trail Pants
description:
Designed for variable weather conditions, our high-performance hiking pants provide protection from the elements and reliable comfort on the trail with their lightweight, water-repellent construction. Size & Fit: Modern Fit sits lowest on the waist and is slightly fitted through hip and thigh with a straight-leg. Fabric & Care: Water-repellent construction seals out moisture without sacrificing breathability, while a hybrid of woven and knit fabrics offers maximum abrasion resistance and moisture-wicking comfort. The nylon blend allows for just-right stretch where you need it most. Additional Features: Zoned cordura fabric provides maximum abrasion resistance in seat and knees, while a rear vent offers optimal breathability. Two zippered front pockets and one zippered back pocket are perfect for securing essentials and the articulated knees allow for ease of movement. A leg hem cord provides personalized adjustment and all of this is imported.
Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Flowfold Wrist Wallet
description:
Part of our NEW collection designed in collaboration with Flowfold, a Maine-based company known for its craftsmanship, performance fabrics and minimalist designs. Made in the USA using some of the world’s strongest – and lightest – fabrics.

Specs

Weight: 1.4 oz.
Dimensions: 5"H x 8.5"W.

Why We Love It
We were drawn to Maine-based Flowfold's practical designs from the very beginning. We love how this ultralight pouch carries just what we need, and nothing more. The no-fuss minimalist design is perfect for adventures on the go – the pouch is perfect on its own but also tucks easily into a tote or pack. It's super lightweight, highly weather resistant and surprisingly strong.

Fabric & Care
Fabric is made in Connecticut. Spot clean.

Construction
Made of waterproof X-Pac fabric, a composite of multiple layers laminated into a single sheet. Layers include a nylon face, poly x-ply mesh, waterproof film and light taffeta backing. Ultralight fabric has a great strength-to-weight ratio. Zip closure. Interior pocket for ID or credit cards. Made in

name: Kwakiutl Warrior Knife
description:
The Wabakimi is a classic Scandanavian style knife designed by Survivorman Les Stroud and named after the Canadian wilderness park where he spent a year living off the land. After months of testing prototypes, Stroud chose this knife as the best.

Specs: 
Blade length: 3.3"
Handle length: 4.6"
Weight: 4.8 oz.

Construction:

The durable, water-resistant upper and rawhide lacing provide extra protection and traction. Imported (fur Australia).

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off

name: Home Address Sign, Round
description:
Instantly update your home – and make a great first impression – with this round address plaque, proudly handcrafted in the USA.

name: Bushman Hat
description: Lightweight and cool in the hottest conditions, this outback shade hat is the ideal choice for all your warm-weather outdoor activities. Size & Fit: Adjustable chin and back straps for maximum comfort and security. Fabric & Care: Shell: Lightweight and quick-drying nylon/polyester blend. Sweatband is CoolMax moisture-wicking polyester. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Handwash, line dry. Additional Features: Darker color on inside brim enhances shade. Foam insert in the brim helps the hat keep its shape and will float. Back flap tucks into hidden pocket under rear half of brim. Imported. Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Weather-Proof Garden Chair
description: Our comfortable all-weather patio chair is designed with durability in mind and is perfect for any garden or patio. With its overall dimensions of 35¼"H x 25½"W x 24"D, and a seat area of 20" x 17 3/8" and a seat height of 17¼"H, this chair is made of ecofriendly, partially recycled HDPE (high density polyethylene) with marine-grade quality, rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware. Tougher and more resilient than treated wood, it is heavy enough to withstand winds and unaffected by wet weather and extreme temperatures. This chair will stay in place without rotting, warping, cracking, splintering or ever needing to be painted – even if you leave it outside all year-round. It is easy to clean with soap and water and is available in three attractive, fade-resistant colors. Plus, when paired with our Garden Bench and Casco Bay Cushions (sold separately), you can create a timeless, functional outdoor entertainment area. Assembly required; USA.

description:
This fun and colorful clutch is the perfect way to keep your essentials secure. Made from tough and lightweight nylon packcloth, it features an exterior zip pocket for extra storage and a handy wrist strap. It coordinates with the Everyday Lightweight Tote, and is imported. 

Specs: 
Weight: 1.5 oz. 
Dimensions: 4½"H x 8"W.

Fabric & Care: 100% 80s two-ply cotton. Features wrinkle-free performance that never washes out. Our innovative TrueCool® fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and helps it dry quickly. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Button-down collar. Single patch pocket. Imported.

description: This ultralight, supercool reflective running hat blocks the sun and helps keep you cool during warm-weather workouts. Size & Fit- One size fits all. Fabric & Care- Coolmax ® polyester. Machine wash, line dry. Additional Features- Quick-fit adjustable headband and reflective trim increases visibility. Imported.

name: Women's Essential Summer Hat
description: From the beach to the garden, this paper sun hat has an extra-wide brim for plenty of sun protection and effortless style. Its slightly floppy design offers a fun, stylish look. The 100% paper construction provides UPF 50+ sun protection - the highest rated sun protection possible. Spot clean for easy care and it's imported for superior quality. Get superior sun protection that won't wear off - our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Scientific Anglers Amplitude Smooth Limitless Taper Fly Line
description: Scientific Anglers calls this line “Infinity” for a good reason: there's no limit to the kinds of fishing you'll be able to do with it. It's a do-it-all floating fly line that powers out streamers while being delicate enough for dry fly fishing. Construction features AST Plus technology which allows superior shootability and durability. The line is built a half-size heavy, with a long head and substantial front taper. Additional Features include being an all-purpose fly line for many kinds of species, the highest-performance fly line Scientific Anglers has ever developed, with up to five times less drag and eight times the durability of traditional lines. Made in the USA.

name: Men's Oboz Sawtooth Waterproof Trekking Shoes
description: These Oboz Sawtooth Waterproof Hiking Shoes feature waterproof construction and heavy-duty outsoles, making them ready for the trail in any condition. Their specs include an approximate weight of 2 lb. 7 oz. per pair. They are made with rugged nubuck leather uppers and mesh panels, as well as B-DRY™ waterproof, breathable membranes. Additionally, they feature a protective rubber toe bumper, injection-molded heel counter, nylon mesh lining, anatomic EVA footbed, dual-density EVA midsole, nylon shank, and aggressively lugged outsoles with durable sticky rubber for exceptional grip. All of this is sure to support your feet with specialized features and forward thinking tech. Moreover, Oboz, in partnership with Trees for the Future, plants a tree for every pair of Oboz shoes purchased, helping to reduce carbon, enrich soil, shade crops, control erosion and more. These shoes are imported.

name: Women's CozyHill 3SP Winter Fleece Pants
description:
Designed for women who prefer a fit that’s neither baggy nor form-hugging, these versatile cross-country ski pants are ideal for cold, windy weather. 

Size & Fit
Semi-fitted. 

Fabric & Care
90% polypropylene, 10% spandex. Machine wash, line dry. 

Additional Features
Four-way stretch 3SP fabric resists wear on the outside with a soft, fleecy interior for warmth. Technical fabric blocks wind, resists rain and snow, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Flat-fitting waistband stays flat; includes drawcord to adjust fit. Two zippered front pockets. 9" zippers at ankles for easy on/off, even while wearing boots. Flatlock seams for comfort. Subtle reflective piping only activates in low-light conditions. Imported.

name: WeatherGuard Counter-Height Chair
description: This classic Adirondack counter chair is made in the USA and is built to withstand the elements year-round. Crafted with ecofriendly, partially recycled HDPE (high-density polyethylene) and rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware, it is tougher and more durable than treated wood. With solid, heavy-duty construction, it won't rot, warp, crack, splinter, absorb moisture or ever need painting. The overall dimensions are 46¾"H x 24¾"W x 24"D, with a seat area of 20¼" x 15½" and seat slats of 17"W. The seat height is 24¼"H and the approximate weight is 31 lbs. Cleaning the chair is easy with just soap and water. It is available in four attractive, fade-resistant colors and pairs well with our Counter Height Table, sold separately. Additionally, you can pair this chair with any of our All-Weather products for a timeless, functional outdoor entertainment area. Assembly is required, see instructions below.

description:

name: Sun-Soaked Sand Surf Shorts, 8"
description:
These stand-out swim trunks are your answer to any and every water adventure. Whether you're hitting the beach, going out for a paddle or spending a great day poolside, they move with you and dry quickly for all-day, anywhere comfort. 

Size & Fit 
8" inseam. 
Standard Fit: Sits lower on the waist and straight through the hip and thigh for a streamlined look.

If you could choose one pair of swim trunks, let it be these. Built tough for splash after splash of watersport fun, with good-looking style and quick-drying comfort so you can head into town afterwards. 

Fabric & Care 
50% recycled polyester and 50% elasterell-P with Sorona® for four-way stretch. 
UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. 

Additional Features 
Durable water-repellent finish ensures they'll dry quickly. 
Fade and abrasion resistant.

name: Flexible Performance Shorts, 8"
description: Our most versatile swim trunks are perfect for swimming, running, kayaking or any unexpected adventure. Redesigned to be more comfortable and better looking than ever, they feature an 8" inseam and a classic fit that sits at the natural waist and trim, with a traditional straight leg. Made with lightweight, breathable 100% nylon fabric and UPF 50+ rated sun protection, these trunks also boast a super soft, quick-drying, anti-odor polyester mesh liner. The updated elastic waistband has an internal adjustable drawstring for just the right fit and the three-ply Supplex fabric is lightweight, breathable and brushed for softness. In addition, these trunks have a durable water-repellent finish and include side seam pocket and back welt pocket with velcro closure both with mesh drainage panels and our iconic Mt.Katahdin logo on the lower left leg. Rinse thoroughly after use and machine wash and dry for best results. Imported.

name: Men's Ventilated Keen Targhee Trekking Shoes
description:
Tackle the trail with confidence in these Keen Targhee Ventilated Hiking Shoes. They feature excellent traction with grippy rubber outsoles and a heel-capture system that promotes stability with every step.

Size & Fit
Recommend ordering one half size larger than regular shoe size or your regular Keen size. Sizes 12½, order size 13.

Specs
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 13.6 oz. per pair.

Construction
Lightweight nubuck leather upper.
Removable metatomical dual-density EVA footbeds cushion your stride.
Injected thermoplastic urethane heel-capture system promotes stability as you hike.
Reinforced eyelets are durable and allow easy adjustment.
KEEN all-terrain nonmarking rubber outsoles provide reliable traction.
Breathable mesh lining wicks moisture away from your feet.
Dual-density compression-molded EVA foam midsole.
Imported.

name: Voyager Outdoor Lamp
description: The Traverse Cube Outdoor Light is an extremely versatile and great camp lantern for all ages. With up to 200 lumens on high power and 56 lumens on low power, it provides plenty of light for nighttime activities like card games or just illuminating a tent. It also has a special mode that cycles through the colors of the rainbow, making it perfect for kids. This light is constructed from a silicone globe and impact-resistant ABS plastic base, making it water-resistant and able to float if dropped in the water. Plus, it has a convenient handle for carrying or hanging at your campsite. With a weight of 7.7 oz. with batteries and dimensions of 4.5"H x 3.25"W x 3.25"D, it is sure to be a fun and practical addition to your camping gear. Batteries are not included. With up to 14 days of run time on low power, this light is perfect for long camping trips.

name: Therma-Fur Insoles
description:
Enhance the fit and performance of your favorite foul-weather boots with these men’s shearling insoles—and keep moisture and odor at bay.

Size & Fit
For Men, order your regular shoe size, half sizes order up. For Women, please consult the size chart before ordering to ensure the correct fit.

Fabric & Care
Handwash, line dry.

Construction
Made from dyed and treated lamb shearling. Bottom is constructed with EVA foam for comfort, cushioning and support. 

Additional Features
Regulates foot temperature while wicking moisture to control odors. Imported (fur Australia).

name: CozyWool Midweight Performance T-Zip, Print
description: This 250-weight quarter-zip top is made of merino wool to naturally wick away sweat, resist odor and keep you warm in a wide range of activities and temperatures. Our exclusive wool performance fabric provides an ideal base layer for cool-weather sports, with fine merino-wool fibers to speed moisture away from your body and trap heat for warmth and comfort. The fabric is made of itch-free 100% merino wool, machine washable in cold water with like colors and can be tumble dried low. It features a fine-gauge knit with flatlock seams for a remarkably soft, smooth fit, thumbhole cuffs to keep sleeves snug at wrist, and a quarter-zip for ventilation. It is a midweight layer, naturally resisting odors for the lifetime of the fabric. Imported.

description:
Take his game to the next level with our quick-drying, moisture-wicking boys' fitness T-shirt. It has all the features he needs, plus an odor-fighting fabric that stays fresh all day. A great all-around performance tee – at a great price. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. 

Fabric & Care: 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Dries quickly and wicks away moisture to keep him cool and dry. Antimicrobial fabric controls odors. Reflective logo on chest increases visibility. Imported.

name: Plush Plaid Scarf
description: The oversized plaid scarf is the perfect addition to your wardrobe. It can be draped beautifully over your shoulders or wrapped around your neck multiple times. Crafted from 100% wool, this scarf is wonderfully soft to the touch. Be sure to handwash and dry flat for best results. It also features a fringed edge, making it extra special. Imported. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

description: Stylish, lightweight and comfortable, Suncloud Scene polarized sunglasses will protect your eyes during all your time outside. Construction: Lenses provide 100% UV protection, and polarized lenses cut glare on water and roads. Tough, lightweight Grilamid nylon frames and polycarbonate lenses are scratch and impact resistant. Additional Features: Fit small faces best. Imported. Have any questions? Feel free to reach out to customer service.

This console is made from rough-sawn white pine, finished with a durable low-sheen topcoat and plywood back. No two pieces are exactly alike and each arrives fully assembled. Made in the USA, this console measures 30"H x 72"W x 15"D, and weighs approx. 75 lb.

Size & Fit: Slim Fit: Cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist.

name: Children's  Boots, Insulated
description:
The original  Boot, handcrafted in Maine since 1912 – in sizes just for kids. Lined with Thinsulate Insulation to keep their toes toasty. 

Size & Fit: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down. 

Why We Love Them: Our children's duck boots feature the same impeccable construction as our adult styles, combining the waterproof protection of rubber-bottom boots with the comfort of full-grain leather. Made right here in Maine by expert craftspeople who treat each pair like it was made for their own kids. 

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care 

Construction: Full-grain leather upper and rubber chain-link tread. Moisture-wicking liner. 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation in footbed helps keep feet warm and dry. 

Additional Features: Proven to shed rain and snow. Uniquely shaped foot form offers the stability and comfort kids need. USA. 

Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.

name: Heritage Rugby, Traditional Fit Long-Sleeve Shoulder Stripe
description: This engineer-striped rugby shirt is an authentic classic with rubber buttons and a rugged all-cotton fabric. It's lighter than our original rugby, but still has the same familiar feel. The traditional fit is relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist, and it's washed for the appearance of being worn for years. Crafted with a woven collar, rubber buttons, herringbone-taped double placket, ribbed cuffs and a droptail hem, this timeless piece is finished with chambray trim at the collar, label and side vents. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

description:
This bright camping lantern is lightweight and compact enough take with you on backcountry adventures. With folding legs and a collapsible dome, it won't take up much space in your pack.

Weight: 5.5 oz.

Imported.
Questions?  Please contact customer service for help.

name: SnuggleSweats Pullover

It has an oversized adjustable cowlneck, kangaroo pocket, tall rib-knit cuffs and thumbholes to keep sleeves in place. This sweatshirt is machine washable and dryable and is imported.

The Targhee mid hiker is a lean, tough and gritty hiking shoe that packs modern design and performance materials into one stylish package.

Size & Fit

Approx. weight: 1 lb. 14 oz. per pair
Height: 4½"

Construction

This shoe is waterproof and constructed with leather and performance mesh upper. It is also equipped with Keen.Dry waterproof barrier to keep water out while allowing vapor to escape. The moisture-wicking synthetic liner is treated for odor control. Dual-density compression-molded EVA midsole and removable EVA foam footbed offer cushioning. It features Keen all-terrain rubber outsole for high traction grip, and Keen's "S3" internal heel support structure for torsion control.

Additional Features

This shoe also comes with ESS shank for lightweight support, midcut height for ankle support, web pull-on loops at back collar and tongue, and web tab lacing system to draw heel inward to hold foot securely.

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.

Additional Features: Field-tested by women fly fishers to ensure it fits right. Two vertical chest pockets near the front zipper hold small fly boxes and tools. Two large handwarmer pockets that can also carry two large fly boxes. The superlight fabric is very breathable yet still dependably waterproof. Gusseted cuffs keep water out when releasing fish or casting in the rain. Hood adjusts with a cord-lock in back. All closures have a low-profile design to minimize line catching. Imported.

name: Astraight™ Arrow Six-Pack
description: Make the most of your backyard target practice with these ready-to-shoot, high-grade Easton target arrows for growing archers. Construction: Easton 7075 aerospace alloy. Additional Features: National Archery in the Schools Program-approved for tournament use. Consistent spine and weight for precision accuracy and reliable performance. Nock, fletching and target point installed. Made in the USA. Questions? Please contact us for more information.

name: Men's Tropic Breeze Zip-Leg Pants
description:
Keep your options open with these Men’s convertible cargo pants—they transform into shorts with two quick zips, allowing you to adapt when the weather just can’t seem to make up its mind. 

Size & Fit
Inseams: Pants 31¼"; Shorts 7".
Classic Fit: Sits at the natural waist and trim, with a traditional straight leg.

Fabric & Care
94% nylon, 6% spandex wicks moisture and resists wrinkles.
Built-in SunSmart™ UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Button front with zip fly.
Adjustable nylon belt.
Two front slash pockets, two cargo pockets, two rear pockets.
Zippered security pocket.
Elastic inserts in waist.
Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Thermo-Shield Tote, Bold Design
description:
This handy twist on our classic tote is perfect for keeping your lunch or beverages cool at the beach, picnic or campsite. Specs: Capacity: Approx. 2,016 cu in., 33 L. Weight: 3 lb. 5 oz. Dimensions: 14"H x 22½"W tapers to 17¼"W x 7½"D.

Why We Love It: Finally, a substantial insulated bag that keeps food and drink cool and looks good while doing it. Take it for picnics, tailgating, camping or anywhere you want to keep food and drinks cold.

Construction: Main fabric is 600-denier polyester, trim fabric is 8 oz. cotton canvas. Food-grade, seam-sealed lining is BPA and PVC free. Lining is tested to be free of lead and phthalates. Detachable shoulder strap.

Additional Features: The insulation of our lunch boxes, the look of our classic totes. Lining is leakproof and easy to clean. Imported.

name: Women's Coastal Journey Multisport Shoes
description:
Now you can do all your favorite outdoor activities in one comfortable shoe. 

Specs:
Approx. weight: 1 lb. 13 oz.

Construction:
Quick-drying mesh upper lets water in and out easily. 
Outsole is specially designed to mirror the amazing grip of amphibian feet. 
Neoprene collar helps protect against sharp stones and debris. 
Perforated and breathable sock lining. 
Ecofriendly AEGIS microbe-shield technology prevents bacterial growth. 

Additional Features:
Walk, boat or hike in these versatile shoes built for a variety of activities. 
Imported.

name: Cozy Textured Knit Sweater
description: Light and airy in a hand-designed open stitch, this sweater is just right for changing seasons – as perfect for the beach as it is for a barbecue. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at hip. Why We Love It: Our designer hand selected each and every stitch of this gorgeous open-weave sweater – ensuring it falls beautifully and truly flatters. Fabric & Care: In a cool blend of 80% cotton and 20% linen. Handwash, dry flat. Additional Features: Due to the open stitch, we recommend wearing a layer underneath. Imported. Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Adventurer Hydration Pack
description:
This hydration pack is designed for aerodynamic performance, making it ideal for road cyclists who enjoy speed and efficiency.

Specs
Pack capacity: 305 cu. in., 5 L.
Weight: 15 oz.
Dimensions: 15½"H x 10"W x 5 7/8"D.
Hydration Capacity: 85 oz.

Construction
Pack body made from 200-deneir plain weave polyester.
New Crux reservoir offers 20% better flow rate than any other reservoir.
Harness and back panel are covered with breathable mesh.
Adjustable sternum strap.

Additional Features
Two zippered pockets accommodate tube, tools and energy snacks.
Overflow pocket holds essentials like a rain shell.
Reflective details for low-light visibility.
Imported.

name: Youthful Balance Arishi V2s
description: Light, comfy and classic, these kids' New Balance sneakers feature an engineered mesh upper for superior breathability – so feet stay cool and dry mile after mile. Construction: Breathable, engineered mesh upper for maximum airflow to keep active kids comfortable. Durable rubber outsole absorbs shock. Additional Features: Stylish and supportive – a perfect choice for road running, workouts or just hanging out. Patented Fresh foam midsole conforms to shape of foot for a personalized plush ride. Imported.

name: Women's  Wildwood Waxed Cotton Down Vest
description: This warm, cozy vest is insulated with advanced 650-fill DownTek. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Falls below hip. Fabric & Care: Spot clean with brush or sponge. Line dry. Additional Features: Waxed cotton fabric is highly waterproof, wind resistant and rugged. 650-fill DownTek repels 33% more moisture and dries 66% faster than standard down. 20% lighter than our previous down vests. Gains a vintage patina with age. Offers soft corduroy inside collar and pocket flaps. Snap-flap patch pockets have small slash pocket for gloves or small items. One zippered internal chest pocket. Brass hardware is tough and rust resistant. Features longer back length for more coverage. Diagonal-stitch pattern. Imported.

name: Explorer Dome 2-Person Tent
description:
This value-packed tent from  boasts lightweight and strong aluminum poles at a great price. It is ideal for both beginners and experienced campers thanks to its simple design which sets up quickly and easily. 

Specs
Capacity: 2 people plus gear. 
Tent area: 37.5 sq. ft.
Tent floor dimensions: 7'6" x 5'. 
Peak height: 47". 
Minimum weight: 5 lb. 6 oz. 
Packed size: 22" x 8". 

Construction
Durable 68-denier ripstop polyester body, floor and fly. 
1,500 mm polyurethane waterproof coating on fly. 
Simple design for quick set-up. 
An integrated awning extends over the door to keep rain out. 
Single door and window with poly-fine mesh allows plenty of ventilation and keeps bugs out. 
Interior storage pockets help you keep organized. 
Imported.

name: Girls' Coastline Cutoffs, Stripe
description:
From trail to treehouse to surf, these water-friendly girls' hybrid shorts make summer transitions and adventure easy and comfortable. Size & Fit Relaxed fit. Fabric & Care In a quick-drying, water-repellent 89% polyester, 11% spandex blend. Recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. No-pinch adjustable waistband. Envelope-style back pocket. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Winterproof Snow Trousers
description:
These men’s waterproof snow pants are designed for natural movement and maximum warmth and waterproof breathability. The breathable, waterproof TEK2® 100% nylon fabric is taped at the seams and insulated with our ThermaTEK polyester insulation. Snap closure and waistband adjustments provide a customizable fit over any base layer, and snow gaiter hems keep out deep snow and allow for easy on/off over boots. The lining content is 100% Nylon taffeta and the pants are machine washable and dryable. 

Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit - our loosest cut, with the most room through the seat and knee. 

Imported. 

If you have any questions, please reach out to our customer service team.

name: Coastal Cotton Crewneck Sweater
description:
Our iconic Cotton Fisherman Sweater is designed with modern styling and distinctive tipped edges. 

Size & Fit: 
Fitted: Sits close to the body. 
Falls at hip. 

Why We Love It: 
The original fisherman’s sweaters of the Aran Islands were knit with designs that told stories of a rich coastal heritage. From good luck to a plentiful catch, special sentiments were represented in each and every stitch. We’ve recreated those same authentic cable patterns in an updated close-fitting silhouette, beautifully knit in pure cotton yarns.

Fabric & Care: 
100% cotton in a versatile three-season weight. 
Machine wash, dry flat.

Additional Features: 
Ribbed at neck, cuffs and hem. 
Imported.

name: Mountain Master Colorblock Quarter-Zip
description:
Now softer, lighter and better than ever, our exceptionally breathable moisture-wicking shirt is built for performance with unrestricted comfort. Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted - Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. Fabric & Care: Body - 52% S. Cafe Polyester/48% polyester. Panels - 15% S. Cafe Polyester/85% polyester. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: L2Dry fabric technology wicks moisture away and dries quickly to keep you comfortable all day long. L2Sun fabric technology provides 50+UPF protection so you can go wherever your adventures take you. Antimicrobial finish reliably resists odor. Flatlock seams prevent chafing. Reflective logo on chest and strips at back add visibility. Moisture wicking. UPF 50+. Side panels offer increased breathability and comfort during high intensity activities. Exceptionally breathable and built for performance with unrestricted comfort. Imported.
Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Cozy Comfort 3-in-1 Jacket
description:
This men's down 3-in-1 jacket offers a durable, waterproof shell and a lightweight yet warm 650 DownTek liner. With this jacket, you have the option to double-up or wear either piece alone in varying weather conditions. It is rated for light activity to 20° and moderate activity to -30°. It has a slightly fitted cut that falls below the hip and is best with midweight layers. 

Whether you're mountain bound or on a rainy commute to work, this jacket will fit every need. Wear the shell when summer weather gets wet, the liner when fall's chill sets in or zip them together for plenty of warmth and protection during winter activities. It features a waterproof, seam-sealed two-layer TEK shell, a lightweight DownTek goose-down liner, a 3-point zip-in system, a fully adjustable helmet-compatible hood, longer length and higher collar for additional protection, pit-zip venting for added breathability, two chest pockets and two handpockets, and an interior media pocket. 

The shell is made with a 100% polyester exterior and 100% nylon interior while the liner is made with 100% nylon and insulated with warm, lofty goose down. It

name: Men's Maine Outdoor Boots, 12"
description:
The Maine Hunting Shoe was "L.L." Bart's first product, introduced in 1912. Over the years, we've made lots of improvements, but hunters told us they missed the moccasin-like feel that our original boots had in the woods. So we brought it back.

Size & Fit
- With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.
- With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Specs
- Approx. weight: 3 lb. 13 oz. per pair.

Why We Love Them
With a moccasin-like sole that lets you feel the forest floor beneath your feet, a taller 12" height for extra coverage and waterproof construction, we carefully considered every detail of these Maine-made boots. As one customer told us, “These boots fit like they have over a 100 years of effort put into the design.”

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care

Construction
- Premium waterproof leather upper.
- Steel shank for superior lateral and arch support.

Additional Features
-

name: Cosy Flannel Comfort Cover.

The bestselling ultrasoft flannel comforter is versatile and pill-resistant for year-round use. It pairs perfectly with your favorite down insert or blanket and gets softer every wash.

Why We Love It: After more than two years, more than 75 testers and a close partnership with flannel experts at our mill in Portugal, we developed an exclusive process that removes fibers from the surface of the fabric to create a remarkably soft and velvety finish. The result is the most pill-resistant flannel comforter cover we've ever tested, unmatched in comfort and durability. 

Fabric & Care: 100% brushed cotton flannel, 5 oz. weight. Tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (137

name: Sea to Summit eVent Compression Seal Sack

Large - Capacity: 1,220 cu. in., 20 L.; Weight: 5.9 oz; Dimensions: 20"L x 9"W. Extra-Large - Capacity: 1,831 cu. in., 30 L.; Weight: 7.4 oz; Dimensions: 23"L x 10½"W. Construction: Rugged 70-denier nylon body and lid; Waterproof seams – double stitched and tape sealed; Roll-top Hypalon® closure won't wick moisture, so it’s more waterproof than webbing closures; Reinforced stitching on all stress points; Handle on bottom. Additional Features: Unique eVent base that's waterproof yet air permeable, letting air escape without a valve; Packs gear down as small as it can get;

name: Women's PrimaLoft Comfort Socks, Crew Height
description:
We crafted the perfect blend of PrimaLoft yarns and merino wool to make these socks ultradurable and comfortable for long days on your feet.

Size & Fit
7" height.

Fabric & Care
This lightweight blend of 35% nylon, 31% PrimaLoft® polyester, 31% merino wool and 3% spandex wicks away moisture and dries quickly. Merino wool yarns naturally resist odor. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
Seamless toe construction won't chafe. Cushioning under foot for additional comfort. Reinforced heel and forefoot add durability. Made in the USA.

name: Girls' Aquatic Adventure Swimsuit, One-piece, Long Sleeve, Colorblock
description: Whether it's relaxing on the beach or paddling on the water, this long-sleeved, UPF 50+ rated girls' swimsuit makes it easy to focus on the fun. Fabric & Care: 78% recycled nylon, 22% Xtra Life Lycra. Machine wash, line dry. Additional Features: UPF 50+ rated, the highest rated sun protection possible. Made from recycled content from fishing nets to help minimize our environmental impact. Long sleeves offers great coverage; no need to layer on a rash guard. Breathable and quick drying, with comfortable stretch for great freedom of movement. Front zipper for easy on-off, even when wet. Imported.

name: Enduring Outdoor Chair
description: Our comfortable all-weather patio chair is durable enough to withstand the elements year-round – perfect for any garden or patio. With its specs of overall dimensions of 35¼"H x 25½"W x 24"D and seat area of 20" x 17 3/8", and a seat height of 17¼"H, this chair is made of eco-friendly, partially recycled HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) and rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware. Weighing in at 33 lbs., this chair is tougher and more resilient than treated wood and is heavy enough to withstand winds, unaffected by wet weather and extreme temperatures, making it perfect for all year-round use without rotting, warping, cracking, splintering or ever needing to be painted. Additionally, it is easy to clean with soap and water. Available in three attractive, fade-resistant colors, pair this chair with our Garden Bench and Casco Bay Cushions, both sold separately, for a timeless and functional outdoor entertainment area. This product is made in the USA. Assembly instructions are included.

name: Girls' Plaid Coastline Shorts
description: These girls' hybrid shorts are perfect for all her adventures, from running around the playground to hitting the surf. They have a relaxed fit and are made from a water-repellent, quick-drying blend of 89% polyester and 11% spandex. With an adjustable waistband and envelope-style back pocket, these shorts are also UPF 50+ rated—the highest rated sun protection possible—and recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name: Glowbeam Clip Lamp
description: Being seen is essential to staying safe at night. This small light will clip onto just about anything for nighttime visibility—great for walking the dog, unlocking the car or camping. Constructed from stainless-steel, it is water resistant and securely clips onto zippers, dog collars, key chains and much more. Choose between glow and flash modes. Note: Arrives in “Try Me” mode and will shut off automatically a few seconds after being turned on. To deactivate “Try Me” mode, press and hold power button until the light starts flashing quickly. Imported.

name: Wilderness Hunter Overpants
description: Bart's Big-Game System presents the men’s waterproof camo overpants. This pant features an optional flap for extra protection and comfort in the high back, plus built-in pockets that can hold heat packs for additional warmth against the lower back. It is made with 100% polyester and is machine wash and dry. The pant also has a rear security pocket, an elastic waistband with fly front that stretches to accommodate layering, oversized belt loops and suspender buttons inside the waistband, and zip cuffs to pull easily over boots. Imported. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Thule ProRide XT Supreme Bike Carrier
description:
The ProRide XT is a durable roof top bike rack that's super-easy to use and holds your valuable bike securely. The re-designed wheel holders and support arm clamp adjust to help keep your bike in position while you secure it to the carrier.

Specs
Weight: 10 lb.
Capacity: 40 lb.
Tire compatibility: Up to 3".
Dimensions: 57"L x 13"W x 3.5"H.

Additional Features
Ergonomically designed dial and clamp.
Torque limiter tightening dial controls the amount of force applied to the bike frame.
Frame clamp with extended lower jaw and soft claw pads protects and supports your bike.
Spring-loaded, push-button clamp release makes unloading your bike fast and easy.
Fast, easy tool-free installation.
Fits Thule AeroBlade Edge, AeroBlades, Square Bars and most t-slotted aftermarket racks.
Made in the USA.

name: Organic Cotton Stripe Comforter Cover Collection
description:
Our organic cotton comforter cover with modern stripes and a smooth finish creates a fresh look in any bedroom. It is certified by Control Union CU 810031, GOTS certified and tested for harmful substances to the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certification (2735CIT CITEVE). With 220-thread-count, 100% organic cotton percale, you can rest assured that it is designed to be better for the planet and look beautiful on your bed. The comforter cover features hidden button closures and internal ties to keep it in place, while the sham has tie closures. 

Twin: Dimensions: 68" x 88"
Full: Dimensions: 81" x 88"
Queen: Dimensions: 88" x 96"
King: Dimensions: 107" x 96"
Standard Sham (1): Dimensions: 21" x 27"

This product is machine washable and dryable and is made in Portugal. The comforter cover and sham are sold separately and the price reflected is for a single sham.

name: Shetland Wool Quarter-Zip Pullover
description:
Reach for our rich-toned, 100% premium Shetland men’s wool sweater for midweight warmth. Dressed up or down for work to weekend, this rugged classic’s earthy colors stay true year after year. 

Fabric & Care: Knit from premium 100% Shetland wool. Handwash, dry flat. Imported. 

Questions? Please contact our customer service team for more information.

name: UltraFeet Comfort Insoles
description: Our men’s superfeet blue insoles give your feet unmatched support and comfort that lasts all workout or workday long. Construction includes extra support in the rear-foot area to help reduce pronation, deep heel cups for comfort and control, and a friction-control top cover to help prevent blisters, with an antimicrobial treatment to control odors. Additional features include being designed for support with tight-fitting casual and athletic footwear, and the ability to be trimmed to fit. Imported. Questions? Reach out to customer service.

name: Kiddo Snow Trax Boots
description: Our best-value waterproof winter boots are constructed with a synthetic upper with waterproof membrane and brushed tricot lining. The lightweight heat-trapping foam insulation, exclusive chain-grip outsole, and hook-and-loop-closure strap make for a just-right fit. Additionally, the boots feature a 3M™ Scotchlite™ Reflective Material back triangle for safety. Imported.

name: Comfy Knee-Highs, Two-Pack
description: Our crew-height ragg socks are the perfect combination of comfort and lightweight design. Soft to the touch and itch-free, these socks are great for wearing with wellies or rubber mocs. With 63% cotton, 22% polyester, 14% nylon, and 1% spandex, these socks are sure to fit as comfortably as they look. The diamond cable pattern and solid toe ensure a secure fit. Plus, these socks are proudly made in the USA. Care for them is easy – machine wash and dry. So, get ready to enjoy them during the warm spring and summer months!

name: Maine Guide PrimaLoft Parka
description: Wool is a time-tested favorite of cold-weather hunters. It's warm even when wet, quiet in the woods and exceptionally durable for its weight. Our Maine Guide Wool Parka combines Bart's exclusive premium-quality, tightly woven wool with the lightweight comfort and warmth of advanced PrimaLoft® Infinity insulation. You get all the advantages of heavyweight wool without added bulk, allowing you to quickly and comfortably move through the woods and mount your rifle. The parka features fabric patches for forearm protection, strap closure for snug collar, full cut for layering with a comfortable nonbinding fit, back zip cargo pocket with reinforcements for drag rope or survival kit, interior zip security pocket, two front cargo pockets, two handwarmer pockets, draft-stopping elasticized drawcord waist and license loop. The tightly woven premium-quality wool provides superior durability, and the advanced PrimaLoft Infinity insulation adds extra warmth. Imported.

name: Women's Teva Terra-Float Adventure Sandals
description: These women's active water shoes provide exceptional cushiony comfort and long-lasting durability. Featuring an innovative FloatLite foam construction that's both ultralight and durable, the shoes also boast a quick-drying waterproof nubuck upper, Vibram® MegaGrip rubber outsole, and quick-lace for easy on/off and adjustability. Approx Weight: 14 oz. per pair. Imported.

name: -SolarLight Fusion Rechargeable Flashlight
description: This powerful rechargeable and waterproof flashlight is perfect for car, garage, and boat use. It features a 2400 mAh lithium-ion battery, a 160 lumens brightness, and a waterproof casing that also floats. The flashlight includes a USB port for charging mobile devices and can be charged via solar power or micro USB port. It is also capable of holding a charge on the shelf for seven years and provides 14 hours of light on low beam and up to 7 hours on high beam. The flashlight measures 6"L and weighs 4.5 oz. It is imported.

name: Kids' AdventureGuard Waterproof Hiking Shoes
description:
The same rugged, waterproof design as adult Keen hikers, in sizes perfect for little explorers. Built to take on puddles and new adventures, in a versatile low-profile style that's great for town and trail. 

Construction:
- Waterproof leather with textile upper.
- KEEN.DRY™ waterproof, breathable and anti-microbial inner lining.
- Secure-fit lace-capture system for stability.
- Padded tongue and collar for added comfort.
- All-terrain traction.

- Non-marking rubber outsole.
- Imported.

name: Kids' Arcata Wool Stripe Boots by Bogs
description:
These kids' boots are ready to tackle winter adventures! With a comfort rating down to -40°F, they are waterproof, insulated, and odor resistant. They also offer pull handles for easy on/off and a lace-up system for a comfortable fit.

Specs:
- Approx. Weight: 1 lb. 6 oz 

Construction:
- 100% waterproof construction keeps feet dry.
- 5mm Neo-Tech upper with wool blend offers waterproof insulation and warmth down to -40° F.

- Non-marking, non-slip rubber outsole.

Additional Features:
- Pull handles offer easy on/off. 
- Lace-up system ensures a comfortable fit.

name: AquaPure Shield
description:
Having clean drinking water is critical when you're on backcountry adventures. Originally designed for the military, the Guardian water purifier removes bacteria, viruses, protozoa and sediment, as well as many other impurities, so you can stay hydrated without worry.

Specs:
- Weight: 17.3 oz.
- Height: 8.2"
- Maximum diameter: 4.7"

Construction:
- Patent-pending self-cleaning system cleans with each stroke; no need to backflush or clean filter.
- Rugged design stands up to heavy use and extreme environments.
- Purifies 2.5 liters per minute from nearly any water source and treats up to 10,000 liters.
- The only hollow fiber purifier on the market that can withstand freezing temperatures.
- Drop tested from 6' onto concrete.

Additional Features:
- Meets NSF protocol P248, the testing standard used by the U.S. military for removing viruses.
- Made in the USA, components USA and imported.

name: Women's Osprey Celestial AG50 Pack
description:
The Osprey Aura AG 50 Women's Backpack is the perfect weekend companion for women who like to travel light. Offering three different sizes, it provides the perfect fit for any adventurer. The Extra Small size with a capacity of 2,746 cu. in., 45 L., fits torsos up to 18.5" and weighs 3 lb. 11 oz. The Small size with a capacity of 2,868 cu. in., 47 L., fits torsos from 18" to 20" and weighs 3 lb. 12 oz. The Medium size with a capacity of 3,051 cu. in., 50 L., fits torsos over 20" and weighs 3 lb. 13 oz.

This innovative backpack is designed with the Anti-Gravity Suspension system with load lifters, which allows for the load to be suspended off your back, making it feel like you're not even wearing a pack. The seamless suspended mesh extends from the shoulder blades to the lumbar, dispersing and balancing the load while also allowing air to move across your back.

The pack body is constructed with 100D and 630D nylon dobby and the bottom is made of 420HD nylon packcloth. The top-load

name: Waxed-Canvas All-Terrain Rucksack
description:
Our classic rucksack has been updated with heavier pebbled leather trim, shearling padding on the shoulder straps and a narrower frame that allows greater freedom of movement. It's tough enough for the trail and great around campus or city.

- Fits torso: 16" to 21".

Additional Features: Can be worn as a sweatband, beanie, scarf, bandana or face mask, made from 100% recycled materials with 2 recycled water bottles per Buff, UPF 50+ rating for great sun protection, HEIQ technology provides cooling when moisture is present, Polygiene antimicrobial treatment means fewer washes needed, added stretch for a more comfortable fit, imported.

name:
Moon

 Wool Braid Rug, Lunar Crescent

Attention to detail and high-quality virgin wool make this attractive braided crescent rug last and retain its color longer than the competition's.

Our classic oval rug is crafted with 100% wool surface yarns that are soil resistant. The braids are held together by Super Seam, a rugged, break-resistant polyester thread that ensures durability, which might be why one customer called our rug “beautiful and indestructible.”
