name: Girls' Tech Zip-Up Hoodie
description:
Our girls' hoodie is designed with a stretchy, moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric that ensures comfort and durability. The fabric allows her to move freely and it won't stretch out of shape. The hoodie also features a chin guard, on-seam pockets, thumbholes at the cuff, and a reflective logo on the back for increased visibility. It is made from 88% polyester and 12% elastane french terry fabric and is machine washable and dryable. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. 

Fabric & Care: 88% polyester, 12% elastane french terry. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Super-soft performance fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, stretch fabric moves when she does, flat-faced fleece is brushed on the inside for a soft feel, reflective logo on back for increased visibility, imported.

name: Luxury Pima Cotton Cardigan with Ribbed Trim
description:
This luxuriously soft cardigan is made from the world's finest cotton – Supima. With its easygoing open style and flattering longer length, it's sure to be an everyday favorite.

Size & Fit:
Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body.
Falls at low hip.

Why We Love It:
Our premium Supima cotton tees are perennial favorites for their extraordinary softness, smoothness and lasting quality. Tests have proven they stand up better to laundering than ordinary cotton, so the luxe fabric looks and feels great, season after season.

Fabric & Care:
Extraordinarily soft in long-staple Supima® cotton – grown in the USA.
Interlock knit for a smooth feel inside and out.
Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features:
Ribbed trim at collar, placket, cuffs and hem.
Front pockets.
Droptail curved hem.
Imported.

name: Mix-It-Up Tankini Print
description: This feminine squareneck bathing suit top features beautiful prints and a flattering design for a look that will pair well with all your favorite swim bottoms. Our Mix-and-Match swim collection is designed to make finding your perfect swimsuit easy, with so many incredible options to choose from. The fabric is made from 80% nylon and 20% Lycra® Xtra Life, providing long-lasting fit and resistance to sun, chlorine, and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. The lining is made from 84% nylon and 16% Lycra Elastane for UPF 50+ rated sun protection. Breathable, quick-drying Italian swim fabric holds its shape, and is chlorine-resistant for stay-true color. Adjustable straps and a feminine square neckline provide extra coverage. Handwash and line dry to keep it looking its best. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Men's All-Day Comfort Chino Socks, Two-Pack
description: Made of a blend of moisture-wicking merino wool, nylon for durability, and spandex for shape-retaining stretch, these soft, form-fitting men's chino socks offer all-day comfort at home or work. Fabric & Care: 48% nylon, 25% merino wool, 25% acrylic, 2% spandex blend. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: 10"H. USA, fabric imported.

name: Coastal Wool Hooked Pillow, Lobster
description:
Take home one of Maine’s most iconic catches with our hand-hooked Lobster Throw Pillow.

Specs: 
Dimensions: 8" x 24".

Fabric & Care: 
100% wool front. 
100% cotton, velveteen back. 
100% polyester insert. 
Spot clean. 

Additional Features: 
Charming, coastal-inspired design. 
Removable cover. 
Wool yarns are hand hooked on front to create design. 
Imported. 

Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: Chill & Dine Picnic Cooler
description:
We listened to your feedback and added 5 exterior pockets to our popular coolers, making it easier to organize all your picnic accessories. The new flip-top lid stays open when you're looking for a snack inside, and the cooler holds 12 to 15 12 oz. cans with ice.

Specs
Capacity: 2,016 cu. in.; 33 L.
Weight: 1 lb. 10 oz.
Dimensions: 11"H x 15"W x 9"D.

Construction
The body is made from durable 600D Kodra and triple ripstop 100D Cordura, and the food-grade, non-PVC liner is easy to clean and won't leak. The easy-opening, zippered main lid allows quick access, and dual-adjustable shoulder strap is removable. Two small zippered side pockets are perfectly sized for utensils or small essentials, and there's a large front pocket with an elastic cuff. There are also two zippered pockets on the lid and back, providing additional storage. Carry straps with velcro handle wrap are elongated, allowing the cooler to be easily shouldered.

Additional Features
This lightweight, durable cooler is perfect for picnics with the family

name: Juniors' Bike Bottoms
description:
A wardrobe essential for active girls, these form-fitting bike shorts can be worn alone or under skirts, dresses and shorts. 

Size & Fit: Fitted.

Fabric & Care: 78% nylon, 22% Lycra. Machine wash, line dry.

Additional Features: Performance fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and is rated UPF 50+. Soft waistband provides comfort and coverage. Pairs perfectly with our Girls’ Fitness Shorts. Imported.

name: Women's Divinely Cozy Slipper Slide
description:
Your feet work hard every day, so they deserve some serious pampering. These cozy slides feature our legendary Australian shearling that wraps your feet in rejuvenating comfort. A super-soft footbed cushions every step.

Size & Fit
Best fit with lightweight socks or barefoot. Half sizes order up.

Why We Love Them
With over 4 million pairs sold over the last 5 years, it’s clear customers think our Wicked Good Slippers deserve the title of Best Slippers Ever Made. They make such a great gift that we sell a pair every 7 seconds during our peak in December. Why are they so popular? There are a few reasons but at the top of the list is the most cozy shearling you can find. Throw in superior construction using premium sheepskin and you’ll know why in Maine, “Wicked Good” is as good as it gets.

Construction
Genuine Australian lambswool shearling lining is super-cozy and wicks moisture. Australian sheepskin suede upper is soft and durable. EVA midsole for comfort and support. Footbed is shearling-covered EVA foam for luxurious cushioning. Leather-wrapped midsole features vintage whip

name: Heritage Waxed-Cotton Packer Hat
description:
A favorite among sportsmen for generations, the durable fabric in our wax hat has been relied upon for protection in the worst weather conditions. 

Fabric & Care: Made of 100% waxed cotton canvas. Lining: 100% Polyester Sweatband. Spot clean.

Additional Features: Full brim keeps water off face and neck. Crushable for transport in pack or pocket. Brim can be snapped up. Adjustable drawcord for perfect fit. Imported.

name: CozyLoft Heated Hoodie
description:
Worry less about the weather and concentrate on the adventure – our women's Heater Jacket utilizes first-to-market PrimaLoft Gold insulation to keep you warm and comfortable during outdoor adventures, even on the worst days. Light activity: to 10°  Moderate activity: to -40° about comfort ratings. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls below hip.

Why We Love It: It's all in the name – our Heater Jacket is the warmest synthetic-insulated jacket we offer, utilizing PrimaLoft Gold insulation to provide incredible warmth when the chill sets in. Of course, we couldn't stop there; we used our innovative TEK O2 fabric on the hood, shoulders and top of arms for even more protection when weather is at its worst. 

Fabric & Care: First-to-market Primaloft® Gold Insulation. Shell: 100% nylon. Insulation: 100% polyester. Waterproof fabric on hood, shoulders and arms – right where you need it most. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Fully adjustable hood. Two hand pockets, one chest pocket. Interior zippered stow pocket, drop mesh pocket

name: AquaFlex® Swimwear, Tanksuit
description:
The best value under the sun, our full-coverage tanksuit stays strong and looks great in premium Italian swim fabric. It’s breathable, quick-drying, chlorine-resistant and proof you can find a great swimsuit at a great price.

Size & Fit
Our most comfortable swimwear, with the best stretch. Fitted: Sits close to the body.

Why We Love It
We designed our best-priced swimwear with thoughtful features – not frills – for the very best performance and value. With great coverage, stay-put shape and quick-drying comfort, it’s why customers return to it again and again.

Fabric & Care
80% nylon, 20% Lycra Xtra Life fiber. Lycra Xtra Life provides long-lasting fit and resists degradation from sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. Full front lining: 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Handwash, line dry.

Additional Features
Stretchy, breathable, quick-drying chlorine-resistant fabric keeps its shape. Soft-cup bra. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Imported

name: Sport Utility Spade
description: This rugged aluminum utility shovel is perfect for any outdoor winter activity. It extends to 32"L, and packs to 14"L x 15"W for easy storage. The blade size is 8½"W x 11"L, and the shovel only weighs 1½ lb. The construction is 100% aluminum, making it lightweight. The three-piece design is easy to dissemble and comes with a sturdy case. Questions? Please contact us!

name: Slingaway Spectra Pack
description:
The Stowaway Sling Pack is superlight at 10.4 ounces, stowable and durable, making it perfect for travel, a day on the trail or a walk into town. It's cleverly designed to contour to the center of your back for a more stable carry. 

Specs:
Capacity: 610 cu. in., 10 L. 
Weight: 10.4 oz.
Dimensions: 14.5"H x 12.25"W, depth is tapered from 1.5" on top to 5" at base. 

Construction: 
Made from durable 70D nylon ripstop with 210D nylon lining. 
7" fleece-lined pocket on side for sunglasses or a phone. 
Front mesh shove-it pocket for a water bottle or extra layer and features two compression straps. 
Packs into its own internal stowaway pocket for travel or storage. 
Breathable air mesh back panel for comfort. 
Cross body strap features air mesh with EVA perforated foam for breathability. 
Tuckaway nylon web stabilizing strap. 
Full-face envelope pocket on front. 
Imported.

name: Men's Chaco Cloud Comfort 2 Sandals
description: Known for their podiatrist-approved support and adjustability, these rugged Chaco water sandals feature an extra cushioning for a pillow-like feel and a toe loop for extra security. Construction includes durable polyester webbing straps that wrap around foot and through midsole for maximum adjustability, a toe loop for a secure fit, a sturdy injection-molded ladder-lock buckle, and a durable Luvseat footbed for all-day comfort. The layer of durable polyurethane over the rubber sole adds plush cushioning from the first wear, while the treated construction fights odor-causing bacteria. The grippy non-marking outsole with 3.5 mm lugs and vegan-friendly construction make them a great choice. Imported.

name: Men's  Trail Trekker Tee, Short-Sleeve
description: Updated with improved seam construction and an even better fit. From trail run to backyard chore or city stroll, this versatile, affordable men’s moisture-wicking T-shirt is designed for everyday wear. Size & Fit Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. Why We Love It Every man needs a go-to tee he can reach for without thinking, one that will keep him comfortable and dry wash after wash, no matter what the task. Fabric & Care Lightweight and breathable 100% polyester. Quick-drying, antimicrobial fabric moves moisture away from the body for odor control. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Raglan sleeves place flatlock, nonchafing seams off the shoulders for greater comfort. Imported.

name: Turtle Coast Beach Towel
description: Our updated turtle beach towel from  is big, bold and sure to make a statement. Specs: Dimensions: 36" x 68". Fabric & Care: 100% ring-spun cotton. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Plush, absorbent and generously sized. Yarn-dyed for stay-true color. Dries fast without fading. Can be monogrammed with up to 10 characters, including spaces. Made in Turkey. If you have any questions, please contact us for assistance.

name: Cotton Raglan Comfort Socks, Twin-Pack
description: A favorite heritage style crafted in an itch-free cotton blend, these men’s socks are a natural candidate for everyday, all-season wear. Size & Fit: Designed and knit for an exceptional fit that won’t bind or sag. Why We Love It: Following in the footsteps of our perpetually popular wool Ragg Socks, these men’s cotton-blend socks are the ideal choice for everyday wear. Designed to hold their shape from one wash to the next, they look as good as they feel – and they’ll keep your feet warm and dry no matter where your day takes you. Fabric & Care: Crafted of an itch-free blend of 86% cotton, 13% nylon, 1% spandex. Breathable fabric wicks moisture to keep feet dry. Specialized yarn dries faster than traditional cotton. Soft yarn feels terrific – and keeps feet cozy and comfortable. Machine wash and dry. USA.

name: Comfy Plaid Zip Hoodie
description: Our plaid flannel hoodie is made from high-quality Portuguese cotton and designed for relaxed comfort and warmth. Its generous fit sits farthest from the body and falls at low hip. To ensure quality, a master weaver has confirmed that our exclusive flannel is simply the best. Meticulously brushed eight times on each side, the incredibly plush and long-lasting fabric has passed a “touch test” given by a skilled craftsman. Authentic Scottish tartan patterns are specially yarn-dyed so they’ll stay bright. It features side pockets, a full-front zip, a drawcord at the hood, and a rounded droptail hem for great coverage. It also has a locker loop at the back and is machine washable. Imported.

name: Riverglide Performer SUP Paddle
description:
This SUP paddle provides superior performance, durability and a great price. It allows for an efficient stroke so you can paddle longer with more comfort and less fatigue. 

Specs
Weight: 28 oz.
Blade Dimensions: 17.5" x 7.25".
Blade Angle: 10.5 degrees.
Blade Area: 90 sq. in.
Adjustable Range: 67"-83".

Construction
Lightweight, durable carbon fiber shaft. 
Tough fiberglass blade.

Additional Features 
Feels like a fixed-length paddle but has the versatility of an adjustable. 
LeverLock Adjustment System provides an infinite adjustment range.
Lightweight construction delivers efficient performance. 
Imported.

name: Women's Sparkling Pistil Neck Warmer
description:
Made from lightweight yarns for comfort and breathability, this have-it-all style instantly converts from a scarf to a hoodie. Why We Love It: We love pieces that are both stylish and functional. Not only will this neckwarmer keep you warm and comfortable, it also adds an element of fun and uniqueness to your look. Simply throw it on as a scarf and flip up the hood when the wind gets chilly.

Fabric & Care: Fine-knit fabric breathes well for comfort indoors or out. 100% soft acrylic yarns. Handwash, dry flat. Imported.

name: Ultra-Plush 850 Down Vest
description:
In a class all its own, our revolutionary 850 vest defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum nylon shell – for unbeatable performance. 

Size & Fit
Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. 

Why We Love It
We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements. Revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry long and dries out faster, making a great insulator even better. 

Watch the Video

Fabric & Care
850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. Premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance. Certified by

name: Men's Featherweight Colorblock Knit Pullover
description: This quilted pullover provides all the performance features needed for outdoor adventures and plenty of wear-anywhere style. It is lightweight, 100% polyester that wicks away moisture and is abrasion-resistant. With UPF 50+ rated sun protection, it is also Bluesign® approved fabric for minimized environmental impact. The snap-front pullover style allows for easy on/off and features reinforced bindings on the collar, sleeves and hem, as well as a kangaroo pocket and the classic Mount Katahdin logo. It is slightly fitted, with a relaxed chest and sleeve, and a slightly slimmer waist. It falls at hip and is machine wash and dry.

name: Camp-Luxe Futon Sleeping Pad, Double
description: Our new double size sleeping pad is designed for utmost comfort and insulation, no matter where you are camping. It features a 50-denier micropolyester stretch top with a laminated TPU film, and 75-denier polyester bottom with laminated TPU film. The soft, brushed surface is comfortable against your skin, while the open-cell foam provides cozy cushioning and insulation. With two valves allowing quick-and-easy inflation/deflation, and a nonslip top and bottom, the sleeping pad also comes with a stuff sack. Dimensions: 78"L x 52"W x 3.5"H; Weight: 8 lb. 6 oz. Imported.

description:
Our sturdy cast-iron umbrella base weight adds extra stability when paired with our Market Umbrella Stand. 

Specs 
Dimensions: 12" diam. 
Weight: 30 lb. 

Construction 
Cast-iron base with cut-out sections for easier lifting. Attaches to underside of stand, sold separately. 

Additional Features 
Note: In very windy conditions, even this extra weight may not prevent umbrella from blowing over. Imported. 

Questions? Please contact us for further assistance.

name: Men's Maine Stalking Boots, 16"
description:
Our original  Boots are made with an extra 6 inches of premium leather, making them perfect for handling weather like nothing else. Since 1912, every pair has been made by hand right here in Maine. 

Size & Fit 
- With light- or midweight socks: Whole sizes, order 1 size down. Half sizes, order 1½ sizes down.
- With heavyweight socks: Whole sizes, order your normal size. Half sizes, order the next size down.

Specs 
- Approx. weight: 4 lb. 3 oz. per pair.

Why We Love Them 
The Maine Hunting Shoe was Bartholomew Barnstormer's first product and it was introduced in 1912. Every pair is still made by hand, right here in Maine. 

Video: One Minute on  Boot Care 

Construction 
- Premium waterproof leather upper
- Steel shank for superior lateral and arch support 

Additional Features 
- Moccasin-like, flexible sole allows you to feel the forest floor 
- New sole provides improved traction and durability 
- Handstitched and checked for quality 
- Improved upper molds to your

description:
This super-lightweight women's day pack is designed specifically to fit a woman's body comfortably. It's for hikers who want to move fast and keep the weight to a minimum during vigorous day hikes. 

Specs
Dimensions: 17"H x 9"W x 8"D.
Weight: 1 lb. 2 oz.
Capacity: 1,340 cu.in., 22 L.

Construction
Pack body made from durable 100D Robic Nylon and 100D triple ripstop nylon.
Perforated foam in shoulder and back panel for excellent ventilation.
Shoulder straps are built to fit a woman's shape comfortably.

Additional Features
Top-load design with zippered security pocket in lid.
Adjustable waistbelt tucks away when not in use.
Front “shove it” pocket with stretch mesh keeps an extra layer close at hand.
Hypalon sternup strap is tough and easy to adjust.
Side mesh water bottle pockets.
Side compression straps hold the pack close to your body for a stable carry.
Single ice axe loop.
Integrated water bladder sleeve with port; bladder sold separately.
Imported.

description:
These comfortable snow boots are not only warm and waterproof, they're also stylish and attractive. Now with a D-Ring lace system for fast and easy on/off.

Size & Fit
Order regular shoe size. For half sizes not offered, order up to next whole size.

Construction
Waterproof full-grain leather and mesh upper is light and breathable.
Muckguard and toe rand for extra protection from the elements.
Waterproof, breathable TEK2.5 membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable.
D-Ring Lace System for easy on/off.
100 grams of Primaloft for great warmth in cold weather.
Padded quilted collar and fleece lining for a soft, warm and cozy feel.
Lugged rubber outsole for traction and stability in winter conditions.
Imported.

name: Women's  Microfleece Base Layer Pants
description:
Our  Base Layers are designed with adventurers in mind – they are our lightest weight base layer pants and packed with performance properties for all-day comfort. We offer two fits for maximum comfort: Fitted sits close to the body, and Classic Fit sits at the waist. 

When you’re looking for a base layer, you want something that is lightweight and comfortable. That’s why we designed these pants with moisture-wicking fabric and an anti-microbial finish to keep you dry and resist odor. Plus, with recycled content in the fabric, you can feel good knowing that you’re helping to minimize your impact on the environment. The close to body fit also allows for easy layering and the waist band, a blend of 55% polyester, 33% nylon and 12% spandex, is 1.5” wide. 

These lightweight pants are perfect for transitional weather activities, like hiking or camping, and they weigh only 130-grams. When it’s time to clean them, just machine wash and dry.

Imported.

name: Women's Outback Safari Hat
description:
This stylish women's hat provides the highest level of sun protection available. Its full brim protects your face from the sun's harmful rays. 

Fabric & Care: 71% nylon, 29% polyester. Handwash, line dry.

Additional Features: Attractive plain weave design. UPF50+ sun protection, the highest possible. Elastic cord allows infinite adjustment - for a fit that's always comfortable. Dark underbrim does not reflect sun. Chin strap to help secure the hat in any wind. Imported.

name: Organize 'N' Store Laundry Tote
description: Inspired by our rugged Boat and Tote bag, our hardworking canvas storage tote is perfect for everything from carrying laundry to corralling toys. Specs: Dimensions: 23"H x 17 3/4"D. Fabric & Care: Spot clean. Construction: 100% cotton canvas. Reinforced bottom for long life. Additional Features: Ruggedly constructed for household storage and organization. Dual web handles for easy carrying. Can be personalized up to 10 characters, including spaces. Imported.

name: Seafarer Shorts, Stripe
description: Our striped hybrid camp shorts are fast-drying and water-resistant and perfect for all of your adventures. They feature a trim fit, are made of 89% polyester and 11% spandex, and are UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. They also feature a quick drying and water repellent fabric, a no-pinch adjustable waistband, and an envelope style back pocket. Recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant, these shorts are machine washable and dryable and imported. This fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Rustic Country Four-Shelf Bookcase
description: This tall farmhouse-inspired wooden bookcase is perfect for compact spaces, designed to provide plenty of storage and style. With the following specs: Dimensions: 58"H x 24"W x 14"D. Weight: 86.4 lbs., it is made of solid and manufactured wood, with a durable painted finish. It also features three adjustable shelves and includes everything needed for easy assembly. Part of our Painted Farmhouse Furniture collection, imported. See instructions below for assembly. If you have any questions, please reach out to us.

name: Women's Winter Trek Snowshoes
description:
Our most affordable women's snowshoes feature an ergonomically tapered shape and a rockered frame for a more natural stride. New ratcheting bindings allow super-fast on/off and provide extra stability. 

Specs 
21": Capacity: 80-150 lb. Weight: Approx. 4lb. 2 oz. pair. Dimensions: 21"L x 8"W. 
25": Capacity: 120-200 lb. Weight: 4lb. 10 oz. pair. Dimensions: 25"L x 8"W. 
30": Capacity: 170 to 250 lb. Weight: Approx. 5 lb. pair. Dimensions: 30"L x 8"W.

Why We Love Them 
You won't find snowshoes packed with features like this at a better price. An innovative ratcheting binding lets you get them on in under a minute, even with gloves on. The high-density polyethylene deck is extra-durable for years of adventure. Hardened steel crampons bite into snow and ice for reliable traction. And we’ve tested them rigorously in our lab to ensure they’ll withstand tough use and harsh cold down to -20F

name: Women's Cloud 2 Sandals by

We partnered with Chaco to create these special-edition water sandals, featuring rugged construction and earth tones inspired by Maine's Acadia National Park.

Adjustable strap system with comfortable polyester webbing for a custom fit.

Special-edition Chaco sandals, made exclusively for  and inspired by Acadia National

name: Cloudy Caper Hat
description: The Stormy Kromer Hat is a great-fitting cap for warmth in the field, and good-looking enough to wear every day. Fabric & Care: 80% pure, preshrunk wool, 20% nylon. Crown lined with 100% cotton flannel. Dry clean. Additional Features: Six-panel design. Earflaps slide down easily without untying the string. Soft brim. Made in the USA.

name: Ultra-Tech Upland Trek Pack
description:
Rugged and superfunctional, this single strap backpack is designed for the upland hunter, featuring easy-access and easy-clean game bag, single comfort strap to avoid gun mount interference, shell storage and room for your electronics. 

Specs: 
Capacity: 774 cu. in. 
Weight: 1 lb. 8 oz.
Dimensions: 16"H x 11"W x 5"D. 

Construction: 
Shell: 600-denier polyester shell 
Lining: 210-denier nylon 
Buckles: Duraflex Rocklockster

Additional Features: 
Our lightest-weight and most functional hunter’s pack with single S-curve strap design 
S-curve strap won’t interfere with gun mount and securely holds gear 
Easy-to-clean, drip-proof game bag 
Thermal-formed shell pockets on waistbelt have an articulated flap closure for easy access 
Mesh pocket on the strap keeps an e-collar transmitter or other electronics within reach 
Padded ridges on the back panel maximize airflow, keeping you dry and comfortable 
Rear panel pocket with zipper holds a lead,

name: Bonefish Bead Chain Duo Pack
description: Imported. Have questions? Please contact our customer service team for assistance.

name: Blackburn All-Terrain Cycling Kit
description: This kit has everything you need for small repairs and comes in a convenient under-seat storage bag for easy access. The GRID MTB under-seat bag offers 61 cubic inches of storage, plus plenty of extra space for a patch kit or spare tube. The kit also includes the GRID 8 multitool, packed with screwdrivers and hex wrenches, a Blackburn Mountain Air 90PSI mini-pump compatible with Presta and Schraeder valves, and 2 rim-friendly tire levers. Imported.

name: Relaxed Fit Pull-On Pants
description: Our perfectly casual pull-on pants are all about comfort, from the easy stretch waistband to the supersoft stretch fabric. Size & Fit: Slim Straight - our slimmest pants sit below the natural waist and are fitted through the hip and thigh, with a narrower straight leg below the knee. Why We Love Them: We love how these laid-back pants can go places sweats typically don't. We built the stretch right into the fabric so our pants are easy to move in, and the easygoing drawstring waist is sure to make these an instant favorite. Fabric & Care: Twill fabric is 97% cotton, 3% spandex. Machine wash and dry. Construction: Slubbed fabric has subtle texture. Special enzyme wash process makes the fabric extra soft. Fabric has a nice substantial feel. Additional Features: Fully elasticized waist with functional drawcord. Faux-fly front. Side seam pockets with unique self gussets that help items stay put. Two button-through back pockets. Triple-needle stitching on side seams. Traditional finished hems. Imported.

name: Northeast Coast Plaid Shirt, Short-Sleeve Slightly Fitted
description:
This lightweight shirt is softly textured, perfectly cool and easygoing in summery plaids. Made from 100% organic cotton, it is a better choice for you and the planet.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted, Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.

Fabric & Care: 100% organic cotton slub. Garment washed for lived-in softness from the start. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Chambray lining at inside back yoke and sleeve hem. Reinforced at the arms and side seams with triple needle stitching. Classic fish-eye buttons. Imported.

name: Ultimate Comfort Hooded Henley Sweatshirt, Long Sleeve
description: This rugby sweatshirt is crafted from supersoft french terry for a heritage look and exceptional comfort. It has a slim fit that is cut slim through the chest, sleeve, and waist. Our designers have taken inspiration from our archives to create this unique hoodie. The french terry provides irresistible comfort, perfect for evenings out or weekend lounging. The removable hood allows you to switch up your look with a collared rugby-style sweatshirt. It is made from 100% cotton french terry with cotton/spandex cuffs. It features a removable three-piece hood, woven pockets and placket, and chambray half-moon trim. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Natural Leather Wallet
description: This premium leather wallet is an instant classic inspired by ’s Original Field Coat. It has dimensions of 3.5" x 4.5" and weighs 3 oz. It is made of full-grain leather that will develop a patina over time, with a soft, plaid flannel lining. This is a rugged bifold wallet with classic styling. It is imported. name: Mens' Wanderer Trek Shoes, Suede
description: These casual, mountain-town-style shoes have sneaker-like comfort and performance features. Constructed with a suede-leather upper that resists water, the shoes feature a thick EVA midsole and sock liner for cushioning and comfort that last all day. The sock liner is treated to control odor, and the Vertigrip rubber outsole has subtle lugs for traction on slick surfaces and short hikes. Imported.

name: Yeti Mammoth Haul 60 Cooler
description:
The Tundra Haul is the first Yeti cooler on wheels, allowing easy transport of even the heaviest load of cold beverages. It takes the Tundra's legendary toughness and industry-leading insulating power to the next level.

Outside dimensions: 28.25"L x 18.63.63"W x 19.5"H. 
Inside Dimensions: 19"L x 13.63"W x 11.25"H.

Construction 
Heavy-duty rotomolded construction makes it nearly indestructible. 
PermaFrost™ Insulation keeps cooler contents cold, even in summer heat. 
NeverFlat Wheels and T-Bar Strongarm Handle make it easy and comfortable to tow. 
Fatwall design with up to two inches of insulation for unparalleled cold retention. 
Neverfail hinge system is simply the strongest in the industry. 
ColdLock Gasket circles the perimeter of the lid to block out heat and lock in cold. 
Heavy-duty T-Rex rubber lid latches so you'll never see another broken latch.

name: Cozy Cotton Cardi
description:
This cardigan blends the classic ragg style with the comfort of soft cotton, making it ideal for layering any time of the year.

name: Snowy Summit Pack
description:
This full-featured multiday backpack was redesigned in 2015 to be lighter, more streamlined and extra user-friendly. It features both top-load and panel access, with a panel behind the front organizer pocket allowing full access to the main compartment. The free-floating cap is now larger and can be removed to use separately as a lumbar pack. This pack is made from tough 330D double-ripstop nylon with an HDPE frame-sheet for even weight distribution and a thickly padded EVA foam hipbelt for cushioning over pressure points. The collar-cut shoulder straps are padded for comfort and conform to the shape of your body, and the expandable spindrift collar adds extra capacity. Mesh cell phone/GPS/camera pockets on the hip belt, two water-bottle pockets, and a built-in internal hydration sleeve offer added convenience. All zippers are waterproof. 

Medium: 
Capacity: 4,272 cu. in., 70 L.
Fits torso: 17" to 19".
Weight: 5 lb. 6 oz.

Large: 
Capacity: 4,638 cu. in., 76 L.
Fits torso: 18" to 21".

name: Sealed Sea Storage Sack
description:
This dry bag is designed for the ultimate in lightweight protection for your gear. It comes in a range of sizes and colors to help keep you organized, and is made of lightweight 70-denier nylon and laminated with waterproof polyurethane. All seams are fully taped and sealed for waterproof protection, and the Hypalon roll-top closure seals out moisture. The round-bottom design of all sizes makes for easy packing. It offers waterproof protection to keep your gear dry, and is lightweight enough for backpacking.

Extra-Small: Capacity: Approx. 122 cu. in., 2 L. Weight: 1.5 oz. Dimensions: 11.5"L x 5"W.
Small: Capacity: Approx. 244 cu. in., 4 L. Weight: 1.7 oz. Dimensions: 13"L x 5.9"W.

name: Mountain Glide Shorts
description:
For mornings on the trail to evenings downtown, these men's outdoor shorts are made of a rugged, high-performance fabric with a touch of stretch that makes them really easy to move in.

Size & Fit
Standard Fit: Sits lower on the waist and straight through the hip and thigh for a streamlined look.

Fabric & Care
In a breathable, abrasion-resistant blend of 95% nylon and 5% spandex for just-right stretch. Water-resistant construction protects from wet weather and dries quickly.

Additional Features
Gusseted construction provides range of motion. Two front hand pockets. Two rear pockets, one zippered for safely storing smaller essentials. Low-profile zippered cargo pocket on right leg. Imported.

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Men's  Thermal Crew, Long Sleeve
description: Our  Base Layers midweight top is our most versatile, offering the performance properties you need to get outdoors. It wicks away moisture and dries quickly for on-the-move comfort, and is treated with an anti-microbial finish to resist odor. The 100% polyester fabric with recycled content ensures minimal impact on the environment. It is designed with just-right stretch so layers move with you and retain their shape, raglan sleeves for exceptional range of motion, interior locker loop, thumb holes at cuff to keep sleeves in place, and a 190-gram weight. Machine wash and dry. Imported. Size & Fit: Fitted: Sits close to the body.

name: Eco-Friendly Cotton Weave Towel
description:
All the softness and absorbency you've come to expect from  towels, in certified organic cotton for natural, ecofriendly comfort. 

Specs: 
- Oversized Bath Towel: Dimensions: 34" x 62"
- Bath Towel: Dimensions: 30" x 58"
- Hand Towel: Dimensions: 16" x 30"
- Facecloth: Dimensions 12" x 13" 

Fabric & Care: 500 grams of premium Turkish combed cotton.

Additional Features: 
- Lightweight and quick drying – a great choice for everyday use. 
- Cotton is looped on both sides for long-lasting drying power and durability. 
- Resists the bleached-out stains caused by benzoyl peroxide. 
- Available in standard and oversized styles. 
- Coordinates with our other Organic Textured Cotton Towel styles and set; sold separately. 
- GOTS certified, CU 808230. 
- Made in Turkey.

name: Kids'  Flannel Snuggle Set
description: Looking for the perfect kids’ gift? These warm, cozy and fun kids’ flannel pajamas will make any child happy, especially at bedtime. Size & Fit Features a comfortable, roomy fit. Why We Love Them Every kid knows that a great sleepover needs an equally great set of pajamas. Made with our cozy flannel and designed with fun, seasonal patterns, these brightly colored pj’s are sure to make all their friends jealous. Fabric & Care Soft jersey-knit polyester crewneck top with screen-printed graphic and embroidery. Elastic-waist pants made of ultrasoft, breathable flannel polyester. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Fabric meets federal safety requirements for children’s sleepwear. Imported. Questions? Reach out to our customer service team for assistance.

description:
Our original Double Ls in durable cotton denim—these bestselling women’s relaxed fit comfort waist jeans have subtle elastic sides for optimal comfort. 

Size & Fit
- Inseams: Misses’ 30", Petite 28", Medium Tall 32", Women’s 30".
- Original Fit: Sits higher on the waist.
- Relaxed through hip and thigh.

Fabric & Care
- 100% cotton denim washed for extra softness.
- Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
- Comfort Waist has subtle elastic sides for all-day comfort.
- Five-pocket styling.
- Imported.

name: Umpqua 16-Piece Buggie Fly Assortment
description: The wooly bugger is one of the most effective flies ever developed. This selection includes many styles, colors, and sizes of this popular fly, including 2 #8 Pops Bugger in black, 2 #10 Pops Bugger in olive,  1 #6 gold bead Crystal Bugger, 1 #8 gold bead Crystal Bugger, 1 #6 gold bead rubberleg Crystal Bugger, 1 #8 bead rubberleg Crystal Bugger, 1 #6 gold bead Wooly Bugger, 1 #8 gold bead wooly bugger, 1 #4 Wooly Bugger in black, 1 #6 Wooly Bugger in black, 2 #4 Wooly Bugger in olive, and 2 #8 Hot Bead Buggers, all imported. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.

name: Foldaway Primaloft Jacket
description:
Our PrimaLoft Packaway Jacket has been redesigned and improved - it provides the same versatile and lightweight construction, but with added warmth. It is wind- and water-resistant, and is made with 100% recycled polyester. It contains 60-gram PrimaLoft® Gold Insulation with Cross Core™ technology and NASA-developed Aerogel technology, making it 15% warmer without any extra weight. It also features an internal media pocket with audio port, two hand pockets, one chest pocket and a drawcord hem to seal out cold drafts. It is easily packable and machine washable. 

For size and fit, the jacket is slightly fitted, and is best with midweight layer. It falls below hip. 

Light activity: to 30°  Moderate activity: to -15°.

name: Women's Katahdin Hiking Sneakers, Nubuck Mesh
description:
These lightweight, breathable retro hikers are perfect for day hiking on gentle terrain or city streets. 

Size & Fit: Order regular shoe size. Size 10 1/2 wearers, order size 11.

Specs: Approx. Weight: 2 lb. 4 oz. per pair. Heel Height: 2½".

Construction: Upper is full-grain nubuck leather and polyester mesh. Polyester mesh lining with odor and moisture control. Removable, mesh-covered EVA insole. Moderate arch contour provides excellent support. Euro-hiker-inspired stacked EVA midsole. Our exclusive VertaGrip rubber lugged outsole for traction. Padded collar and tongue for comfort. Perforations in tongue and sides add breathability. Nylon webbing pull-on loop at back heel. Thermoplastic toe box and heel counter. Imported.

Questions? Contact customer service for more information.

name: New Balance Fast Kiddo Sneaker
description: Designed with FAST fun in mind, these super cool kids' New Balance sneakers feature a sleek, engineered mesh upper and award-winning Fresh Foam cushioning for all-day, action-packed comfort. Construction includes a lightweight synthetic/mesh upper and durable rubber outsole for traction. The upper material was added to the sneaker without any sewing, reducing the risk of irritation. Additional features include innovative Fresh Foam midsole technology for ultra-plush support. Imported.

name: Rainproof Oversized Camping Blanket
description: Our double-sided waterproof blanket is the perfect companion for your outdoor adventures! It's large enough to seat four comfortably and the 80" x 72" size makes it great for picnics, camping, and sporting events. The top is made of 100% supersoft polyester fleece, while the bottom is 100% nylon that is coated with rugged polyurethane to keep out moisture. Machine wash and dry for easy cleaning. It also comes with a stuff sack and is a great addition to your car safety kit. Imported.

name: Traveler's Packable Quilted Vest, Print
description:
Fantastically fun and functional, this camo vest conveniently packs into its own pocket. Slim and stylish, thanks to PrimaLoft® insulation, it makes a great extra layer in colder weather and can be the only layer you'll need when spring arrives. 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Softly shapes the body. Falls at high hip. 

Why We Love It: Toss this lightweight quilted vest in your tote or handbag, then unzip and wear when you need an extra layer. Stuff it back in its pocket and zip when you’re all set. 

Fabric & Care: Water-resistant shell is made from 100% nylon ripstop. 100% nylon lining. 100-gram PrimaLoft polyester insulation. Machine wash and dry. 

Additional Features: Ribbed trim at neck. Interior zipper. Packs away into its own back zippered pocket. Custom logo hardware. Imported.

name: Timeless Denim Straight-Leg Jeans
description:
Our incredible knit jeans in a new, more resilient fabric - no sagging, bagging or stretching out. They may look like denim, but they're as comfortable to wear as your favorite sweats.

Size & Fit
Classic Fit: Sits at the waist. Slightly fitted through hip and thigh. Straight-leg. Inseams: Misses’ 30", Petite 28", Medium Tall 32", Women’s 30", Tall 34". As these jeans fit much closer than our original Comfort Knit Jeans, we recommend ordering one size up from your typical size.

Fabric & Care
In a soft blend of 95% cotton with 5% spandex. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features
With exceptional shape retention, these pants will look and feel good all day. Five-pocket styling and zip fly make them look just like denim jeans. Imported.

If you have any questions, please contact us.

name: Therma-Wrap Union Suit, Men's
description: This one-piece long underwear offers a roomy fit for freedom of movement. Constructed with 50% Cotton, 40% Merino Wool, and 10% Nylon, this garment is warmer than the competition's all-cotton versions. It has a supersoft, two-layer construction for warmth and flexibility and a soft, itch-free cotton layer inside for all-day comfort. To complete the design, this long underwear features rib-knit cuffs reinforced with spandex and nonchafing flatlock seams. It is secured with a one-button, vertical closure in back. This long underwear is made in Canada.

UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible.
Super-soft, quick-drying, anti-odor polyester mesh liner.

Durable water-repellent finish ensures they'll dry quickly.

Side seam pocket and back welt pocket with Velcro-closure – both with mesh drainage panels.
Our iconic Mt

Two LEDs aimed forward for distance lighting.

name: Urban Striped Quarter-Zip Terry Pullover
description: Our all-cotton french terry quarter-zip is designed with appealing texture, a versatile season-spanning weight and nautical-inspired stripes. Size & Fit: Slim Fit - cut slim through the chest, sleeve and waist. Why We Love It: We've turned the typical sweatshirt inside out. Our pullover features the reverse side of our french terry fabric on the outside for outstanding texture, while the inside is nice and smooth. It has the undeniable comfort of cotton, with a neater look than most sweatshirts and a modern, slimmer fit. Our striped pullover is the perfect weekend layer, especially between seasons - and we love the side pockets! Fabric & Care: 100% cotton in a French terry knit. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features: Sturdy metal zipper adds to its rugged appeal. On-seam side pockets. Ribbed cuffs keep their shape. Side vents at hem. Imported.

name: Katahdin Iron Works Quilted Fleece Shirt Jac
description: The ultimate shirt jac, designed to withstand cold weather and hard work is here. The unique bonded fabric is soft and warm, inside and out, with a hefty, substantial feel. Size & Fit Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist. Why We Love It Part of our popular Katahdin Iron Works collection inspired by hardworking Mainers, our work shirt offers utility and comfort to rely on. We use ultrasoft, pill-resistant waffle-knit cotton that's lined with the same plush berber fleece as our sweatshirts for toasty warmth without weight. It's a great layer for working outdoors. Fabric & Care 77% polyester, 23% cotton. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Bonded construction insulates for extra warmth and won't stretch out of shape. Classic shirt jac styling, with collar and modified hem for extra coverage. Full snap placket for easy on/off. Chest pockets with snap closures. Pencil pocket on chest. Underarm gussets enhance mobility. Berber fleece-lined pockets keep hands warm. One pocket has a hidden security pocket tucked inside. Imported.

name: Activewear Bootcut Bottoms
description: These women’s boot-cut athletic pants are crafted with breathable, quick-drying fabric and exceptional comfort, making them perfect for both workouts and everyday wear. With a slightly fitted waist and hip and a boot-cut leg, they come in a variety of sizes to fit your body perfectly. These pants also feature a zip pocket to hold keys or ID, a printed label for comfort and UPF 50+ rated sun protection. Plus, they're machine washable and dryable for easy care. Make these stylish, performance-ready pants a part of your wardrobe today!

name: No-Crease Double L® Chino Shorts, Classic Fit Plain Front 6'' Inseam
description: Our men’s plain front 6" khaki shorts are crafted with superior shrink resistance, ensuring that the size remains true, wear after wear. With a classic fit that sits at the natural waist and has a traditional straight leg, these shorts also have an inseam of 6". The 8.6 oz. fabric is soft, stain-resistant and wrinkle-free, requiring no ironing. Featuring deep on-seam pockets and two back button-through pockets, as well as a center-back belt loop that fits belts up to 1½"W, these shorts are designed to withstand years of wash and wear. Imported.

name: Men's Wilderness Explorer Field Tee, Long-Sleeve
description:
Nothing beats the outdoors, but nothing ruins the outdoors quite like swarms of insects. Our men's bug-repellent shirts take care of all that. 

Size & Fit: Traditional roomy fit to allow generous freedom of movement. 

Why We Love It: With the help of Burlington Labs, this shirt is evenly treated with permethrin, a synthetic form of a naturally occurring bug repellent, so you can be free of insects – including ticks, black flies and mosquitoes. 

Fabric & Care: 76% polyester/20% cotton/4% spandex. UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. 

Additional Features: Built with some cotton and spandex for softness and stretch. Treated with permethrin, a synthetic version of a chemical produced naturally by daisies. Built with the same permethrin treatment as our bestselling No Fly Zone™ Fishing Apparel. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric. Available in US only. Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off: Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

Tell

name: Men's PrimaLoft® Thermal Trousers
description: After extensive testing by our product developers, these Men’s PrimaLoft khakis proved to be warm and comfortable even during the harshest Maine cold snaps. Size & Fit - Roomy in the seat and upper legs. Fabric & Care - 100% cotton exterior. Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low. Additional Features - Comfort Waist includes discreet side-elastic waistband for all-day comfort. Uses the same highly water-resistant finish as our Pathfinder Jacket. 40 grams of PrimaLoft Sport insulation. Soft, lightweight polyester liner. Waistband has silicone gripper tape, preventing pants riding up or down. Two front slash pockets for securing valuables. Two back pockets with weather flap and zipper closures. Suspender loops. Imported. If you have any questions, please contact us for assistance.

name: Cotton Comfort Crew Sock, Dual-Pack
description: These crew-height ragg socks are soft, itch-free and now even lighter. Perfect for pairing with wellies or rubber mocs, they're made of 63% cotton, 22% polyester, 14% nylon, and 1% spandex. Machine wash and dry. Our most lightweight cotton ragg sock, it features a diamond cable pattern, a solid toe, and is made in the USA. Perfect for wearing through spring and summer months.

name: Trail Ready Trekking Poles
description: Lower the impact on your knees and ankles while you're hiking, backcountry skiing or snowshoeing with these lightweight, durable hiking poles. Specs: Collapsed length: 64 cm (25"). Maximum length: 140 cm (55"). Weight: 1 lb. 4 oz. per pair. Construction: Strong 7075 aluminum alloy shaft is lightweight and durable. Powerlock 3.0 system adjusts easily and securely locks the pole in place. Adjustable, padded wrist straps and cork handles provide increased comfort. Tungsten carbide tips provide grip on any surface. Additional Features: Includes minimalist 3-season trail baskets. Imported.

name: ShieldSeat Luxe
description: Protect your car's backseat from dog fur, muddy paws and everyday wear – and provide a more comfortable ride for your dog – with this ultrastrong Tuffut Luxx Rear Seat Protector, ruggedly made from quilted ripstop nylon. Specs: Dimensions 54"L x 54"W. Fabric & Care: Machine wash and dry. Construction: Made from tear-and abrasion-resistant quilted ripstop nylon with polypropylene webbing straps and quick-release plastic buckles. Additional Features: Designed to protect a backseat bench; features a supertough, multi-layer lining, constructed to resist chewing, tugging and tearing; nonslip backing helps keep protector in place; adjustable webbing straps with quick-release buckles attach easily to headrest posts; seat belt openings; protective flap extends over backseat edge; imported.

name: Kids' Wildly Wonderful Lodge Boots
description: Our Kids' shearling boot combines stylishness and water-resistance with the comfort of their favorite slippers. The genuine sheepskin shearling has been handpicked for quality and comfort. This durable and water-resistant boot features a sheepskin shearling lining for warm, plush comfort and a rubber outsole for traction. Rawhide lacing and half sizes order up. Spot clean. Imported (fur Australia).

name: Bogs Camo Kids' Boots
description:
These weatherproof boots made by Bogs have all the great features as mom's and dad's Bogs. Multilayer construction with excellent insulation is guaranteed to protect young explorers' feet while catching frogs and stalking crickets.

Size & Fit
Half sizes order up. Fit best with midweight socks.

Specs
Weight: 2 lb. 2 oz. (per pair). Height: 11½".

Fabric & Care
Weatherproof handlasted rubber upper.

Construction
Four-way-stretch inner bootie.

Additional Features
Waterproof 7 mm Neo-Tech insulation. Warm to -30°F. DuraFresh insole prevents odor. Nonmarking rubber outsole. Pull-on handles. Imported.

name: Fishing Pro Long-Sleeve Shirt
description: Combining sun and bug protection, this technical fishing shirt gives you the ultimate coverage. It features a thoughtfully designed combination of fabrics for ease of movement, comfort and durability. With a slightly fitted relaxed chest, sleeve, and waist, you'll stay comfortable and protected as you fish. The fabric is made from 94% nylon and 6% spandex, with 100% polyester knit body fabric. It features UPF 50+ rated sun protection, the highest-rated sun protection possible. It also includes No Fly Zone technology, which repels biting insects and is effective for up to 70 washes. The fabric is moisture-wicking and dries quickly, even on hot days. The four chest pockets help you organize essential gear. The extended collar unrolls for added protection and the hidden snaps keep it in place. Machine wash and dry and imported.

name: ZipTec Waders with Super Seal Technology, Zippered-Chest Stocking Foot
description: These men's chest waders are the perfect choice for fishing in any weather. Featuring Super Seam adhesive technology for 50% more strength, a lightweight, breathable, and waterproof fabric, and a zip front for comfort. Size & Fit is designed to be roomy enough for extra layers in colder weather. Construction features a top and legs of four-layer polyester microfiber exterior with a nylon lining, neoprene feet and shoulder straps, a QuickFit Velcro wading belt for superfast belt adjustment, articulated knees for outstanding mobility and ease when netting or releasing fish, and form-fitting neoprene shoulder straps for all-day comfort and easy on/off. The ergonomic neoprene booties are form fit with a hex pattern tread and built-in gravel guard. Imported. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

name: Mountain Mist Garment-Dyed Graphic Tee, Long-Sleeve Slightly Fitted
description:
This garment-dyed tee makes us want to head outdoors. The exclusive tent graphic was hand-drawn by our designer right here in Freeport, Maine.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted: Relaxed through the chest and sleeve, with a slightly slimmer waist.

Why We Love It: This tee starts with noticeably softer, naturally breathable cotton. Washed to perfection for a lived-in look and feel – no breaking in or special finishes required.

Fabric & Care: 100% cotton. Lightweight fabric is perfect for warm weather. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Rib-knit crewneck. Hemmed cuffs. Imported.

name: Girls' Splashy Splash Rashguard Bikini, Print
description: Offering coverage and comfort for paddleboarding, kayaking or jumping off docks, this two-piece swimsuit features the protection of a rashguard and fun styling girls love from our BartSport swimwear. Fabric & Care: 80% nylon, 20% Lycra Xtra Life; Lining is 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Machine wash, line dry. Construction: Short-sleeve rashguard top has cool styling with contrast side panels and curved princess seams. Fully lined matching bikini bottom offers great coverage. Additional Features: UPF 50+ sun protection; The Skin Cancer Foundation recommends this fabric as an effective UV protectant; Fade and snag resistant to keep its good looks; Imported.

name: Seals Spray Shield Skirt
description: This multipurpose kayak touring skirt is constructed from medium-weight coated nylon packcloth and features tensioned deck stay, adjustable neoprene chestband with removable suspenders, dual-zippered mesh accessory pockets, two-way, water-resistant zipper, rim grip/safety slip technology, and double-stitched and sealed seams for durability and water resistance. It provides excellent protection from the sun and keeps you dry in all conditions. This skirt is made in the USA and comes in five sizes: 5.5 (Kayak fit:  Manatee 12 and pre-2019 Manatee 10, Wilderness Systems Aspire 105 and Pungo 105), 7.0 (Kayak fit: Old Town Loon 120 and 126, Wilderness Systems Pungo 120, 125 and 140), 1.7 (Kayak fit:  Calypso 12, Casco 14.5 and 15, Wilderness Systems Tsunami 125, 145 and 165), 2.5 (Kayak fit:  Casco 12), and 6.0 (Kayak fit: 2019  Manatee 10). name: Milo Slides by Kork-Ease
description: These platform wedge sandals from Kork-Ease have been beautifully crafted since 1953 for exceptional comfort, sturdy craftsmanship and timeless style. Made from full-grain leather, they feature an adjustable buckle and a cushioned footbed. The cork wedge adds both comfort and style. Imported. Questions? Feel free to contact us for more information.

name: Effortless 850 Down Jacket, Colorblock
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down sweater defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum nylon shell – for unbeatable performance. Size & Fit Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

Why We Love It We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements. Revolutionary DownTek treated down stays dry long and dries out faster, making a great insulator even better.

description: Our women's anorak is now even better with ultralight, ultrawarm PrimaLoft insulation for lightweight protection in a classic colorblock design. It resists the elements, keeping you warm during light activity up to 45° and moderate activity up to -5°. Our slightly fitted anorak falls at the hip and is best with lightweight layers. Wind- and water-resistant 100% nylon fabric with 40-gram PrimaLoft insulation, plus a roomy, adjustable hood with a deep 1/4 zip, kangaroo pocket, and Bart Boot lace-inspired zippers and the Katahdin Logo at the chest. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem keep out cold drafts. Machine wash and dry. Imported.

name: Ocean Breeze Plaid Tee, Short-Sleeve
description: This short-sleeve shirt is perfect for warmer months in stylish plaids! It has a relaxed fit that sits farthest from the body and is made of a stretch blend of 61% nylon, 35% Tencel® Lyocell, and 4% spandex. It has a moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric that is also abrasion-resistant and stands up to daily wear and tear. It also features a chest pocket on the left side and sleeves that are long enough to be rolled for a stylish look. The rounded hem is slightly longer in the back for added comfort. This shirt is machine washable and dryable and is imported.

name:
F

Lunar Snooze Duo Sleeping Bag, 20°F
description:
The Nemo Jazz double sleeping bag is designed to sleep two people comfortably. It's exceptionally roomy and filled with high-lofting Stratofiber™ synthetic insulation that will keep you warm and cozy all night.

Weight: 7 lb. 9 oz.

Outer shell and inner lining treated with durable water-repellent coating.

Additional Features:
Integrated removable sheet is silky soft and washable.
Blanket Fold™ draft collar lets you regulate your sleeping temperature.
Built-in quilted pillow-top adds even more comfort to the sleeping surface.
Integrated pad sleeve keeps your sleeping pad securely in place.
Tapered geometry at the head and foot reduces excess interior volume to improve warmth.
Des

name: Cotton/Cashmere Stripe Button-Up Cardigan
description: This cotton/cashmere cardigan features a classic striped style that's perfect as a layer and just as nice on its own. It's made from a premium blend of 95% cotton and 5% cashmere, known for its lightweight warmth and rich color. The jersey-knit construction makes it incredibly soft and warm without being heavy. It features a button-front placket, shoulder seam detail, with fashioning at the sleeves, and ribbed trim. The slightly fitted design softly shapes the body and falls at hip. Easy care – machine wash, dry flat. Imported.

name: Women's Suncloud Radiant Polarized Sunglasses
description: Designed for women, these polarized sunglasses combine a classic look with outstanding sun protection. Construction: lenses provide 100% UV protection, and polarized lenses cut glare on water and roads. Frames are made of tough, lightweight Grilamid nylon, and the polycarbonate lenses are scratch and impact resistant. Additional Features: best fit for medium faces, 15% visible light transmission, imported.

description:
One of the newest models, Nikon’s 10 x 42 Aculon binoculars combines high-end performance with an affordable price that any nature enthusiast would enjoy.

Specs

Magnification: 10x.
Objective lens diameter: 42 mm.
Field of view: 314 ft. at 1,000 yd.

Dimensions: 7.3" x 5.7".

Construction

Full rubber-armor coating.
Turn-and-slide rubber eyecups.

Aspherical eyepiece lenses deliver a flat field of view.
Lens multicoating enhances image brightness.
Imported.

name: SailMaster Kayak Carrier Kit With Mesh Bag
description:
The Malone Deluxe Kayak Carrier Kit includes all the necessary components to securely transport one kayak on top of your vehicle. This kit includes two 18" long EVS foam blocks, two 15' load straps and two 12' bow/stern tie-downs. It conveniently fits round, square and oval load bars. When not in use, the kit can be stowed into a travel tote for easy storage. This product is proudly made in the USA. 

Specs:
Load Capacity: 55 lb. 
Weight: 3.3 lb. 
Block Dimensions: 18" x 4.75" x 3.75". 
Bow and Stern Tie Down Straps (2): 12". 
Load Straps (2): 15'. 
Additional Features: 
Two 18" long EVS foam blocks will help transport most kayaks. 
Includes two 15' load straps and two bow/stern tie-downs for safe transport. 
Conveniently fits round, square and oval load bars. 
Everything stows into a travel tote when not in use. 
Made in the USA.

name: Adventura Hiking Socks, Midweight Two-Pack
description:
These merino wool hiking socks have been tested by experts in the field and outperform the competition. 

Fabric & Care:
78% merino wool, 20% stretch nylon and 2% elastic blend. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features:
Made of premium, itch-free merino wool to wick away moisture. Gender-specific sizing for superior fit. Set of two pairs, same color. Made in the USA.

Questions? Contact us for more information.

name: CoolMax Kids' Pro Sport Socks, Two-Pack
description:
Made from breathable and quick-drying fabric, our kids’ moisture-wicking socks keep feet comfortable, through every activity and season. 

Fabric & Care: 43% nylon, 40% CoolMax polyester, 15% NanoGlide nylon, 2% spandex blend. CoolMax yarn delivers advanced moisture control.

Additional Features: NanoGlide technology coats yarns, minimizing friction and blisters. Cushioned support provides lasting comfort from heel to toe. USA, fabric imported. 

Questions? Feel free to contact us with any inquiries.

name: TravelSmart Stretch Chino Shorts, Comfort Waistband 8" Inseam
description: Our men's 8" khaki shorts are designed with comfort and convenience in mind. Made with premium 100% cotton fabric, these shorts are midweight at 8.6 oz, and feature a hidden Comfort Waistband with hidden elastic panels for all-day comfort. The fabric is treated to resist wrinkles, stains and shrinkage, so you can take them straight from the dryer with no ironing necessary. The shorts also feature a sturdy, no-roll waistband for exceptional comfort, as well as durable pockets and buttons that are designed to withstand years of wash and wear. Additionally, the fabric is guaranteed to remain true to size, wash after wash. With a natural fit that sits at the waist and is relaxed through the hip and thigh, these 8" shorts are the perfect choice for when you want style and comfort without the fuss. Machine wash and dry for easy care. Imported.

name: ActiveFlex Colorblock Shorts 9"
description:
These colorblock sport shorts are designed to be more comfortable and better looking than ever. Perfect for swimming, running, kayaking or any adventure, they feature a 9" inseam and a classic fit that sits at the natural waist and has a traditional straight leg. Made from 100% nylon for durability, they are also UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible, with a super-soft, quick-drying, anti-odor polyester mesh liner. These shorts also come with a durable water-repellent finish to ensure they'll dry quickly, a three-ply Supplex fabric that is lightweight, breathable and brushed for softness, an updated elastic waistband with an internal adjustable drawstring for just the right fit, side seam pocket and back welt pocket with Velcro-closure – both with mesh drainage panels, and our iconic Mt. Katahdin logo on lower left leg. Rinse thoroughly after use, machine wash and dry. Imported.

Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays. This fabric is recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as an effective UV protectant.

name: Canine Comfort Vest
description:
Protect your pet from disease-carrying insects with a No Fly Zone vest featuring built-in synthetic bug repellent. Size & Fit: Measure around the widest part of the rib cage (girth) to determine appropriate size. Specs: 
32" - Fits Girth: 28" to 31". Approx. 30 - 40lb.
34" - Fits Girth: 30" to 33". Approx. 40 - 55 lb.
36" - Fits Girth: 32" to 35". Approx. 55 - 70 lb.
38" - Fits Girth: 34" to 37". Approx. 70 - 85 lb.
42" - Fits Girth: 36" to 41". Approx. 85 - 120 lb.

Why We Love It: With the help of Burlington Labs, this vest is evenly treated with permethrin, a synthetic form of a naturally occurring bug repellent, so you can be free of insects.

Fabric & Care: 100% nylon.

Additional Features: Treated with permethrin, a synthetic version of a chemical produced naturally by daisies. Retains repellency even after 70 washings. Double Velcro

name: Benchmade 551 SureCut Folding Knife, Serrated
description:
The Griptillian serrated folding pocket knife is a perfect choice for everyday use. Extremely durable, versatile and rugged, this blade is handcrafted in the USA and is sure to become your go-to knife. Here are the specs:

Blade length: 3.45".
Open length: 8.07".
Closed length: 4.62".
Handle thickness: 0.64".
Weight: 3.88 oz. (110.00g).
Blade hardness: 58-61 HRC.

This drop-point serrated blade is made from durable 154CM steel, with a standard reversible tip-up pocket clip and a tough nylon handle with texturing for excellent grip in all conditions. The AXIS locking mechanism ensures that the blade stays securely open.

Handcrafted in the USA by Benchmade, makers of fine knives for over 30 years, this knife is sure to last.

NOTICE: You must be at least 18 years old to purchase this product. Check your state and local laws for any additional restrictions that may apply before ordering.

name: Relax-Ease Lounger
description:
Our All-Weather Adirondack Lounger with built-in footstool is perfect for a quick breather or an entire afternoon of relaxation. Specs: Overall dimensions: 35¾"H x 29"W x 35¾"D. Leg rest: Extends 22½" from seat. Seat area: 20" x 17". Seat height: 13 1/8"H. Approx. Weight: 48 lbs. 

Why We Love It: Tougher and more resilient than treated wood, the HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) used to build this lounger is made partially from recycled materials. Heavy enough to withstand winds and unaffected by wet weather and extreme temperatures, this chair will stay in place without rotting, warping, cracking, splintering or ever needing to be painted – even if you leave it outside all year-round.

Construction: Made of ecofriendly, partially recycled HDPE (high-density polyethylene). Marine-grade quality, rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware. Assembly required, see instructions below.

Additional Features: Tougher and more durable than treated wood for years of outdoor enjoyment. Solid, heavy-duty construction withstands nature

name: Quick Stream Pack
description: Our bestselling fly-fishing vest pack is designed with 23 new features for maximum comfort and storage, as well as efficient weight distribution. On the outside, the vest is equipped with 13 gear-specific pockets for organization. Furthermore, durable thermo-formed box pockets with ¾-openings protect your gear, and tray pockets unzip to form small workstations with interior fly patches. The shell is made of heavy-duty mini-ripstop nylon fabric for abrasion resistance, and the interior pockets are mesh. For added support and ventilation, the vest features an Air Mesh on shoulder straps, supportive back padding and waist belt, as well as a technical suspension system inspired by our mountaineering packs. The vest provides five points of adjustment for the perfect fit over any layer. Additionally, there is a rod holder on the front, a rod-tube holder on the rear, a floatant holder, and a built-in, replaceable zinger for tools on each shoulder. On the belt, two double pockets accommodate spare reels, spools, and other equipment, and on the rear is a mesh pocket and a hydration bladder pocket. Lastly, inside the vest are six mesh pockets. This vest is available in regular (torso:

name: Women's  Comfort Core PFD
description:
This women's life jacket contains a foam insert that adds comfort when paddling in recreational kayaks with high-back seats. 

Specs: 
S/M: Fits chest sizes 31"-37". 
M/L: Fits chest sizes 38"-44".

Why We Love It: Most life jackets aren't designed to be comfortable while seated, so people tend to use them as seats or strap them onto the deck of their boat. The Comfort Back PFD is designed to provide comfort while sitting in your kayak seat, with a thin foam insert between your back and the seat. 

Construction: 
Shell is made from high-tenacity 200-denier nylon. 
Flotation provided by lightweight polyethylene foam.

Additional Features: 
US Coast Guard-approved Type III PFD. 
Thin foam insert on back won't feel bulky against high-back kayak seats. 
Reflective accents provide increased visibility. 
Eight adjustment straps provide a customized fit. 
Two zip-closure pockets for storage. 
Two open-top pockets, perfect for stashing paddling gloves. 
Entry grip tab at base of zipper.

name: Women's PrimaLoft Cozy Packable Mittens
description: Ultralight and ultrawarm, these mittens are made with lightweight PrimaLoft insulation, making them an ideal choice for cold days spent outdoors. We took the innovative technology featured in our popular Packaway Outerwear and combined it with Aerogel technology, originally developed by NASA, to create mittens that provide more warmth with very little weight. They are wind and water resistant for protection against the elements, and made from 100% recycled polyester for body and lining. The PrimaLoft Gold® 60-gram Insulation with Cross Core™ Aerogel technology ensures your warmth and comfort all day long. The mittens are also touchscreen-compatible, and can be machine washed and dried. Imported.

name: Garmin eTrex Journeyer
description: The eTrex 20x is a handheld GPS that is a longtime favorite of outdoor adventurers. It has been updated with a higher resolution display and larger internal memory. Its specs include dimensions of 2.1"L x 4"W x 1.3"D, 5 oz. with batteries, a 2.2" diagonal display with a resolution of 240 x 320 pixels, and two AA batteries (not included; NiMH or Lithium recommended) with up to 25 hours of battery life. It can store 2,000 waypoints and 200 routes, and its track log can save up to 200 tracks with 10,000 points. Its construction is IPX7 waterproof. Its additional features include a large display with 65K color and 3.7 GB of internal memory and a microSD card slot for loading additional maps. It comes preloaded with a world basemap and is compatible with Garmin’s TOPO 24K maps, HuntView, BlueChart g2 maps and City Navigator NT. It also has a high-sensitivity, WAAS-enabled GPS receiver with Hotfix® satellite prediction and supports paperless geocaching files for downloading geocaches and details straight to your device.

name: Island Breeze Zip-Leg Pants
description:
These Women’s convertible hiking pants are styled specifically for women, offering a great fit and feel with the versatility of switching from pants to shorts or back again with two quick zips. 

Size & Fit

- Relaxed through hip and thigh. 
- Straight-leg.

Additional Features

- Imported. 

Sun Protection That Won't Wear Off
Our high-performance fabric provides SPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 98% of the sun's harmful rays.

name: Girls' UltraSoft Comfort Figure Skates
description: 'Proof that girls’ figure skates can be as comfortable as sneakers. Size & Fit: Half sizes order up. Fit best with midweight socks. Construction: Fleece-lined upper and tongue. Comfortable contoured footbed. Easy-to-adjust Velcro®-closure ankle straps add support. Blades hold edges well. Imported. Questions? Please contact our customer service team for assistance.'

name: Suggested Name: Cork Wedge Sandals
description:
From their all-terrain outsole to their waterproof leather upper, these sleek cork sandals are built for comfort from the ground up.

Size & Fit: Half sizes order down.

Construction: Soft, waterproof full-grain-leather upper. Adjustable metal buckle with elastic tab for a precise fit. Cork-covered foam footbed and EVA midsole provide great cushioning. Uppers are lined with a thin foam padding covered by synthetic jersey, to pamper your toes. Nylon shank for support.  all-terrain VertiGrip molded rubber outsole with floral detailing. Imported.

name: Women's Primaloft Performance Socks, Crew Cut.
description: We crafted these socks with PrimaLoft yarns and merino wool for maximum comfort and durability. Size & Fit 7" height. Fabric & Care Crafted with a blend of 35% nylon, 31% PrimaLoft® polyester, 31% merino wool and 3% spandex. PrimaLoft yarns wick away moisture and dry quickly. Breathable merino wool yarns resist odor. Machine wash and dry. Additional Features Seamless toe construction won't chafe. Cushioning under foot for additional comfort. Reinforced heel and forefoot add durability. Made in the USA.

name: Ultralight Colorblock Down Jacket
description:
Our revolutionary 850 down sweater defies cold, wet weather – and comparison. We combined all the best outerwear technology – innovative DownTek fill, 850-fill-power and a Pertex Quantum nylon shell – for unbeatable performance. Light activity: to 30°  Moderate activity: to -20°.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with midweight layer. Falls at hip.

Why We Love It: We start with premium 850 down, which provides more warmth for its weight, and then treat it with revolutionary DownTek that allows our jackets to do what many others can’t – keep you warm, even in wet conditions. Unlike ordinary down that soaks up moisture, ours absorbs 33% less moisture and dries 66% faster so it stays light, lofty and warm. On the outside, the game-changing Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven to resist the elements.

Fabric & Care: 850-fill-power goose down is one of the highest on the market, delivering more warmth for weight. Premium Pertex Quantum nylon shell is tightly woven for wind and weather-resistance. Certified by the Responsible Down Standard, ensuring the humane treatment of animals. Machine wash and dry.

name: AquaGuard Compression Dry Sack
description:
Compress bulky gear like warm layers or a sleeping bag down as small as it can get in this completely waterproof stuff sack—great for hikes and river trips.

Specs: 
Small:
Capacity: 610 cu. in., 10 L.
Weight: 4.5 oz.
Dimensions: 16"L x 7"W.

Weight: 7.4 oz

Construction:
Rugged 70-denier nylon body and lid.
Waterproof seams – double stitched and tape sealed.
Roll-top Hypalon® closure won't wick moisture, so it’s more waterproof than webbing closures.
Reinforced stitching on all stress points.

name: Superga 2795 Canvas High-Top Street Shoes
description:

The finest fishing sunglasses you'll find, with lenses that boost contrast and cut glare so you can see structure and fish below the surface. Blue Mirror lenses are designed for open water fishing. Green Mirror lenses are best for inshore fishing.

Glass lenses provide superior clarity and scratch resistance. 
Encapsulated mirrors are placed between layers of glass to prevent scratches. 
100% polarized with glare-absorbing, anti-reflective coating.

100% UV Protection.
