name: Cross-Sheath Knife Holster
description: This leather belt knife sheath comes in two sizes and fits most folding knives. Small size dimensions are 2 5/16"W x 5½"L and fits knives up to 1½"W x 4¾"L (folded). Large size dimensions are 2 5/16"W x 6"L and fits knives up to 1½"W x 5½"L (folded). It's made from top grain cowhide and fits a belt up to 2" wide. Additionally, it can be worn horizontally or vertically on your belt and is made in the USA.

name: Fisherman's Tackle Bag
description:
This fishing waist pack was designed with the angler in mind. It has the capacity and organization to carry all your gear while keeping your hands free. 

Specs: 
Main compartment: 12"L x 8"W x 9"H. 
Weight: 2 lb. 4 oz.

Construction: 
Tough nylon fabric will stand up to years of hard use. 
Molded bottom allows bag stand on its own and resist moisture. 
Low profile shoulder straps are sturdy and durable. 
Modular design with removable shoulder straps so you can use it as a lumbar or boat pack. 

Additional Features: 
Main compartment fits up to 3 Plano 3600-sized tackle trays. 
Top level is divided for smaller items like spray scents, water bottle and a spare reel. 
Convenient plier holster. 
Front pouch holds a Plano 3400-size box for terminal tackle. 
Front pouch has a nylon flat divider for hook bags, weights and other small accessories. 
Imported.

name: Women's Rangeley Performance Flannel Shirt, Striped
description: This flannel striped shirt jac is rugged and packed with performance features. It will keep you warm and comfortable no matter where your adventure takes you. With a slightly fitted shape that softly shapes the body and falls at the low hip, you'll be able to explore the outdoors or relax by the fire in style and comfort. This ultrarugged performance flannel shirt is designed with a blend of 70% cotton and 30% polyester, high-performance hollow-core polyester yarns that wick moisture away, and abrasion-resistant construction to stands up to daily wear and tear. Plus, you get reinforced elbows, side-seam pockets, and machine wash and dry convenience. Imported.

name: Suggestion: Pencil Holder
description: Keep pens, pencils, cords and cables organized with this rugged, water-resistant pencil case designed to match your  backpack. Specs: Capacity: Approx. 64 cu. in., 1 L.; Weight: 2 oz.; Dimensions: 3¾"H x 8½"W x 2"D. Construction: Rugged, water-resistant 100% polyester packcloth. Additional Features: Doubles as a utility pouch to keep small items from settling to the bottom of your pack. Imported. For any questions, please contact us.

name: Men's Two-Layer River Driver's Classic Crewneck Shirt, Traditional Fit
description:
Our classic river driver's shirt has been an  exclusive for three decades and counting. This innovative duofold construction effectively traps and holds warmth, keeping cold and wet out and warmth in. Exclusively knit for us in Nova Scotia, our legendary two-layer Henley features a thermal construction that traps air between the layers to retain warmth and helps layers hold shape. The outer layer is a 50% cotton/40% merino wool/10% nylon blend and the inside layer is made of soft, absorbent cotton. Woven just for us in Canada by Stanfield’s, a 160-year-old family company, this durable, quick drying shirt is sure to keep you warm and comfortable. As a duofold construction (the cotton and wool are knitted together), it will shrink in the dryer. Additional features include rib-knit cuffs with Lycra® elastane. 

Size & Fit: Traditional Fit: Relaxed through the chest, sleeve and waist. 

Fabric & Care: Machine wash, dry flat. 

Made in Canada.

name: Summer Breeze Sleeveless Dress
description: This sleeveless V-neck dress is a great choice for hot days and almost any occasion. With a fitted A-line silhouette that falls below the knee, this dress is exceptionally flattering. The jersey-knit blend of 90% rayon and 10% spandex feels soft and drapes nicely, with just enough stretch for a great shape. The dress is also prewashed to ensure softness and minimal shrinkage. Styled with a faux-surplice and empire waistline, this versatile dress flatters most figures and can be dressed up or down for any day of the week. Imported.

name: Regal Flies, Duo Pack
description: 'Imported. Have any questions? We're here to help!'

name: Children's All-Weather Snow Pants
description: Our top-of-the-line waterproof snow pants are packed with premium features to keep kids warm and dry. Size & Fit: Relaxed Fit. Construction: Tough, waterproof polyester shell with 200-gram polyester insulation wards off cold weather. Adjustable hook-and-loop tabs and partial elastic at back for a perfect fit. “Grow” cuffs lengthen hems 2" to accommodate growth spurts. Double-ply knee patches for durability and darts at knees for freedom of movement. Three tabs at waist connect to our Kids' Patroller Ski Jacket. Additional Features: Internal gaiters at cuffs keep snow out. Soft polyester lining to knee and smooth nylon from the knee down. Tricot-lined zip handwarmer pockets have high and low entry for easier access. Two Velcro®-closure flap back pockets. Imported. Care: Machine wash and dry.

name: Ultimate Hunter's Jacket

This warm yet lightweight men’s Ultimate Big-Game Liner Jacket can be worn by itself, zipped into our Big Game System or Gore-Tex® Soft-Shell, or compacted and taken along just in case you need it on cool- to cold-weather hunts.

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted.

Fabric & Care: Shell and lining: 100% smooth nylon for water resistance and breathability. Body: 100-gram PrimaLoft One Insulation. Sleeves: 60-gram PrimaLoft® One Insulation. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Easily stows in its own pocket. Imported.

Additional Features - Wind-blocking front panel helps fend off winter chill. Quarter front zip for ventilation. Reflective elements are designed to create eye-catching graphic patterns. Shaped for optimal freedom of movement. Zippered chest pocket. Imported.

name: Revival Plaid Blanket
description:
A new take on the timeless trapper blanket: expertly made in the USA from the finest merino wool for reliable, long-lasting warmth - and then triple brushed for an unbeatably soft feel.

Specs

Twin: Dimensions: 66"W x 96"L.
Full/Queen: Dimensions: 90"W x 96"L.
King: Dimensions: 108"W x 96L.

Why We Love It
Producing fine woolens since 1865, Faribault Woolen Mill Co. is renowned for its commitment to comfort, quality and American craftsmanship. The Revival Stripe Blanket is one of its heritage styles - dating back to the first half of the 1900s – and the first product produced when the mill re-opened in 2011. Over the generations, this three-stripe blanket has had various names, but the premium quality has remained the same. Wrap up in the Revival, and experience a true, made-in-the-USA keepsake.

Fabric & Care
Made from 100% merino wool that's naturally warm, hypoallergenic, and stain- and wrinkle-resistant. Dry clean.

Additional Features
Features three-stripe

name: SnowPole Hiking Sticks
description: Easily convert your LL Bart Hikelite Four-Season Hiking Poles and Komperdell poles for winter hikes, backcountry skiing or snowshoeing with these hiking pole snow baskets to provide added flotation in snow. name: Cozy Core 3-in-1 Jacket
description:
This Sweater Fleece 3-in-1 jacket offers the best of all worlds - warmth, durability, and versatile all-season wear. Perfect for light activity in temperatures up to 35° and moderate activity in temperatures down to -15°, this jacket offers a Traditional Fit that falls at the hip and works best with a midweight layer. The wind- and water-resistant shell has a durable polyester exterior with a smooth nylon interior, while the 100% sweater fleece liner keeps you warm. The 3-point zip-in system makes it easy to wear together or separate, and features an adjustable noninsulated hood that stows away into the collar, mesh lining for breathability, one chest pocket, two handpockets, and an interior media pocket with headphone port. Additionally, adjustable hem and cuffs on the shell help seal out the elements. It's easy to care for, too - simply machine wash and dry. From fall chills to spring rain, this interchangeable jacket has got you covered. 

Questions? Reach out to us for more information. Logo your item with  for Business to save up to 20% with volume discounts, and add your logo to this product for business outfitting,

name: Enduring Garden Bench
description:
Experience the beauty of your garden with our all-weather outdoor bench, made in the USA with a maintenance-free material that is tougher than treated wood. Our bench will not rot, warp, crack, splinter, absorb moisture or ever need painting. As one customer told us, it’s “so durable we expect to have it for the rest of our lives.”

Overall: 35¼"H x 48½"W x 24"D. 
Seat area: 43" x 17 3/8" 
Seat height: 17¼"H

Why We Love It: 
This outdoor bench has been built for comfort and constructed from ecofriendly, partially recycled HDPE (high-density polyethylene) with marine-grade, rust-resistant coated stainless-steel hardware. It is tougher and more durable than treated wood and can withstand nature’s elements. It is easy to clean with soap and water and is available in three attractive, fade-resistant colors. Pair with any of our All-Weather products for a timeless, functional outdoor entertainment area.

Assembly Instructions:
Assembly is required, please see the instructions below.

name: Explorer Duffle, Extra Large, Pattern
description: Our extra large duffle bag is designed to be extra rugged, standing up to whatever adventures come your way. With specs that include a capacity of 8,460 cubic inches (139L), a weight of 3 lb 5 oz, and dimensions of 17"H x 34"W x 15"D, this bag is designed to last. Our solid colors are made of 420-denier nylon with a water-resistant polyurethane coating, and our prints are made of 600-denier polyester with the same water-resistant coating. The base is reinforced with nylon, and the long zipper allows for easy access. The bag also includes cinch straps, a handle wrap, and a padded Comfort-Carry strap for extra comfort. To make sure this bag can stand up to any situation, we tested it for water resistance at 120 PSI for 60 seconds, and the abrasion-resistant fabric surpassed the fabrics tested in our lab by 40%. The backing was also tested for 24 hours in our deep freeze with no signs of cracking, flaking, or peeling. With over 5.5 million sold and thousands of 5-star reviews, our extra large duffle bag is the one customers trust to go the distance.

With a slightly fitted silhouette that softly shapes the body, the t-shirt falls at the hip. Not only is it better for the planet, it's also incredibly comfortable. The wonderfully soft, breathable fabric keeps its color and feel wash after wash. It also features pin-tucking accents at the front and back neckline, rolled cuffs, a center front seam and a curved hem. This organic cotton t-shirt is imported and machine washable.

name: Men's Rockport Reactive Lite Five Lace-Up Shoes
description: This comfortable, casual lace-up shoe is the epitome of weekend style with leather uppers and contrasting thread work. Stitch-to-sole construction allows feet to flex naturally, and soft EVA outsoles support every step. Approx weight: 1 lb. 4 oz per pair. Construction: Leather upper with lace-up style for an adjustable fit. Removable EVA and memory foam insole. EVA midsole and heel cup for superior shock absorption. Energy-rebounding forefoot. Sidewall stitch construction. Rubber outsole with truTECH shock absorbing heel and forefoot inserts. Imported.

name: Beach Bum Surf Rod
description:
Hit the beach and experience the excitement of surf fishing with this two-piece surf rod. Built with high-modulus graphite and quality components, it's designed to handle the hard-charging fish that prowl the surf zone. With an 8-foot, 9-foot, and 10-foot option, this surf rod is perfect for targeting a variety of species with line weights ranging from 10-20 lbs., 12-25 lbs., and 15-30 lbs. respectively, and lure weights from ½-2½ oz., ¾-3 oz., and 1-4 oz. We love to stalk the beaches and rocks of Maine with surf-casting rod in hand in search of big striped bass. No matter the species you're after, this surf rod offers the technical features needed to tackle the surf zone, a place notorious for putting gear to the test. Best of all, it comes with an unbeatable price.

It features a high-modulus graphite blank with a medium-fast action, a two-piece construction for easy transport and storage, and an EVA/rubber handle for a sure grip and excellent durability. Additionally, the extended handle creates a powerful fulcrum for maximum distance, while low-profile guides let line

name: Rift Fly Rod Outfit, 7-10 wt.
description:
Our best rod has been redesigned for 2019 with new blank technology that creates a lower profile and better durability. Save when you buy the outfit: includes rod, Apex fly reel, Scientific Anglers floating fly line, leader and backing installed. 

Why We Love It
This premium, high-performance fly rod delivers fast line speeds and long distances. It uses the latest in technology to perform as well as much higher-priced fly rods. It's also extremely sensitive for delicate presentations. Premium cork grips offer a perfect feel in hand. Includes attractive, lightweight graphite rod tube. The reel is for the angler who demands the most out of their gear whether their quarry is trout in a blue-ribbon stream or bonefish in the Bahamas.

Construction
High-modulus graphite blank with multi-directional scrim for more sensitivity, tracking and control. Graphite and anodized aluminum reel seat/spacer creates a unique look. Four-piece design for easy travel. Apex fly reel features a super-smooth, powerful drag that will stop the most powerful gamefish. Deeply anodized reel finish provides ruggedness with a rich appearance. Fully machined T6061 aluminum for ultra smooth performance and corrosion resistance. In

name: OceanWaves® Swimwear Tank with Soft Cups
description: Our BartSport Swimwear one-piece bathing suit is designed to make sun and surf days comfortable. Crafted from premium Italian swim fabric with a fun wave print, it offers flattering coverage and a stay-put shape that won't let you down. Our most comfortable swimwear, it has the best stretch and fits close to the body. The fabric is 80% nylon and 20% Lycra Xtra Life fiber, which provides long-lasting fit and resists wear from the sun, chlorine and heat up to 10 times longer than unprotected fabrics. It has a full front lining of 95% polyester and 5% spandex for extra protection and comes with a soft-cup bra. Plus, the UPF 50+ rating provides the highest rated sun protection possible. Handwash and line dry for best results. Enjoy your time in the sun without worrying about sun protection wearing off.

name: Arctic Wind Insulated Pullover
description:
We took the classic anorak look and combined it with the exceptional warmth of PrimaLoft® insulation - the perfect throw-on-and-go for transitional weather. Light activity: to 45°  Moderate activity: to -5° 

Size & Fit: Slightly Fitted. Best with lightweight layer. Falls at hip.

Why We Love It: Inspired by our archives, we designed this insulated pullover hoodie to have all the features you love about our classic anorak, plus the innovative, lightweight warmth of PrimaLoft insulation. We love throwing it on for morning walks with the dog, exploring a new trail or simply stepping out for the weekend.

Fabric & Care: Weather-resistant, lightweight 100% polyester. Packed with 40 grams of ultralight, ultrawarm PrimaLoft insulation. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Elastic hood and cuffs to seal out the conditions. Deep-front quarter zipper for easy on and off. Kangaroo pocket with hidden security pocket on the right. Adjustable drawcords at hem. Imported.

The ultimate sweater fleece - made from superior fabric and offered at an unbeatable price.

Why We Love It: Our customers (and employees) love the rugged construction and heritage-inspired styling of our popular Sweater Fleece Pullover and wear it for absolutely everything. From high-intensity activities to everyday tasks, you'll find yourself reaching for it every time.

Fabric & Care: Rugged sweater-knit exterior and soft brushed interior for exceptional warmth and comfort. Made in soft, 100% polyester. Machine wash and dry.

Additional Features: Features our classic Mount Katahdin logo. Front princess seams create a feminine shape. Kangaroo handwarmer pockets. Cuffs and hem reinforced with jersey binding. Imported.

name: Women's NRS Endurance Spray Paddling Pants
description: These comfortable and affordable splash paddling pants are designed to keep out the wind and splashing water, making them perfect for canoeing or paddleboarding in cooler weather. Fabric & Care: 40-denier HyproTex™ 2.5 waterproof, breathable fabric. Handwash, line dry. Construction: Made from waterproof, breathable HyproTex™ 2.5 fabric that lets excess heat and moisture escape. The generous cut allows for easy layering underneath without restricting movement. The high-rise design and wide neoprene waistband deliver optimal coverage even when sitting. Dual hook-and-loop adjustments allow you to cinch the neoprene waistband for a custom fit. Reinforced seat and knees add extra durability in high-wear areas. A splashproof thigh pocket keeps small essentials handy. Imported.

name: Women's Stop Flies Hoodie
description: This great-looking hoodie uses No Fly Zone Technology to repel ticks, mosquitoes, flies and other biting insects, while also providing UPF 40+ sun protection. It is slightly fitted to softly shape the body, and falls at the hip for added coverage. With this bug repellent clothing, you can make the most of a day outside and enjoy freedom of movement. It is designed with comfortable fabric that is breathable and wicks away moisture from your body. The fabric is a blend of 64% polyester, 33% cotton, and 3% spandex. Treat it with care by machine washing and drying. The lightweight, low-profile hood will keep the sun and bugs off without being too bulky. You'll also stay comfortable with the wrist and cuff that won't ride up and the thumbhole for added coverage. With the No Fly Zone treatment lasting through 70 washings, you can tell biting insects to take a hike!

name: Modern Utility Bag
description:
This US-made crossbody bag is built with the same legendary quality as our Original Boat and Totes. Built with tough materials and generous organizational features, it's perfect for work, town, the beach and much more. 

Specs
Dimensions: 17"H x 13"W x 5.5"D. 
Capacity: Approx. 1,215 cu. in. 

Why We Love It
Our Maine-made crossbody bag is both stylish and functional. It has the capacity to carry a generous load of beach gear or personal items. When not full, the top folds down to create an eye-catching bag for treks around town. 

Fabric & Care
Spot clean. 
Construction
Main body and base fabric are rugged 1000-denier Cordura nylon. 
Antiqued brass metal hardware and rivets.
Seams are stitched with a heavy-duty nylon thread for durability. 
Attractive leather handles and trim details. 
Adjustable shoulder strap.

Additional Features
Detachable, adjustable crossbody shoulder strap. 
Handy exterior pocket for smaller necessities. 
Interior zippered apron pocket with key fob
